story:
Civic Brigade

#knowyourcongress

from non-profit Beacon Initiative, Inc. 

 

The portrayal of our Congress across the internet and the media focuses almost exclusively on party lines. Civic Brigade's goal is to provide more meaningful insight into what legislators are actually doing.
 
At the heart of this is our app Pure Democracy. Here we present to you speeches made on the floor of Congress and let you decide if the energy spent crafting and expounding on said topic is a valid use of our extremely expensive representation.
 
Keep in mind that no one in Congress makes less than $174,000 and there are 541 total members of Congress. That's a lot of money to be paid to give speeches about "A Tribute To Stock Car Racing Legend Dumont Smith".
 
The impression from reading through these speeches is that a huge amount of time is wasted by political pandering. The reverse perspective is also enlightening, in spite of the obvious pandering going on how thoughtful and important a lot of the remarks are.
 
When we began working on this app we were all quite cynical with regard to Congress but working through the speeches and bills has brought about a new appreciation for our legislators. Many people on Capitol Hill share our hopes and fears about where our country is heading and are doing everything they can to try and improve our situation.

 

Our Goal: Software and products meant for civic-minded folks to encourage accountability in our nation's Congress

 

Here’s some more info about Civic Brigade…

  • Civic Brigade's Pure Democracy app uses the voice of the people to create unbiased profiles of our elected officials, enabling our "Civic Brigadier" users to decide what represents legitimate debate versus unproductive use of floor time by reviewing an anonymous issue by issue view of what Congressmen and House Representatives choose to converse about. Click on the link to see a demo of what we are doing!
  • Civic Brigade is a launching point to develop a way to respond to Congress.
  • Important to note that both Beacon Initiative and Civic Brigade are non-partisan.

We intend to create iOS and Android versions of Pure Democracy with the funding from this project. 

 

Beacon Initiative is a startup 501(c)3 non-profit with a commitment to helping you be more informed and better able to stand up to manipulation and hateful speech on the internet and in general. No matter how you look at it developing cutting-edge new technologies costs time and money. Your tax-deductible contribution will be greatly appreciated.

 

We wanted to let you know what you can do, what we're doing, and how we can work together! Thank you for your interest and support! Any and all contributions are greatly appreciated.

story:
What Is WeBond?

Creating a Safer World Today

Who We Are

Do you know where your child is right now?

We are WeBond Inc. We are a group of concerned fathers and mothers; we are engineers and entrepreneurs from the Silicon Valley. Family safety is our major goal. Families cannot be happy when over 470,000 children are reported missing according to FBI records annually in the United States alone, that is over 50 children every single hour! That is a very scary statistic.

We do not want your child to be a statistic.

YOU CAN PARTICIPATE NOW and YOU SHOULD.

We would like you to join the revolution. 

Our immediate goal is for parents to keep their children safe by buying these smartwatches and putting them into action. While keeping their children safe, parents will help us raise our first $27,000 crowd funding target. 

The watches are ready and the App is done.This money will help us finish the last stages of boxing, packaging, building inventory and shipping the products to the participating families.

As we have succeeded in bringing this product to life, we are working on other products that will increase family safety such as pets and elderly devices. 

Safe families are happy families. 

Join the revolution. 

Be part of it. Buy today.

 

         

Capabilities and Functions of the Track'n'Play include:

  • Call Your Child: The Track'n'Play has its own phone number and you can set speed dial to call Mom or Dad.
  • Text or Voice Message your child.
  • SOS Capabilities: If your child is in trouble they can simply "hold down" on the easily located SOS button.
  • Geo-Fencing: Allows the parent to set a perimeter around their child and receive a notification if they outside the set area (i.e., school).
  • Current Location and Location History: Find out where your child currently is, or where they were at any point in the day.
  • Second Parent Monitoring: Both parents can monitor the child and provide special access to family members or child care.
  • Parent Controlled Contact List: You as a parent will be able to upload a contact list to your child's Track'n'Play Smartwatch from your app. Your child cannot dial numbers not on the list nor change the list.
  • Parent Set Alarms: You can add alarms on the watch from the app to remind your child to perform agreed on activities.
  • Syllabus: Your child's class schedule can be uploaded to the watch from the app.
  • Pedometer: The watch automatically acts as a pedometer tracking your child's activity. You can see the results on the app.

Other functions in the Track'n'Play include a calculator, a calendar, three-map viewing, and more!

PURCHASE NOW FOR UP TO 43% OFF:

Now is the time to purchase a smartwatch for your child. Our first hundred contributors will receive a 28% discount on individual watch packages and a 43% off discount on our package specials!

If you can’t contribute, please help us by spreading the word to parents, grandparents, aunts, and uncles, friends, and colleagues of school-aged children about our amazing product. The weBond team thanks you for letting us share our product with you and we hope you will join us in our efforts.

We have brought our concept to reality and are excited at how our smartwatch can help parents gain extra peace of mind knowing that they are providing another “security blanket” for their children’s well-being.

story:
We are here to bring you the best innovative products directly with the highest quality without the high retail price.

World’s only Fast charging AC adapter with smart lightning cable design with voltage protection circuit and real time status LED indicator

Four Status LED

One Green is 25% Full,Two Green is 50% Full

Four Green is fully charge ! NO more Charging in the Dark !



With Our QC 2.0 fast charge circuit, the charging current for iPhone 6 / 6+ increased from 1 AMP to 2.02 AMP. Charging iPhone 6 / 6+ over 200% faster.


FlashLight's smart charge circuit design allows for seamless power transfer.

  • Build in AC adapter transfer energy to your smartphones or tablet
  • Build in Smart Status LED with 4 LED
  • Supports Qualcomm Quick-Charge 2.0 rapid charge
  • Supports Apple 2.4mode (Maximun 2.4A@5V)

Our working prototype is plastic mock up, but we have designed a durable, cool light alloy casing for mass production. That's why we need the funding for the alloy tooling for the final product. Our backer has the choice to pick Silver or Gold alloy casing for the perk.






Others Adapters and USB cable can only provide iPhone 6/6+ with a 0.47 AMP charging current.

No more messy cable and additional adapter, It's the perfect travel companion and even include a AC adapter with the retractable cable. 

True Fast Charging On The Go

With the Quick-Charge 2.0 ciruit design and OFC cable, it give you faster and secure charging than other chargers or cable in the market

It is an ultra portable charger with fast charging circuit designed to fully charge your smartphone, support iPhone 6/6+,Samsung and QC 2.0.

With Our QC 2.0 fast charge circuit, the charging current or iPhone 6 increased from 0.47 AMP to 2.02 AMP. Over 400 % increasing charging power.

Perks


It is our mission to provide innovative products at deeply discounted pricing for our IndieGoGo backers. Why pay full price at your local retail store when you can double your value with a smaller, faster and more powerful product?  

Be the early bird to get hand on this wonderful fast charging cable !

Risks and Challenges:
Being an OEM supplier for the past 10 years, we have developed stringent procedures with our manufacturing factorys, who has been manufacturing grade A quality products for our OEM customers.
They both have been proven with high production capability, therefore manufacturing risk is at a minimum.

As for the challenge of delivery,we have already produced fully functional prototypes, once the funding goal reach, the machine tooling can be done in 6 to 8 weeks, then we are already for mass production.

story:
1. Brightest Headphones Around.

Premium sound with ultimate expression.  Glow lights up with vibrant laser that pulsates to your favorite music. Use the Glow App for iOS or Android to control the laser intensity, so you can go bold or subtle depending on your mood.


2. First  & Only Laser Headphones.

Beautiful and brilliant. Glow is the only headphone illuminated by Fibrance™ light diffusing fiber designed by Corning to conduct pure, radiant laser light that pulses to your music. 


3. Designed for Total Control.

The intuitive touch button design lets you respond to texts, snap pictures and use voice commands to stay connected like no other headphone.



4. Designed for Everyone, Everywhere.


5. Reviews & Facebook Fans

Product reviews by top tech publications

Check out our Facebook page to read fan reviews & feedback


6. Shipping in March

Retail Packaging 

Flat Ribbon Micro-USB charging cable

 Silicone eartips - S, M, L


7. Nerdy Stuff

Premium Audio Drivers
Glow uses premium audio drivers specially tuned so you'll hear all the highs and lows of your music.

Specs & Features

  • Premium audio drivers
  • Glow works for music listening even without battery (3.5 mm audio jack)
  • You can turn off the glowing feature for ninja mode
  • Bluetooth connection for smart controls

Smart Remote 

    • Processor - ARM Cortex
    • Micro-USB
    • When fully charged - Glow has up to 8 hours of battery life
    • 353 mAh Rechargeable Battery

story:
Get PaperLike now on www.getpaperlike.com - FREE worldwide shipping!

 

"...writing on the PaperLike produces a better result than writing on the surface of the screen. From this point of view, the mission is fulfilled." - igen (French)

"I definitely have more control on my stroke, it doesn't feel like I'm fighting to take control of the lines, the difference is like night and day." - Graphic artist

"When using the pencil setting on Apple notes and the PaperLike, I can promise I subconciously felt the smell of a pencil." - Philip Maurer / Web designer

For some years now I've been trying to go paperless. For this I tried the iPad and all kinds of styluses and it never really worked. It was impossible to write and rest the hand on the screen, styluses were not precise and mostly it was a unsatisfying experience.

Until the new iPad pro and Apple Pencil came out. I was blown away by its responsiveness and palm rejection, but regrettably the plasticky feel when writing on the iPad with the Apple Pencil really disappointed me, as I really missed the haptic feedback.

I then decided to fix this, as there wasn't a good solution in the market. After some extensive research and testing we made the PaperLike. It is a screen shield that makes writing on the iPad Pro with the Apple Pencil feel like writing on paper. It is incredible how it completes the iPad Pro experience.

No matter if in a meeting or simply collecting thoughts. Handwriting with the Apple Notes App and the PaperLike is the most paper like digital experience ever. You can even rest your hand on the display without leaving finger marks.

Sketching with the Procreate App and the PaperLike is the best digital sketching experience that feels like paper on the iPad. With the PaperLike, your hand slides nicely on the iPad’s surface, making the sketching experience much more rewarding.

No more printing, no more heavy books or documents. You can now write directly on a page, make notes or highlight on the iPad while keeping the paper feel. Combine the haptic feedback of paper with today’s connected digital tools.

  • Makes writing on the iPad Pro with Apple Pencil feel like paper
  • No fingerprints
  • Protects your screen from scratches
  • Drastically reduces glare

The PaperLike works with all iPad Pro models. And man it adds the missing detail to the awesome iPad Pro.

The PaperLike has been made to simulate the feel of paper when using the Apple Pencil. The material is hard enough to add the needed tooth and surface texture, but still not too coarse so that the screen noise is minimal.

The PaperLike is a worthy iPad upgrade for paper people like me. All titles, sketches and annotations in this campaign were made by me on the iPad Pro using our latest PaperLike Prototype. It has been a joy building this campaign, and I'm looking forward to revolutionising your iPad experience and having you on board!

Compatibility

Compatible with both iPad Pro models: the bigger (12,9') and the smaller one (9,7'). Interested in the new iPad Pro 10.5' model? Subscribe here to be notified when available.

Thanks for reading this far. I hope you got all the Info you needed and decided to back us and get your own PaperLike! Anyhow, I'd love to hear from you in case you have feedback or have any open questions keeping you from joining this campaign. Please open the FAQ and click on "ask a question".

Now shipping!

You're writing about the PaperLike? Here the PressKit with pictures you can freely use: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/cnwdbs169uugpfa/AAA7... you can get in touch with me directly over hello@sapper.me.

story:
HALLAM NEW YORK smart jacket has 3 types of styles: Hoodie, Varsity Jacket, and Wool Jacket. Moreover, there are 4 types of jackets based on functions: BASIC, SMART, WORKOUT, and TRAVEL.

 

BASIC Jacket has 14 types of functions, such as AUTO-CONNECT FAVORITES, AUTO-MUTE POCKET, AUTO-MUSIC PLAYING POCKET, NECK PILLOW, SLEEP SHADE, BUILT-IN GLOVES, and VENTILATION ZIPPER. 

 

SMART Jacket is the best choice for smartphone users. It includes bluetooth badge, which has 7 additional functions comparing to Basic Jacket, such as SMART PHONE LOSS PREVENTION, GPS TRACKING, FINDING A SMARTPHONE, PUSH NOTIFICATIONS, MUSIC CONTROL, MacBook, iPad CONTROL, and SELFIE.

 

WORKOUT Jacket has 5 additional functions comparing to Smart Jacket, such as CHARGING WHILE IN USE, CHARGER POCKET, BATTERY WARM-UP MODE, ELECTROMAGNETIC  WAVES SHIELDING, and SAFETY LED FLICKER. 

It includes Battery Pack to power up anywhere, and LED Pack to keep safe during night workout.

 

TRAVEL Jacket has 5 additional functions comparing to Workout Jacket, such as KEY CHAIN, SELFIE TRIPOD, BLUETOOTH EARPHONE, MAGNETIC CHARGING CABLE, and CAP. It helps charge smartphone conveniently, listen to music with bluetooth earphone, and take photos easily with tripod. Moreover, it is useful to prevent lost luggage by key chain.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SELFIE 

 

MUSIC CONTROL (PLAY, STOP, SKIP)

 

AUTO-CONNECT FAVORITES 

 

LED FLICKER 

 

MAGNETIC AUTO CONNECT CHARGING WHILE IN USE 

 

BUILT-IN GLOVES

  • SMARTPHONE LOSS PREVENTION
  • PUSH NOTIFICATIONS 
  • MUSIC CONTROL 
  • MacBook, iPad CONTROL 
  • GPS TRACKING
  • FINDING A SMARTPHONE

  • Battery : Rechargeable battery with charge lifespan of 14days
  • Connectivity : Bluetooth 4.0
  • Device Compatibility : iPhone 4s & later ,iPad 3rd Generation & later,and Android devices with Bluetooth 4.0
  • BADGE is made of high quality glossy metal or matt plastic or top-grain genuine cowhide leather. All the materials are hypoallergenic

 

 

KEY CHAIN

 

  • KID PROXIMITY ALERT
  • ANTI-THEFT VALUABLES 
  • SMARTPHONE LOSS PREVENTION
  • GPS TRACKING
  • AUTO-DIAL TO THE OWNER
  • AUTO-SHARE CONTACT

 

  • Diameter : 39 mm 
  • Thickness : 5.8 mm 
  • Weight : 13 g (0.40 oz)
  • Battery : Rechargeable battery with charge lifespan of 14days
  • Connectivity : Bluetooth 4.0
  • Device Compatibility : iPhone 4s & later ,iPad 3rd Generation & later,and Android devices with Bluetooth 4.0
  • KEY CHAIN is made of high quality glossy metal or matt plastic or top-grain genuine cowhide leather. All the materials are hypoallergenic

 

 

BATTERY

  • Dimensions : 96mm x 62mm x 7.2mm 
  • Weight : 61g ( 2.15 oz )
  • Capacity : 3000 mAh 
  • Input Power : 5V / 1A ( Micro USB )
  • Output Power : 5V / 1A ( USB Port )
  • Lithium Polymer 1000 Cycle Grade A Battery 

 

 

NFC

  • Weight : 0.5 g

 

NFC FUNCTION

  • Diameter : 19 mm 
  • Thickness : 3.6 mm 
  • Weight : 1 g  　
  • Battery : Rechargeable battery with charge lifespan of 14days
  • Connectivity : Bluetooth 4.0
  • Device Compatibility : iPhone 4s & later ,iPad 3 rd Generation & later,and Android devices with Bluetooth 4.0

　

 

CAP

 

SELFIE TRIPOD

  • Diameter : 1.3 inch 
  • Weight : 280 g (9.8 oz)

 

 

 

 

  • It's your time to shine with this hot item while you enjoy traveling, camping, partying, playing games, listening to music, taking photos and all kinds of sports activities such as jogging and biking. 
  • It comes in handy wherever you are, whenever you go out, who you are with　 

 

 

 

We are a startup company founded in Manhattan, New York in September, 2014. We have specialized teams for jacket design, jewelry design, Bluetooth & NFC research, wearable technology, smartphone accessories and production that work collaboratively to design and produce creative and smart technology products of HALLAM P NEW YORK. The CEO, Hallam Park, majored in design and for the last 15 years he has been a designer and a creator. The motto of his work has been to provide a happier, healthier, and more convenient life for people who are exhausted from living busy lives. Park has put his passion and creativity into numerous product designs, turning 10 of them into patents. During his work, he experienced the inconvenience of having to use a smartphone for virtually everything in our society and started working on a design that could compensate for the mental stress and inconvenience smartphone causes.  After 2 years of tremendous effort and research, world’s first smart jacket was released for both iPhone and android users.

 

 

 

SMARTPHONE LOSS PREVENTION

When you are more than 33 feet away from your smartphone, alarm goes off on BADGE and your phone through an app called HALLAM P NEW YORK to prevent losing your phone. BADGE contains the latest Bluetooth 4.0 pcb board and it works precisely as it is paired up with your smartphone. 

 

 

KID , PET PROXIMITY ALERT

After you take out KEY CHAIN from the jewelry pocket, you can hang it on a < child’s clothes or bag / dog collar >. When the < child / pet > is more than 33 feet away from you, alarm goes off on BADGE and your phone through the app HALLAM P NEW YORK to warn you. 

 

 

ANTI-THEFT VALUABLES 

When you take out KEY CHAIN from the jewelry pocket, you can hang it on the valuables such as Mac Book, luggage or pets. When they are more than 33 feet away from you, alarm goes off on BADGE and your phone through the app HALLAM P NEW YORK to warn you.

 

 

GPS TRACKING

If you lose your smartphone, child, pet, or valuables, you can activate the location-tracking on HALLAM P NEW YORK App to locate them.

 

 

FINDING A SMARTPHONE

Can't find your phone ? press your badge button to ring your Phone even if it's on Silent! We make finding your phone too easy. 

 

 

PHONE CALL, TEXTS, SOCIAL MEDIA PUSH NOTIFICATIONS

If you are not able to hold your phone in your hand, BADGE lets you know when you receive calls, messages or social media notifications, through the HALLAM P NEW YORK App.

 

 

MAGNETIC AUTO CONNECT CHARGING WHILE IN USE 

When you run out of phone battery, bring a built-in magnetic cable in the sleeve close to the charger port on the phone. Then, it would get matched automatically, making it very convenient to charge even in the dark.

　

 

MAGNETIC AUTO CONNECT CHARGER POCKET

The right chest inner pocket holds an auto-coupling magnetic cable. It automatically connects to and charges the phone very conveniently. 

 

SAFETY LED

When you are outside in the dark, jogging or riding a bicycle, LED lights will keep you safe. There are three lighting modes: constant light, slow blinking and fast blinking. If you use the same lighting mode with your friends or family, it’s easy to spot them even in pitch dark. 

 

 

LED FLICKER 

While jogging or riding, It reduces the risk of traffic accidents when turning.

 

 

MUSIC CONTROL (PLAY, STOP, SKIP)

When you listen to music with your smartphone in the pocket or bag, you can play, stop and skip a song with just one click. When you click the button on JACKET Badge once, it plays, another click stops it, and two consecutive clicks change the song.

 

 

SMART TV, MacBook, iPad CONTROL (PLAY, STOP, SKIP)

BADGE can play, stop and control smart TVs, MacBooks and iPads. It is convenient to use it to remotely control the devices during a presentation or else. 

 

 

SELFIE 

When using a selfie stick or a tripod, clicking the button on JACKET Badge will take a photo for you, as long as you’re within 33 feet. 

 

 

AUTO-CONNECT FAVORITES 

When you tag the smartphone to the right sleeve (NFC functions built in), it automatically connects you to bookmarks, such as google or Facebook. 

 

 

AUTO-SOS CALL

When you tag the smartphone to the left sleeve (NFC functions built in) in the case of danger of emergency, it dials 911 automatically.

 

 

AUTO-MUTE POCKET 

When you put the smartphone in the left pocket (NFC functions built in), it automatically shifts to “Mute mode”, which turns off sound or blocks WIFI and Bluetooth. It is especially useful when you have to turn off those functions urgently at a meeting or a movie theater.

 

 

AUTO-MUSIC PLAYING POCKET 

When you put a smartphone in the right side of the pocket (NFC functions built in), music plays from the phone automatically. 

 

 

ULTRA-THIN BATTERY    

It is equipped with 2 battery pockets for phone charging. They can each hold ultra slim batteries of 3000mah, and handle up to 6000mah.

 

 

BATTERY WARM-UP MODE 

When you press the warming button on JACKET BATTERY, the embedded safety heating panel generates a heat between 110 and 130℉ in the battery pocket on your back and neck, making you warm.

 

 

ELECTROMAGNETIC WAVES SHIELDING FABRICS

There is absolutely no need to worry about the health impacts of electromagnetic waves. All wires embedded in the battery pockets and the rest of the jacket are coated with electromagnetic waves shielding fabrics. Moreover, the battery pockets are finished with net fabrics to increase the thermal efficiency.

 

 

 NECK PILLOW, SLEEP SHADE   

When you want to rest during the travel on a plane or a car, a neck pillow and a SLEEP SHADE that are built in the hood will guarantee a comfortable sleep.

 

BUILT-IN GLOVES

When you feel cold, you can just put on the built-in gloves in the sleeves.

 

 

VENTILATION ZIPPER

When you feel hot, just open the ventilation zippers to cool down your body.

 

 

SUNGLASS RACK POCKET 

You can store your sunglasses safely in the chest pocket.

 

 

PASSPORT, CARD POCKET

You can also store your passport and cards safely in the pocket 

　

 

DETACHABLE HOOD

Because the hood with a built-in neck pillow is detachable, it can be stored separately, if necessary.

 

 

JEWELRY POCKET

The jewelry pocket is in the left side of the hood and you can store BADGE, Key chain or ring in it. 

 

 

EARPHONE POCKET

You can store earphone in the left inner pocket in the hood. You can take it out and use it, if needed. 

 

 

BLUETOOTH EARPHONE

Bluetooth earphone is built in the earphone pocket of the jacket. The wireless earphone means no more wires that tangle with your arms and fall out. 　

 

 

WASHABLE

Before washing Jacket, please separate BADGE, charging battery and LED module. Once that’s done, it’s perfectly okay to machine-wash it as the rest of the electric devices are waterproof.

 

CUSTOMIZABLE 

NFC functions of JACKET can be customized easily, no matter when users want. Many functions are included, especially  AUTO MUSIC PLAY ,  AUTO-MUTE, AUTO-SHARE CONTACT, and AUTO-CONNECT FAVORITES.

 

AUTO-SHARE CONTACT

Simply by tagging KEY CHAIN to your friends’ or colleagues’ smartphones that have NFC functions, you can share your contact information. 

 

 

AUTO-DIAL TO THE OWNER 

If you lose your KEY CHAIN, the person who picks it up can call you simply by tagging it on his or her smartphone with NFC functions. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • WOOLS : We use the finest blend of wool to insure years of wear and tear. The wieght is 25 ounces and is both colorfast and drycleanable.
  • LEATHERS : We choose only the best leather hides available. Hand selected top-grain genuine cowhide leather. Our leathers are drycleanble and will endure years of wear and tear.
  • INSIDE LININGS : Wether it's a lightweight or heavier quilt lining we use a 100% polyester.
  • ZIPPERS : We use top qulity YKK zippers to compliment the durability of our jackets.   

 

 

 

  • Wool Jacket is sized right around the same as Calvin Klein's Body Slim Fit Suit. 
  • Other styles are sized right around the same as H&M, GAP, American Eagle.
  •  Use a measuring tape and keep it horizontal while you’re measuring.  Find your size use the chart to determine your size. If you’re on the borderline between two sizes, order the smaller size for a tighter fit or the larger size for a looser fit.  

 

 

 

HALLAM NEW YORK smart jacket is nearly completed. We’re currently ramping up at our factory and are ready to meet the estimated delivery times.
We’ve done our very best to estimate demand and create a solid production plan. We’ve learned a lot from the past two  years, but sometimes forecasts are not able to hit the mark perfectly. In this case, we’ll let you know the reasons and make it correctly as soon as possible.
We have preliminary agreements with manufacturers. We’ll face challenges with production, packaging and shipping worldwide but we have the highest notch advisors onboard. With their extensive background and work experiences, the road will be much more easy.
We’ll work hard and deliver you an incredible product perfectly, which has been our responsibility since this project begins!
Can’t wait for you guys to get our smart jacket.

story:
Getting your BASE insoles is easy. 2D images are taken through the Wiivv smartphone app to capture the unique contours of your feet. These images are verified by an expert and processed in Wiivv’s blazing-fast customization engine to produce a 3D-printable file for a pair of insoles to perfectly fit you and you only. This unique file is then sent to enterprise-grade 3D printers that use SLS technology (a system of powerful and precise lasers) to build a durable and flexible shell. Finally, skilled workers use their crafting knowledge to deftly apply a beautifully designed top layer along with features to further improve comfort, like silicon treads and cushions.

In a kinematic analysis done by a 3rd party, BASE custom insoles have been found to significantly reduce joint loading in the knee and hip – which translates into reduced injuries and increased performance in athletic activities. They give you more control through your full range of motion and help spread the impact force of walking and running activities to areas best suited for absorption.

Our specially designed heel cup delivers optimum stability, shock absorption and comfort. The “hole in the heel cup” design was created in collaboration with pedorthic experts to reduce heel raise. Reduced heel raise is a key feature that allows users of BASE insoles to keep the built-in or removable insoles of their current footwear. The ¾ shell delivers biomechanical neutrality, lessens pressure on the forefoot, and offers better stability. Purchase your pair here

(Note: iPhone and iPod touch available now. iPad and Android will be available by the summer). 8.5x11 sized sheet of paper is required to properly digitize your foot. Wiivv makes true comfort accessible to you for only $75 (MSRP) per pair of custom insoles. Purchase your pair here

Function always comes first, but style matters too. We invested in the details of our product, from your name engraved on the bottom of your Wiivvs to the variety of beautifully designed top layers. Purchase your pair here

Led by Wiivv's own biomechanics team, BASE’s development was done in partnership with experts in the fields of sports medicine and orthopedics in the effort to create the ultimate custom insole. The team identified and improved on critical design features that affect insole comfort and effectiveness, such as the medial/lateral arch shape and offset, insole contour and thickness, shock absorbing heel pad, cushioning top layer, insole length and shape to maximize flexibility in 1st MPJ joint, and heel cup shape and depth.

BASE fills the wide gap in the product offerings available between a corrective orthotic and an off-the-shelf insole. Corrective orthotics are usually custom, but are costly. Off-the-shelf insoles have lower price points, but they do not fit your unique contours. Purchase your pair here

Our design process went through a year of R&D that resulted in 8 generations of feature sets and an astounding 72 product iterations. Having vigorously tested our product and the viability of our platform, we are unique in our ability to fulfill orders shortly after receiving your photos. The Wiivv platform is all about on-demand customization. Giving backers access to our product in record-time is just another application of that philosophy.

We have developed a suite of technologies that we call our ‘Adaptive Manufacturing System’. This system can be applied to make any device for the human body customizable with disruptive levels of convenience and affordability for the end user. The core component of the Adaptive Manufacturing System is our proprietary product customization engine. In seconds, the engine interprets data from the human body and spits out 3D print-ready files that are perfectly custom and optimized for your biomechanics.

Below, you’ll see one of Wiivv’s printers manufacturing a batch of custom insoles. That’s followed by the delicate separation and preparation of parts by our technicians before our skilled handworkers add the finishing touches. Purchase your pair here

Wiivv is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, and has an R&D and manufacturing facility in San Diego, California.

Wiivv was co-founded by Louis-Victor Jadavji and Shamil Hargovan in 2014 with the drive to make body-perfect gear, including custom insoles, accessible to the masses. Ben Wynne, a former HP Labs 3D technologist and Wiivv’s Chief Technology Officer, leads a strong technical team that includes experts in biomechanics, mechatronics, mechanical, software, and computer vision engineering.

The team has been advised by industry leaders in biomechanics, additive technologies, and lifestyle brands to help ensure that our product, platform, and brand are built to last.

If you are still reading - we want to thank you for sharing in our vision. We are passionate about building great products for you and hope that you will join us in this critical part of our journey.

Please reach out to ask questions or provide feedback at hello@wiivv.com

#KEEPGOING

The Wiivv Tribe


Purchase your pair here

Wiivv is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, and has an R&D and manufacturing facility in San Diego, California.
Wiivv was co-founded by Louis-Victor Jadavji and Shamil Hargovan in 2014 with the drive to make body-perfect gear, including custom insoles, accessible to the masses. Ben Wynne, a former HP Labs 3D technologist and Wiivv’s Chief Technology Officer, leads a strong technical team that includes experts in biomechanics, mechatronics, mechanical, software, and computer vision engineering.

  


  

The team has been advised by industry leaders in biomechanics, additive technologies, and lifestyle brands to help ensure that our product, platform, and brand are built to last.

  

If you are still reading - we want to thank you for sharing in our vision. We are passionate about building great products for you and hope that you will join us in this critical part of our journey.
Please reach out to ask questions or provide feedback at hello@wiivv.com
#KEEPGOING
The Wiivv Tribe

Purchase your pair here

story:
Why fund only ideas with just a prototype when you can get one of the highest quality desktop printers already at an affordable price. Introducing CraftBot, the all new 3D printer that combines quality and affordability.

We have taken all of the most desirable features found in the best current 3D printers and have combined them into one unit. And if you are new to 3D printing, no problem, anybody can use CraftBot, especially when accompanied by CraftWare, our very own 3D software that is absolutely free to download at any time. Check it out yourself! CraftBot works right out of the box, all you need to do is load your 3D model, slice it with our state-of-the-art software and print it.

We have already began the production of CraftBot. Your contributions will aid us to manufacture this high quality product (using only the best components) in greater quantities, therefore decreasing the cost of each individual unit.

We have designed and developed every part of our printer from the ground up. We started by using the best quality steel and aluminium. CraftBot is assembled with the utmost precision, keeping in mind that the printer head must make very fine movements. CraftBot utilizes quality laser cut metal parts and CNC milled components to achieve a higher standard of 3D printing.

The tests have gone out and the results are in. In comparison with other approaches nowadays, this pathway is an obvious plus for youths growing up in a world of technology. It helps them to learn computer skill in a more constructive way. It's fun and educational for children at the same time. Its a catalyst for creativity. We've personally placed CraftBot and CraftWare in the hands of children, and the results were outstanding.  Specifically, we tested our products through a teacher at an elementary school and the kids couldn't get enough of it.  At home or in a classroom environment, CraftBot and CraftWare stand alone.

Size does matter!

Most people do not want to print chairs for ants. If you intend to make more practical prints think twice before purchasing a tiny sized 3D printer. CraftBot is capable of printing large objects (250x200x200 mm, approx. 10x8x8 in). CraftBot has one of the biggest build volume in its class.

Heatable build platform, no bending or warping

3D printing material shrinks as it cools down, therefore 3D printed objects tends to bend or warp during the printing process, causing the printer head to collide with the object, ultimately ruining the print. To overcome this problem we have designed our printer with a heatable build platform. Of course, it requires a stronger power supply that increases the total manufacturing cost, which is why most of our lower-priced competitors do not use it.

Removable platform

We have eliminated the unnecessary injuries caused by reaching into the machine to remove the finished object. The easy solution: a removable build platform.

Touchscreen LCD

Most of our competitors use a 4x20 matrix non-graphical display that is difficult to operate. CraftBot uses a 2.8” QVGA LCD touchscreen, which makes it very easy to control the printer.

Custom electronics

The heart of CraftBot lies in its electronics. Our goal was to achieve dual channel communication allowing the user to immediately interact with the printer. We used the best quality electronic parts and made several prototypes until we arrived at one that we were satisfied with.

Compatibility

CraftBot also understands a standard command set, which means that it can be controlled by CraftWare or with other software of your choice.

Technical specifications

  • Printer Dimensions: Width: 41cm (16.1”), Length: 36cm (14.1”), Height: 38cm (14.9”)
  • Max object dimensions: Width: 250mm (~10”), Length: 200mm (~8”), Height: 200mm (~8”)
  • Max object volume: 10000 cm3
  • Printing material (filament): PLA, ABS, Nylon
  • Filament size: Standard 1.75mm from any source.
  • Nozzle diameter: 0.4mm
  • Min layer height: 50 microns
  • Filament type: non-proprietary ($29/kg)
  • Total weight: 13kg
  • It can also be used with any Windows, Mac, or Linux based system.
  • USB-Compatible connection.
  • Standalone printing from USB flash drive.
  • Heatable and removable build platform.
  • Replaceable nozzle.
  • Best use between 100 and 300 micron layer resolution.
  • 15 micron X and Y positioning accuracy.
  • Core XY mechanism.
  • Dual ARM Cortex M3 MCU.
  • White interior LEDs.
  • Dual voltage (110/220V supported)
  • Texas Instruments DRV8825 stepper motor driver with fault feedback.

CraftWare, our free software

CraftWare is an all in one advanced slicer software written by us from scratch. Slicing is an essential part of 3D printing as it is the process that turns your digital 3D model into the toolpath information understood by 3D printers. An algorithm which generates such a toolpath must be smart enough to provide the most precise pathway for the best possible results and quality. Shorter build time also can be achieved using good toolpath information. With CraftWare you can interactively and easily build custom non-vertical support bars (see video below). With CraftWare, you can also attempt to print non-watertight objects.

Material & Filament options

PLA (Poly Lactic Acid) is probably the best non-toxic material to get you started with 3D printing. The material cools and sets very quickly with the aid of the CraftBot's two on-board fans. This means that you can achieve a wide range of shapes that would be difficult to print with other materials. You can use any 1.75mm PLA or ABS filament spool available on the market. Choose the one that best fits your budget. Now this is important, because as you will see in the comparison chart, most of our competitors use proprietary filament which is significantly more expensive! Proprietary filament is a custom filament which must be used to fit a specific machine. Don't be tricked, they are designed to create another source of income for the company.

Product development timeline


Perks

Stretch goals

We are reaching our goals, and this makes all of us at CraftUnique very happy! Now let's talk about "Stretch Goals", or goals set beyond the initial goal and the incentives there-after. We feel that the CraftBot, considering the components that go into making it, is already being sold at a very generous price.

But... We are proposing the idea to install anodized aluminum parts on one of the immediate new batches to come. We are also planning to increase the color selection of the printers from 4 to 8 when we pass our $100,000 barrier!

Risks and challenges

We do not like to wait for something, do you? The good news is that we already began production of the first hundred machines! After our campaign ends, allow us one-month break until we arrange the final steps and we start sending out the first 100 pieces for our VIP backers. If you are late, you are not! All of our backers will receive their printer in this calendar year!

We have arranged everything with our suppliers, they know about our campaign as well. We have discussed the best shipping options with FedEx, our logistics partner, to make the shipping as smooth as possible.

International shipping

Shipping costs vary by location and country. To keep the shipping costs as low as possible for you, we have made a contract with FedEx and will charge the costs individually. Based on your location you can roughly estimate the shipping cost if you click here. After the campaign we will send you a survey and at this time you can give us your address details.

Disclaimer

The printed figures are only used to demonstrate that CraftBot can print various objects. We do not sell the printed figures. We respect the intellectual property rights of the authors and owners. Please, notify us if you find any prints that do not properly identify the author or potentially infringe any rights of the owners. We will take proper measures to resolve the issues.

Company

Our company is CraftUnqiue Ltd. a small but competent company. Our members have more than 10 years’ experience in developing high-end electronic and tech products.

We want to bring affordable user friendly 3D printing technology to every home. Our mission is to be innovative at every level of 3D printing, from object design all the way to the printing itself.

CraftUnique team members

Attila Horvath, founder & CEO: for more than a decade Attila was the CEO of a tech company, which developed software and hardware for foreign companies and governmental projects. He has vast experience in managing complex development projects (with lean project management). During the past 2 years, he has been working on this project along with his brother and their team. He is a passionate dreamer and a motivated professional with a proven record in the international tech industry.

Janos Horvath, founder & Chief Software developer: responsible for the development of CraftWare. He is an experienced professional with a technological background. He loves challenges, and dedicated all his time and talent to design and develop a unique state-of-the-art slicer software, which will revolutionize the market due to its high performance.

Nathaniel Hale, project supervisor with an emphasis on text and script writing and communications. An artistic visionary and Jack of all trades.

Janos Csobolyo, CTO: engineer with a wide variety of mechanical and electrical engineering experience. He was responsible for the design, operations and maintenance of CNC precision machines, building control systems and delivering unique solutions to different technological challenges. At CraftUnique, he is responsible for hardware and firmware development.

János Szabó, software developer: the right arm of our CTO, he exists in a QT C++ environment. He is one of the keys to the success of our unique 3D printer.

Bálint Szabó, marketing manager: an experienced growth hacker, addicted to new technologies, he is responsible for marketing and communication. Bálint has more than 5 years’ experience working with tech startups.

Luckily, we live in Hungary where we have a pool of talented developers and engineers. Occasionally we contract 3rd-party developers, testers and engineers on-demand if we need the extra human resources to reach a deadline.

FAQ

How much do I pay for shipping?

We provide an individual shipping cost for everyone. Please visit http://www.craftbot3d.com where you can roughly estimate the shipping cost to send 1 pcs of CraftBot and 1kg of PLA filament. Shipping will be calculated and collected when we send the backer survey. This will be just before your rewards are sent to ensure the fairest shipping rates.

How much VAT (Value Added Tax) will I have to pay if I am located outside of the European Union?

Because we are based in the European Union (EU), we won’t charge VAT to customers living outside the EU.

How much VAT (Value Added Tax) will I have to pay if I am in the European Union?

Because we are based in the European Union (EU), we need to charge a VAT rate of 27% for backers within the EU. After the successful conclusion of the campaign, we will contact you by email for the exact location you want your CraftBot to be shipped. If the location is inside the EU, we will send you a request to pay the 27% VAT before shipping. Once you have fulfilled that request we will send out your package as soon as possible. If you live outside the EU (for instance the USA or Canada) we won’t charge VAT. Local VAT and import tax might be applicable to you. Your country's local customs department will collect the import tax and VAT if necessary.*

How do I request a printer color and/or a filament color?

When the Indiegogo campaign ends, we will send everyone a survey asking them exactly what they want. We would like your feedback too during the campaign as we finalize the filament color options.

How do I add extra filaments to my pledge?

Please select "PLA filament supply" perk. Please note that shipping is calculated by weight, so the backers who want an extra roll may need to pay a little more for shipping.

Which operating systems does CraftWare run on?

The software works with Windows 7 at the moment. We are currently working on the OSX release.

Can I use the CraftBot 3D printer with other operating system than Windows?

Yes, all mayor operating systems are supported by CraftBot.

Can I use the CraftBot 3D printer with other software like pronterface?

Yes, you can use CraftBot with pronterface.

What is CraftBot's command set?

CraftBot's command set gives you more control options with the CraftBot 3D printer than compared with anything else. A full documentation of CraftBot's extended command set will be released later in August.

Which colors can I get my CraftBot 3D printer in (preferably something that ties the room together)?

If you are a backer, you will soon be receiving a color survey from us allowing you to choose the color of your choice.

story:
FAQ

Can I still get texts, voice calls, emails etc, when my phone is in the POD?

No - your phone will not transmit or receive any wireless signals or data when placed inside the POD.


Can't I just power down my phone?

No, cell phones can still be accessed and used for surveillance when they are powered off. Most phones today power off on the software level, leaving the power circuit connected.


Why can't I just use "Airplane Mode?"

Airplane mode uses software to prevent your phone from sending and receiving wireless signals. Software is not the most reliable security measure to rely on - particularly in context of avoiding surveillance. POD guarantees your privacy by creating a privacy wall when you demand it.


Wouldn't removing the battery solve my issues with surveillance?

Not all phones have removable batteries. The POD requires you only to place your phone in and close the lid.

Can't I just power down my phone?

are powered off. Most phones today power off on the software level, 
leaving the power circuit connected.

privacy by creating a privacy wall when you demand it.

Wouldn't removing the battery solve my issues with surveillance?

requires you only to place your phone in and close the lid.

story:
World’s first mobile party powerhouse bringing video, music, and fun outdoor/indoor without power cord. Flicks is the world’s first all-in-one, Bluetooth enabled boombox that marries a Hi-Fi audio system with a cutting edge 720p HD LED projector that lets you watch movies for 8 hours and listen to Bluetooth music for 56 hours without power cord. From now on, you party bright, loud, and unplugged!


  • 4 hours movie playback/28 hours Bluetooth music playtime (140WH model)
  • 8 hours movie playback/56 hours Bluetooth music playtime (280WH model)
  • Bluetooth 4.0 Hi-Fi stereo speaker system
  • Watch movies via HDMI
  • Wireless streaming using TV sticks (Roku, Chromecast, Amazon FireTV Stick)
  • Built-in handle for easy portability
  • Bright 720p HD LED projector with Texas Instruments DLP technology


720p HD LED Projector
Full-color RGB LEDs light source deliver astonishing image quality with superior color saturation and amazing 700 LED brightness in brilliant 720p HD with Texas Instruments DLP technology. Long-lasting 20,000 hours of OSRAM LED lifetime.

Bluetooth 4.0 Hi-Fi Speakers
Dashbon Flicks unique design features an airtight enclosure that includes two custom designed 50mm neodymium speakers with wide dynamic range and a subwoofer with bass radiator system to create amazing sound clarity with crystal-clear highs and heart-pounding bass at any volume.

Built-in Rechargeable Battery
4 hours movie playback/28 hours Bluetooth music playtime (140WH model)
8 hours movie playback/56 hours Bluetooth music playtime (280WH model)



Works with Wireless Streaming Media Devices

Take out your favorite streaming media device – Roku, Google Chromecast, Amazon FireTV Stick – and connect it to Flicks’ built-in HDMI port and directly powered by the built-in USB port.

USB Charge-out Port
The built-in 10W (2A/5V) USB charge-out port can charge your smartphones, tablets or power your streaming media devices.

Built-in Grip Handle
Grab the built-in handle and take your movies and music to places you never think possible.

Entertainment via HDMI
All it takes is one HDMI cable (included) to start watching movies and TV shows streaming from your iPhones, smartphones or other HDMI-compatible devices to Flicks.

Speakerphone
Flicks has a built-in microphone to pick up your voice in crystal-clear clarity. Use Flicks as a speakerphone to take calls from your friends or make conference calls with your colleagues at the office.

story:
In Brief

While a microcredit loan is the main benefit that a microfinance institution (MFI) can offer its members, many MFIs around the world are beginning to introduce additional services, such as savings facilities. We want to build an Android app for use by MFIs to safely accept savings deposits from their members in the field. We hope the security of cash transactions will encourage more savings deposits from members, which will build upon one of the foundations of successful MFIs - promoting self-sufficiency through savings.


Background

Microfinance has been an effective initiative in tackling poverty. In Bangladesh, research has shown that 48% of members of MFIs manage to rise above the poverty line. In contrast, only 4% of those who don't borrow from MFIs escape poverty. The main benefit that these institutions provide is the microcredit loan. These loans provide the capital that members need to grow their businesses and to start up new ones at reasonable levels of interest.

Besides lending money, many MFIs have found other ways to help their members succeed. One MFI in Indonesia, Koperasi Kasih Indonesia (KKI), has an education program which promotes the importance of savings. Since starting operations in December 2011 in Cilincing, one of Jakarta’s poorest sub-districts with over 19,000 households living below the poverty line, KKI has disbursed over USD 1.5 million helping 10,660 women and their families. With almost all of its members unbankable, KKI offers a savings facility which has become the only way for many of them to save. This deposit service has been very successful with savings among its members growing at 22% per annum. KKI’s field operations are currently conducted on paper. With its number of members growing in excess of 60% per year, KKI needed a way to maintain or even improve the momentum in the growth of savings while reducing the risk of error or fraud.


Our Solution

After several meetings with KKI’s founder, Leonardo Kamilius, we looked to technology for a solution - an Android app used by field officers to collect savings deposits. Field officers will input the savings deposit amounts into the mobile app. When the amounts are confirmed, the data will be sent to a mobile printer via Bluetooth, which will print out a receipt that is given to the members. Additionally, the amounts of the deposits will be directly uploaded to KKI’s cloud-based information system. These features will have several positive effects:

  1. Eliminating paper bookkeeping in the field would drastically reduce the risk for error or fraud.
  2. A hardcopy receipt for the savings deposit would increase members’ sense of security, which would encourage larger deposits and more members to make use of the savings facility.
  3. The direct uploading of savings data into KKI’s cloud-based information system would greatly improve efficiency in KKI’s operations.

Allocation of Funds

The goal of this campaign is to raise USD 6,000. These funds will be used to build the application, buy the hardware, and socialize the application among KKI’s field officers and members. Funds will be divided as follows:

We have chosen a “fixed funding” campaign. This means that we will only receive the funds if we reach our goal; we will not receive any funds if we don’t. We would need the entire amount to ensure this project’s success.


Timeline
story_txt:
In Brief



While a microcredit loan is the main benefit that a microfinance institution (MFI) can offer its members, many MFIs around the world are beginning to introduce additional services, such as savings facilities. We want to build an Android app for use by MFIs to safely accept savings deposits from their members in the field. We hope the security of cash transactions will encourage more savings deposits from members, which will build upon one of the foundations of successful MFIs - promoting self-sufficiency through savings.


Background
Microfinance has been an effective initiative in tackling poverty. In Bangladesh, research has shown that 48% of members of MFIs manage to rise above the poverty line. In contrast, only 4% of those who don't borrow from MFIs escape poverty. The main benefit that these institutions provide is the microcredit loan. These loans provide the capital that members need to grow their businesses and to start up new ones at reasonable levels of interest.
Besides lending money, many MFIs have found other ways to help their members succeed. One MFI in Indonesia, Koperasi Kasih Indonesia (KKI), has an education program which promotes the importance of savings. Since starting operations in December 2011 in Cilincing, one of Jakarta’s poorest sub-districts with over 19,000 households living below the poverty line, KKI has disbursed over USD 1.5 million helping 10,660 women and their families. With almost all of its members unbankable, KKI offers a savings facility which has become the only way for many of them to save. This deposit service has been very successful with savings among its members growing at 22% per annum. KKI’s field operations are currently conducted on paper. With its number of members growing in excess of 60% per year, KKI needed a way to maintain or even improve the momentum in the growth of savings while reducing the risk of error or fraud.





Our Solution
After several meetings with KKI’s founder, Leonardo Kamilius, we looked to technology for a solution - an Android app used by field officers to collect savings deposits. Field officers will input the savings deposit amounts into the mobile app. When the amounts are confirmed, the data will be sent to a mobile printer via Bluetooth, which will print out a receipt that is given to the members. Additionally, the amounts of the deposits will be directly uploaded to KKI’s cloud-based information system. These features will have several positive effects:


Eliminating paper bookkeeping in the field would drastically reduce the risk for error or fraud.
A hardcopy receipt for the savings deposit would increase members’ sense of security, which would encourage larger deposits and more members to make use of the savings facility.
The direct uploading of savings data into KKI’s cloud-based information system would greatly improve efficiency in KKI’s operations.



Allocation of Funds
The goal of this campaign is to raise USD 6,000. These funds will be used to build the application, buy the hardware, and socialize the application among KKI’s field officers and members. Funds will be divided as follows:



We have chosen a “fixed funding” campaign. This means that we will only receive the funds if we reach our goal; we will not receive any funds if we don’t. We would need the entire amount to ensure this project’s success.


Timeline

story:
What is this? 

With the Transform The Smartphone Challenge, adding batteries, headphone jacks, and Qi wireless charging are the most common features across them. 

While it is great that they do have them, it's annoying that these standard features are using the MotoMod expandability. That is where the Mod Compatible Battery comes in. 

Everyone is so focused (myself included) on the capabilities of the Moto Mod platform, that they ignored the standard features of the device; the USB C port. This port provides the ability to add all of those features, without sacrificing the MotoMod platform!

So what have we done? We have designed what is essentially a standard battery pack case that most other phones have. Providing room for a 2100mAh battery, Qi Wireless Charging, USB- C Passthrough, and bringing back the forgotten headphone jack. Utilizing components, this keeps production costs down, development time down, and most importantly - your investment down.

 

Show us what you got!

Another eye opener from the Transform The Smartphone Contest is the lack of commitment. Forums, posts, websites everywhere ask and say the MotoMod platform is lacking unique and inventive ideas. 

This is a mod that would be easily adapted to future phones, Motorola or otherwise. While loss from investment from within is not as big of a deal, it is important to see the interest is there for this type of option. 

All it takes is $1 and a dream

This is why I am limiting this to $1 for 'perk' items. This is not pre ordering an actual product at the moment, just to get proper interest and feedback as to whether or not this is an avenue worth our time. 

 

Intrigued by the idea? Share this page, donate $1.00, buy 100 perks to really show how much you want it, and we will make it happen.

story:
Meet Beam

 

Beam can turn any flat surface into a big screen. It is a powerful projector equipped with a smart computer, all inside a beautifully designed casing. Screw Beam into any light socket or use the included power cable to place Beam on a flat surface. You can play games, watch movies or share content from your smartphone or tablet. Beam will assist you in your daily activities, like wake you up in the morning with the latest news and your agenda or show you your social updates when you come home. Beam is easy to set up and control with the Apple or Android app. You can screw it into any light socket or use the included power cable to place it on any flat surface.

 


 
 

The Press Loves Beam

 

 

 

 

 

What can you do with Beam?

 

 

 

You can watch Netflix or YouTube on a big screen (even on your bedroom ceiling while lying in bed)

 

 

Stream photos and video to Beam. You can stream any content to Beam through Airplay or Miracast.
 

You make the rules, and Beam will follow. Play a movie when someone arrives home, leave a message, or display the weather every morning.

Use Beam as a regular LED Light. Switch between light and projection. With the Beam Remote app you can dim the light levels!
 

These are just a few examples but there’s a lot more that you can do! With Beam you can watch TV on your bedroom ceiling, play games using your phone or a Bluetooth controller, project recipes on your kitchen counter, stream content from your network drive, listen to music through its speakers, play projected board-games on your dining table, show a presentation or even use it in a restaurant to show the menu and turn the walls into digital paintings.

Beam is a connected projector that can be programmed to automatically perform actions. You can program anything; play a movie when someone arrives home, leave a message, or display the weather every morning.You make the rules, and Beam will follow your rules without question!

Because Beam is running Android, you can use any app available in the Google Play Store.

 

Control Beam

 
You control Beam with your smartphone or tablet with the “Beam Remote” app for iOS and Android devices.

 

 

Beam Labs is a hardware company with a design philosophy. We took great care to create a designed object that can earn its own space in every room, without being noticed on a first glance. Our team is focused on designing a product with a modern minimalistic look. From the product itself to the accessories to even the packaging!
 

 

 

 

Let's talk Hardware
 

 

 

 

 
Specifications
Projector  LED Pico projector (854 x 480), 100 Lumen, 
contrast ratio: 1000:1, 20.000 projection hours 
Power Light socket powered E26/E27, 110V to 240V 50/60Hz. 
Usage 9W in use, 3W standby 
Computer Android computer 4.2, upgradable to 4.4, 
1.3 GHz Dual Core processor, 8GB storage 
Connectivity Bluetooth 4.0, WiFi b/g/n 
Light 24x LED light 
Sound 2 x 2 Watt speakers
Dimensions Length: 150mm, diameter: 110mm, weight: 400gr. 
Package Contents Beam, power cord, manual
 

Reactions of Beam Users

 

 

 

 

Timeline

March 2014 - Idea was born
May 2014 - Technical prototype
November 2014 - Finalized design
February 2015 - Start of Crowdfunding campaign
March 2015 - End of campaign raising $760.000

April / December 2015 - Production & Delivery
Completion of all software development
Finetuning of electrical design
Ordering components
Preparing mass production prototype
Getting molds for mass production
Producing the outer-casings 
Assembly of first batch
Delivery of our first batch to our backers

July 2016 - Delivery of our next batch

 

Project Development
 

 

 

 

For over 2 years we have been working on Beam, which evolved from a wild idea to the product you see right now.

The idea of Beam is born during a brainstorm session in March of 2014 with the thought ‘what if we could make a projector that you could screw in your light socket’. The next month we evolved this basic idea to a full product concept, by brainstorming, discussions and having meetings with various experts. Soon after, we formed the Beam-team and started working on the first prototype.
 

When the technical details were defined we had all the information to start designing the look and feel of Beam. In the meantime we started the development of the iOS and Android apps and the software on Beam itself.

All the software and technical engineering has been finalised by the end of 2015 and our manufacturer is already producing Beam’s! We have already shipped out our first batch and will be able to keep this up with your support!
 

Meet the Beam Team!

 

 

 

 

 

Beam is what happens when you put talented and passionate engineers and designers in one room. Our team has many years of experience designing connected devices, award winning user interfaces and innovative concepts.

Thomas de Wolf MSc. and Guust Hilte MSc. are the teams inventors and can create any device they come up with. They've even created an aquarium on wheels that is steered by fish, go figure. Combined they have more than 20 years of product development and engineering experience.

Paul Swagerman is the creative side of the team. Over the years he has worked on visual and UX design for clients ranging from IKEA to world famous artists and DJ's. Jim Raaijmakers is working on support and is there for all your questions and concerns (at least when he is not chugging down the Jim Beam). Don Molenaar is responsible for keeping the team flowing and to make sure we don’t have too much fun with Beam, but he actually makes sure it’s finished. Gido da Graca is the one responsible to get Beam into the retail shelves (GO GIDO!!).

 

 

 

Shout out to the developers!
 

 

 

We created Beam with the vision to be a completely new product category, enabling users and developers to do things they were not able to do before. Because Beam is running Android you can use the existing IDE and tools to develop. Combine that with the fact that Beam is always connected and you have a great platform for development. No need to learn any new skills, but still the possibility to create truly new and innovative apps for a brand new platform.

Although we believe in the uniqueness of Beam, we need your support to bring Beam to an even higher level. Therefore we’ll make sure you have access to its various functions and controls when building apps for Beam itself. We will also make the connection to smartphones into an easy to use protocol so you can build your own control apps for iOS, Android or any other operating system and we’ll even let you specify your own IF’s and THEN’s to make it react to specific devices, commands, notifications or events.

We’ll make all of these tools and manuals for developers available on our website in a later stadium. But don’t wait for that moment! Let us know your awesome ideas on hacking@beamlabsinc.com and we’ll let you know if we can find a way to enable you to make it!

   The Press Loves Beam

July 2016 - Delivery of our next batch



 
Project Development 
 
 
 
For over 2 years we have been working on Beam, which evolved from a wild idea to the product you see right now.
The idea of Beam is born during a brainstorm session in March of 2014 with the thought ‘what if we could make a projector that you could screw in your light socket’. The next month we evolved this basic idea to a full product concept, by brainstorming, discussions and having meetings with various experts. Soon after, we formed the Beam-team and started working on the first prototype. 
 
 When the technical details were defined we had all the information to start designing the look and feel of Beam. In the meantime we started the development of the iOS and Android apps and the software on Beam itself.

Meet the Beam Team!

Thomas de Wolf MSc. and Guust Hilte MSc. are the teams inventors and can create any device they come up with. They've even created an aquarium on wheels that is steered by fish, go figure. Combined they have more than 20 years of product development and engineering experience.
