Gido da Graca is the one responsible to get Beam into the retail shelves (GO GIDO!!).
 
 



 
Shout out to the developers! 
 
 
We created Beam with the vision to be a completely new product category, enabling users and developers to do things they were not able to do before. Because Beam is running Android you can use the existing IDE and tools to develop. Combine that with the fact that Beam is always connected and you have a great platform for development. No need to learn any new skills, but still the possibility to create truly new and innovative apps for a brand new platform.
Although we believe in the uniqueness of Beam, we need your support to bring Beam to an even higher level. Therefore we’ll make sure you have access to its various functions and controls when building apps for Beam itself. We will also make the connection to smartphones into an easy to use protocol so you can build your own control apps for iOS, Android or any other operating system and we’ll even let you specify your own IF’s and THEN’s to make it react to specific devices, commands, notifications or events.
We’ll make all of these tools and manuals for developers available on our website in a later stadium. But don’t wait for that moment! Let us know your awesome ideas on hacking@beamlabsinc.com and we’ll let you know if we can find a way to enable you to make it! 


 

Q and A  Q: What about shipping fees, duties and taxes?A: The pledge for Beam includes all shipment costs. Backers from Europe and the United States of America will not have to pay any duties and/or taxes.
Q: Can I adjust my screen?A: We made sure that you can rotate the image without loosening Beam in the light socket. When you rotate the outer ring you can adjust the image with 180° this combined with the 180° software screen rotation allows for a full 360° movement.
Q: What devices can i use to control Beam?A: You can control Beam with an iOS (iPhone and iPad), Android device (phone or tablet) or with any device that has a web browser, like Windows (Phone), Mac or Linux. You can also control Beam with a Bluetooth mouse and keyboard to enjoy its full potential. Next to the standard Beam functionality, you can even do more with third party apps, like Team Viewer to mirror your Windows screen, DLNA server apps to send media to Beam and lots more.
Q: Is the brightness of 100 lumen enough?A: Beam has ANSI 100 Lumen. During development we added a brightness adjustment because it was too bright in some instances. With 100 Lumen you can easily see what Beam projects during daytime when you are inside.
Q: What is the maximum size of the projection?A: Beam can project up to 120-inch widescreen.
Q: How large will the projection area be when I place Beam 6ft (1.8m) from a wall?A: The throw ratio of Beam is 1.6:1 (distance:width). That means that for every 1.6ft distance, the projection will become 1ft larger. So at a distance of 6ft your screen will be 3.75ft (1.1m).
Q: Does Beam work on my country’s voltage level?A: Beam works on 110VAC up to 240VAC, this covers all countries standard power line voltage levels.
Q: Will i get the right plug for my country?A: We will make sure that you will receive the correct power plug.
Q: Will Beam work in any light socket?A: Beam has an E26/E27 thread. But this can be easily converted to any light socket connection that you want (e.g. gu10, E14) by using an adapter. You can find these adapters online (just search for “E27 to “x” adapter”) or in your local hardware store.
Q: What are the dimensions and weight of Beam?A: Beam has a diameter of 4.5 inch (11cm) and is around 6 inches (15cm) tall. It weighs around 0.9 pounds (400 grams)
Q: Always on? Does that mean Beam uses lots of electricity?A: No, always on means it goes into standby mode when not projecting. In standby Beam only uses 3 Watts, that’s half of what your TV set-top box uses when it’s on standby! When it is projecting it only uses 9 Watts.
Q: Does Beam get really hot after projecting for a while?A: Beam is actively cooled by a slowly rotating, very silent fan, so it doesn’t get hot.
Q: Does Beam make a lot of noise?A: Beam has a LED projector and therefore requires less intensive cooling than traditional lamp projectors. It uses a low RPM very silent fan, meaning that you can hardly hear the difference between on or off.

story:
3D DIGITAL WORLD AS YOU NEVER EXPERIENCED BEFORE


Is it what all of us was waiting for? ...once if you hold an Alienline device in your hands the answer will definitely YES! 

At Alienline we decided to create something REVOLUTIONARY in this field. So we didn`t want to carry on the traditional way of 3D visual innovations by creating better and better 3D glasses or virtual head sets. We took the hard way and we developed specially engineered elements integrated directly into the layers of the display. The result is a brand new jaw-dropping 3D visual technology where 3D glasses or any other additional gadgets are not needed anymore.


REVOLUTIONARY NEW 3D TECNOLOGY


Our eyes deliever two different pictures from two different angles continouasly to our brain. (Left and Right) The human brain synthesizes these two images into a single image creating a perception of depth.

We designed a polymer layer with specially engineered surface. Applying this extra layer directly into the phone. Thus the whole screen itself becomes a Real 3 Dimensional Ultra High Quality Display. After this innovation 3D glasses are not needed because this Real 3D Display does all the work by itself including delivering color-segmented frames separately to your left and right eyes.


The special geometry surface of an added extra polymer layer decodes the color segmentation so that each eye sees only what was designed for it to see, creating a perception of depth. The Right Eye image is specially segmented, matching the prism's Right side of the polymer surface. This lets only the Right image to be visible. The Left Eye image is segmented differently, matching the prism's Left side of the polymer surface. This lets only the Left image to be visible. The display switches between the Left and Right eye image at up to 100 frames per second alternately segmenting each frame.     

Alienline 3D smartphones and tablet PCs are designed to allow you to comfortably watch a movie while reducing ghosting and image blur, which are side effect previously experienced with any kind of 3D glasses. And as an extra feature you can also enjoy our newly developed 3D operating platform specially designed for Android users.


NEW 3D FEATURES

Let's see the new 3D features.

Please note! You cannot experience the real 3D effect through your common 2D screen as you watching this video.  


DEVICES TO BUY

Alienline presents its brand new Android Smartphone 5.5" and Tablet Phone 7" integrated with the revolutionary 3D Naked-Eye Display. 

Alienline 3D smartphones and tablet PCs are designed to allow you to comfortably watch a movie while reducing ghosting and image blur, which are side effect previously experienced with any kind of 3D glasses. And as an extra feature you can also enjoy our newly developed 3D operating platform specially designed for Android users. 

Alienline 3D Naked-Eye Android Smartphone 5.5"



Alienline 3D Naked-Eye Android Tablet Phone 7"


We are offering here something extremely new... And you can be part of this by ordering a 3D smartphone or phablet at a very keen pre-market price.

In this way you will receive not just a High Performance device with Full High-Definition Naked-Eye 3D Display, but you will also support the development team in integrating this revolutionary new technology into laptops, monitors, televisions and other devices.

So, help us to spread this technology wordwide and make this brand new technology available to everyone.


Forget about the past and ...”Let’s enjoy 3D movies together, in a totally new way."

Learn more about the new 3D Technology and find more technical details about our devices at  www.alienline.com


TIMELINE


FAQ

Ordering

1.  How do I place an order?

During our product launch, we would advise you to place an order on Indiegogo.com to get Alienline products at a promotional price.  Alienline products will be available in our webshop on www.alienline.com starting in October.

2.  Can I place an order over the phone?

No, you don't but we accept orders placed online 24 hours-a-day, seven days a week at www.alienline.com

3.  Can I place an order if I have APO, FPO or PO Box address?

If you would like to ship to an APO/FPO address, please contact us before you place an order by sending an email to info@alienline.com. Please note that we do not deliver to PO Box addresses.

4.  How do I pay for my order?

We accept Visa, MasterCard, Discover, American Express and Paypal payments.

5.  How do I know my order was successfully submitted?

We will send you an email within 24 hours with your order confirmation and shipping details.

6.  How do I get a copy of my invoice?

You will receive a copy of your invoice with the order confirmation email and hard copy with the delivered product.

7.  Can I place a tax-exempt order?

Unfortunately, tax-exempt orders cannot be placed through Alinenline.com. For further information, please contact us by sending an email to info@alienline.com

8.  How quickly will my order be processed?

If you place your order on Indiegogo till our campaign ends you will receive the item in December 2016. Any orders will be placed later on at Alienline.com will be processed within two business days.

9.  How do I check my order status?

Once your order ships, you will receive a shipping notification that includes the tracking information. You can track your shipment through the carrier using the tracking number.

10.  How do I cancel an order?

To cancel your order, please contact us by sending an email to info@alinline.com with your order details.

11.  Can I make changes after I submit my order?

To change your order, please contact us by sending an email to info@alienline.com

12.  What is covered in the shipping fee?

Shipping charges include handling, processing your order, packaging and delivering your product. Please note that your order may be subject to import duties and taxes, which are levied once a shipment reaches your country. Customs policies vary widely from country to country. Please contact your local customs office for further information.

13.  How long does delivery take?

Delivery time depends on the availability of the product, the shipping destination and the shipping method you choose when you place an order.

Availability

1.  Are Alienline products available at any stores?

Alienline products will be soon available in stores, but as for now you can place an order on Indiegogo.com at a very keen pre-market price.

Shipping

1.  What are my shipping options?

Our company ships internationally with different courier delivery services companies. Our shipping and handling charges will appear when you place an order.

2.  What happens if I am not available to sign for my order?

Once your order has been handed over to the carrier for delivery, you will receive a shipment notification email with an estimated delivery date. The carrier will make three attempts to deliver your package. If you are not available on any of those dates, you can also ask for a service called the ‘access point’. The carrier will deliver your package to one of these points and you can pick it up at a more convenient time.

3.  What should I do if my shipment is lost? 

Please contact us immediately by sending us an email to info@alienline.com to report the loss of your shipment.  

4.  What should I do if my shipment arrives damaged?

If you receive a package that was damaged during shipment, please report it to the carrier on the spot. If you receive a package with damages to the product, please report it to us in the next 14 days from the date you received it by sending us an email to info@alienline.com. Please make sure to keep the package and if it possible please, take photos of the damages.

5.  What should I do if my shipment is missing an item?

Please contact us by sending us an email to info@alienline.com to report a missing item. We apologize for any inconvenience, we will send you the missing item as soon as possible.

6.  Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we ship internationally.

7.  Where can I find shipping delivery status on my order?

You can track your shipment through the carrier using the tracking number. You can also find out the status of your shipment by setting up email or SMS tracking.

Product returns

1.  How do I return or exchange a product?

To return or exchange a product, please contact us by sending an email to info@alienline.com

2.  How much time will it take to receive my refund?

As soon as your package reaches us, we’ll send you an email and complete your refund. Depending on your card issuer, it can then take up to 5-10 days for the refund to show on your account.
story_txt:
3D DIGITAL WORLD AS YOU NEVER EXPERIENCED BEFORE
Is
it what all of us was waiting for? ...once if you hold an Alienline device in
your hands the answer will definitely YES! 
At Alienline we decided to create
something REVOLUTIONARY in this field. So we didn`t want to carry on the
traditional way of 3D visual innovations by creating better and better 3D
glasses or virtual head sets. We took the hard way and we developed
specially engineered elements integrated directly into the layers of the
display. The result is a brand new jaw-dropping 3D visual technology where
3D glasses or any other additional gadgets are not needed anymore.REVOLUTIONARY NEW 3D TECNOLOGYOur eyes 
deliever two different pictures from two different angles continouasly to 
our brain. (Left and Right) The human brain synthesizes these two images
 into a single image creating a perception of depth. We designed a polymer layer with specially engineered surface. Applying this extra layer directly into the phone. Thus the whole screen itself becomes a Real 3 Dimensional Ultra High Quality Display. After this innovation 3D glasses are not needed because this Real 3D Display does all the work by itself including delivering color-segmented frames separately to your left and right eyes.


The special geometry surface of an added extra polymer layer decodes the color segmentation so that each eye sees only what was designed for it to see, creating a perception of depth. The Right Eye image is specially segmented, matching the prism's Right side of the polymer surface. This lets only the Right image to be visible. The Left Eye image is segmented differently, matching the prism's Left side of the polymer surface. This lets only the Left image to be visible. The display switches between the Left and Right eye image at up to 100 frames per second alternately segmenting each frame.     







Alienline 3D smartphones and tablet PCs are designed
to allow you to comfortably watch a movie while reducing ghosting and image blur,
which are side effect previously experienced with any kind of 3D glasses. And as
an extra feature you can also enjoy our newly developed 3D operating platform
specially designed for Android users.

NEW 3D FEATURES
Let's see the new 3D features.
Please note! You cannot experience the real 3D effect through your common 2D screen as you watching this video.  

DEVICES TO BUY


Alienline presents its brand new Android Smartphone 5.5" and Tablet Phone 7" integrated with the revolutionary 3D Naked-Eye Display.  
Alienline 3D smartphones and tablet PCs are designed to allow you to comfortably watch a movie while reducing ghosting and image blur, which are side effect previously experienced with any kind of 3D glasses. And as an extra feature you can also enjoy our newly developed 3D operating platform specially designed for Android users. 
Alienline 3D Naked-Eye Android Smartphone 5.5"


Alienline 3D Naked-Eye Android Tablet Phone 7"

We are
offering here something extremely new... And you can be part of this by ordering a
3D smartphone or phablet at a very keen pre-market price.
In this way you will
receive not just a High Performance device with Full High-Definition Naked-Eye
3D Display, but you will also support the development team in integrating this
revolutionary new technology into laptops, monitors, televisions and other
devices.
So, help us to spread this technology wordwide and make this
brand new technology available to everyone.



Forget about the past and ...”Let’s enjoy 3D movies together,
in a totally new way."
Learn more about the new 3D Technology and find more technical details about our devices at  www.alienline.com

TIMELINE


FAQ




Ordering
1. 
How do I place an order?
During our product launch, we would advise you to
place an order on Indiegogo.com to get Alienline products at a promotional
price.  Alienline products will be
available in our webshop on www.alienline.com starting in October. 
2.  Can I place an order over the phone?
No, you don't but we accept orders placed online 24
hours-a-day, seven days a week at www.alienline.com 
3.  Can I place an order if I have APO, FPO or PO Box address?
If you would like to ship to an APO/FPO address, please
contact us before you place an order by sending an email to info@alienline.com. Please note that we do not deliver to PO Box
addresses.
4. 
How do I pay for my order?

We accept Visa, MasterCard, Discover, American Express and Paypal payments.
5. 
How do I know my order was
successfully submitted?

We will send you an email within 24 hours with your order confirmation and
shipping details. 
6. 
How do I get a copy of my invoice?

You will receive a copy of your invoice with the order confirmation email and hard copy with the delivered
product. 
7. 
Can I place a tax-exempt
order?

Unfortunately, tax-exempt orders cannot be placed through Alinenline.com. For
further information, please contact us by sending an email to info@alienline.com
8. 
How quickly will my order
be processed?

 If you place your order on Indiegogo till our campaign ends you will receive the item in December 2016. Any orders will be placed later on at Alienline.com will be processed within two business days.
9. 
How do I check my order
status?

Once your order ships, you will receive a shipping notification that includes
the tracking information. You can track your shipment through the carrier using
the tracking number.
10.  How do I cancel an order?
To cancel your order, please contact us by sending
an email to info@alinline.com with your order details.
11.  Can I make changes after I submit my order?

To change your order, please contact us by sending an email to info@alienline.com
12.  What is covered in the shipping fee?
Shipping charges include
handling, processing your order, packaging and delivering your product. Please
note that your order may be subject to import duties and taxes, which are
levied once a shipment reaches your country. Customs policies vary widely from
country to country. Please contact your local customs office for further
information.
13.  How long does delivery take?
Delivery time depends on the availability of the
product, the shipping destination and the shipping method you choose when you
place an order.
Availability
1.  Are Alienline products available at any stores?

Alienline products will be soon available in stores, but as for now you can
place an order on Indiegogo.com at a very keen pre-market price. 
Shipping
1. 
What are my shipping options?
Our company ships internationally with different courier delivery
services companies. Our
shipping and handling charges will appear when you place an order. 
2.  What happens if I am not available to sign for my order?
Once your order has been handed over to the carrier
for delivery, you will receive a shipment notification email with an estimated
delivery date. The carrier will make three attempts to deliver your package. If
you are not available on any of those dates, you can also ask for a service
called the ‘access point’. The carrier will deliver your package to one of
these points and you can pick it up at a more convenient time. 
3. 
What should I do if my shipment
is lost? 

Please contact us immediately by sending us an email to info@alienline.com to report the loss of your
shipment.  
4.  What should I do if my shipment arrives damaged?
If you receive a package that was damaged during shipment,
please report it to the carrier on the spot. If you receive a package with damages to the
product, please report it to us in the next 14 days from the date you received
it by sending us an email to info@alienline.com. Please make sure to keep
the package and if it possible please, take photos of the damages.
5.  What should I do if my shipment is missing an item?
Please contact us by sending us an email to info@alienline.com to report a missing item. We apologize for any inconvenience, we will
send you the missing item as soon as possible.
6. 
Do you ship
internationally?

Yes, we ship internationally. 
7.  Where can I find shipping delivery status on my order?

You can track your shipment through the carrier using the tracking number. You
can also find out the status of your shipment by setting up email or SMS
tracking.
Product returns
1. 
How do I return or exchange
a product?
To return or exchange a product, please contact us
by sending an email to info@alienline.com
2. 
How much time will it take
to receive my refund? 
As soon as your package
reaches us, we’ll send you an email and complete your refund. Depending on your
card issuer, it can then take up to 5-10 days for the refund to show on your
account.

story:
What is DreamMe?

With the DreamMe hardware and app you keep up to date with time and other information, right on the ceiling of your sleeping room. DreamMe hardware does not require batteries or cumbersome coupling to your smartphone or tablet, as the hardware uses a special optical system to show the information from your smartphone right on the ceiling of your darkened room.

Start the app - set DreamMe onto your smartphone / tablet - stay tuned @ night!

How it works:

While the phone is charging on the nightstand, DreamMe uses it to project parts of the display onto your room ceiling. Simply place DreamMe onto the display. The app ensures the appropriate placement and allows to choose different categories of information to be displayed. The user decides himself whether DreamMe is solely used as "projection alarm clock", or indicates your new mail messages and the weather report. The app also provides help for those who like to count sheep to fall asleep. Thus, DreamMe´s sympathic sheep even convert your smartphone to a sleeping aid.

The smartphone apps:
The app is responsible for displaying the information with increased brightness and contrast. Additionally it will mirror the information for the optical system, so the information is clearly visible on the darkened room ceiling.


App functionality:
  • Display the local time and date
  • Display the local weather (temperature and cloudiness) 
  • Display your own message 
  • "Sheep counting" will help you to fall asleep 
  • Alarm clock and auto on / off 
  • Display time in additional time zones (pro upgrade) 
  • Display weather in other cities (pro upgrade) 
  • Show number of unread mails (pro upgrade) 
  • Show the latest Twitter tweet (pro upgrade)
iOS and Android versions available for free in app stores (with optional pro upgrade)

DreamMe live in action:

Black DreamMe with white focus ring working on Android smartphone. Settings: Additional time zone "NEW YORK" - weather additional city "NEW YORK" - custom text "ON" - sheep counting "ON".

As you can imagine, it is not easy to capture the working DreamMe as the capability of current cameras is limited in darkness. We tried our best to give you an impression of how DreamMe is projecting. Please keep in mind that our eyes are X times better than a camera...


Design - from the beginning to the final:

DreamMe features a simple and stylish design. It not only fits perfectly to your nightstand, it establishes a perfect symbiosis with your smartphone - real bros & sis. Compact size and low weight make it a perfect companion on your next trip. It follows you through the night to keep you up to date.

When DreamMe and your smartphone get to know each other - this will be more than just a one night stand! :-)

The two identical parts, of which the upper one carries the optics, have the exact same contour and sit mirrored to each other, which is why in silhouette they form a shapely cylinder that keeps its symmetry even when it is unscrewed to adjust the picture sharpness. Considering its aesthetics, it is almost a pity it is being used in the dark. The base is available in two colors, black and white. In active use the colored focus ring separates the upper and lower parts with a subtle light band. The selected material not only is non-slip and extremely lightweight but also offers comfortable haptics preventing scratches.

Some more insight on the DreamMe Design:

The design was created by Uwe Spannagel TM. I know Uwe since more than 20 years and after my first on tries on the design (see pictures above) I decided that DreamMe needs something more professional. This is when I contacted Uwe. Here is some more background on:

Uwe Spannagel TM is an office for industrial design, founded in Cologne in 1995 by Uwe Spannagel after working for Henry Dreyfuss Associates in New York City and Phoenix Design in Stuttgart. 

He converts limitations into innovations. He transforms technical complexity into tranquillity and beauty. The result is an elegant, self-evident design that people want not just to use but consciously to possess.
Feel free to contact him if you are looking for a clean and elegant new design: http://uwespannagel.com/en/

Traveling with DreamMe:


Designvariation:
Black or white body - monochrome or color focus ring - your choice!


Wherever you go - you can easily adjust the focus to the height of your room:

DreamMe size:

DreamMe optical system:

We haven´t counted the number of lenses and optics we tested - finally we decided not to pick the cheapest but the best of them - an asperic lens. DreamMe is a purely passive system, without support of electronics. A part of the smartphone display is optically magnified and focused. DreamMe is designed for use in the bedroom and other low light environments.

Available perks:

Those are the perks that you can contribute to at Indiegogo.

Single DreamMe perks: You will get one DreamMe in either black or white body, complete with special lens and a white focus ring included. Also includes DreamMe App for iOS or Android.

Color focus ring perks: If you prefer it more colorful you can add green or orange focus rings to your DreamMe.


Double DreamMe perks: You will get two DreamMe´s in either 2 x black or 2 x white body or mixed 1 x black and 1 x white body, each with special lens and a white focus ring included. Also includes DreamMe App for iOS or Android.


DreamMe with colored focus ring sample:


The DreamMe team:




In August/September 2015 we ran an initial crowdfunding campaign that was more than 300% funded and allowed us to get the tools and machinery to start producing DreamMe hardware.
We are so excited about the great feedback and still have many additional ideas to improve DreamMe and the related apps - so we decided to have a follow on campaign on Indiegogo, which will profit all our backers to receive a even greater product. E.g. the funds raised here will be used to improve on the build quality of the DreamMe moulding tools.

Small risk of time delay with manufacturing
We have investigated many manufacturing options and choosen the manufactures we trust the most. However producing real hardware always includes the risk of rework needed for one reason or another.
We have done our best to make sure we have provided an as accurate as possible timeline for delivery of your DreamMe, including some buffer time allowing for delays.

story:
Solartab: The Premium Solar Charger

The Solartab is unlike any other product on the market today. A truly unique solar charger – featuring great design, a powerful 5.5 W solar panel, a massive 13 000 mAh internal battery and a built-in cover that ensures maximum sun exposure at all times. Solartab: the solar charger you’ll want to take with you everywhere you go!

Check out our video (above) to see what the Solartab looks like in action!

A premium solar charger
The Solartab is unlike any other portable solar charging or backup battery solution on the market. A truly unique product featuring great design, a high-capacity internal battery and a built-in cover that ensures maximum sun exposure at all times. And a solar panel large and powerful enough to charge even your tablet. 

Solar power everywhere

Whether in the park, at the beach, at a music festival or out trekking, Solartab always lets you enjoy free and endless solar power! Simply open up the Solartab to start solar charging either the internal battery or or USB devices like your phone or tablet. Thanks to Solartab’s huge internal battery, you can even charge your devices after the sun sets!

Compatible with ALL USB devices

Not all solar chargers are created equal. Standard solar chargers can only communicate effectively with and charge certain devices. Thanks to the Solartab’s built-in intelligent charging circuitry, each of the two USB ports can communicate with the attached device, such as your iPhone or Android phone, and thereby always charge at the maximum possible rate. So plug in any USB device to your Solartab, any brand or model, and enjoy compatibility that doesn't limit your charging speed. Charge your iPhone 6S in 2 hours and iPad Air 2 in 4 hours!

A unique cover
The Solartab’s unique built-in cover gives it a stunning and nostalgic look, and protects the solar panel when it’s tucked away in your bag. But the cover also works as a stand for the solar panel, so you can angle the panel in three different positions. Find the right angle for maximum exposure to sunlight, plug in your device, and start charging!


HERE ARE A FEW SITUATIONS WHEN YOU CAN USE YOUR SOLARTAB:

• The beach
• On a rooftop
• Your favorite café
• Music festivals
• When hiking
• On a boat
• A clearance in the middle of the forest
• At picnics
• On savannahs or the outback
• In your backyard with some brews
• On a desert island
• At outdoor parties
• On the Great Wall of China
• In your grandma’s orchard 


WHERE DESIGN MEETS CONVENIENCE

Drawing from our previous experience with solar panels, professionally and as consumers, we knew that we wanted a bigger solar panel. Something that could truly charge your devices efficiently. Too many solar chargers on the market today feature solar panels that simply are too small – barely strong enough to charge an iPhone within a reasonable amount of time. We wanted to create a solar charger strong enough to effectively charge even devices like the iPad. A charger that would allow its user to be mobile everywhere, anytime.


So we increased the size and the quality of the 5.5W solar panel, way above what you’ll find on the average charger on the market today. And already after our quick initial research and drafts we found that we could still create a slim, light and perfectly portable product. A product that would still be the size of a magazine. Or your tablet.

We couldn’t find a solar charger on the market that did everything we wanted, so we decided to design one. And after a lot of work, we managed to make our dream product a reality: A charger more powerful, reliable, good looking and portable than anything out there! After all, why should solar power be an inconvenient gimmick? We believe solar power should rather be a fully integrated part of your daily life.


We wanted to create a solar charger featuring beautiful and smart design. A robust aluminium frame encloses the Solartab's highly efficient solar panel, giving the product its clean, minimalist look. The cover is made out of soft, high grade polyurethane, which is both durable and water resistant – so don’t worry about placing it on wet grass. An elegant elastic band and strong magnets hold the cover firmly closed, while adding to the Solartab’s irresistible and timeless notebook look. And make sure it will stay closed and safe when you put it in your bag.

But there is more. Since solar panels can only fully release their potential when sunlight hits them as directly as possible, we designed the cover to also serve as a stand, which always ensures maximum efficiency. Thanks to the stand’s three different positions, the Solartab’s solar panel can always be adjusted to the current position of the sun.

Through our long and thorough product development process, we constantly strived to design a product that would truly change the way you perceive and use solar chargers. Through our uncompromising and perfectionist approach, all the way from early sketches to physical prototypes to the final product, we believe we have made the Solartab the best portable solar charger there is. It combines efficient solar charging with an attractive and smart design. The result is a truly unique product that will become your trusted everyday companion. Power everywhere!


JOIN US: TAKE ENERGY INTO YOUR OWN HANDS, AND BRING IT WITH YOU EVERYWHERE

Our generation is also an environmentally conscious one. We bear great responsibility upon our shoulders: As it becomes ever more clear how unsustainable the power consumption of previous generations has been, we are constantly on the lookout for more environmentally friendly solutions to our ever increasing energy needs. Using solar power to an increasing degree is exactly the direction we should be heading.


By the end of the day, it is up to us individuals to change the world. And the fact is, we’re currently in the middle of a revolution that empowers the individual in many different fields – slowly weakening what previously used to be the rock-hard centres of power, one step at a time.

"Energy has traditionally been generated centrally, distributed over power lines and sold to consumers. (…)The Edison Electric Institute (EEI), a trade group, warns that distributed generation could do to energy companies what the internet did to newspapers." 
– The Economist on solar power


We’re living in an exciting age. Since fairly recently, the computer and the internet have made it possible for anyone to record music or videos, or write books, and distribute them on their own. Right from their personal tablet or laptop computer, and out to the whole wide world. We are in no way as dependent on the big record companies, movie studios publishing houses as we were just a few years ago.

  • Solartab 5.5W solar charger with 13 000 mAh internal battery
  • Beautiful integrated cover
  • 10W USB Power Adapter (US)
  • USB to micro-USB charging cable
  • Instruction Manual

Does the weather forecast for tomorrow look a bit troubling? Since you can charge the Solartab from a wall outlet using its wall charger, you can make sure the battery is full even before you head out. It doesn’t matter if it’s grey outside: Every single day your iPad is joined by your Solartab, its battery life is already doubled!


SPECIFICATIONS

  • Solar Panel
    • 5.5W nominal power
    • Mono-crystalline silicon
  • Battery
    • 13,000 mAh
    • Lithium-Polymer
  • Size
    • 9.7 (W) x 7.6 (D) x 0.35 (H) inches
    • 246 (W) x 193 (D) x 9 (H) mm
  • Output
    • 2x USB 2.1A 5V (max)
    • Charges iPhone 6S in 2 hours and iPad Air 2 in 4 hours
  • Input
    • Micro USB port for wall charging: 1.5A 5 (cable and charger included)
  • Indicators
    • Battery: row of 4 green LEDs indicating status of internal battery, button-triggered
    • Charging: One green LED for each USB and micro USB
    • Solar: One bright white LED to indicate solar charging
  • Cover
    • High grade polyurethane
    • Works as stand and protects the solar panel during transport
    • Lets the user angle the solar panel in three different positions

© 2016 Solartab Limited

Solartab: The Premium Solar Charger

A truly unique solar charger – featuring great design, a powerful 5.5 W solar panel, a massive 13 000 mAh internal battery and a built-in cover that ensures maximum sun exposure at all times. Check out our video (above) to see what the Solartab looks like in action!







MEET THE SOLARTAB 





Enjoy efficient portable solar power day or night with the Solartab. Charge your phone, tablet and all other USB powered devices anywhere and anytime! Featuring a 5.5 W solar panel and a 13,000 mAh battery. And powerful dual 2A USB ports – charge your iPhone 6S in 2 hours and iPad Air 2 in 4 hours!

Find the right angle for maximum exposure to sunlight, plug in your device, and start charging!

HERE ARE A FEW SITUATIONS WHEN YOU CAN USE YOUR SOLARTAB:




•	The beach•	On a rooftop•	Your favorite café•	Music festivals•	When hiking•	On a boat•	A clearance in the middle of the forest•	At picnics
•	On savannahs or the outback•	In your backyard with some brews •	On a desert island•	At outdoor parties •	On the Great Wall of China•	In your grandma’s orchard 


WHERE DESIGN MEETS CONVENIENCE 


The Solartab started out with a basic idea: How can we create a powerful and environmentally friendly charger that people want to use all the time? To us, it was important to create a product that people would embrace as one of their favorite belongings. And add to their their list of essentials that they always take with them, every time they leave home.

  

Drawing from our previous experience with solar panels, professionally and as consumers, we knew that we wanted a bigger solar panel. Something that could truly charge your devices efficiently. Too many solar chargers on the market today feature solar panels that simply are too small –  barely strong enough to charge an iPhone within a reasonable amount of time. We wanted to create a solar charger strong enough to effectively charge even devices like the iPad. A charger that would allow its user to be mobile everywhere, anytime.



So we increased the size and the quality of the 5.5W solar panel, way above what you’ll find on the average charger on the market today. And already after our quick initial research and drafts we found that we could still create a slim, light and perfectly portable product. A product that would still be the size of a magazine. Or your tablet.

We couldn’t find a solar charger on the market that did everything we wanted, so we decided to design one. And after a lot of work, we managed to make our dream product a reality: A charger more powerful, reliable, good looking and portable than anything out there! After all, why should solar power be an inconvenient gimmick? We believe solar power should rather be a fully integrated part of your daily life.





We wanted to create a solar charger featuring beautiful and smart design. A robust aluminium frame encloses the Solartab's highly efficient solar panel, giving the product its clean, minimalist look. The cover is made out of soft, high grade polyurethane, which is both durable and water resistant – so don’t worry about placing it on wet grass. An elegant elastic band and strong magnets hold the cover firmly closed, while adding to the Solartab’s irresistible and timeless notebook look. And make sure it will stay closed and safe when you put it in your bag.
But there is more. Since solar panels can only fully release their potential when sunlight hits them as directly as possible, we designed the cover to also serve as a stand, which always ensures maximum efficiency. Thanks to the stand’s three different positions, the Solartab’s solar panel can always be adjusted to the current position of the sun.

On top of that we have equipped the Solartab with a powerful 13,000 mAh internal battery. This means you can charge your devices even after the sun has set! As long as you let it soak up sun during the day until it’s full, the internal battery will always be able to provide a full charge on any iPad – or SEVEN full charges on an iPhone 6S! With the Solartab, you’ve always got complete independence in all your charging needs.






Through our long and thorough product development process, we constantly strived to design a product that would truly change the way you perceive and use solar chargers. Through our uncompromising and perfectionist approach, all the way from early sketches to physical prototypes to the final product, we believe we have made the Solartab the best portable solar charger there is. It combines efficient solar charging with an attractive and smart design. The result is a truly unique product that will become your trusted everyday companion. Power everywhere!


JOIN US: TAKE ENERGY INTO YOUR OWN HANDS, AND BRING IT WITH YOU EVERYWHERE 




For today's young technology enthusiasts enjoying an active, modern and versatile lifestyle, having constant access to phones and tablets is nothing less than essential. And as technology to an ever greater degree leaves the comfort and the power outlets of one’s home, the demand for alternate power sources increases.

Our generation is also an environmentally conscious one. We bear great responsibility upon our shoulders: As it becomes ever more clear how unsustainable the power consumption of previous generations has been, we are constantly on the lookout for more environmentally friendly solutions to our ever increasing energy needs. Using solar power to an increasing degree is exactly the direction we should be heading.





By the end of the day, it is up to us individuals to change the world. And the fact is, we’re currently in the middle of a revolution that empowers the individual in many different fields – slowly weakening what previously used to be the rock-hard centres of power, one step at a time.
"Energy has traditionally been generated centrally, distributed over power lines and sold to consumers. (…)The Edison Electric Institute (EEI), a trade group, warns that distributed generation could do to energy companies what the internet did to newspapers." – The Economist on solar power




We’re living in an exciting age. Since fairly recently, the computer and the internet have made it possible for anyone to record music or videos, or write books, and distribute them on their own. Right from their personal tablet or laptop computer, and out to the whole wide world. We are in no way as dependent on the big record companies, movie studios publishing houses as we were just a few years ago.

In the same way, the influx of 3D printers is bound to shift production of all kinds of goods from giant factories to the comfort of our homes. And the solar power revolution will take ever more power from the big energy companies, and give each individual the ability to take advantage of the sun fuelled energy present right outside his or her doorstep. Free yourself from the power outlets of your home, and let the Solartab follow you and your smartphone or tablet everywhere – never running out of energy. It’s green, it’s free, and it gives us the freedom we require.

  PACKAGE CONTENTS







Solartab 5.5W solar charger with 13 000 mAh internal battery

Beautiful integrated cover

10W USB Power Adapter (US)

USB to micro-USB charging cable

Instruction Manual


Does the weather forecast for tomorrow look a bit troubling? Since you can charge the Solartab from a wall outlet using its wall charger, you can make sure the battery is full even before you head out. It doesn’t matter if it’s grey outside: Every single day your iPad is joined by your Solartab, its battery life is already doubled!




SPECIFICATIONS






Solar Panel
5.5W nominal power
Mono-crystalline silicon



Battery
13,000 mAh
Lithium-Polymer



Size
9.7 (W) x 7.6 (D) x 0.35 (H) inches
246 (W) x 193 (D) x 9 (H) mm



Output
2x USB 2.1A 5V (max)
Charges iPhone 6S in 2 hours and iPad Air 2 in 4 hours



InputMicro USB port for wall charging: 1.5A 5 (cable and charger included)


Indicators
Battery: row of 4 green LEDs indicating status of internal battery, button-triggered
Charging: One green LED for each USB and micro USB
Solar: One bright white LED to indicate solar charging



Cover
High grade polyurethane
Works as stand and protects the solar panel during transport
Lets the user angle the solar panel in three different positions





© 2016 Solartab Limited

story:
Order now at findlapa.com


We lose things, all the time. It's a simple, every day problem that deserves an equally simple yet efficient solution. That’s how Lapa was born.

Lapa is a bluetooth tracker unlike any before it. Still, good enough isn't enough, so we turned a good gadget into a great gadget. Better in every way and engineered to keep up with an active lifestyle, with Lapa you’ll find your things, no matter what.

Controlled entirely from an app, Lapa uses Bluetooth to keep you connected to your things. Hang it from your keys or stick it to your bag, and Lapa will keep your things safe during all your adventures.




It’s been three years in the making. After a successful Lapa version 1, you told us what you wanted, what you needed to protect your belongings – and we made it happen.  We re-envisioned the Bluetooth Tracker, all the while considering the consumer experience first.


 
Because it's attached to your things, Lapa's design is as important as its technology. Every inch, every line and every curve was thought out to combine maximum performance with an attractive look and feel.

The new Lapa maintains its original signature shape, but it's the added details that make it truly elegant and bold. Whether it’s to be attached to your keys, inside your wallet,  or hanging from your backpack, Lapa fits perfectly with your life, your style, and your things.


Lapa is waterproof and bi-injected with polycarbonate and EPDM – that is to say, it's ready for war. Tough against abrasion, Lapa takes its signature curvy design to a whole new level of endurance, keeping its shape and sleekness despite your wildest adventures.


Lapa responds to your call through sound and light. In your house or in the street, under the couch cushions or inside a purse, you just can’t miss it. And thanks to an incorporated LED, you’ll easily spot it, even in the dark. 



We've packed our latest technology into a device so small and so slim, it can be attached to any object and still maintain a clean, sleek look. In fact, Lapa is smaller than an Apple Watch and twice as slim.



Sometimes it’s not just things we’re afraid of losing. That's why we created the Lapa Bracelet - an accessory made especially for children. Parents will be warned anytime their child leaves their side.

Mobile applications should make your life easier. And the Lapa App does just that. With a stunning and intuitive user interface, navigation is beautifully simple. This because it was purposefully built to provide an exquisite user experience so that finding your misplaced things is as easy as 1, 2, 3.

Free and compatible with both iOS and Android.


Find misplaced things

Can't ever find your keys? Not a problem. Lapa will find your misplaced things no matter how far away. Inside a tiny apartment or a 3 bedroom house. Under the cushions or outside in the garden.



Find your misplaced phone

What if you misplace your phone? Because the connection goes both ways, finding your phone is as easy as pressing a button. Once clicked, Lapa will make your phone ring and light up so that you can find it. Even if it's set to silent mode.


Have some peace of mind

Are you the anxious kind? Want to make sure you have all your things with you? Lapa has your back. Whether you leave something behind, somebody takes it or even if “it” runs away, Lapa warns you whenever you and your belongings are separated.

With Lapa, you'll protect everything and everyone you can’t live without.


Can't remember where you left something?

Let's say you're at a restaurant, and realize you forgot your wallet. Luckily, the App remembers where you left it. The map shows your Lapa's last GPS position.



Lost something? Use Lapa community to extend your reach

Report your Lapa as lost and receive a notification every time a Lapa community member passes by it, updating its position on the map. You’ll extend your reach and track your things virtually anywhere.


Get your friends to help you out

Who better to help you than those who hang around the same places you do? You can post on Facebook about your lost things directly from the Lapa App and ask friends to keep an eye out. 


Get back lost things
Any user who goes near a lost object marked as public will know it’s lost and may contact its owner to return it. No need for a middle man or exasperating visits to Lost and Found offices. Easy, direct and immediate. 



A note to our first backers and clients

Without you, there would be no Lapa, let alone a Lapa. Your feedback inspired us, your support drove us to aim for excellence, and we wouldn’t want to set off into this new adventure without you.

As thanks we’d like to offer you a free Lapa for each 3 or 9 pack you buy! 

All you have to do is use the same email you used to buy the original Lapa.


Get your pack. Spread the word. Get Lapa for your family and friends. Help us reach these goals and we'll unlock two amazing new rewards.




Here pictured (on a rare work break, from left to right) are:  Rafael Costa, Designer; Ricardo Pessoa, Mobile Developer; André Quinta, Hardware Engineer; João Oliveira, Co-Founder and CEO; Ana Rita Pessoa, Copywriter; Luís Certo, Co-Founder and CTO. Not pictured: Marta Maia, Marketeer (she didn't get to take a break).

We have been working on Lapa for a very long time. Everything is set and ready to go but we need your help to take the final step. Your support will allow us to take Lapa to mass production. Only with mass production can we ensure it's built efficiently, while keeping costs low and lead times short.



We currently have a working prototype and we're now focused on finalizing the final details of Lapa and working out production rates with our manufacturing partners.  Our team has years of experience in creating hardware products. We have been working closely with our manufacturing partner to guarantee a flawless product and we're confident that production and delivery will go without a hitch and comply with the timings.


How does it connect to my phone?

Lapa connects to your smartphone via Bluetooth Low Energy.

How many Lapas can one smartphone control?

You can control unlimited Lapas with your Lapa App.

What is the range/reach of Lapa?

You can Scan & Beep a Lapa up to 200 feet (60m) in line of sight. This distance can be shorter depending on the environment. But because every Lapa you own connects you to the vast Lapa network, you can virtually track it anywhere. Anytime another user passes by your Lapa, they will update its position.

How long does Lapa's battery last?

Lapa lasts 1 year running on a single battery, which can be easily replaced.

What kind of battery does Lapa use?

Lapa uses a common CR1632 watch battery.

Is Lapa's battery replaceable?

Yes. To replace the battery, easily detach the bottom case using Lapa’s opening mechanism.

Is Lapa waterproof?

Yes.  Whereas most devices choose between waterproofing and a replaceable battery, Lapa's enclosed casing means that there's no need to compromise as Lapa is waterproof.

How durable is Lapa?

Lapa is very robust, built to handle all kind of shock and impact.

What mobile devices are compatible with the Lapa App?

iOS devices with Bluetooth 4.0 and running 8.0 or above, and Android devices with Bluetooth 4.0 and running Android 4.3 or above. We test and guarantee compatibility with iPhone 4S, 5, 5S, 5C, 5S, 6, 6+, 6S, 6S+; iPad Mini, iPad 3rd and 4th Gen; iPod Touch 5th Gen; Samsung Galaxy S3, S4, S5, S6, S6Edge, S6Edge+, Note3, Note4; Google Nexus 5, 6; LG G2, G3; HTC One; Sony Xperia Z2, Z3; Moto X.

Is the Android and iPhone App free?

Yes. It's absolutely free and there are no additional charges whatsoever.

Can I use multiple phones with my Lapa?

Yes. The app is free and you can access your app account on multiple phones.

Can I share Lapa with other people?

Yes. You can share any Lapa with as many people as you want.

Can other Lapa users scan and track my Lapas?

No. Unless you explicitly decide to share access to your Lapas, or publicly report them as lost, only you can see where they are.

Do other Lapa users know when I pass by their Lapas?

No. No user in the Lapa network will know when he or she passes by your Lapas, and neither will you know when you pass by theirs (unless they explicitly share or report their Lapas as lost).

When I share a Lapa with someone else may both of us interact with that Lapa?

Yes, but not simultaneously.

What countries will you ship to?

All of them. We’ll ship Lapa worldwide.

How much does shipping cost?

Shipping is free worldwide and on all orders.

When will my order arrive?

Estimated shipping dates for the device is late November. We guarantee delivery before Christmas.

Can you provide tracking numbers for packages?

Yes, all orders can be tracked. Once an order is shipped, you’ll receive a confirmation email and a tracking number.

story:
Kraftvoll. Praktisch. Vielseitig.

Geek Out V2+ ist ein kompakter DAC und Kopfhörerverstärker welcher über den USB port an deinem Computer oder mobilem Gerät angeschlossen wird.

Es unterstützt hochauflösende Musikdateien, so dass du näher an deiner Musik dran bist, unabhängig in welchem Format es vorliegt.


Warum eine EU Kampagne?

Mit unseren ersten IndieGoGo US-Kampagnen, haben wir bereits einen immensen Erfolg gehabt und liefern heute noch die Geräte im InDemand-Status aus.

Mit der EU-Kampagne möchten wir an diesem Erfolg anknüpfen, aber auch gleichzeitig das neue Gehäuse der Geek Outs vorstellen.

Unsere 3D-Drucker Gehäuse waren zwar innovativ hinsichtlich Wärmeabfuhr und Aufbau, allerdings war die Haptik und die Oberfläche noch verbesserungswürdig.

Mit dieser Kampagne vertreiben wir nur noch die aktualisierte Version.

Das Video zeigt allerdings noch die alten Gehäuse

Geek Out V2+ ist ein Problemlöser.

Kraftvoll

Zirka 25x kraftvoller als der Kopfhörerausgang eines Laptops oder Mobilgerätes.

Geek Out V2+ steuert jede Art von Kopfhörer an.

Praktisch

Geek Out V2+ ist kompakt und handlich, so dass du es überall mitnehmen kannst.

Aber lass dich nicht täuschen - er gibt den Ton an!

Vielseitig

Geek Out V2+ ist der vielseitigste DAC, den du finden kannst - mit einer Unterstützung von PCM bis zu 32/384 kHz und DSD bis zum 128-fachen einer CD Samplerate.

Volle Kontrolle

Geek Out V2+ lässt dich zwischen zwei Filtern wählen:

Time Coherence Mode (minimum phase Differenzzeit ) oder
Frequency Response Mode (slow roll-off linear Verhalten). 

Er ist der einzige tragbare DAC seiner Klasse, welcher dir diese Auswahl bietet.

Mühelos

Geek Out V2+ ist vollkompatibel mit der USB 2.0 Audio-Spezifikation.
Das bedeutet für dich, Plug & Play bei USB 2.0 Geräten und los geht's.
Für nicht-kompatible Systeme stellen wir einen Treiber bereit.

Flexibel

Nicht alle Kopfhörer sind gleich, daher lässt dich Geek Out V2+ deine Ausgangsleistung selbst wählen:
100 mW für empfindliche IEMs (In-Ear-Monitore) oder
1000 mW für leistungsstärkere Kopfhörer.

3100mAh Batterie

Geek Out V2+ beinhaltet einen großen Li-Ionen Akku, welcher einen rauscharmen Musikgenuss für bis zu 10 Stunden bietet.

Multi-Plattform

Geek Out V2+ ist für diverse Plattformen konzipiert und durch die integrierte Stromversorgung auch ideal für Android und iOS Mobilgeräte*. 

*Für iOS Geräte wird Apple's Camera Connection Kit benötigt.   

                              

Ultra-Hochauflösendes Audio

Geek Out V2 und V2+ wurden mit dem selben Vorsatz entwickelt, wie unsere ersten Geek Out Produkte:
Sie müssen echte 32 bit / 384 kHz PCM audio und natives DSD128 abspielen.

Das bedeutet schlichtweg, sie können jede Art von derzeit gängigen Musikformaten abspielen.

Unser Ziel ist es euch möglichst akkurate und lebensechte Musikwiedergabe eurer Lieblingsmusik zu ermöglichen.
Dank der hochauflösenden Technologie, dem rauscharmen Hintergrund und einer erhöhten Ausgangs-Verstärkung, wird deine Musik mit Leichtigkeit in einer dreidimensionalen und lebensnahen Tonbühne präsentiert.

Geek Out V2 und V2+ suchen Ihresgleichen in diesem Segment.

Worauf wartest du noch, nimm deine Tonbühne mit dir - egal wohin du gehst.

Hast du dir schon immer gewünscht, die Lautstärke noch ein wenig lauter zu drehen? 

Also, jetzt kannst du es, da unser Verstärker bis zu 25x kraftvoller ist als der Kopfhörerausgang herkömmlicher Audiogeräte.

Jetzt kannst du es krachen lassen - es ist nicht nur lauter, sondern klarer und hat dramatisch mehr Detail und Bass.

Geek Out V2 und V2+ sind nicht nur kraftvoll, sondern hochauflösend und detailgetreu.
Das bedeutet, dass sie die kleinsten und feinsten Details in deiner Musik naturgetreu reproduzieren können und so dein Musikerlebnis näher an der Realität ist.

Ein Geheimnis von erstklassigem digitalem Audio ist die Vermeidung von digitalem Rauschen.

Geek Out V2 und V2+ verhindern dank ihrer regulierten bi-polaren Stromversorgung und den äußerst präzisen dual-clock Zeitgebern das Eindringen von Rauschen in das Signal.

Das Endresultat ist lebensechter Gesang und erstaunlich akkurate Instrumenten Differenzierung und Wiedergabe.

Durch die Auswahl der Ausgangsleistung kannst du dein Geek Out V2 und V2+ an deine Kopfhörer anpassen - so wirst du nicht eingeschränkt und kannst je nach Situation den besten Musikgenuss erleben.

Technische Spezifikationen



Geek Out in der Presse

Warum eine EU Kampagne?
Mit unseren ersten IndieGoGo US-Kampagnen, haben wir bereits einen immensen Erfolg gehabt und liefern heute noch die Geräte im InDemand-Status aus.
Mit der EU-Kampagne möchten wir an diesem Erfolg anknüpfen, aber auch gleichzeitig das neue Gehäuse der Geek Outs vorstellen.
Unsere 3D-Drucker Gehäuse waren zwar innovativ hinsichtlich Wärmeabfuhr und Aufbau, allerdings war die Haptik und die Oberfläche noch verbesserungswürdig.
Mit dieser Kampagne vertreiben wir nur noch die aktualisierte Version.
Das Video zeigt allerdings noch die alten Gehäuse


Geek Out V2+ ist ein Problemlöser.




Kraftvoll
Zirka 25x kraftvoller als der Kopfhörerausgang eines Laptops oder Mobilgerätes.
Geek Out V2+ steuert jede Art von Kopfhörer an.




Praktisch
Geek Out V2+ ist kompakt und handlich, so dass du es überall mitnehmen kannst.
Aber lass dich nicht täuschen - er gibt den Ton an!




Vielseitig
Geek Out V2+ ist der vielseitigste DAC, den du finden kannst - mit einer Unterstützung von PCM bis zu 32/384 kHz und DSD bis zum 128-fachen einer CD Samplerate.




Volle Kontrolle
Geek Out V2+ lässt dich zwischen zwei Filtern wählen:
Time Coherence Mode (minimum phase Differenzzeit ) oderFrequency Response Mode (slow roll-off linear Verhalten). 
Er ist der einzige tragbare DAC seiner Klasse, welcher dir diese Auswahl bietet.




Mühelos
Geek Out V2+ ist vollkompatibel mit der USB 2.0 Audio-Spezifikation.Das bedeutet für dich, Plug & Play bei USB 2.0 Geräten und los geht's.Für nicht-kompatible Systeme stellen wir einen Treiber bereit.




Flexibel
Nicht alle Kopfhörer sind gleich, daher lässt dich Geek Out V2+ deine Ausgangsleistung selbst wählen:100 mW für empfindliche IEMs (In-Ear-Monitore) oder1000 mW für leistungsstärkere Kopfhörer.

3100mAh Batterie
Geek Out V2+ beinhaltet einen großen Li-Ionen Akku, welcher einen rauscharmen Musikgenuss für bis zu 10 Stunden bietet.

Multi-Plattform
Geek Out V2+ ist für diverse Plattformen konzipiert und durch die integrierte Stromversorgung auch ideal für Android und iOS Mobilgeräte*. 
*Für iOS Geräte wird Apple's Camera Connection Kit benötigt.   

















                              


Ultra-Hochauflösendes Audio

Geek Out V2 und V2+ wurden mit dem selben Vorsatz entwickelt, wie unsere ersten Geek Out Produkte:Sie müssen echte 32 bit / 384 kHz PCM audio und natives DSD128 abspielen.
Das bedeutet schlichtweg, sie können jede Art von derzeit gängigen Musikformaten abspielen.

Unser Ziel ist es euch möglichst akkurate und lebensechte Musikwiedergabe eurer Lieblingsmusik zu ermöglichen.Dank der hochauflösenden Technologie, dem rauscharmen Hintergrund und einer erhöhten Ausgangs-Verstärkung, wird deine Musik mit Leichtigkeit in einer dreidimensionalen und lebensnahen Tonbühne präsentiert.
Geek Out V2 und V2+ suchen Ihresgleichen in diesem Segment.
Worauf wartest du noch, nimm deine Tonbühne mit dir - egal wohin du gehst.

Hast du dir schon immer gewünscht, die Lautstärke noch ein wenig lauter zu drehen? 
Also, jetzt kannst du es, da unser Verstärker bis zu 25x kraftvoller ist als der Kopfhörerausgang herkömmlicher Audiogeräte.
Jetzt kannst du es krachen lassen - es ist nicht nur lauter, sondern klarer und hat dramatisch mehr Detail und Bass.

Geek Out V2 und V2+ sind nicht nur kraftvoll, sondern hochauflösend und detailgetreu.Das bedeutet, dass sie die kleinsten und feinsten Details in deiner Musik naturgetreu reproduzieren können und so dein Musikerlebnis näher an der Realität ist.

Ein Geheimnis von erstklassigem digitalem Audio ist die Vermeidung von digitalem Rauschen.
Geek Out V2 und V2+ verhindern dank ihrer regulierten bi-polaren Stromversorgung und den äußerst präzisen dual-clock Zeitgebern das Eindringen von Rauschen in das Signal.
Das Endresultat ist lebensechter Gesang und erstaunlich akkurate Instrumenten Differenzierung und Wiedergabe.

Durch die Auswahl der Ausgangsleistung kannst du dein Geek Out V2 und V2+ an deine Kopfhörer anpassen - so wirst du nicht eingeschränkt und kannst je nach Situation den besten Musikgenuss erleben.


Technische Spezifikationen






Geek Out in der Presse

story:
Get it now on Amazon!

 

The Buzz

The Story

This is the story of four engineers who met in college and had one thing in common: we didn't want to work a 9-5 engineering job - crunching numbers on a project that may or may not ever see the light of day. So after accumulating a few Master's degrees in mechanical engineering (and some minors in rocket science) we set out to follow our true passion: designing products that improve everyday life. Over the past few years, we've designed and developed a little bit of everything: children's games, phone apps, an orthopedic surgical device, a laser that fuses tissue together (yea, that's right: A laser. That fuses tissue.) Our team also helped create the first sleep tracker that actively helps you sleep (shameless plug: The Sleep Shepherd Blue has raised over $780,000 and is available now on Indiegogo InDemand). 

With the Vi-Band we had one modest goal: Make the world just a little bit more comfortable. 

 

Well, you're welcome world... we did it!

 

 

 

 

The Product

 

              

 

The Vi-Band is simple: its a headband that vibrates in specially designed patterns on your forehead and temples. The Vi-Band uses brushless vibration motors that vibrate on specific pressure points on your head - letting you relax without disturbing those around you. An integrated PCB allows for selecting different massage modes, all specially designed to give you a relaxing, endless head massage. Best yet, the headband contains a rechargeable battery so your head massage doesn't end until you say it ends (or, ya know, the battery dies).

 

 

 

Why it's so much better:

The Team

story:
Another Successful Campaign.

Thanks again to all of our amazing supporters. 
For those searching for this item the fastest way to order is now going to be at www.kyasi.com. Here is the best link to the 3D iPHONE 6S Screen Protector.

There's No Risk With A Kyasi IndieGoGo Campaign. Here's some of our early customer REAL results:



Announcing the all new Kyasi 3D Gladiator Glass. Designed for the Apple iPhone 6/6S and the iPhone 6/6S Plus. Lifetime Guarantee!



Overview: If you watched our video or know Kyasi you know we like to have fun, but here's the "vegetables" about our offer that are important too. 

The most advanced generation of iPhone screen protection has arrived. This 3D edge to edge made with Premium Glass is something that adds amazing levels of enhanced protection for your device and looks gorgeous at the same time.

  • Kyasi has been working in mobile accessories for years now and has developed screen protection for every generation of iPhone made.
  • This distinctive design idea is all about adding a subtle yet beautiful surface to your favorite device and achieving a new level of screen protection at the same time. No compromises.
  • By helping us launch this new item you will receive the first shipments of the production that is already completed. We realize that a lot of crowdfunding campaigns bring a certain level of uncertainty with them in terms of the question, "Will the company deliver?", "How long will it take to deliver?", "Will the product be good quality?" and other factors. 
  • We want to proactively tell you that we have already completed a first production, we will ship guaranteed perks within 36 Hours of the campaign being funded by Indiegogo.* There will be no delay. And if you have a problem we're here for you. Kyasi is all about delivering world class service. The best way to contact us is on this page: 

English - How to install:


Product Features and Benefits of Kyasi Gladiator Glass 3D:
  • PRECISION FIT - fits the iPhone 6/6S 4.7" and 6/6S Plus 5.5" perfectly with engineered opening for the front facing camera and speaker as well as a cut out for the Home Button. Custom Made For Your New Iphone 6S to help protect the screen from from Scratches and Drops, and a bevelled black edge to ensure it protects & fits the edges.
  • ABSOLUTE CLARITY - Highly responsive and sensitive with HD Clear Transparency ensures maximum resolution for Retina Displays. The Kyasi Gladiator Glass 3D screen protector seamlessly merges mobile protection and user interactivity into a single enjoyable experience.
  • EXTREME DURABILITY - Superior Grade Glass 9H Super Tough protects From scratches to high impact drops. Precise laser cut tempered glass made with polished, rounded edges. 99.99% HD Clarity and Touchscreen Accuracy. Anti-fingerprint "special" coating (oleophobic) which resists oil smudges and reduces annoying fingerprints. Nanotechnology to insure absolute smooth surface.
  • EASY TO INSTALL - our proprietary screen protector, comes with intuitive installation instructions, a wet cleaning cloth and lint-free dry cloth and is extremely well packaged for premium protection.
  • 100% PEACE OF MIND - Backed By Kyasi's Lifetime Breakage Replacement Warranty & 30 DAY NO QUESTIONS ASKED 100% Satisfaction Guarantee and together with our world class customer service you have nothing to fear by investing in protection for your new cell phone today.


iPhone 6S 3D Force Touch Compatible Glass.

Made with premium Tempered Glass!


This new tempered glass is made with premium glass materials which we purchased from a company that distributes the biggest brand in glass which rhymes with Morning Glass. :) Because they are very protective of their brand name and because we don't buy the materials directly from them we can't use their name in our marketing, but this material is super special and costs 10x more than standard raw materials. We buy the raw materials from one of their largest customers in Japan and then we use the finest materials and our finishing process uses the best technology to achieve absolutely stunning edge to edge protection. The only way for this material to be used for screen protection is to buy in the middle market since the 10 billion dollar company that makes such awesome glass has not yet worked directly with any screen protector businesses. (If they are looking for volunteers to pioneer the market with them we hope they call www.kyasi.com first!)

For those screen protector experts (or Glass Nerds as we call ourselves) we want to point out that Kyasi's Gladiator Glass 3D tempered glass is made with high alumina silica glass like you see in the video which is linked. The raw materials are more than ten times the cost of the inferior soda-lime tempered glass. And what a lot of people don't know is that the edges of soda lime are actually curved by using a corrosive technique to eat away part of the glass towards the edges which forms the curved effect. These so called edge to edge glass solutions will not last as long as a nanotechnology based premium tempered glass. At Kyasi we are always focused on long term durability and customer satisfaction.

The glass is compatible with the new iPhone 6S 3D Force Touch technology as well.

This is a premium product and is absolutely the most beautiful protector ever made. Best of all it matches your device so perfectly that you probably won't even notice it is there, until the inevitable drop happens.

The Gladiator Glass 3D is also more compatible with more cases than other curved edge protectors. Although not every case with work with these curved edges most cases that we have tested appear to work just fine. Unlike some of the cheaper would be competitors who use only 2mm thickness we provide a full 4mm thickness for maximum protection. 

Remember, we line up these perks to give you the inside track at a lower than retail price AND we back it with our commitment to unwavering support before and after the sale. How's that for awesomeness?


What You Get

We have made perks for a number of options from a single pack to multipacks which increase your savings:

  • Our crowd funding goal is to help promote this new release worldwide and help customers with the new Apple iPhone 6S find a screen protector that fits all of their needs.
  • Each perk will help us with future forecasting what models and sizes and colors will be popular since the crowdfunding community of early adopters is a leading indicator of market performance.
  • All perks will be confirmed for the size, color and any other relevant details using a survey to each participant and orders will be shipped as soon as the campaign is funded.


The Impact

Your voice matters. We love it when customers share their experiences because it creates a hyper learning environment for us. Even experiences that are negative contribute highly to our ability to understand how the market will react to this innovative new concept. When a new device like the iPhone 6S comes out there is a lot of uncertainty about what will and won't work. By supporting us now we accelerate that learning ten times faster than a normal market release. Crowd funding supporters are absolutely on the inside track of trends and help us gauge consumer expectations going forward.

More Social Proof:

Below please find a youtube review from: Dchomiez15  


Risks & Challenges

We have been around and launched many products so we are doing everything we can to mitigate the risks and overcome the challenges.

  • However, like any new product the item may not hold up over time. We have tested for around 3 months and the product is superlative, however, after longer durations of time it's hard to say how the item will hold up. However, based on lab duration testing that simulates longer usage and our track record of high quality products we believe this is only a very limited risk. Using High Alumina Silica glass which is 10 times more expensive that the cheap soda-lime glass used by other "edge to edge" protectors is another way we believe that we are investing in the long term quality and limiting your risk.
  • Not all tight fitting cases are compatible.
  • Our QUICKSHIP perks will ship quickly. If those quantities sell out then we will add other perks which will ship as they are produced. Each Perk will show an estimated ship timeframe. 


Other Ways You Can Help:

Even if you don't have an iPhone that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use your share tools on the upper left side of the screen! These may it easy and fun to see how your realm of influence participates in our campaign based on your recommendation.


As always we remain at your service,

Kyasi Team Bravo




IMPORTANT NOTE: Not all cases will fit with this premium 3D protector.

Because the glass protector actually extends to the curved edge of the screen cases that wrap over the curved area of the front of the screen may try to push the screen protector away.


In our experience so far in testing most Slim bumper cases, especially those made of silicone or leather which are more plyable will work fine. The PVC to TPU cases that are made with more hard plastic that wrap around the front can create a conflict. Overall 60% of cases seems to work fine. Here are some examples of the different types of cases that work fine:

Compatible Types of Styles:

Silicone Bumper Case: http://kyasi.com/products/kyasi-slimline-smart-phone-case-for-iphone-6-clear?variant=7997475777

Wallet Case: http://kyasi.com/collections/signature-wallet/iphone-6-case

TPU Bumper Case: http://kyasi.com/products/kyasi-dimensions-smart-phone-case-with-bumper-accent-colors-for-iphone-6-black-for-verizon-at-t-sprint-t-mobile-international-and-unlocked-case-for-apple-iphone-6-4-7inch-iphone-6-plus-5-5-inch-new-2014

Battery Case: http://kyasi.com/products/kyasi-power-to-go-3500-mah-battery-case-for-100-more-battery-life-iphone-6-6s-jet-black

Incompatible Types of Styles:

TPU Wrap Case: http://kyasi.com/products/kyasi-prime-mech-smart-phone-case-for-iphone-6-iphone-6-plus-for-verizon-at-t-sprint-t-mobile-international-and-unlocked-case-for-apple-iphone-6-4-7-inch-new-2014

Armor Case: http://kyasi.com/products/kyasi-armor-case-multi-color-pack-with-black-gold-and-silver-plates-included-for-iphone-6-and-iphone-6-plus-interchangeable-colors-with-black-silver-gold

In our experience with the curved protectors as long as we share with customer that really tight cases won’t work, but many normal style cases will work we have had no pushback from customers. 

Please let us know if you all have any questions or if you would like a video that demonstrates this.

ENGLISH INSTALLATION VIDEO:


DEUTSCH Einführung und Installation:

Hast du ein iPhone 6/6S und dir immer schon einen 3D Effekt gewünscht? Dann ist dieses Produkt genau richtig für dich. Das preiswerte 3D Gladiatior Glass von Kyasi http://kyasi.com/products/iphone-6-6s... Viel Spaß damit.

Español Instalación



*In order to ship by December 10th you must purchase one of the QUICKSHIP perks AND you must reply to our email survey where you will be asked to select your phone size and color.
