story:
What is this all about!!


     When I was a little kid I was introduced to the Apple IIc, I enjoyed playing with it for hours but the real computer that I loved so much was the Commodore 64c. I found the music about that came from it, great, the graphics where much more superior than the Apple IIC and the games that it came was equally fun and addicting.

    Then I came to Canada and was introduced to my very first Amiga system: Amiga 500. I found it to look equally sexy as the Commodore 64c, it had the Commodore name on it which at that time convinced me it was the new and improved C64. I loved the graphics output, the kickstart 1.3 interface and everything about it, Amiga computer have being passion when it came to the retro system of the past.  Then it hit me! Why not turn the Amiga classic into a portable console? After all, in my opinion the Amiga classic is a console and a computer combined. It had it's own custom chipset, it produced console quality graphics but unfortunately it lacked the portability of a console. It needs to be hooked into either a PAL or NTSC TV, and had to stay home..you cannot take the fun where ever you go.

   One might say what about gp2x, PSP, with Amiga emulator that runs games in these portable consoles? Doesn't this make it a redundancy since an emulator already exists? My answer to that is: No! Because unlike emulator this is the real deal? Do you consider an emulator a solution to the real hardware? Personally I would not spend 700 to 800 dollars on a real classic Amiga if I believed that the emulator will replace the actual hardware.

  However, this is more than just a tiny sized version of a classical Amiga this have new things and new features that you cannot find in the classical Amiga or emulator. Here are the following things that this provide over an emulator and the real machine:

  1) New custom chipset that follows the lines of the OCS, ECS, AGA with 1 GB CHIP RAM. It is called AGA-II.

  2) New Paula chipset that is 32 bit quality sound but named differently, of course.

  3) The custom graphic chipset will have 3D ability that matches that of PS 2.

  4) Background compatibility with OCS/ECS/AGA graphics and allows you to transfer games between classical Amiga to this console and play directly on this console.

  5) Have new customized workbench that allows it to read and execute real Amiga games, apps, etc. It even allows you to execute games directly from adf.  In order to switch between different ADF images you just press and hold on the select button for couple of seconds, then a menu popup asking you to select the ADF. If you press the start/select button together and hold for couple of seconds it quits back to the main and back to home screen. It also allows you to switch to Amiga classical mode and take advantage of the new hardware this system offers. How? Simple.  In the root directory of the console you place your legal copy of kickstart 3.1,1.3,etc. In the OS of this console you select switch to classical mode. Then it asks you to select the kickstart version and it reboots and starts as a classical Amiga that takes advantage of the new hardware configuration (including the new custom chipset and CHIP RAM).

  6) It have expansion port that allows you to use real keyboard, mouse, allows for composites, s-video, dvi-i, and hdmi port to hook to your TV. It supports all TV signals including: PAL/NTSC/SECAM, etc. The expansion also supports USB which allows you to use external HD, CD-ROM.

 7) Audio filter on/off and power LED on/off based on audio filter is supported (like classical Amiga).

 8) It have a 68060 running at 233 Mhz as the base CPU for classical Amiga mode and the kickstart of this console is build as hardware in it. The build in kickstart allows you to boot from HD USB, or CD-ROM which gives you the the advantage to switch to classical mode, and have a new customized Amiga system that takes advantage of the new hardware configuration.

 9) Allows you to play movies, mp3, browse the net, watch youtube, etc. Which means it supports WiFi connection.

What sort of chipset we will be using? We will be using an FPGA chipset and technology to make this all happen and when it is time for mass production the chipsets will no longer be reprogrammable.  Now the screen is going to be either an LCD or LED screen for brighter and better colors.


Is it going to look like that picture?

No way! Rest assure that the picture above is just a rough sketch to give you an idea what this project is about. It is going to look better than this for sure and with your help and support will be a very beautiful looking portable console.
story_txt: What is this all about!!     When I was a little kid I was introduced to the Apple IIc, I enjoyed playing with it for hours but the real computer that I loved so much was the Commodore 64c. I found the music about that came from it, great, the graphics where much more superior than the Apple IIC and the games that it came was equally fun and addicting.    Then I came to Canada and was introduced to my very first Amiga system: Amiga 500. I found it to look equally sexy as the Commodore 64c, it had the Commodore name on it which at that time convinced me it was the new and improved C64. I loved the graphics output, the kickstart 1.3 interface and everything about it, Amiga computer have being passion when it came to the retro system of the past.  Then it hit me! Why not turn the Amiga classic into a portable console? After all, in my opinion the Amiga classic is a console and a computer combined. It had it's own custom chipset, it produced console quality graphics but unfortunately it lacked the portability of a console. It needs to be hooked into either a PAL or NTSC TV, and had to stay home..you cannot take the fun where ever you go.   One might say what about gp2x, PSP, with Amiga emulator that runs games in these portable consoles? Doesn't this make it a redundancy since an emulator already exists? My answer to that is: No! Because unlike emulator this is the real deal? Do you consider an emulator a solution to the real hardware? Personally I would not spend 700 to 800 dollars on a real classic Amiga if I believed that the emulator will replace the actual hardware.  However, this is more than just a tiny sized version of a classical Amiga this have new things and new features that you cannot find in the classical Amiga or emulator. story:
Holidays deals now available on Indiegogo!

Click here to grab the ZUS Smart Car Charger and companion ZUS Kevlar Cables (iOS/Android) - the most durable charging cable. Shipping now.

ZUS is a truly smart car charger. It doesn’t only charge up your devices at twice the speed but also finds your car with the iOS and Android ZUS app. Say good-bye to time-consuming searches across large parking lots or endless streets. In terms of quality, ZUS is the only car charger that meets US Military Standard. 

 

 

 

 

German Design

Designed in Germany, ZUS sports a sophisticated, yet very functional design. Easily plug in cables of any size into ZUS’ dual ports.

 

ElegantShine™ Lighting System

ZUS’ proprietary ElegantShine™ lighting ­­provides top of the line lighting for enhanced visibility in dark environments.

 

Easy to Use. 100% Automated.

Plug in Zus. Install App. Connect. Done! ZUS automatically remembers where you've parked your car when your engine turns off. When you need to find your car, simply open the ZUS app.

 

Outdoor-friendly. No Signal Is Needed.

Find your car even when your phone doesn’t have reception. We love going out camping, trekking, and being in the outdoors, so we worked hard to make ZUS outdoor-friendly. ZUS can tell if your car is a hundred feet away or a hundred miles away. 

 
 

Smart Device Detection

With its advanced smart device detection technology, ZUS detects what device it's charging and delivers the  maximum amp output accepted by your device, enabling your device to charge at its fastest speed.

 

Lightning Charging

Charge 2 devices at their maximum speed, faster than a normal car charger.

 

 

US Military Grade

ZUS is the only car charger to meet US Military MIL-STD-810G High Temperature Standard. It is crafted from the highest grade German Bayer PC/ABS with all metal parts coated in Titanium in order to work under temperatures up to 100°C/212°F.

 

ZUS Cooling System

Less heat results in longer device lifespan. That is why we designed a special cooling system that results in 35% less heat. Check out the testing results below to understand the effectiveness of the cooling system.

Testing method: We tested 3 car chargers. Each charges one iPad at over 2 Amp output. After 38 minutes, we measured the temperature via a thermal temperature meter. 

The bottom car charger's temperature went up to 149°F (65°C) after 53 minutes. Imagine the impact of such a high temperature on an electrical device. That's why the ZUS cooling system is able to double ZUS' lifespan when compared to other normal car chargers. 
 

Product Diagram

Smartphone Compatibility: The ZUS app requires a mobile device with iOS 7.1 or newer OR Android 4.3 or newer. 
ZUS can be used for a 12V or 24V cigarette lighter. It outputs at 5V (max 4.8A).
 
 

Some of you have been wondering whether ZUS supports rapid charging for the new NEXUS 5X and we're delighted to let you know that "yes, it does" and it does it better than a leading brand and a best selling charger on Amazon.

Check out the Amp readings below from an Amazon best-seller, a leading electronics brand and ZUS. 

ZUS vs. ANKER's $30 premium charger. ZUS outperforms ANKER (a No. 1 charging brand) by continuing to work under temperatures of up to 145°C.
 

 

 

 
 

FREE SHIPPING is available to those living in the USA (via Amazon fulfillment). It's a flat shipping fee for all other countries via third party shipping. Check out the individual perk description for more info. Additionally, VAT is included in the shipping fee for EU countries.

On and before Nov. 11, 2015

For orders made during our live Indiegogo campaign, which ended on November 11th, shipping started in mid-November. For USA/UK/Canada, you should have received a coupon code to redeem via Amazon. For other countries, we've shipped your package via a third party shipping company. An email with your tracking code has been sent.

On and between Nov. 12 and Dec. 12, 2015

For orders made on and between November 12 and December 12, your orders will be shipped out via a third party shipping company by December 14th if it hasn't already been shipped out. A tracking code is emailed upon shipping.

On and after Dec. 13, 2015

For orders made on and after December 13, orders will be shipped out within 10-12 days via a third party shipping company. You will be emailed a tracking code upon shipping. 

For all orders, make sure that your shipping address and email is CORRECT. We will not be able to take responsibility for an incorrectly entered shipping address.

 
 

Want to avoid expensive parking tickets by just taking 5 secs of your time? Now you can with our easy-to-use parking time alert. Sine we reached our $250K stretch goal, we'll be officially releasing this app feature in late November or early December of this year.

 

 

 

nonda is a smart hardware startup based in Palo Alto, California. We wanted ZUS to be useful to the everyday commuter, traveler, parent, student, and professional. We rethought the way people used a conventional product like a car charger and made it smarter. We build ZUS to help people save time - time saved from searching for your car and from charging your devices, so that you can spend it on things that you really care about.

We're a group of smart hardware enthusiasts, app developers, go-getters, and industry specialists. We love what we do and hope to share our vision of what the future of smart hardware will look like with the world.

 

 

We've done the work in ensuring a quality product. We've gone through several production batches to test for hardware quality and rounds of testing to test for best app user experience. In September, we invited 300 external beta testers through our a-Fans program in order to test for issues and resolve them. Now, after months of work, we're ready to share ZUS with you. We are confident that we can ship in time, having already made preparations to mass manufacture and we're undergoing first batch. The only risk is if the campaign gets funded beyond our wildest dreams (such as over $1.1M), then we would need to ramp up on manufacturing, which we can do quickly since we have staff working onsite with our manufacturer.

 

1. How does ZUS work to find my car?

When you turn off your car's engine, ZUS will communicate automatically to your smartphone via Bluetooth to save your car's location using the phone's built-in GPS. When you're heading back towards your car, just open the ZUS app and follow the red arrow, which shows you both the direction and distance of where your car is located. The app will indicate "Here" when you're within sight of your car.

2. What kind of phone works with the ZUS app? 

Any smartphone device with iOS 7.1 or newer or Android 4.3 or newer.

3. What languages does the ZUS app support?

At this time, the app is currently in English and available for download worldwide. 

4. Can ZUS pair with more than one phone at the same time? 

ZUS can only pair with one phone at a time. You can however disconnect ZUS from your phone to allow someone else to connect to ZUS.

5. Does ZUS work if there's no power when the car's engine has been turned off?

ZUS' car locator feature only requires that ZUS is plugged into the socket when you park your car. It doesn't matter if there is power or not after ignition is off.

6. How accurate is ZUS' ability to tell where my car is?

ZUS relies on your phone's location tracking as approximated by using the following information from your phone: GPS, WiFi, cell tower, accelerometer, compass, gyroscope and barometer.  As a result, the accuracy level can vary between phones and where you are at the point of parking such as being indoors or outdoors can influence the accuracy. While it would be amazing to achieve an accuracy level of plus or minus  1 foot, in actual scenario, ZUS gives you an approximation to get you from somewhere far to within sight of your car or to where you can hear your car beep. 

7. How can I get additional ZUS units? 

You can buy more of a specific package. For example, if you want to get four ZUS units, you can pledge for two of the couple packages, bringing your total to $120 + shipping depending on where you're located.

8. Will ZUS drain my car's battery if it is left plugged in and if I don't drive my car for a long time? 

If ZUS' lights are off after you've turned off the ignition, there will be no battery drain problem. If ZUS' lights are on after the ignition is off, especially when the light is still on after 2 hours or during the whole night, and you're not going to drive the car for more than 3 weeks, we recommend that you unplug ZUS from the socket. 

9. How can I upgrade or change my perk level? 

Please follow these instructions from Indiegogo: 

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk

10. Does the ZUS app work for a multi-level parking lot, such as an airport parking lot? 

As long as the airport parking lot is uncovered and you remember which floor your car is on, the ZUS app can help you find your car. Because the ZUS app locates your car via your phone's built-in GPS, the ZUS app only works for uncovered parking lots and it can only tell horizontal distance and not vertical distance.

11. How well does ZUS charge NEXUS 6, MOTO X Pure, and Samsung Note 5? 

Check out the lab testing results here: http://www.nonda.co/blogs/news/54743041-lab-testing-result-for-nexus-6-moto-x-pure-samsung-notes-5

12. How will you ship out my package?

During our live campaign For those located in the USA and Canada, we will be using Amazon fulfillment. For those located elsewhere, we will ship via a third party shipping company.

13. When will you start shipping? 

By mid-November for orders made during the live Indiegogo campaign. For orders made on and between November 12 and December 12, your orders will be shipped out via a third party shipping company by December 14th if it hasn't already been shipped out. 

For orders made on and after December 13, orders will be shipped out within 10-12 days via a third party shipping company. You will be emailed a tracking code upon shipping. Please make sure that your shipping address and email is CORRECT. We will not be able to responsibility for an incorrectly entered shipping address.

15. When will I get my free 24K gold ZUS?

We will ship out everyone's ZUS orders first. Then, we will ship out the 24K gold ZUS as a separate shipment in late December, most likely after Christmas. Manufacturing of the gold ZUS takes more customization work, so hence the later shipping date.

story:
THANK YOU TO ALL THAT CONTRIBUTED! SIGHT SAVER IS NOW AVAILABLE ON OUR WEBSITE AT WWW.LASERTECHPROS.COM

Click the link below to buy SIGHT SAVER!!! 
http://www.lasertechpros.com/#!sight-saver/c1ud

Short Summary

Our small company, LaserTechPros LLC, was started by us three high-school graduates when we were seniors in the beginning of 2014. We had a vision of a small self-sustaining company that we could do something we love doing and make some money on the side. So far we are doing pretty well! After using our school's laser machine, we set off and bought our own smaller version to get us started. We have been making payments using the money we earn from online sales, and we are always trying to come up with new products and new ways to help people out! 

We now present our newest product idea: SIGHT SAVER! 


Sight Saver was designed with the purpose to protect your expensive optics during gameplay. Whether you play indoors or outdoors, there is nothing worse than getting the glass shot out on your red-dot scope and having to pay anywhere from 60 to 200 dollars to replace it! Instead, Sight Saver is a crystal clear shield that can take many hits from Airsoft guns that shoot 400fps and higher! With extra lenses included in our packages, you will never be left hanging with a broken sight!  Sight Saver is like insurance for your hobby investments. It keeps your sight safe and you on the field doing what you love! 

What We Need & What You Get

When you pledge your hard-earned money to our project, we don't take it lightly. We are here to give you the best possible product and service we can to help you and us for the good of everyone! 

Buying Sight Saver does three main things to help us and our campaign.

1. The money that you pledge will be used to have the first production run of the CNC aluminum base mounts to be made. We need a minimum of 50 items for them to be machined. Having low quantity, material, and machining time done by the local shop makes that first order a big investment. Reaching our funding goal will mean we don't have to use any of our out-of-pocket money to make this project happen.

2. The money that you pledge will also be used for the material cost and our lasers working time to cut out the shock resistant lenses for Sight Saver. 

3. Most importantly, you will not only be helping a small product campaign, but you will being giving your support to a genuine small business that is owned and operated by recent high-school graduates with a dream. All of our products are made in the USA and we'd like to keep it that way! We take pride in our work and do our best to set goals, and then blow them out of the water!

Now for the nitty gritty. Here's what we want to offer you!


REFERRAL CONTEST!

Refer our project to your friends by giving them a link to click on. Once they click the link and contribute to our campaign, indiegogo tallies your numbers and we will notify you when your referral amounts climb to each tier! Your friends MUST CLICK YOUR LINK for it to count!


Reach $50 in referrals: FREE Regular pack!


Reach $100 in referrals: FREE Heavy Fire Pack!


Reach $250 in referrals: FREE Team Deathmatch Pack!!!

GOOD LUCK!!!!!!!
NOTE: Once you reach a higher tier, the previous tier will be ignored.

PERK 1 - THANKS FOR SUPPORTING US!

Keep checking out our website (www.lasertechpros.com) and continue to watch us grow and see where you've helped take us!

PERK 2 - 5 PACK OF SPARE LENSES!

Add a spare 5-pack of lenses to your order so you might never have to buy them again! Be protected for longer and stay in the game.

PERK 3 - SIGHT SAVER EARLY BIRD!

An early bird for the regular SIGHT SAVER package. Your order will include the aluminum base, hardware, and THREE lenses to get you rolling. No better way to save money than to use sight saver to protect your investments as well as saving with our early bird special!

PERK 4 - SIGHT SAVER REGULAR PACK

The regular SIGHT SAVER package. Your order will include the aluminum base, hardware, and THREE lenses to get you rolling.

PERK 5 - SIGHT SAVER HEAVY FIRE EARLY BIRD

Just another way for you early birds to save some cash! Our heavy fire pack will include TWO aluminum bases for your two primary weapons, or if you have a buddy that wants one too! It also includes the hardware and EIGHT lenses that keep you in the game long after you've taken some heavy enemy fire!

PERK 6 - SIGHT SAVER HEAVY FIRE

Our heavy fire pack will include TWO aluminum bases for your two primary weapons, or if you have a buddy that wants one too! It also includes the hardware and EIGHT lenses that keep you in the game long after you've taken some heavy enemy fire!

PERK 7 - SIGHT SAVER TEAM DEATH MATCH EARLY BIRD

The early bird gets the deal - Great for the whole team, the team death match super package includes FIVE bases, hardware, and TWENTY lenses! That means savings and insurance for everyone. This pack will keep you going and going!

PERK 8 - SIGHT SAVER TEAM DEATH MATCH

Great for the whole team, the team death match super package includes FIVE bases, hardware, and TWENTY lenses! That means savings and insurance for everyone. This pack will keep you going and going!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PERK 9 - SIGHT SAVER RETAILER PACKAGE!

Perfect for shops that want to get their first batch of Sight Savers in their store as soon as possible rather than waiting until the next batch or parts to be made after the campaign is over. Includes TWENTY bases, hardware, SIXTY lenses (3 per base, and an extra 20 lenses to sell as spares), ONE 3' x 1.7' Banner (For your store to let customers know you sell Sight Savers)

Remember to contact us again at lasertechpros@gmail.com to get in touch about wholesaling in the future!

PERK 10 - RETAILER SUPER PACKAGE!

Perfect for shops, pro-shops, and fields that want a nice order of Sight Savers to stock their store and not waste ANY time or money! This campaign is where you will see our best price for sight saver! Includes FIFTY bases, hardware, TWO HUNDRED lenses (3 per base, and an extra 50 lenses to sell as spares), ONE 6' x 2.5' Banner (For your store to let customers know you sell Sight Savers)

Be sure to contact us in the future at lasertechpros@gmail.com for future orders!


Timeline

As soon as the first few backers pledge to us, we will make the order to the machine shop to get the parts made ahead of time so there is less waiting for you!
When the campaign ends, It should take us no longer than TWO WEEKS to finish our production of the lenses, anodizing of the aluminum parts, and laser engraving of the bases. However, we are going to plan for THREE WEEKS just in case! We plan for everything to ship out in early December. Perfect for the indoor season and all of the holidays coming up.
After three weeks or less we will ship all of the products to you FREE OF CHARGE (in the mainland US).
It's that simple!


Stretch goals

$1,000 - BLUE and RED options for the anodized bases!
$1,500 - PURPLE, GOLD, and GREEN anodized bases!
$1,800 - NEON lens packs
$2,000 - Custom team logo engraving on the base mounts for the Team Deathmatch package!
(More may be added if we hit all of these!)


The Impact

We can't explain enough how much your support helps us. If you are buying one of our products or if you simply sharing our website with your friends, you are helping us get closer and closer to achieving our dreams. You are helping a small local business spread it's wings and continue to keep moving forward! Thank you so much for checking us out!

     (The finished CAD rendering of Sight Saver)

    Risks & Challenges

    With our growing knowledge in manufacturing and production efficiency, challenges are what feed our every-day stride forward. We enjoy excitement and surprises. There are always going to be challenges that you face with projects like this. Equipment goes down, things take longer than usual, whatever the case may be we are ready for it! We know you are too. Backing projects like this is risky and there's no getting away from that. Regardless of the negativity, we plan to push through with the best knowledge and the best effort we can put forth!

    If our project isn't COMPLETELY funded, ITS O.K.! We will still use our out of pocket money to make our project happen so that those who did pledge and want a product will still get what they wanted! 


      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you don't play Airsoft or you still want to help:

      -Share our project with your friends using the Indiegogo sharing tools and help us get out there! We need to reach our goal for you to get the best product and service that we can provide so help us out! We also have facebook, and even our own website at www.lasertechpros.com! 

      Thank you so much for your support!
story_txt:
THANK YOU TO ALL THAT CONTRIBUTED! SIGHT SAVER IS NOW AVAILABLE ON OUR WEBSITE AT WWW.LASERTECHPROS.COM
Click the link below to buy SIGHT SAVER!!! 
http://www.lasertechpros.com/#!sight-saver/c1ud
Short Summary

Our small company, LaserTechPros LLC, was started by us three high-school graduates when we were seniors in the beginning of 2014. We had a vision of a small self-sustaining company that we could do something we love doing and make some money on the side. So far we are doing pretty well! After using our school's laser machine, we set off and bought our own smaller version to get us started. We have been making payments using the money we earn from online sales, and we are always trying to come up with new products and new ways to help people out! 
We now present our newest product idea: SIGHT SAVER! 


Sight Saver was designed with the purpose to protect your expensive optics during gameplay. Whether you play indoors or outdoors, there is nothing worse than getting the glass shot out on your red-dot scope and having to pay anywhere from 60 to 200 dollars to replace it! Instead, Sight Saver is a crystal clear shield that can take many hits from Airsoft guns that shoot 400fps and higher! With extra lenses included in our packages, you will never be left hanging with a broken sight!  Sight Saver is like insurance for your hobby investments. It keeps your sight safe and you on the field doing what you love!    What We Need & What You Get 

When you pledge your hard-earned money to our project, we don't take it lightly. We are here to give you the best possible product and service we can to help you and us for the good of everyone! 
Buying Sight Saver does three main things to help us and our campaign.
1. The money that you pledge will be used to have the first production run of the CNC aluminum base mounts to be made. We need a minimum of 50 items for them to be machined. Having low quantity, material, and machining time done by the local shop makes that first order a big investment. Reaching our funding goal will mean we don't have to use any of our out-of-pocket money to make this project happen.
2. The money that you pledge will also be used for the material cost and our lasers working time to cut out the shock resistant lenses for Sight Saver. 
3. Most importantly, you will not only be helping a small product campaign, but you will being giving your support to a genuine small business that is owned and operated by recent high-school graduates with a dream. All of our products are made in the USA and we'd like to keep it that way! We take pride in our work and do our best to set goals, and then blow them out of the water!
Now for the nitty gritty. Here's what we want to offer you!

REFERRAL CONTEST!
Refer our project to your friends by giving them a link to click on. Once they click the link and contribute to our campaign, indiegogo tallies your numbers and we will notify you when your referral amounts climb to each tier! Your friends MUST CLICK YOUR LINK for it to count!

Reach $50 in referrals: FREE Regular pack!

Reach $100 in referrals: FREE Heavy Fire Pack!

Reach $250 in referrals: FREE Team Deathmatch Pack!!!
GOOD LUCK!!!!!!!
NOTE: Once you reach a higher tier, the previous tier will be ignored.

Keep checking out our website (www.lasertechpros.com) and continue to watch us grow and see where you've helped take us!

story:
• If you have any questions please feel free to email support@chuwi.com and our customer service team will respond promptly within 48 business hours.
  • Follow us and discuss the CoreBook on social media - Facebook @chuwidotcom or Twitter @chuwidotcom.

The Stretch Goals:
$100K Goal: Upgrade the CoreBook's RAM from 6GB to 8GB FOR FREE! 
$200K Goal: Upgrade the CoreBook's storage type to SSD FOR FREE!

     

    ​

    As a global tablet strategic partner of the Intel and Microsoft, the CoreBook will be powered by the latest Windows 10 OS and powerful Intel processor.
     



    Usually, a normal laptop can deliver the great performance for our work and study, but unfortunately it's not so convenient to work on the go. While a tablet is more portable, it doesn't have the efficiency we need for day to day use. Now with the Chuwi CoreBook, you can enjoy both the efficient productivity with uncompromising mobility in one device. 

    CoreBook has the exquisite metal appearance which can be compared to the Apple iPad Pro, and the ultra-compact design makes it easy to put into your bag and take anywhere you want - whether for a business trip or a meeting. Plus, the detachable full-size keyboard and high performance Intel Core-M processor make CoreBook as powerful & useful as a regular PC laptop.



    A powerful performance usually means high price? No, not with CoreBook. In order to make the perfect 2-in-1 tablet laptop, CoreBook has an affordable price with high end features that match up to some of the high end devices. And not only that, we've also included all the necessary accessories in one package, such as: detachable keyboard and stylus pen, so you can enjoy the complete 2-in-1 experience with the minimal expenses.

     





     







     

    • Ultra-portable design & ergonomic 2.5D curved glass

    Engineered with an aluminum alloy enclosure, Chuwi CoreBook has a sturdy and well-built body. The ultra-slim and ultra-light design means that you can effortlessly put it into your bag and take it anywhere you go with ease - it's a great partner for a business trip, a meeting or your study. The ergonomic 2.5D curved glass edges make it not only look more beautiful, but also fit more comfortably in your hands. 


     

    • Amazing OGS fully laminated Full HD screen

    Featuring a 13.3-inch OGS Full HD screen, up to 1920 x 1080p high resolution and 350-nit brightness, Chuwi CoreBook provides a sharper contrast and gives natural, delicate colors. The fully laminated technology greatly reduces glare to make your pictures even more transparent and colorful - perfect for indoor and outdoor usage. Whether it is used for watching your favorite movies or handling your daily working, CoreBook brings you the ultimate visual experience.


     


     

    • High performance Intel Core-M CPU, up to 2.60GHz

    Chuwi CoreBook is powered by the latest generation Intel Core m3 processor (M3-7Y30), offering 2 cores 4 threads and up to 2.60GHz turbo frequency. It's the best choice for a 2-in-1 convertible/detachable device. Compared to the Apollo Lake platform, it offers about 96 percent performance improvement, so it can handle all kinds of professional and personal scenarios with ease. Plus, backed up by the powerful Gen.9 Intel HD Graphics 615, it can easily support 4K videos and run some 3D games.


     

    • 8GB RAM & 128GB massive SSD storage

    With the 8GB LPDDR3 memory, you can easily multi task, switching between the world's most popular productivity packages including Adobe Photoshop and Microsoft Office. And massive 128GB SSD storage not only lets you enjoy the lightning-fast boot-ups and transfer times, but also is enough to store all of your files, travel photos, favorite movies or TV series.


     

    • Advanced fingerprint recognition unlock technology

    We have added a fingerprint sensor to the Chwi CoreBook, so you can log in instantly and securely password-free with a single touch. This is about 3x faster than a password log in.


     

    • Detachable keyboard & 1024 pressure levels stylus

    Chuwi CoreBook comes with a detachable and stepless adjustable chiclet full-size keyboard, allowing you to freely adjust it between 0 to 165 degrees. The rotating hinges have been tested through 20,000+ flippings, so it will definitely stand up to the test of time. With the ultra-slim design, it can be easily put into your bag or brought with you, anywhere you want.




    Chiclet full-size keyboard - make typing easy, great for productivity.
     



    Chuwi CoreBook will also support a 1024 levels of pressure sensitivity active stylus. With the palm blocking technology and less than 30 degrees writing angle, it has been carefully designed to bring you the most fantastic pen experience.

    • Windows 10 OS, best for work and play

    As a strategic partner of Microsoft, the Chuwi CoreBook will be equipped with the latest Windows 10 OS. PC/tablet dual modes make it not only an efficient productivity tool, but also perfect for light entertainment. The Edge browser, Cortana and Windows Ink also will enrich your user experience.


     

    • Super full-function USB-C port & Dual-band Wi-Fi

    Chuwi CoreBook features a powerful full-function USB-C port, which can support power charging, data transmission and video/audio transmission, you can easily connect it to a projector or a hub. It is also compatible with the most advanced USB Power Delivery 2.0 quick charging technology. And if you want to access the internet, the 2.4GHz/5GHz dual-band 802.11ac Wi-Fi will offer more stability and quicker internet surfing experience, whether at home or in public places. 

    • Long lasting battery & 12V/3A (36W) quick charging

    Chuwi CoreBook comes with a power-saving design and packs a 34.2Wh high-density lithium battery, means that it can easily offer up to 8 hours of average use from a single charge. Also, it can be quickly recharged within about 3 hours, using the provided 36W charger.



     


     

    Established in 2004 and located in Shenzhen of China, Chuwi has built a reputation for creating great tablet devices in our home country over the past thirteen years. We are always committed to designing and producing our own brand tablets, personal laptops, fast charging accessories and other digital products.

    Our products are sold around the world through self-operated Amazon stores, AliExpress stores and many other distributors or retailers. With high-quality products, competitive prices and excellent service, our products always sell well, with loyal customers coming back as new models are released. We are proud to be an Intel and Microsoft global tablet strategic partner.
     





    All of the team members have more than 8 years of working experience in their related industries, this excellent team is surely able to bring you the most perfect Chuwi CoreBook.



     


     

    1. Who is responsible for the additional taxes, duties or VAT?

    Chuwi CoreBook funding will be used for the product itself and will be distributed from our warehouse in China. Shipping will only include international postage, so you may need to pay additional taxes, duties or VAT if your country requires it. Check your local laws before ordering.

    2. What is your warranty and refund policy for crowdfunding users?

    Our crowdfunding users will make the Chuwi CoreBook possible. As such, they will enjoy equal warranty rights when the product appears on the market. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can ask for a refund at any time by contacting us at support@chuwi.com. Please note, we will not be able to refund your order once it has shipped, except under warranty.

    3. If I want to be a distributor or retailer, where do I start?

    If you want to stock Chuwi CoreBook, we are open to distributors and retailers worldwide. If you have a retail store or website where Chuwi would be a good addition to your range, please email us at sales1@chuwi.com.

    4. If I have other questions, how can I contact you?

    If you have any question about our project or product, please feel free to send us an email at support@chuwi.com. Our team will answer your questions as soon as possible.

    5. When is Chuwi CoreBook expected to ship?

    Chuwi CoreBook is expected to start shipping in March 2018. We will keep everyone posted on the delivery, and will send out tracking numbers prior to shipping.

story:
Living today’s digital and big data age is absolutely made our life much easier but we all have two hands how to carry smart devices and use it as needed reduce our space as much as possible and use it easily and quickly is the idea and goal to make this two in one smart bracelet turning in to a good and affordable product.  

Taking care fitness and health, Taking care phone calls and much more.....

Duet Earband V08 will guarantee do both for you, make your daily life so easy and convenient.

  

Pedometer, Calories, Blood pressure, Heart rate and more.....

Monitor your steps, distance, calories, heart rate and blood pressure 24 hours a day and all the information can be accessed at any time as you like to.

  

Sleep Monitoring 

Segmented sleep monitoring record every section of your sleep. sleep or wake can also be measured.......

Put on the earbud to answer, put it back to hang up.

Pick up the earbud to answer automatically, The touch function can control mute or hand up in coming call if the satiation is inconvenient to answer.

  

What is in the box:

The Best App Both For iOS And Android

 

Timeline

 

                         2016     · Oct. Idea 

               · Nov. Design

               · Dec. Software & Program

                   2017     · Jan. Prototyping

     · Feb. Development

        · Mar. Lab. Testing

           · Apr.  Tech Development

              · May. Second Testing

          · Jun.   Final Prototyping

             · Jul. /Oct.    Package Design

             · Nov. Production Begin

   · Dec. Indiegogo Launch

                       2018     · Jan. Mass production & Shipping

        

        

                        

FAQ

What if I changed my shipping address?

Update your shipping address in your Indiegogo account. We will provide notice before we start confirming addresses.

When will I receive the backer surveys?

You will receive your backer survey 15 business days after the campaign ends. Indiegogo needs 15 business days to process all contributions.

What colors are available for Earband V-08?

Touch will be available in two colors: Black only. 

How much is shipping?

All shipping is free during the LIVE campaign. Once the campaign goes on InDemand, shipping cost is $10 for US and $15 for the rest of the world.

What devices is Earband V-08 compatible with?

V-08 Earbud 4.0 technology connect to any desktop computer, tablet, IOT, and mobile phone. Both iOS and Android, and any device which includes Bluetooth connectivity.

What is your returns & exchanges policy?

If you receive a defective or broken unit, we will resend a unit or process a full refund to you. We will help process exchanges as long as we have inventory–if not, we’ll send you your money back.

When will I receive my product? What if I receive it past the listed date?

We have experience with production runs of up to 20,000 units at a time with other products we’ve made in the past, we’ll put in the order out as soon as we finish the campaign. The shipment   will take by air two weeks to be arrived at our warehouse. We will honor our timelines as best as we can and aim to ship to you. But if we hear of any delays on the shipper’s side, we’ll notify our backers immediately. We won’t be able to refund you for shipping delays, but if you decide to cancel your order before we put the order in for a product run, you’ll get 100% of your money back.

How much is internationally shipping? Am I responsible for taxes and duties in my country?
We will cover shipping to US and Canada. For regions outside of these, we will charge a flat $15 shipping rate, which will help us cover some of the costs of getting it to your door. Keep in mind that you are responsible for paying your own country’s taxes and duties.

OUR TEAM

Create good products and make it happen is our passion that’s also what we are doing for living.  Every member of my team has a lot of experience (six to nine years working experience from consumer electronic technology, communication, marketing and design) knowing how to make the right products for people. We all keep the same passion together not only for the dream we have in heart but also for the products that people’ trust.

This is the first time for us running our project Campaign use crowdfunding here in Indiegogo.  We need your supporting us and help us to reach our goal!

Starting Production  and get ready for shipping soon.

story:
So why does this campaign exist?

Good question. I'm a youtuber of sorts who also likes livestreams and alcohol. This Idea came about when I was streaming and ran out of alcohol for my drinking game. The audience wanted me to keep going but I said I couldn't afford unlimited alcohol. So this was recommended. 

So what are the rules?

This may very depending on the popularity of donating as I don't feel like dying of alcohol poisoning. Right now I'm thinking.

Shots at 2$ 4$ 8$ 10$ 20$ and Double from there resetting after every stream.

But that's more than the cost of the alcohol what happens to the rest of the money?

With any extra money I make I'll be buying new computer/recording equipment. Again the exponentially increasing cost is just so I don't die.

So Where Can I find and watch this glorious man?

Thank you, I'm flattered you'd call me glorious. You can find me stream at www.Twitch.tv/yessikziiiq and my youtube at www.youtube.com/yessikziiiq.

When do you usually stream? 

This can be a bit sporadic, usually Tuesday and Friday. Although sometimes The heat will stop this.

story:
Now starting to ship!


 

Motes are a family of small, wireless sensors for your iPhone, iPad, Android, Linux or Raspberry Pi device that measure environmentals such as ambient temperature, humidity, light, soil moisture, soil temperature, object temperature, human presence and movement. They last for about a year on a single battery and don't require an Internet connection to work. 

You can upload your data to our cloud service for analysis via our free app, or use the optional mote.cloud bridge to do it for you in realtime via Wifi.

 

 



Instead of launching a weather app, wouldn't it be nice to know what the weather right outside your home is right now? Or if it's too dry or cold at night in your baby's bedroom? Or how long it take my fridge to cool down every time the door is opened? Or if my cigars turning to dust in my humidor? Or if that bottle of vintage wine is turning to vinegar in the basement? Or if my compost heap has finished its aerobic reaction?...

The Climote has literally hundreds of uses where you need precision temperature, humidity and light information. Like all motes, it records this information to its built-in memory when you're not around and can send you alerts when a minimum or maximum threshold is exceeded. You can even upload your mote's data to our cloud service to analyze it or export it to your own applications.

 

The Growmote measures the amount of water available in the soil surrounding the roots of a plant. the level of light available for growing, and even soil temperature to protect against frost. Unlike other devices on the market, they're economical enough to have several of and can 'push' alerts such as "I need water" directly to your smart device.

Imagine coming home from work, and your lawn telling you that it needs to be watered?


The Thermote doesn't measure the air temperature or even use a probe: it measures the temperature of an object just by being pointed at it! The techno-jargon for this is "infrared emissivitiy". In practical terms, it means that the mote:thermo doesn't need to be touching the object you want to measure the temperature of -- just point and measure!

This makes it great for measuring the temperature of the water in your hot tub or swimming pool or aquarium, your body tempature (via your temporal area), food, or anything else you might not want to stick a traditional temperature probe into for reasons of hygiene, comfort or practicality. 

Because it's tiny and can easily be stuck to an iPad or iPhone, you can even turn your iPad or iPhone into a portable contactless thermomter!

 

As we've now exceeded our original funding goal, we're able to introduce the...

The Securimote has a passive infrared motoion sensor that detects human movement up to around 5m/16ft away. It also has an onboard acceleromter, so it can detect if it's moved. Use it to notify you if someone is approaching your front door, if your toddler has climbed out of his bed again in the middle of the night, or that the mail is delivered -- the possibilites are enedless!

A Great Looking App

 

Our app features a minimalist deisgn and works with the whole range of Motes -- no need to launch separate apps for each type. Simple "sparkline" graphing is available on your iPhone and iPad to indicate trends and data can easily be uplaoded to the cloud service for more detailed graphing and data export with the click of an icon.

Signal strength and battery life for each Mote is displayed whilst that Mote is selected.

We will have an Android version of the app for Android 4.3 devices in June or July of 2013, although this is dependant on Google releasing Anrdoid 4.3 with a fully supported version of the Broadcom Bluetooth 4.0 stack. Only devices that have the necessary hardware (most Samsung devices, Google Nexus, etc.) will be compatible -- please ask if you're unsure if your device will be supported.


Common Features Of All Motes

Technical Specifications

How We'll Use The Money Raised and the Risks and Challenges

We've spent a long time developing our technology, going through various prototypes, developing the iOS app, putting together the beta of our cloud service, and more. We're almost at the pre-production stage, but we need your help to make the first production run a reality.

We'll use the funds raised for the following major tasks:

Plastic Enclosure Moulding

Even a seemingly simple plastic part can actually have a very expensive and complicated mould. These moulds sometimes cost tens of thousands and sometimes even hundreds of thousands of dollars.

Rather than have a custom enclosure for each Mote, we've opted to use one basic design that can be post-machined using a CNC. This saves time, money and reduces risk -- it's a lot easier to adjust machining a hole on a generic design than having to redesign the entire mould if the hole is completely wrong. 

We've worked with Protomold, a company that specializes in prototpye and short run injection moulding, to design an enclosure that is both functional and economical. Using CAD models they have identified potential issues with our designs *before* manufacturing and therefore we are confident we have mitigated any expensive issues before starting production.

Regulatory Testing

Because Motes are both tiny computers and wirelessly communicate with a smartphone, tablet or computer, they require regulatory testing and approval.

To ensure that we get Bluetooth complance approval we've worked with the manufacturer of the Bluetooth SMART system-on-a-chip we're using to ensure we follow their best pratices. We've also reused their reference design for the complicated radio portion, which also means we're assured compliance approval from the Bluetooth oversight body -- Bluetooth SIG. 

We have partnered with a testing facility that will perform our FCC (USA), Industry Canada (Canada) and CE (Europe) radio frequency emissions testing and provide consulting advice in the unlikely event we are not compliant. 

Electronics Assembly and Fulfillment 

One of the biggest challenges with producing a product is getting every part of it made, put together and ready for shipping.

For electronics our electronics, we have a worked with a contract manufacturer who will take on the procurement of most of the parts, manufacturing of the printed circuit boards, assembly of the printed circuit boards and the testing of the completed electronics sub-assemblies. 

But it's not economically feasible to do the above everytime we get a single order -- we need to order in bulk (1,000 Motes or more) to make it practical.

 

Press Coverage

"Whether you are a gardener or just had a baby, you will be alerted of changes in the environment with the Motes sensor. This is an affordable product that is durable, simple, and has a great app to go with it. Motes has doubled its goal on Indiegogo!" - The Crowdfund Mafia

"Notifications keep us appraised of email, Twitter and overall social presence, but what about the real world? That’s where Motes come in. These tiny 1×1-inch sensors keep tabs on their local environment, detecting either temperature, humidity and light (Climote), object temperature via infrared (Thermote), motion plus movement thanks to an accelerometer and infrared sensor (Securimote), or light exposure and soil humidity of a plant (Growmote). How they’re used is totally up to you, but they make it easy with 1-year battery life, water-resistant casings, wireless connectivity, two types of included mounting materials, plus an app that brings it all together." - GearHungry 

 

 
   

Questions and Answers

Are Motes waterproof?
While they are not designed to be submerged, they are water resistent and can be placed indoors or outdoors. We use the same stuff to coat their electronics that they use to keep electronics safe in the harsh conditions of oil rigs!

What kind of batteries do they use?
Motes use common, readily avaialble CR2032 "coin cell" batteries. Our Perks for Motes include an extra battery as an added thank you.

Does the app display in Farenheit as well as Celcius? 
Yes! Farenheit, Celcius and Kelvin will be supported.

Can you guarantee the range?
Unfortunately, no. Most building materials such as drywall/sheet rock, lumber and flooring do not severely affect the range. Thick concrete walls such as those in foundations will affect the range quite severely. If you're able to see where the Mote is from where you are ("line of sight"), you're pretty much guaranteed a 30-50 meter range.

How big is a Mote?
The Climote and Thermote are approximately 30mm*30mm*10mm. The soil probe for the Growmote adds approximately 90mm in height to that device.

Why not use Wifi?
Wifi is relatively power-hungry and wouldn't allow us to produce such tiny, battery powered sensors that run for so long on a single battery. We *will* release a Mote-to-Wife bridge (mote:cloud) later in the year that will connect your Motes directly to our cloud service for realtime, continuous data streaming, remote access and historical data.

Will you ship internationally?
Yes! Go ahead and select the Perk you'd like, and we'll contact you once we reach our goal to let you know exact shipping costs. As an example, shipping uninsured/untracked to Europe is about USD$9 per Mote or USD$44 for a 3-pack insured. Tracked and insured shipments are very expensive with Canada Post, so we're looking into courier services.

How many Motes can I talk to from one iPhone/iPad?
Our software is currently limited to 128 Motes per iPhone or iPad.

What devices are Motes compatible with?
At launch, you'll have to have an Apple iPhone 4S or 5, an iPad (3rd gen & 4th gen), or an iPad Mini, or a current iPod touch. Android support will arrive in June 2013 via Android 4.3 (developer API 18). If your device has Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and can be upgraded to Android 4.3, then it should work with our Motes.

Will there be a Software Development Kit (SDK)?
The mote.cloud bridge will have alternative firmware that will be Arduno compatible for hackers. We will publish details of our Bluetooth 4.0 profiles and services so that you can access the Motes from Linux or other environments that don't have an off-the-shelf app.

Will there be other Motes?
Yes! We already have prototypes of additional and very exciting Motes. We may even add them as "Stretch Goals" to the existing campaign if things go well. Stay tuned!

We're a distributor or reseller and would like to carry your products
We'd prefer you buy the 100-pack here and support our campaign, but you can also drop us a note at contact@wimoto.com and we'll talk.

story:
What is iParent.TV? If your kids are awake, they’re probably on a smartphone, in front of a smart tv, downloading apps, or posting to social networks. And most likely you have no idea what they’re doing. iParent.TV will be a yearly, subscription-based website for teaching and informing parents on all things tech, mobile, devices, websites, and apps for kids so that you WILL know.

The Problem.  Most parents don't have an inside track to tech or social media dangers, let alone how to safeguard their kids against them. 

58% of 10-12 year old kids believe they know how to hide their online activities from their parents.

46% of them said they would change their online behavior if they knew their parents were paying attention.

Introducing iParent.TV - keeping parents ahead of the tech curve. We believe we have the opportunity to help parents understand, get involved and safeguard their children in the ever-evolving tech World. iParent.TV educates parents with all the latest trends via Websites - Social Media - Apps - Devices

The idea.  It started with a group of dads who felt like their 9-year-olds knew more about tech than they did. They were right. But their idea will help change that forever for all parents. Once launched, we will have 100s of videos and product reviews that are very current, cutting edge and trending, keeping parents who subscribe ahead of the tech curve.

How it will work?  Our website will be a subscription-based site costing $49 per year for parents to access all the videos, reviews, how-tos, and live chat support. It will be the largest site on the net helping parents understand what's safe and what’s not in the world of tech. We are offering it for only $29 here on Indiegogo.

What you will get? 

Over 100 Video Reviews on all Trending Tech Devices, Gaming Systems, Smart Phones, Apps and Websites.

Check out iParent.TV for more info and the great early bird perks here on Indiegogo.

story:
SMS CONTACT

Where the Technology Meet the Art

 

MY STORY

Dear Indiegogo friends, let me introduce myself.
 
My name is Giuseppe Pezzella and I'm an Electronics Engineer and indipendent Physics Researcher.
 
My real passion is studying FREE ENERGY DEVICE but for this kind of study you must be outside of governamental structures such as the academy, yhe university ecc.

It is sad to say but it is true......
 
So the real goal behind this campain is to create an Advanced Research Lab for create new Clean Technology and Save Our Mother Earth.
 
 
Fortunately I have created a useful device that can help me raise found and help people in their job: SMS CONTACT!
 
 
 

 

SMS CONTACT

  DO YOU HAVE A JOB THAT REQUIRES TO SETTING APPOINTMENTS  BUT NOT HAVE MONEY FOR SECRETARY?

  DO YOU WANT LAUNCH A PROMOTIONAL CAMPAIGN FOR  NEW PRODUCT, NEW SERVICE BUT NOT HAVE ENOUGH MONEY FOR ADVERTISING?

 

WELL, SMS CONTACT WILL DO IT FOR YOU!!

 OK, but how does it work?

 

Since I think that a picture is worth a thousand words I will show both screenshtot and explanation.

 

STEP1: CREATE A CLIENT DATABASE

Every time a NEW customer arrives, their data is insert in sms contact database. By doing so, in a short time and with minimal effort, you will have a complete customer database.

 

 

STEP2: USE SMS CONTACT

With only 5 steps you have created a new reinder. Now relax....
The message will be send at required date.

 

 

 

DASHBOARD

In lower side of main page there is a dashboard with all information you need to have under control:

 

 

SMS ARCHIVE MAINTENANCE

Of course there is a section of program  where you can modify or deldete planning SMS:

 

CLIENT ARCHIVE MAINTENANCE

Here you can modify/delete all information of your client

 

DONATION

Thank you for your collaboration.

story:
Hey! Privit is part english and part spanish. Here you have the english version by Dave. No te pierdas la traducción en español ofrecida por Carlos más abajo.

Privacy, what privacy?

Companies are not interested in our privacy. In fact, they're interested in our data.

We use products and services every day that we get for “free”. Unfortunately, there are very few things in life which are truly free. The reason why you have free email, free messaging, and free social networks is because the companies behind those services want you. They want you and your data, and your friends data, and their friends data. In short: we’re being “milked” for all of our data, which these companies store, analyse and sell to others. 

“If we’re not paying for the the product, then perhaps we are the product.” 

We’ve been led to believe that this was OK. That these companies behind the information revolution are good at heart. We’ve been tricked. Their interests are in providing socially useful tools, but at the high price of invading our privacy. 

Another way …

Why should a company have access to your chats between you and your girlfriend? Or store photos of your holidays and parties that you share privately?

We don’t think sending messages should cost something so valuable as your privacy.

We are creating a tool that allows you to communicate with all of the people you care about and to make sure that those communications are really private.

Privit allows you to use the same great features from other messaging apps, such as starting and keeping track of conversations, sharing your location, and sending pictures and videos. However, all of this is done securely so that your privacy is protected. We, or anyone else who might be out there lurking on the Internet, cannot read any of the messages, because you control the "keys" to unlock them.

Who’s behind Privit?

We’re two young (well, we think we’re still young!) entrepreneurs from very different backgrounds. We hope that this compliments the project :-)

“Hi, I’m Carlos”

Carlos is from Galicia, Spain. Tall, dark and allegedly has terrible acting skills. Carlos comes from the world of digital media and marketing. He knows exactly what data companies are interested in, and how to get it. He’s so good at this, he has even won some awards. For his sins, he decided to help start Privit as he believes in privacy too.

“Hi, I’m Dave”

Dave is from Dublin, Ireland. His acting isn’t great either, but he had lots of fun making the videos for Privit.

Dave’s background is in information security. He’s worked defending computer systems and as a “hacker for hire” (security consultant) for the past 10 years, helping banks, online retailers, telecommunications companies and others identify weaknesses in their systems and applications so that they can defend themselves from online attacks. 

Why should I support you?

  1. Be the first! You’ll be one of the first people to get access to Privit. Being first is awesome, right?
  2. You’ll get the app forever - no recurring charges.
  3. You can help us get your privacy back. Be good to yourself.
  4. You can help others get their privacy back too. Be a good Samaritan.

Ask yourself this: have you had enough of companies invading your privacy? Isn’t it time we changed this? Do you want to be part of that change? If you answered yes, then please support us!

What are you going to use my contribution for?

  • Designing and developing an awesome Privit app for everyone
  • Initial set up of the privit platform
  • Making sure Privit is safe and secure
  • Promoting awareness of online privacy and Privit

Thank you!

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Q. Will I get my money back if you don't raise enough?

A. Yes! This is our first time using crowd funding. It seems that some people are uncomfortable giving money to flexible schemes, and prefer that the money can only be used for the specific project. We assure you that your contributions are only going to be used for developing Privit, and if we don't raise enough money to make the project viable, we'll give you your money back.

Q. What platforms are you developing Privit for?

A. The initial version will be released on iOS (iPhone and iPad) and Android devices. After that, we'll target other platforms, including a desktop application.

Q. I can't contribute financially, but I would like to help …

A. Please share the link to this page using IndieGoGo's sharing tools or whatever means you have available! Thank you!

Q. Why should I trust you and not "the big guys"?

A. Our business model is fundamentally different to "the big guys". They need your data to sustain their businesses. We want you to keep your data for yourself, and to do that we need to charge a small fee to sustain the application development and service.

Q. How do I know you're not just stealing our data anyway?

A. We will provide transparency in the development of our technologies and systems. We will also seek third party verification of the security of the application and publish the results. 

 

Privacidad, ¿qué privacidad?

 

Las empresas no están interesadas en nuestra privacidad. De hecho, en realidad, están bastante interesadas en nuestros datos.
Todos los días, utilizamos productos que conseguimos de forma gratuita. Por desgracia, hay muy pocas cosas en la vida que sean realmente gratis. La razón por la que tienes un email gratis, mensajes gratis y una red social gratis, es porque las empresas que prestan estos servicios te buscan a ti. Te buscan a ti, a tus datos y los datos de tus amigos. En resumen: estamos siendo “ordeñados” por toda nuestra información, que es almacenada, analizada y vendida a otros.

“Si no pagamos por un producto, quizá entonces nosotros estemos siendo el producto.”


Nos han hecho creer que esto está bien. Que estas empresas detrás de la revolución de la información son “buenas chicas”. Pues hemos sido engañados. Su interés es el de proporcionar herramientas socialmente útiles, pero al elevado precio de invadir totalmente nuestra intimidad.

De otro modo...

¿Por qué una compañía debería tener acceso a los mensajes que envías entre tú  y tu pareja? ¿O por qué de repente las fotos de tus vacaciones y fiestas son ahora suyas, cuando tú sólo quieres compartirlas con tus amigos?
No creemos que mandar mensajes deba de costar algo tan valioso como el propio mensaje que envías: como tu intimidad.
Estamos creando una herramienta que permite que te comuniques mandando mensajes, fotos, vídeos o compartiendo tu localización con todas las personas que te importan, o con las que haces negocios, y que lo hagas de una forma segura y totalmente privada.

¿Quién está detrás de Privit?

Somos dos jóvenes (bueno, ¡nosotros creemos que todavía somos jóvenes!) empresarios que venimos de diferentes mundos y esperamos que esto enriquezca el proyecto :-)

“Hola, yo soy Carlos”

Carlos es de Galicia, España. Alto, moreno y allegedly tiene, claramente, muy poca habilidad para actuar. Carlos viene del mundo del marketing digital. El sabe cual es la información que les gusta más a las empresas y como conseguirla. De hecho, es tan bueno en esto, que incluso ha ganado algunos premios por ello. Pero se ha pasado al otro lado y ha decidido ayudar a lanzar Privit, por que él también cree que la privacidad vale la pena.

“Hola, yo soy Dave”

Dave es de Dublin, Irlanda. Dice que tampoco es un gran actor, pero se lo ha pasado tan bien haciendo los vídeos de Privit, que realmente lo ha hecho bastante bien.
Dave es un especialista en la seguridad de la información. Su pasado es bastante más emocionante que el de Carlos: él ha trabajado defendiendo sistemas informáticos y también como “hacker a sueldo” durante los últimos 10 años, ayudando a bancos, tiendas online, empresas de telecomunicaciones, y otras, a identificar sus puntos débiles en sus sistemas y aplicaciones para que puedan defenderse mejor de los ataques en internet.

Por qué ayudarnos?

  1. Sé el primero! Serás uno de los primeros en acceder a Privit. Ver las cosas antes siempre es genial, ¿no estás de acuerdo?
  2. Tendrás la aplicación para siempre, sin ningún coste adicional por año.
  3. Nos puedes ayudar a devolverte tu privacidad. También te estarás ayudándote a ti mismo :)
  4. También estarás ayudando a otros a recobrar su privacidad. Sé un buen Samaritano.

Hazte las siguientes preguntas: ¿no ha habido ya suficientes empresas que han invadido ya tu privacidad?, ¿no crees que es tiempo ya de cambiar esto?, ¿quieres ser parte del cambio? Si la respuesta a dos o más preguntas de estas, es sí, entonces estás listo para ayudarnos :)

Qué vamos a hacer con el dinero?

  • Diseñar y desarrollar una aplicación genial para todo el mundo.
  • Configuración inicial de la plataforma que soportará Privit.
  • Asegurarnos de que Privit es seguro para ti.
  • Promocionando la necesidad de privacidad online y que cuantas más personas sepan que existe una alternativa: Privit.

Gracias!

 

Preguntas Frecuentes (FAQs)

P. Recuperaré mi dinero si no conseguís el dinero necesario?

A. ¡Si! Esta es nuestra primera experiencia en el mundo del crowd funding. El dinero que se aporte en esta campaña irá única y exclusivamente para este proyecto y a conseguir daros lo que os hemos prometido y si no conseguimos el suficiente dinero para ello, devolveremos las aportaciones realizadas.

P. ¿Para qué plataformas váis a desarrollar Privit?

A. La versión inicial se basará en iOS (iPhone e iPad) y dispositivos Android. Después de esto, desarrollaremos para otras plataformas e incluso para tu ordenador portátil y sobremesa..

P. No puedo aportar dinero, pero me gustaría ayudar…

A. Por favor, comparte el link de esta página. Puedes hascerlo usando las herramientas que IndieGoGo te proporciona, o simplemente las que tú creas más oportunas. ¡Gracias!

P. ¿Por qué tengo que creerte a ti y no a los “grandes”?

A. Nuestro modelo de negocio es bastante diferente al de los “grandes”. Ellos necesitan tu información para sostenerlo. Nosotros queremos que sigas podiendo utilizar el servicio, pero sin perder nada a cambio. Por ello tenemos que cobrar una pequeña cantidad para pagar a los desarrolladores y la infraestructura necesaria.

P. ¿Como sé que no estás robándome tú también mi información personal?

A. Aportaremos transparencia en el desarrollo de nuestras tecnologías y una auditoría de seguridad independiente, de la cual publicaremos los resultados.

story:
WHAT IS CALLBACK

Callback is a simplistic, beautifully designed application that provides actors, hosts and models a quick and easy way to log castings, manage booking, track finances, and much much more.

Career and business management will always be necessary for talent industry workers. Many do not have an adequate system of tracking their day to day work, financials, castings and more. Much of the details are misplaced or forgotten. Talent industry workers will benefit greatly by this simply designed, yet detailed application that will allow them to store their career moves in one place and track their progress.

The app will connect with the user’s calendar and maps to keep the clutter to a minimum and avoid conflicts that arise when multiple sources are being used. Another excellent feature of Callback is reports. Reports are available for financials as well as casting and booking stats.

THE MISSION

TO EMPOWER TALENT BY PROVIDING A TOOL FOR BUSINESS MANAGEMENT THAT WILL DRIVE CAREER GROWTH. 

With Callback, talent is empowered to take control of their business. The application  gives talent professionals the tools to manage their business with very little fuss. 


HOW WILL THE FUNDS BE USED?

The initial funding goal is $10,000. All funds raised here will go directly to development costs for the application to be brought to life. Your contributions will build a tool that will benefit thousands. Every dollar helps and is greatly appreciated!

The stretch goal is $25,000 with the intention of developing an iPad and web based application. This will provide Callback users additional methods to access their details across devices.


THE REWARDS

This is the best part. For your contribution to Callback's development you can receive

  • Your name on the credits of the application.
  • Personalized Thank You note from me! :)
  • Download(s) of the application for you and your friends.
  • Callback T Shirt(s)
  • Autographed copy of "Host your own TV Show" written by Emmy Award Winning host and author, Tim Tialdo. 
  • One hour coaching session with me in one of the following areas: modeling, hosting, personal image development or general on camera presentation. (via Skype if not local to Atlanta)


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you can't contribute financially but still want to help make Callback a reality, please share this campaign via social media and spread the word to help the application get funded! 


WHO AM I & WHY I LOVE CALLBACK

My name is Lesa Wilson. I earned my certification in Radio and Television Broadcasting at Coosa Valley Technical College. I have worked as a radio dj, tv host, actor and model my entire career. In 2010 I decided to continue my education at The Creative Circus where I studied Interactive Development. With my newly acquired skills, I learned to manage my own career as a business and that is where the idea for Callback was born. 

For years, I've been managing my work details using spreadsheets and binders full of paper and tabs. Callback gets rid of my binder. It gets rid of my spreadsheets. It puts all of my details in the palm of my hand. With the touch of a few buttons, I can call up any casting I've been on, what I wore, if I got a callback or booking and a dozen other valuable details. In business, we can only improve what we track. Once I started viewing myself as a business and tracking my details, I saw a huge improvement! I also saw the need for simplicity so I can focus on doing what I'm best at.

I am a full time talent. I host television shows, act in commercials and network shows, host live events and model. My client roster includes Minute Maid, Ford, Bright Starts, Graco, Homewood Suites, Wynn Casino Las Vegas and Aflac just to name a few. I bring 17+ years of experience in the entertainment business to the project as well as valuable resources and a keen working knowledge of the talent industry. My body of work is available on my website: www.lesawilson.com.

With Callback, talent is empowered to take control of their business. The application  gives talent professionals the tools to manage their business with very little fuss. 


HOW WILL THE FUNDS BE USED?
The initial funding goal is $10,000. All funds raised here will go directly to development costs for the application to be brought to life. Your contributions will build a tool that will benefit thousands. Every dollar helps and is greatly appreciated!
The stretch goal is $25,000 with the intention of developing an iPad and web based application. This will provide Callback users additional methods to access their details across devices.

THE REWARDS
This is the best part. For your contribution to Callback's development you can receive 

Your name on the credits of the application.

Personalized Thank You note from me! :)
Download(s) of the application for you and your friends.
Callback T Shirt(s)
Autographed copy of "Host your own TV Show" written by Emmy Award Winning host and author, Tim Tialdo.  

One hour coaching session with me in one of the following areas: modeling, hosting, personal image development or general on camera presentation. (via Skype if not local to Atlanta)


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
If you can't contribute financially but still want to help make Callback a reality, please share this campaign via social media and spread the word to help the application get funded! 

WHO AM I & WHY I LOVE CALLBACKMy name is Lesa Wilson. I earned my certification in Radio and Television Broadcasting at Coosa Valley Technical College. I have worked as a radio dj, tv host, actor and model my entire career. In 2010 I decided to continue my education at The Creative Circus where I studied Interactive Development. With my newly acquired skills, I learned to manage my own career as a business and that is where the idea for Callback was born. For years, I've been managing my work details using spreadsheets and binders full of paper and tabs. Callback gets rid of my binder. It gets rid of my spreadsheets. It puts all of my details in the palm of my hand. With the touch of a few buttons, I can call up any casting I've been on, what I wore, if I got a callback or booking and a dozen other valuable details. In business, we can only improve what we track. Once I started viewing myself as a business and tracking my details, I saw a huge improvement! I also saw the need for simplicity so I can focus on doing what I'm best at.
I am a full time talent. I host television shows, act in commercials and network shows, host live events and model. My client roster includes Minute Maid, Ford, Bright Starts, Graco, Homewood Suites, Wynn Casino Las Vegas and Aflac just to name a few. I bring 17+ years of experience in the entertainment business to the project as well as valuable resources and a keen working knowledge of the talent industry. My body of work is available on my website: www.lesawilson.com.

story:
Pointant was created with the intent to bring powerful technology on the go. I have tried just about every mobile speaker on the market as I love taking my tunes on the golf course or out to the job site. Unfortunately, I have been disappointed in all of them. I found a few speakers that were resistant to water and the outdoors while others connected to my mobile device seamlessly, but my biggest headache always has been the power. Here you have a speaker that you stream music from your phone, if one or the other does not have power then NO TUNES. 

Pointant BTS was conceptualized around 3 major facets. 




Our first goal was Power.

We wanted to provide not only substantial power for the speaker, but also the ability to charge our mobile device on the go.

We could never find a way to position the speaker hands free while taking the family out on the boat or even harder listening to tunes in the shower. 


So our second goal was Position. 

We needed a Hands Free mount for not only the speaker, but our mobile device as well. 

The magnetic mount allows your mobile device to swivel freely for viewing in any direction.


Once we had a speaker that had the power and proper placement, we wanted to make our speaker SMART. 


Our third and final goal were our Points.

We wanted to automate the features we typically have to punch into our mobile device. So we developed our own mobile application that communicates directly with the bluetooth speaker. 

Next we created a Point on the speaker that has the ability to automate mobile settings, connect bluetooth devices, and launch music or any of our favorite applications on the go in one simple swipe. 

Now that we have the solution to our problem we look to you to help bring the Pointant solution to market.

story:
Hi,

We are: Benny Weill, A student majoring in industrial engineering in Jerusalem & Meir Horwitz, store manager in Ramat Gan.

For quite a while, we have been trying to come up with an idea for a smartphone accessory -



not just another cover - one that will answer 


Finally, we thought about the
"wiseholder"- a smartphone cover that is also a holder!


    The strap is specifically designed so that it does not protrude from the back, making it easy  to take it in & out of your pocket. 


    What we need and what you get:

    As for now, we have a 3d printed prototype of the smartholder and it feels wonderful.

    We would like to make a mold of the smartholder for the iphone 5, iphone 5s & iphone 6.

    The cost of the mold is 19,000$(USD)

    As one of us is a student and the other a small store manager, we cannot afford the cost of the mold.

    We would love it if you could help us with are first project.

    Thank you,

    Benny&Meir
