story:
More New Perks!!!

$69: Bluetooth + MP3 + Headset
Limited Time Offer!

***Best Value***

  • Can't decide between the Bluetooth and MP3 module? Get both at a steal. 
  • Both modules have clips for your shirt, and both are compatible with the headset so you can easily switch out whenever you want. 
  • Going for a short run or to the gym? Leave your phone at home and just take your music along! 
  • Because the modules clip on the shirt, the headset is SUPER light on the head; even more comfortable than ear buds as there is no weight from the cable on the ears. 
  • Perfect for lots of high movement or long wears!



$24: Assembled Standalone Headset

Convert your existing Cynaps into a sleek headset version! This kit comes with the new improved headset with our newest transducers, a small adapter cable for those who use white connectors and clips to convert any Cynaps module into a shirt or bag wearable version. Clip it on and go!



$49: MP3 Headset

Leave your phone at home! This baby can store up to 1600 songs with the included 8GB Micro SD card. Like the Bluetooth version, the MP3 module also has an integrated clip on the back for your shirt or bag. Comes with leather carry case and USB charger.



$59: Bluetooth Headset: New and improved!



Here are the new features:

  • Super light headset with a new sleek look including our new and improved transducers; minimal sound leakage and awesome transmission with perfect placement on your cheekbones
  • Nearly twice the battery life as the original Mint: 700mAh
  • Improved Bluetooth reception: thinner housing near the Bluetooth antenna for dramatically increased recption over the original Mint
  • Mini headphone jack for the headset: much more stable and reliable than the original white connectors
  • Easier to access buttons on the front of the module
  • Sturdy integrated clip for optional attachment to a shirt or bag
  • Headset can be worn easily in combination with any hat or helmet!

Comes with USB charging cable and leather carry case













--------------------------------------------


Info from original campaign:




Cynaps Mint is a small, but extremely powerful, bone conduction headset. In fact, it's the most powerful one on the planet.

It's made of modular parts, which can be easily disassembled and reassembled to suit a specific purpose. Wear it as a headset, or separate it from the band and clip it into any hat, helmet or hardhat in seconds!


Tweak it so it fits just right for you. The audio modules, called 'transducers', generate sound through vibration, and you can attach them in different ways to suit many different wearing styles:

You can place the transducers anywhere on your head to hear super clear audio through vibration, via Bluetooth from your phone, tablet, PC and many smartwatches.  

Listen to music or take calls without needing to block your ears. Very useful and much safer than traditional earphones when biking, running and driving, as well as many other sports and outdoor activities like motorcycling or snowboarding. Stay connected, while staying in touch with the world around you.

Wouldn't it be easier, since we're already going to be doing all of this snowboarding and motorcycling with a helmet, to have an integrated helmet and headset in one? With Cynaps Mint, it's a snap. The headset disconnects in seconds, and you can use the clips to mount the transducers and base unit directly into any hat, helmet or hardhat!


Are we getting all 'Transformers' on you yet?  :)  Keep reading - it gets better!

Cynaps Mint isn't just a headset.  It's also the world's first and only true stereo vibration speaker system, turning any surface into a set of stereo loudspeakers!  

Our transducers are so powerful, they'll be able to fill a room (or house party) with your playlist and also add a special flavor to your music, depending on which surface you use. 

Stick them on two large glass windows to turn them into a crystal clear, 'stereophonic sound spectacular'.

 Spread them out on a large wooden desk or dinner table to get a very full, rich stereo sound for dinner or background music.  


Use them on a car, truck, boat or BBQ grill to get a strong, reverberating sound that everyone can enjoy, letting the music (and the party) take on a life of its own. 

 
Have fun, and explore your environment - through your music.  Take Cynaps Mint with you, and satisfy the curiosity of your friends with a demo, anytime, anywhere.

Tech Specs:

Main Unit:
Battery: 400mAh
Battery Life: 2 to 12 hours (the time varies widely depending on frequency of use and volume level. Using with the dock is recommended when using as a speaker).
Audio output: 3W each channel, 6W in total
Bluetooth version: 3.0

Microphone: 
Sensitivity: -36 to -46dB
Impedance: 2.2K ohm
Max Current consumption: 0.5mA
Frequency response: 100 to 10,000Hz
Regular transducers:
Resonant Frequency: 16 +/- 0.5 kHz 
Operating Frequency: 300-19000 Hz 
dB Range: 52-80dB
Super transducers:
Operating Frequency: 150-15000 Hz
dB Range: 72-120dB

GERMAN VERSION / DEUTSCHE VERSION

Leicht, kraftvoll und macht süchtig. Verwandelt einen Helm in ein Headset – oder ein Fenster in einen Lautsprecher! 


Cynaps Mint ist ein kleiner, aber sehr leistungstarker Kopfhörer, der den Schall direkt an den Schädel überträgt.  Er besteht aus 3D-gedruckten, modularen Teilen, die je nach Verwendung leicht auseinandergenommen und wieder zusammengesetzt werden können.

Cynaps Mint, hier in „Mint“-Grün und Gelb, das im Dunkeln leuchtet 


Trage es genau so, wie es dir passt. Die Audiomodule, auch „Umwandler“ genannt, erzeugen Klang durch Vibration. Du kannst sie auf ganz verschiedene Arten anbringen, genau so, wie du sie am liebsten tragen möchtest.

Du kannst sie auf die klassische Weise tragen:

oder die beigefügten Clips verwenden, um die Kabel am Hinterkopf zu führen:



Damen können es auch als diskreten und komfortablen Haarreif tragen:


Du kannst die Umwandler überall auf deinem Kopf tragen und genießt durch die Vibrationen einen superklaren Klang. Über Bluetooth kannst du die Umwandler mit Handy, Tablet, PC und vielen Smartwatches verbinden.  Du kannst Musik hören oder telefonieren, ohne dass du deine Ohren bedecken musst. Äußerst praktisch und viel sicherer als herkömmliche Kopfhörer beim Radfahren, Laufen und Autofahren und bei zahlreichen weiteren Sport- und Freizeitaktivitäten, wie Motorradfahren oder Snowboarden. Du kannst den Sound des Cynaps Mint genießen und hast gleichzeitig immer ein offenes Ohr für deine Umgebung.


Und weil wir gerade vom Snowboarden und Motorradfahren sprechen – wäre es nicht toll, in den Helm integrierte Kopfhörer zu haben? Ja, wäre es! Das Headset kann in Sekundenschnelle auseinandergenommen werden und mit den mitgelieferten Clips kannst du die Umwandler und die Basiseinheit direkt an einer Mütze oder einem Helm anbringen!

Klingt ein wenig nach „Transformers“, oder?  :)  Lies weiter - es wird noch besser!

Cynaps Mint ist viel mehr als nur ein Headset.  Es ist auch das weltweit allererste Lautsprechersystem mit echten Stereo-Vibrationen, das jede beliebige Oberfläche in einen Stereo-Lautsprecher verwandelt!  

Unsere Umwandler sind so leistungsstark, dass sie jeden Raum (und jede Hausparty) mit deiner Playlist beschallen können und je nach der Oberfläche, die du verwendest, geben sie deiner Musik einen ganz besonderen Klang. 

Stecke sie auf zwei große Glasfenster und du bekommst spektakulären und wortwörtlich „glasklaren“ Stereosound.

Platziere sie auf einen großen Holztisch oder Esstisch und du bekommst einen sehr vollen, satten Stereosound, perfekt für Abendessen oder als Hintergrundmusik.  

Verwende sie an einem Auto, LKW, Boot oder Grill, und du erhältst einen kräftigen Sound mit Nachhall, den alle genießen können und der die Musik (und die Party) so richtig in Schwung bringt.

 

Du hast Spaß und kannst deine Umgebung erkunden – mit deiner Musik.  Du kannst Cynaps Mint immer bei dir haben und es deinen neugierigen Freunden demonstrieren– überall und jederzeit :).  

Technische Daten:

Basiseinheit:
Batterie: 400 mAhBatterie-Lebensdauer: 2 bis 12 Stunden (kann stark schwanken, abhängig von Häufigkeit der Benutzung und Lautstärke. Beim Einsatz als Lautsprecher wird die Benutzung mit dem Dock empfohlen).Audio-Leistung: 3 W pro Kanal, 6 W gesamtBluetooth-Version: 3.0

Mikrofon: Empfindlichkeit: -36 bis -46 dB
Impedanz: 2200 Ohm
Max. Stromaufnahme: 0,5 mA
Frequenzgang: 100 bis 10.000 Hz

Reguläre Umwandler:
Resonanzfrequenz: 16 +/- 0,5 kHz 
Betriebsfrequenz: 300-19.000 Hz 
dB-Bereich: 52-80 dB

Super-Umwandler:
Betriebsfrequenz: 150-15000 Hz
dB-Bereich: 72-120 dB

story:
Short Summary

What happens if you sit on a chair having the iPhone 6 Plus in your pocket?

Our goal is to test the new iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus against the bending reported problem. If it survies next test will be applied. You can propose a test.

Is it a real problem? As usually the internet is full with pros and cons. We take the new Apple flagships and put on the real life tests: starting  with the bending test. 


What We Need & What You Get. The Impact

  • Off course we need the new iPhones. We have the cameras and the Youtube account to publish the video results.
  • Your test ideas are also a great value testing material. The interesting ones will be put in practice and noticed at "people voice".
  • If you plan to pay for a new iPhone, this is must know info.
  • You are a technology addicted: the real bending or not iPhone news is a major need to know.


    Risks & Challenges

    The testing team is formed by 2 iPhone "haters" and 2 iPhone fans. This way we'll be sure that the impartial propose is achieved.

    All the footage, pictures  and diagrams(including all the un-edited material) are posted on our Youtube account. 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      • Share and spread the news. Please use Facebook, Twitter and others social media to know about this project.
      • The Indiegogo share tools are a great benefit. Please use them!

      Thank You!

story:
Easy to install                          Easy to switch

 

             Easy to share                              Easy for selfie

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It's no secret that we've all experienced the awkwardness of some device charging options, be it bulky power packs with an unruly cable, or bound to a power outlet while at home. Even wireless charging can be less-than convenient when having to answer calls or messages.

That’s why our team has come together to help the world stay charged wherever they may be in a convenient and simple way. The Bingo Case is a product invented by startup technology company K-Top, founded in 2016 and supported by an R&D team with years of experience in mobile accessories such as cable technology, the development of magnetic tips, phone case design, and much more.

With the Bingo Case, we’ve created a product we’re proud of and believe in, which not only provides military-grade protection to your device but also bundles together three revolutionary charging features within one simple and sleek design. With Bingo Case, you can always have the best charging experience, no matter what device you are using, where you are in the world, or whatever time it may be.

A case is a must-have for almost everyone, why not enjoy the convenience of simple, efficient, and flexible charging with our Bingo Case?

 

 

FAQ

Can I use my own Qi wireless receiver case with the Bingo Case charging system? //
Although it’s possible, it is not something we encourage. The capabilities of your own Qi wireless receiver case are limited within our system and only compatible with our Bingo Pad (Qi wireless charging pad). Bingo Case and its alignments can meet the requirements of any charging method. You can switch freely switch between different charging methods (magnetic cable, Qi charging pad and the cord-invisible power bank) without any hassle.
Does the Bingo Case kit cater towards universal wireless charging, world-wide? //
Yes, absolutely. Our Bingo Case and Bingo Pad are built under the Qi standard of wireless charging, which is the world-leading wireless charging standard. This means your phone, integrated with the Bingo Case, is compatible with any Qi wireless charger. Additionally, any Qi-integrated or Qi-ready devices can be charged with the Bingo Pad.
What is the charging rate for the iPhone? //
With a Bingo Case integrated iPhone 7, it takes about 180 minutes for a full charge (from zero to 100%) when placed on the Bingo Pad, while takes about 300 minutes for the iPhone7 Plus to charge fully. The same charging rate also applies for the iPhone8 and iPhone8 Plus respectively. Bingo Case adheres strictly to the iPhone's recommended charging rates and specifications.
Why do you recommend the perk that includes 2 Bingo Power Packs? //
We have extensively researched and realized that the 10,000mAh power bank is a best seller within the external power market, while surveys also suggest that the general public do not prefer bulky power banks. We recommend the perk that comes with 2 Bingo Power Packs, as we’re striving to introduce endless power for our users through our detachable Bingo Power Packs. You can easily remove the Power Bank when it’s used up and attach a fresh one instantly to keep your phone battery full at all times.
What's the difference between the Bingo Power Pack and other portable wireless power banks? //
With our patented Bingo Tip, which is like the gate valve of the Bingo charging system, charging power is collected from the Bingo Power Pack, delivered through the pogo pin, and then through your phone via the Bingo Tip. That means the power delivered between the Bingo Power Pack and Bingo Case is not through the conventional Qi wireless standard. We utilize pogo pins as the invisible cord for transferring power, as well as for achieving a higher charging conversion rate compared with conventional Qi wireless cable charging methods.
How are the shipping costs? //
We offer free shipping worldwide for most countries and regions, including: • North America (United States, Canada) • Western Europe (UK, Ireland, Spain, Portugal, France, Belgium, Switzerland, Netherlands, Germany, Luxembourg, France, Austria, Italy) • Asia (Japan, Hong Kong, Singapore, Taiwan Province, South Korea) Other countries and regions not mentioned above are subject to a $5 delivery fee.
Do the prices include customs duty? //
Our prices do not include customs duties, as they vary between countries and addresses.
How to buy in larger quantities? //


If you are interested in making a bulk order, please contact bc@bingo-case.com and we will send you a quotation as soon as possible.

story:
Ban.gl enables you to store a virtually unlimited amount of information, useful to you and or others exactly when it's needed.  That information is then retrievable with the tap or scan of a smartphone.

Ban.gl was originally conceived as a way to enable first responder to ascertain quickly who an individual is and what, if any, their special requirements might be.

A typical use-case was imagined primarily as ‘wandering toddlers’ at shopping centres and or elderly relatives like my own Grandfather who suffered from Alzheimer’s and had previously gone on an extended walkabout.

After two years of development and testing Ban.gl is now much more than that.

Without needing batteries Ban.gl can display on any web enabled device a virtually unlimited amount of information.  In the case of an elderly relative it might have next of kin contact information or specific medical information.  In the case of a wandering toddler it would just be a contact telephone number.

We need £50,000 to take Ban.gl to the next level and start getting the word out about our revolutionary new way to provide first-responders and others with your important information just when it’s needed most.

In an effort to reach our financial goals we have devised a number of perks which we hope will excite you enough to support us.

Although our target is £50,000 if we do not reach that goal we will first manufacture and ship all due perks and then, with any money left over, pursue whatever marketing is available to us in an effort to further 'spread the word' so to speak.

Ban.gl can store virtually any amount of information.

We believe that Ban.gl brings real peace of mind to anybody who worries about the safety of loved ones when they are out and about on their own.

With the international recognition a successful Indiegogo campaign can bring, largely, if not exclusively, as a direct result of your participation, Ban.gl will be changing lives and maybe even saving lives on a global scale by March 2015.

Some Quick Facts about Ban.gl

  • Ban.gl is device agnostic and in fact is not limited only to smartphones. Any device that can navigate the web can go to https://ban.gl, enter the unique Ban.gl ID and retrieve the contents of the Ban.gl
  • It does not require batteries nor will it ever require batteries.
  • Ban.gl is water proof, shock proof, heat proof, cold proof and stretchable (to a degree)
  • It can withstand temperatures from as low as -70 to as high as 300.
  • It utilises Near Field Communication technology (NFC) and each Ban.gl is unique.
  • It is not a tracking device!
  • It is a passive information device.  If it helps you could think of it as a modern day SOS Necklace but it is so much more than that.
  • The content/information Ban.gl stores can be updated as often as you like.
  • There is no ongoing cost to owning a Ban.gl
  • Ban.gl comes with a bunch of ready-made templates for storing and displaying certain types of content which means you don’t have to be a tech whizz kid to set it up for your parents.  However, if you are a bit tasty with the old HTML5, Bootstrap and what not then the Ban.gl is your oyster and you can pretty much customise the information display to your heart’s content.  
  • Ban.gl is made primarily of Silica, the 2nd most abundant material on Earth and 7th in the Universe!

It’s a website on your wrist.

Some other things you can do with a Ban.gl

There are myriad other uses and we are hearing and thinking of new ways the Ban.gl can be useful on a daily basis. My teenage kids use their Ban.gl to swap their numerous social media identities with friends and compete with each other as to who’s been ‘tapped’ the most.

Sponsor Me – ‘Put your tap where your mouth is’ - Lost and Found - Emergency Medical Information - Waiter/Waitressing Tip Point - Social Networking Card - Digital Business Card - File Download - Important Files such as Passport, plane tickets, visa - Portable Photo Album - Advertising Coupon Keeper - Digital Organ Donor Card - Personal or Business Promotional Device - Safety/Next of Kin when scuba diving - Safety/Next of Kin surfing - Safety/Next of Kin running alone - Safety/Next of Kin when parachuting - Safety/Next of Kin when swimming the channel - Safety/Next of Kin when Sailing - Safety/Next of Kin when Driving - Things to Do List - Remote Whiteboard - Last Will & Testament - Private Treatment Record - Tap Game - Push Device – i.e. others can ‘push’ things on to the Ban.gl remotely

Does it work on all smartphones

Yes and then some.  There are two or three ways to interact with a Ban.gl.  

  • First, and the simplest, is to use an NFC enabled smartphone.  With an NFC smartphone you can just ‘tap’ the Ban.gl and the Ban.gl contents will be displayed on the smartphone.  
  • The second way is to scan the QR code on the front of the Ban.gl and then either enter the unique 7 digit alpha numeric code of the Ban.gl or the Nickname the Ban.gl owner has assigned the Ban.gl.  
  • The third way is to point any web enabled device to https://ban.gl and enter the 7 digit alphanumeric in to the web form.

The Backstory

Initially the idea came about after thinking of my own Grandfather who suffered with dementia.  One day Granddad went ‘walkabout’ for nearly a day without a trace. Thankfully he was eventually found, a little sun-burnt but alive and for the most part, well.   Remembering this I thought that if there had been a more visible ‘contact card’ so to speak, a bus driver or other member of the public could have intervened and Granddad may have been found sooner.

We are all perfectly able to spot when an elderly person is in distress or a little confused but I for one would be reluctant to root through an adult’s pockets in search of I.D.  It's just not very dignified for them. I thought that tapping their wrist would be far less invasive.  The idea for a durable, highly visible identity bracelet was born.

How does it work – what makes it so fandangled

Ban.gl, pronounced Bangle, is a silicone bracelet designed to be worn on the wrist. It has an embedded Near Field Communication (NFC) chip and a visible Quick Response (QR) code printed on the face.

Ban.gl is wearable tech that uses an embedded NFC chip that is uniquely coded to a web address.  Each one is different.

Ban.gl stores a unique ID both on the NFC chip and engraved on either the front or reverse of the Ban.gl.

One can interact with Ban.gl by tapping with an NFC enabled smartphone or by scanning the QR code and entering the unique ID or Ban.gl nickname.

The smartphone is then directed to a web based information page which can contain virtually any type of information that has been added by the owner or somebody on behalf of the wearer.

The content accessible via the Ban.gl is virtually unlimited and can include text, video, pictures, forms, buttons or any other 'gadget' that is available on a web page today.

Ban.gl does not require batteries.  It is extremely durable being water proof, shock proof, dust proof, cold proof (-70) and heat proof (+220).

Where is the project now

Ban.gl has been designed, tested, prototyped, tested and prototyped and tested some more over the last two years.  In July we ordered a minimum quantity of each of the 7 final Ban.gl designs to test the manufacturing process.  We learnt a lot and we now understand where we need to be extra vigilant with regard to the manufacturing process.

The back-end software system has been tested as has the online store and everything else in between from packing and fulfilment through to credit control.

Feedback so far has been phenomenally positive and we truly believe that Ban.gl can give a little extra peace of mind to anyone with a vulnerable dependant or even to themselves.


We are now ready to bring Ban.gl out from the shadows and promote it on a global scale but we need your help.

To launch properly we need a few things that cost money.  We've thought about this figure for a long time and we put our required amount at £50,000.  If we reach our funding goal this is what we will spend it on: 

  • Getting tooled up - The engraving is done with a specialist laser machine.  we need one of those to achieve the high quality end product we wish to produce.  If we exceed our goal we will get our own injection moulding machine and bring the entire process on shore to the U.K.
  • Marketing and promotion – This can cost money but can also be your good will. Please help by following us on Twitter and liking our Facebook page – just to spread the word.
  • Achieve Economies of Scale – We really want Ban.gl to be as affordable as possible.  With that in mind we want to hit a RRP of £10/$16 not including shipping.  Shipping to U.K. will be included, everywhere else will be at cost or maximum £4.50, whichever is lower.  We can hit that target RRP as long as we buy the raw materials and manufacturing in bulk.

When can you expect your Ban.gl

If our campaign reaches its funding goal then no later than the end of February 2015.  If there are any delays to that schedule then we will be up front with all backers and keep you informed.

Risks and Challenges

The usual things can affect us as much as anybody.  Machinery breakdown and other issues in the supply chain.  However, much like above, we will endeavour to keep all backers informed at all times.  After all, it will be very much your project as much as ours.

Support us without money

Please help us get the word out using the IndieGoGo share tools.  Tell us you’ve done it and we’ll put your name on our backers wall on our website.

Frequently Asked Questions

Ban.gl is not designed to be a panacea or cure all for any emergency or social situation. It is a tool. Much like a box of matches on a cold night; get them wet and they’re useless. No internet connection at hand, ban.gl won’t tell you much. However that fact does not stop matches being a useful invention and neither does no internet prevent ban.gl from being useful.

Flexible Funding... hmmm, what happens to my support money if you don't reach your goal?

Simple, you get what we promised you in return for the level of support you offered. We already have the manufacturing expertise to produce the Ban.gl. Our Crowdfunding campaign is to raise cash in order to raise awareness and to acheive economies of scale. We want to get the RRP of Ban.gl to £10 including shipping. To do so we have to order in bulk. By pledging you are effectively, pre-ordering and giving us that purchasing power with our manufacturers. Additionally the publicity we will be able to buy with a succesful campaign combined with the free publicity we hope to get while running the campaign will help us reach our ends.

Does the Ban.gl require an Internet connection?

Yes, sort of. Ban.gl doesn’t need an Internet connection itself but any device wishing to read the data from the Ban.gl does. However, every Ban.gl has a telephone number encoded which in the event of no Internet can be called and by stating the Ban.gl ID the information can be accessed.

Is Near Field Communication aka NFC available on my phone?

A lot of smartphones nowadays have NFC capability built in. Windows, Blackberry and a lot of Android phones. Surprisingly (or not) Apple iPhone, iPad and iPod do not have NFC built in prior to the version 6 model. However, NFC is ‘restricted’ in the 6 model and currently only operates with Apple’s payment platform. As of writing there is no announcement from Apple that they will join the rest of the smartphone community and open up NFC for the phones owner to decide what to do with it.

A lot of smartphones NFC is turned off by default. We’d encourage anybody buying any new technology to thoroughly investigate all of the devices’ features. Otherwise what really is the point of having them? Check your device has NFC and if it does turn it on. It is quite fun.

If I don’t have NFC on my phone and I wish to interact with a Ban.gl what do I do?

The next best thing, if for example you have an iPhone, is to download a Quick Response aka QR, reader from your phones app store. Go by other users ratings and look for a free reader. There are plenty to choose from.

Other than that you can get to any web enabled device, i.e. your computer, visit https://ban.gl and manually enter the unique ID.

How is somebody supposed to even notice the Ban.gl let alone know what to do with it?

Ban.gl is purposefully bright, some might say, garish in colour. The QR code ‘screams’ scan me! If not now then over time more and more it will.

During our extensive testing of over 200 people everyone one of them, some quicker than others admittedly, but all of them nonetheless, realised that one needed to scan the QR code. QR codes are becoming ever more ubiquitous and more and more people are realising they can interact with something when they see them.

How will the masses learn to recognise a Ban.gl

But notoriety is key for Ban.gl and that’s a big part of the reason we have gone down the crowdfunding route. We believe that the Ban.gl is a great product with myriad uses. However, our initial dream was how it might improve the lives of sufferers of Dementia and their carers and or loved ones. We need publicity and that costs money. If we reach our campaign goal we will use a portion of that money to hire some good PR firm to help get the word out. Over time we are confident that with enough publicity everybody will know what to do if they are a first responder and they see the brightly coloured wrist band with a QR code printed on the face.

Of course any new technology is a mystery to everybody upon first glance. Some people ‘get it’ quicker than others but eventually the entire human race know what to do with a ‘thing’. Our dream is to reach that level of penetration.

Why would people want to use Ban.gl

Humankind is a tool using species. If we can make Ban.gl eminently useful people will want to know how to work it. Think of the Internet, email and texting, 10 years ago my parents would have thought I was speaking in a foreign language. Now they regularly Skype, email, text and Geo Check In and they are nearly 80.

Ban.gl is also far more preferable to rooting through another’s pockets or belongings looking for ID in a first responder type scenario.

Isn’t the sharing of contact detail already done to death?

Yes but similarly lots of kettles boil water. Lots of web browsers can access the web. Lots of telephones can make calls. Lots of cars transport you from A to B. Sharing of contact details with a downloadable digital business card is just an example of the type of thing one can do with a Ban.gl

It is a familiar metaphor to understand. If we were crowdfunding for a fire device we would give the example that one could warm ones hands. Of course, fire, like a Ban.gl, can be used for a great many other things as well.

Why can’t contact details be printed on the outside of the Ban.gl thereby not requiring any Internet connection or smartphone?

They could and in fact those types of devices are all readily available. They are called SOS bracelets, wallets, identity cards and such like. Ban.gl is not trying to occupy that space. Ban.gl is a new novel concept using a durable, virtually indestructible material that can be easily updated time and time again without any loss of fidelity. Emergency use is just one facet of Ban.gl. It makes no sense to print or emboss the wearer’s number on the outside of the bracelet.

Ban.gl is an information bracelet not an emergency information bracelet.

Additionally the publicity we will be able to buy with a succesful campaign combined with the free publicity we hope to get while running the campaign will help us reach our ends.
Does the Ban.gl require an Internet connection?
Yes, sort of.  Ban.gl doesn’t need an Internet connection itself but any device wishing to read the data from the Ban.gl does.  However, every Ban.gl has a telephone number encoded which in the event of no Internet can be called and by stating the Ban.gl ID the information can be accessed.
Is Near Field Communication aka NFC available on my phone?
A lot of smartphones nowadays have NFC capability built in.  Windows, Blackberry and a lot of Android phones.  Surprisingly (or not) Apple iPhone, iPad and iPod do not have NFC built in prior to the version 6 model.  However, NFC is ‘restricted’ in the 6 model and currently only operates with Apple’s payment platform.  As of writing there is no announcement from Apple that they will join the rest of the smartphone community and open up NFC for the phones owner to decide what to do with it.
A lot of smartphones NFC is turned off by default.  We’d encourage anybody buying any new technology to thoroughly investigate all of the devices’ features.  Otherwise what really is the point of having them?  Check your device has NFC and if it does turn it on.  It is quite fun.
If I don’t have NFC on my phone and I wish to interact with a Ban.gl what do I do?
The next best thing, if for example you have an iPhone, is to download a Quick Response aka QR, reader from your phones app store.  Go by other users ratings and look for a free reader.  There are plenty to choose from.
Other than that you can get to any web enabled device, i.e. your computer, visit https://ban.gl and manually enter the unique ID.
How is somebody supposed to even notice the Ban.gl let alone know what to do with it?
Ban.gl is purposefully bright, some might say, garish in colour.  The QR code ‘screams’ scan me!  If not now then over time more and more it will.
During our extensive testing of over 200 people everyone one of them, some quicker than others admittedly, but all of them nonetheless, realised that one needed to scan the QR code.  QR codes are becoming ever more ubiquitous and more and more people are realising they can interact with something when they see them.
How will the masses learn to recognise a Ban.gl
But notoriety is key for Ban.gl and that’s a big part of the reason we have gone down the crowdfunding route.  We believe that the Ban.gl is a great product with myriad uses.  However, our initial dream was how it might improve the lives of sufferers of Dementia and their carers and or loved ones.  We need publicity and that costs money.  If we reach our campaign goal we will use a portion of that money to hire some good PR firm to help get the word out.  Over time we are confident that with enough publicity everybody will know what to do if they are a first responder and they see the brightly coloured wrist band with a QR code printed on the face.
Of course any new technology is a mystery to everybody upon first glance.  Some people ‘get it’ quicker than others but eventually the entire human race know what to do with a ‘thing’.  Our dream is to reach that level of penetration.
Why would people want to use Ban.gl
Humankind is a tool using species.  If we can make Ban.gl eminently useful people will want to know how to work it. Think of the Internet, email and texting, 10 years ago my parents would have thought I was speaking in a foreign language.  Now they regularly Skype, email, text and Geo Check In and they are nearly 80.
Ban.gl is also far more preferable to rooting through another’s pockets or belongings looking for ID in a first responder type scenario.
Isn’t the sharing of contact detail already done to death?
Yes but similarly lots of kettles boil water. Lots of web browsers can access the web. Lots of telephones can make calls.  Lots of cars transport you from A to B.  Sharing of contact details with a downloadable digital business card is just an example of the type of thing one can do with a Ban.gl
It is a familiar metaphor to understand.  If we were crowdfunding for a fire device we would give the example that one could warm ones hands.  Of course, fire, like a Ban.gl, can be used for a great many other things as well.
Why can’t contact details be printed on the outside of the Ban.gl thereby not requiring any Internet connection or smartphone?
They could and in fact those types of devices are all readily available.  They are called SOS bracelets, wallets, identity cards and such like.  Ban.gl is not trying to occupy that space.  Ban.gl is a new novel concept using a durable, virtually indestructible material that can be easily updated time and time again without any loss of fidelity.  Emergency use is just one facet of Ban.gl.  It makes no sense to print or emboss the wearer’s number on the outside of the bracelet.
Ban.gl is an information bracelet not an emergency information bracelet.

story:
It’s hard to juggle your fast-paced life. That's why we combined a wireless charger, power bank, and planner into a single journal! The Tesmo is the world’s most stylish charger especially designed to tailor to all your daily needs.

When designing Tesmo, we wanted it to be aesthetically pleasing, practical, and durable. It’s a multi-device charger that offers an unrivaled charging experience as well as the perfect planner to get you closer to your goals.

"Honestly, this feels really damn cool! This is a super high-end book!'" Beta Review by Marc The Geek

Tesmo is compatible with any Qi capable devices like iPhone X and Samsung Galaxy S8/S7. Simply place your phone on Tesmo’s cover and experience the convenience of wireless charging.

Tesmo allows you to simultaneously charge three devices at the same time whether it’s iOS or Android devices. It comes with an 8000mAh battery in its back cover, which will be powerful enough to fully charge your phone 3 times.

Planners are crucial, for those of you who are just starting out your organizational journey, Tesmo is perfect to get you started on the right track!

There’re also designated card, pen, and note pockets to help you be organized wherever you go. With your active lifestyle, Tesmo has everything you need in a single place.

Achieve the perfect work-life balance through our monthly, weekly and daily goals. Tesmo can be used as a planner, sketchbook, journal, or anything else you need it to be.

We’ve designed Tesmo to be the perfect fit for you and your lifestyle! By combining sleek aesthetics with durable materials, Tesmo can withstand the wear and tear caused by work, school, or travel.

Tesmo’s refillable design allows you to put any A5 size inner paper and transform it into a personal notebook, journal, planner, or anything else you want it to be. The premium material we choose makes it a durable notebook for long-term usage.

The original intention of Tesmo was to fuse functionality with design and comfort to your daily necessities. Formed by experienced designers, engineers, and artists with a focus on ergonomic design, Tesmo is designed to combine quality, durability, and style. We only use the finest components in our products, making Tesmo unique and practical. After several months of prototyping and testing different designs, we finally created Tesmo to be simple, practical, and portable. We believe that you will definitely like what we’ve created. 

Our main office is in Shenzhen, a dynamic city where we take full advantage of its rich resources, innovating supply chain, and young talent. Adhering to innovation, we want to continue to design and provide reliable products to improve people's lives. We are excited to see how you will use Tesmo in your daily life, generate ideas, and achieve your goals.

Risks and challenges

We've spent a lot of time designing a product that meets the highest standards of performance, durability, and convenience. We’ve finalized our production schedule and plans with our experienced manufacturers to ensure that Tesmo can be shipped out on schedule.

Before launching our project on Kickstarter, we’ve already had working prototypes that are undergoing extensive testing and trial benchmarks that will push the devices to their limits to expose any flaw. Our wealth of expertise in product development gives us insight into all aspects of the production process, including manufacturing in large volumes and shipping to different countries around the world.

With our reliable partners and suppliers, we are confident to handle any foreseeable risks and deliver a high-quality product to our backers on time. If there is anything that goes out of control, we’ll be sure to always be transparent and let our backers know what’s going on.

story:
We Hear You

We share your dream of mobile music freedom. 

We heard your earbud problems, and like you, we were tired of getting tangled up.

It bothered us that the industry’s response was not to solve this problem, but to ignore it. Year after year in an ever-changing world, the technology is the same, the design is the same and the underwhelming user experience is the same. You said you were being forced to make a choice between convenience and a premium listening experience. And although you may not have been aware of it, a small team of fellow dreamers in San Francisco, California, was listening. 

After more than 18 months of intensive research, development and refinement, we're proud to present HearNotes WireFree Earbuds with Kleer Technology – the only earbuds that deliver lossless, uncompressed, high fidelity stereo audio without a single wire to get in your way.

We set out on the road less traveled to make good on the promise of truly WireFree earbuds. We weren’t going to hide behind tricky wordplay and flashy marketing. In fact, we started by stripping away all the noise and getting back to the basics. We had to walk away from the industry standard, Bluetooth, and build HearNotes from the ground up.

Every detail of The WireFree Solution has been carefully considered and refined to create the ultimate portable audio product.

  • The ergonomic design and lightweight materials – each piece weighs less than a quarter – ensures all-day comfort with virtually no fatigue. 
  • The universal transmitter comes with it’s own power supply so it won’t cause battery drain on any of your devices. And you’ll never experience signal drop-off or interference as long as you’re within its impressive 50-foot range.
  • The premium balanced armature speakers were expertly engineered to accurately reproduce the high fidelity audio transmission your earbuds receive from the transmitter. It was specially designed for music playback, and delivers a rich soundscape with deep lows and crystal clear mids and highs.
  • The sturdy carrying case is fitted with a high-density foam insert, perfectly cut to snuggly fit each piece, and features an easy-to-read LED fuel gauge so you’ll always know just how much battery your HearNotes have.

What's Inside

KLEER technology was built for one thing, and one thing only: WireFree music listening. It was engineered with the singular purpose of streaming flawless, uncompressed audio with inference immunity, extremely low latency and dynamic performance. It enables two independent, uncompressed audio signals to each earpiece for a true high fidelity stereo transmission.

We want you to run, dance, and bask in total freedom when your favorite song comes on. We want you to enjoy your music, anyway you like, without worrying about getting tangled up or pulling an earbud out by the wire. 

We want you to listen to your music, your way.

WireFree means premium, hi-fi stereo audio from a pair of untethered, lightweight earbuds. It means style, comfort, mobility and convenience.

And, most importantly, WireFree means freedom. Freedom from wires, freedom from tangles, and freedom from subpar audio delivered by wireless earbuds.

WireFree is what wireless should be.

We've been proofing, refining and Beta testing units since June 2014, and are pleased to report that HearNotes WireFree Earbuds are nearly complete!  We've vetted, selected and engaged our US-based 'ISO 13485 Certified' contract manufacturer, while also beginning to prepare final production documentation.

We're a team of musicians, artists, and athletes who were united in a passion for music and a vision for change that inspired The WireFree Solution. Starting a company may best be described as a labor of love, but over the past two years, we've only grown more dedicated to making our collective dream – of cutting the cords, without cutting the audio quality – a living reality. We couldn't be more proud to share HearNotes with you and welcome you to the WireFree Revolution.

- The HearNotes Team

Risks and challenges

At the end of the day, the HearNotes team firmly believes in doing the right thing. We do not take our backers' belief or their invaluable support lightly, and pledge to always be up front and honest when it comes to your order - no matter how good or bad the news. Keeping that in mind - we'd much rather under promise and over deliver - than sloppily execute the other way around. We feel that a more conservative approach is better for holding ourselves accountable to the commitments we make and stand behind.

Supply Chain Risk

Component delays and unexpected shortages can occur, but we’ve been building a thorough forecast with our key suppliers to help mitigate that risk. However, should unforeseen challenges present themselves, we’ll always keep you informed immediately and work quickly to solve the problem.

Risks and challenges
