story:
The Designer isn't just another iPhone cover. It's impact absorbent, functional, and can be completely customized to your style.

I've been a part of a small company based in Cleveland, Ohio called MobileTogs since the beginning. Basically what happened was a concept for a fashionable, functional phone case spurred a small group of friends to pursue a dream to create it. After several months of getting molds created as well as prototypes, last October we were finally able to put a product on our virtual shelves.

Helping to launch and brand this project has been the most exciting, and sometimes trying thing I've ever done. Our first product, The Looker iPhone case, which has a scratch-resistant and shatterproof mirror and pocket for essential cards, has made great strides raising awareness for the "no-name" brand togs over the past ten months. And as more and more people get their hands on the case, more and more ideas come to the table of, “how can we make this project grow from a single product to an entire line of functional iPhone cases?”  

That’s where the idea for The Designer came in to play. The thought generated from wanting to take our product that everyone already loves and give them and future customers the opportunity to make it even better. We prompted our fashion blogger, Caroline Dengel, to "create something" on the mirror of the case. She doodled with nail polish and her fans were LOVING the idea and immediately started asking where they could get her case.

We realize the concept of individuality is so important in today’s society that we couldn't resist finding out how to make our product fit perfectly in our customize-everything world. 

Sure, we could just sell another product, but with your support, we can make The Designer case 100% customizable!

To create our prototypes we reached out to two very different artists with two completely different audiences so we could show the diversity of our product. One has a huge gamer following and the other creates much more whimsical sketches with tons of personality. From one end of the spectrum to the other, we love the idea of making a case that truly fits EVERYONE'S persona. 

Our funding goal is a modest $5000.00. With this money we will be able to make the necessary changes to our website that will allow people to upload their specific designs for their case. Much like any website out there that allows you to create your own T-Shirts, business cards, etc... we want YOU to have the ability to fully customize your case from the design you choose, to where you want it placed, on any color & sized case you want.

Reaching our goal will also give us the funding to reach out to more artists to create cases for an even bigger audience. Supporting creativity is the main goal behind The Designer case and we hope to spawn a full line of pre-designed mirrors from our collection of artists, as well.

If we do not reach our entire goal, we will press on in creating The Designer case. To put it simply, if we reach our goal, we will both be able to give you the ability to fully customize your case AND give us the ability to support independent artists by purchasing in-house designs. If we do not, we will be forced to make a decision between one or the other - and we really don't want to have to do that!

Function, Individuality, Fashion

Function: The Designer is made of impact absorbent material that is smooth and comfortable to touch. It slides easily in and out of pockets for quick access to items like your ID, Credit Card, or Transit card that you have stored in the pocket feature of the case.

Individuality: Show the world what your about and what organizations you support. Either choose custom designed artwork from some of our talented independent artists, OR if we haven't come up with something you're into, with your backing we will be able to give you the option to upload your own graphic, logo, or picture of your favorite furkid for a fully customized look.

Fashion: Are you an avid mirror user and tired of using worthless iPhone "mirror" apps that don't work? Worry no more! The printed area of The Designer is a scratch resistant, shatterproof mirror. And if you're not into the whole mirror-thing, you can get your design printed on the back side... and still have an easy-access mirror on-hand to use when no one is looking!

Love the idea but simply can't back it right now? You can still help!

We understand that some people just don't have the funds to back our IndieGoGo campaign but that doesn't mean you can't help. Friends, Family, and Believers alike, if you have accounts on any social network or access to email - you can help support this campaign. 

  1. Stay updated on the progress of the campaign by signing up for our email list located here: https://www.facebook.com/togscases/app_166303603381066
  2. While you're on Facebook, tell your friends and family about our project and let them know that you'd really love them to support!
  3. Use IndieGoGo's SHARE TOOLS and share our project with the world!
  4. Send an email out to your friends, family, and co-workers letting them know about this awesome project. Who knows, maybe your boss will buy cases for the entire office with the company logo on it! 

Thank you! And we look forward to creating your case soon!

Stay updated on the progress of the campaign by signing up for our email list located here: https://www.facebook.com/togscases/app_166303603381066

While you're on Facebook, tell your friends and family about our project and let them know that you'd really love them to support!
Use IndieGoGo's SHARE TOOLS and share our project with the world!

story:
LIVE Broadcast in style, Capture Video, or Snap Photos with your CamCam hat or visor!

The CamCam Story...

Over the past several years we have seen social media blow up with everyone sharing their photos of the fun times, their loved ones, and their passions.  Over the past year or so we have seen those photos change to videos and even now to LIVE broadcasting.  What hasn't changed?  The devices we use to casually capture these moments without lugging around your camera or reaching for your smart phone. How many great moments have you missed because by the time you opened your smartphone and found the camera App, the moment was already gone?  We wanted a way to always be stylishly wearing a camera so that when the moment comes, we can capture it instantly and hands free.  And now with the CamCam you can.  Whether taking photos, recording video, and even LIVE broadcasting through the CamCam App, you'll capture every moment, every time, Hands Free!

From Hunting to Fishing, to Baseball and Golf, the CamCam has you covered.  At your kid's sporting events or school recitals, remain hands free and still capture every moment every time with the touch of a button!  Vacations to the beach or site seeing in Paris, LIVE broadcast those moments to your family and friends so all your loved ones can experience the moment with you!

With the CamCam we no longer have to strap cameras to our head or glasses, or haul them around in an extra bag or on a stick.  We will simply and stylishly already have them on us to capture those spontaneous moments every time hands-free. We can even customize your CamCam with your company logo or colors and we will soon have all your favorite professional and college team caps and visors to sport at game time!

Sharing photos and video has been the hottest technology trend over the past few years and now LIVE broadcasting is becoming ever so popular.  But why?  Because we care to share what we do, who we love, why we live, where we've been, and what each and every one of us are passionate about.  Now let's do it Fashionably, Casually, and Hands-Free with your CAMCAM!  So please support us in any way you can, every contribution will get us closer to our goal!   Thank you and we'll be in touch with you soon.

TECH SPECS

Hardware

  • LIVE stream via WiFi or save to your on-board storage.
  • Up to 200 Lumen, high/low intensity LED illumination
  • 2-way audio with onboard microphone and earbud port.
  • Articulating LED/camera housing
  • Personalize your cap with any color or logo.
  • Easily removable and re-attachable electronics for washing and maintenance.
  • Swap your CamCam electronics from one hat to another.
  • Removable and rechargeable battery
  • Up to 6 hrs. video record time with one battery
  • Embedded audio jack to accommodate 2-way audio while streaming.

Software

  • Login to the CamCam App to view your video feed or photos, or stream your LIVE broadcast for others to view with your secure and encrypted login information.
  • Share your pictures and video instantly to your favorite social media sites.

  • Use the In-App controls to operate your camcam remotely.
  • Stream multiple camcam feeds on one screen simultaneously in order to view all of your employee’s daily activities on the job, LIVE and with 2-way audio communication.


Where are we NOW..

  • Globally patent pending for utility, design, and trademarks
  • Finalizing remaining hardware and software specifications and design
  • Implementing final stages of prototyping and demo unit production
  • Strategically planning manufacturing and distribution channels for a Q3 - 2016 Market Launch.


Your impact & where the contribution will go?

With your contribution, the CamCam team will have the ability to finally go to market.  We are so close to having product in hand and we'll need a bit more capital for final prototyping and manufacturing, scaling the company and hiring a few additional personnel to execute our plan in seamless CamCam fashion.  Whether you are able to contribute a small donation or pre-order a CamCam or two of your very own,  we are so thankful for your support and helping fund the first generation of casual video!

ALL CONTRIBUTORS WILL RECEIVE A PERSONAL THANK YOU FROM THE CAMCAM TEAM AND WILL JOIN THE WEBSITE PHOTO COLLAGE TO SHOW ALL OF THE WORLD WHO WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR BRINGING THE CAMCAM TO LIFE!


FAQs

  • Will CamCam hats and visors come in my favorite major league or college sports team hat logos?  We are currently seeking opportunities to capture sports licensing both on the professional and collegiate levels.  We plan on having this accomplished prior to delivery of your CamCam.  We will be in touch with you following the campaign for cap or visor logo preferences and comfort fit sizing (S/M, M/L, L/XL).
  • Does the CamCam come with a warranty?  The CamCam will absolutely come with a 90 day warranty for any manufacturing defects of the hardware.  But no worries, we will not ship until your product has passed intensive quality assurance protocols.
  • Is the CamCam waterproof?  The CamCam will be water resistant, but not waterproof for submersion.  We will be looking into full waterproofing capabilities for future generations to come.  So rainy weather is fine, your next Scuba trip, not quite yet.
  • Can I use the CamCam for any hats or visors I currently have?  No, the CamCam will be suited for CamCam hats, visors, and accessories only.  We will be working continuously on providing every flavor to suit your needs.
  • Will my CamCam App work for both IOS and Android?  Yes, both operating platforms will be LIVE prior to shipment.
  • What if this campaign does not reach its goal?  Because we are so close to having this product in our hands, we are committed to bringing the CamCam to life and we will not stop until we do.  The success of this campaign will make our process much quicker and more efficient, but without a doubt, we will fulfill the CamCam promise of bringing casual hands-free video to you! 


Risks & Challenges

Our team attains decades of experience in Branding, Hardware/Software technology, International Manufacturing and Distribution and feel that our risks will be limited.  Below are a few we may encounter:
  • An overabundance of pre-orders.  We are forecasting many, but we are in a great position to deliver mass quantities quickly.  Though a HUGE demand is not a bad problem to have, will will deliver all product to our customers in the order they were received.  So get in early if you can!
  • Time frames for production.  Even when you have everything lined up and ready to go, business has a funny way of changing the course every once in awhile. Though we are very hopeful that we will meet our production and delivery deadlines, we are very aware of the possibility of some minor changes.


Other Ways You Can Help...

If for some reason you are not able to send a contribution or pre-order at this time, there are other ways you can help.   Please help us share this on your favorite social media sites and with your family, friends, and co-workers.  We appreciate anything you can do to help bring the CamCam to life!  Thank you!

story:
Introducing the Mu One

 

The Mu One is not just the thinnest international charger in the world but now also packs in an amazing 45W of power along with fast charge technology – that’s enough to charge the latest notebooks, tablets, smartphones and other mobile devices in super quick time.
 


Pocket sized and compact, the Mu One has a unique and patented fold-flat design with an interchangeable head system. This allows the Mu One to reduce its size to an amazing 14mm thin – that’s over 70% smaller than the 29W Type-C Apple Charger!
 

Mu One 45W charger vs Apple 29W charger

 


Have a USB Type-C, Lightning or Micro USB device?  When it comes to chargers, the Mu One is the only one you need.

Combining ultra slim design with cutting edge power technology, the Mu One boasts PD Technology for a fast adaptive charge and breakthrough GaN technology that creates an astonishing 94% power efficiency. This enables a huge amount of power to fit into the super small Mu One. 

 

The Mu One is truly a fusion of award winning design and cutting edge power technology.

 

 

Mu One: Under The Hood 

 

The Mu One has an amazing 45W of power with fast charge technology making it suitable for all smartphones, tablets and even the latest Macbooks and notebooks. This is all thanks to THREE remarkable pieces of technology under the hood…

 

Firstly, Gallium Nitride Technology (GaN). Enabling very high-power in a super small space, all with 94% power efficiency. This is the real genius of the Mu One being able to pack a punch. This latest technological break through in power, enables us to provide big power in our tiny Mu One.

 

Secondly, Power Delivery Technology (PD). Fast charge, adaptive charge, quick charge – it’s all about being able to change the voltage output of the charger to adjust to devices and create a quick charging experience. The Mu One comes with a PD controller onboard and will charge fast.

And then, an Auto-Detect Chip. Providing intelligent identification to iOS, Android and other devices to ensure that they charge at an optimum rate. The Mu One provides the perfect charge no matter which device, make or model is being used.

 

The Mu One - A fusion of award winning design and cutting edge power technology.  

 

 

As you’d expect, the Mu One will be certified to the relevant global safety standards for chargers.

 

Mu One international charger: how it works

 

The Mu One comprises a patented fold-flat design with an interchangeable plug head system, enabling the product to be used in over 200 countries worldwide whilst remaining pocket sized and portable.

 

 

To use the Mu One, you will need two main parts:
1. The 45W power block with a reversible USB Type-C connector
2. One of the three interchangeable plug heads

Simply swap on the plug head for the country you are in or travelling to, select the correct cable for your device, and plug into the mains socket to charge your devices.

 

 

The Brit - pocket-sized and portable, this plug will reduce your overall UK plug size by over 70%. Say goodbye to bulky UK chargers! Suitable for use in the UK & Ireland, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia plus 50 more plug type G countries worldwide.

 

 

The European - portable, with a 90 degree rotation for bi-directional use, this plug head enables you to charge the products you love with a stylish twist. Suitable for use in the EU, Brazil, India, Indonesia, Russia plus over 100 more plug type C countries worldwide.

 

 

The American - pocket-sized with fold-away pins, the streamlined design plugs flat against the socket and is the perfect travel companion. Suitable for use in the US, Canada, China,Thailand, Japan plus 50 more plug type A countries worldwide.

 

 

Mu One: Compatible Devices 

 

The Mu One incorporates the latest breakthroughs in power technology. It features the new reversible USB Type-C connector that has been adopted by Apple, Samsung and most major makers of mobile devices, so you just need to use the appropriate cable for your device:

 

The Mu One is compatible with Micro USB, Lightning and USB Type-C charged devices.

 

For Micro USB products simply connect a USB Type-C to Micro USB cable.
This generally includes Android devices, games consoles and cameras.

For Lightning devices, connect a USB Type-C to Lightning cable.
This generally includes iOS devices i.e. iPhones and iPads.

And for USB Type-C devices, a C to C cable is what you need.
This generally includes the latest Android devices and the latest Apple Macbooks.

Please see our Kickstarter FAQ's for a more comprehensive list of the major compatible devices.

 

Need a cable? We've got you covered!

 

We've teamed up with the fine folk at Native Union to bring you a special deal on one of their best in class cables. 

Simply pick the 'Mu One + Cable' reward and in addition to your shiny new Mu One you will receive a certified USB Type-C to Type-C tangle free cable, complete with a leather belt strap for easy storage. This is a premium accessory - a great partner for the Mu One.

More info can be found here: NATIVE UNION WEBSITE

 

Rewards 

 

By backing us and picking a reward, not only will you be one of the coolest cats on the block by getting your hands on a Mu One first, but you will also get a huge discount to the expected RRP.

The Mu One will be produced in black with the following rewards:

Worldwide shipping: 

• Mu One International Charger bundle in black
• Mu One International Charger bundle in black + Native Union Type-C belt cable in zebra
• Mu One International Charger twin pack (x2) in black
• Mu One International Charger office pack (x4) in black
• Mu One International Charger squad pack (x10) in black

 

Mu One: Development Timeline

 

Upon completion of the initial Kickstarter campaign, first production orders have been placed and tooling has commenced. We will be placing our second production order upon completion of this Indiegogo campaign. Thereafter, production testing and external certification testing will be undertaken to ensure that the Mu One behaves exactly as we expect.

Then… (drum roll) it’s ‘show time’ as we start mass production of the shiny new Mu One and gear up for shipping towards the end of the summer:
• Kickstarter backers: Batch #1: Estimated shipping September 2018 - *New est: Nov 2018.
• Indiegogo backers: Batch #1: Estimated shipping October 2018 - *New est: Nov 2018.
• Indiegogo backers: Batch #2: Estimated shipping December 2018

 

But why did we decide to launch on Kickstarter first and then InDemand on Indiegogo?
Well, we want to give as many people as possible the opportunity to get their hands on the 'all new' Mu One, and Indiegogo to us has a wider overseas audience which we have not captured from Kickstarter so far.

We are a small team, and after these Crowd Funding campaigns have completed their Worldwide shipping for the Mu One, it will then be limited to just shipping and retail in the UK for now, as well as Amazon UK, US & Europe. We are hoping to expand our shipping reach soon, and hope to progress with this to put the Mu One on the global stage.

 

 

Here's a first look at our initial prototyping of the Mu One in the meantime...

 

 

Functional Testing of the Mu One Charger Unit

 

Our Story

 

A few years ago two Dudes wrestled with a sketch.

A sketch that was about to have life forced upon it.

It was the start of a heroic British start-up story. A story that was solving a long overlooked problem of the size of the humble UK plug.

 

Having been unchanged for over 50 years the UK plug was outdated and outsized in comparison to the mobile devices that it served. That changed as the sketch became the Mu and the UK plug size was solved forever.

The Mu won Design of the Year, Accessory of Mobile World Congress along with other associated high profile awards for its novel and simplistic form factor.

But in reality, the job was only half done.

Under the hood, the unseen secondary challenge of the Mu related to the power that it provides. In its first manifestation the ‘Mu Classic’, the Mu had an output power of 1Amp — just enough to charge a smartphone. Later, the ‘Mu Tablet’, ‘Mu Duo’ and ‘Mu International’ increased the power to 2.4Amp — now smartphone and tablet ready. But the enemy of increasing the power of the Mu had two faces: the size of the components on the electronics board inside the Mu that were generally linear to its output, and the heat that it produced. The Mu, being super small, had a very limited enclosure to fit power and to disperse and heat. The impact that the Mu could have over a full range of mobile devices was limited by its essence — size.

For the last two years, the small team behind the Mu have been working with the major global semi-conductor companies aligning their design to the ultimate pursuit of these goliath power providers — high power density (lots of output in a small space) and high efficiency (low heat loss).

And the results are in…

The Mu One hosts 45W output power, now enough to power the latest notebooks and Macbooks. It hosts Power Delivery Technology that creates a variable voltage for fast charging devices, and it has an auto detect chip on board that creates an optimum charge for iOS, Android and other makes of mobile devices. All of this inside the svelte 14mm profile of the Mu.

Being able to add over four times the power of its predecessor is a result of the birth of Gallium Nitride Technology (GaN) enabling a huge amount of power to be enclosed in a very small space — all whilst running at a market leading efficiency of over 90%.

Finally, the solution to create the ultimate Mu is available.

Technology has finally caught up with the Mu that those two Dudes always wanted to produce.
story_txt:
Introducing the Mu One The Mu One is not just the thinnest international charger in the world but now also packs in an amazing 45W of power along with fast charge technology – that’s enough to charge the latest notebooks, tablets, smartphones and other mobile devices in super quick time. Pocket sized and compact, the Mu One has a unique and patented fold-flat design with an interchangeable head system. This allows the Mu One to reduce its size to an amazing 14mm thin – that’s over 70% smaller than the 29W Type-C Apple Charger!  Mu One 45W charger vs Apple 29W charger Have a USB Type-C, Lightning or Micro USB device?  When it comes to chargers, the Mu One is the only one you need.Combining ultra slim design with cutting edge power technology, the Mu One boasts PD Technology for a fast adaptive charge and breakthrough GaN technology that creates an astonishing 94% power efficiency. This enables a huge amount of power to fit into the super small Mu One.  The Mu One is truly a fusion of award winning design and cutting edge power technology. 
 
Mu One: Under The Hood 
 
The Mu One has an amazing 45W of power with fast charge technology making it suitable for all smartphones, tablets and even the latest Macbooks and notebooks. This is all thanks to THREE remarkable pieces of technology under the hood…
 


 

Firstly, Gallium Nitride Technology (GaN). Enabling very high-power in a super small space, all with 94% power efficiency. This is the real genius of the Mu One being able to pack a punch. This latest technological break through in power, enables us to provide big power in our tiny Mu One.

 
Secondly, Power Delivery Technology (PD). Fast charge, adaptive charge, quick charge – it’s all about being able to change the voltage output of the charger to adjust to devices and create a quick charging experience. The Mu One comes with a PD controller onboard and will charge fast.
And then, an Auto-Detect Chip. Providing intelligent identification to iOS, Android and other devices to ensure that they charge at an optimum rate. The Mu One provides the perfect charge no matter which device, make or model is being used. The Mu One - A fusion of award winning design and cutting edge power technology.   

 
As you’d expect, the Mu One will be certified to the relevant global safety standards for chargers.
 
Mu One international charger: how it works
 
The Mu One comprises a patented fold-flat design with an interchangeable plug head system, enabling the product to be used in over 200 countries worldwide whilst remaining pocket sized and portable.
  
 
To use the Mu One, you will need two main parts:1. The 45W power block with a reversible USB Type-C connector2. One of the three interchangeable plug heads

 
Simply swap on the plug head for the country you are in or travelling to, select the correct cable for your device, and plug into the mains socket to charge your devices.
 
 
The Brit - pocket-sized and portable, this plug will reduce your overall UK plug size by over 70%. Say goodbye to bulky UK chargers! Suitable for use in the UK & Ireland, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia plus 50 more plug type G countries worldwide.
   
The European - portable, with a 90 degree rotation for bi-directional use, this plug head enables you to charge the products you love with a stylish twist. Suitable for use in the EU, Brazil, India, Indonesia, Russia plus over 100 more plug type C countries worldwide.
 

 
The American - pocket-sized with fold-away pins, the streamlined design plugs flat against the socket and is the perfect travel companion. Suitable for use in the US, Canada, China,Thailand, Japan plus 50 more plug type A countries worldwide.
 
Mu One with US plug head attached
 
Mu One: Compatible Devices 
 
The Mu One incorporates the latest breakthroughs in power technology. It features the new reversible USB Type-C connector that has been adopted by Apple, Samsung and most major makers of mobile devices, so you just need to use the appropriate cable for your device:
  The Mu One is compatible with Micro USB, Lightning and USB Type-C charged devices.
 
For Micro USB products simply connect a USB Type-C to Micro USB cable.This generally includes Android devices, games consoles and cameras.
For Lightning devices, connect a USB Type-C to Lightning cable.This generally includes iOS devices i.e. iPhones and iPads.
And for USB Type-C devices, a C to C cable is what you need.This generally includes the latest Android devices and the latest Apple Macbooks.
 

Please see our Kickstarter FAQ's for a more comprehensive list of the major compatible devices.


 
Need a cable? We've got you covered!
 
We've teamed up with the fine folk at Native Union to bring you a special deal on one of their best in class cables. 
Simply pick the 'Mu One + Cable' reward and in addition to your shiny new Mu One you will receive a certified USB Type-C to Type-C tangle free cable, complete with a leather belt strap for easy storage. This is a premium accessory - a great partner for the Mu One.
More info can be found here: NATIVE UNION WEBSITE

 
Rewards 
 
By backing us and picking a reward, not only will you be one of the coolest cats on the block by getting your hands on a Mu One first, but you will also get a huge discount to the expected RRP.
The Mu One will be produced in black with the following rewards:
Worldwide shipping: 
• Mu One International Charger bundle in black• Mu One International Charger bundle in black + Native Union Type-C belt cable in zebra• Mu One International Charger twin pack (x2) in black• Mu One International Charger office pack (x4) in black• Mu One International Charger squad pack (x10) in black

 
Mu One: Development Timeline
 
Upon completion of the initial Kickstarter campaign, first production orders have been placed and tooling has commenced. We will be placing our second production order upon completion of this Indiegogo campaign. Thereafter, production testing and external certification testing will be undertaken to ensure that the Mu One behaves exactly as we expect.
Then… (drum roll) it’s ‘show time’ as we start mass production of the shiny new Mu One and gear up for shipping towards the end of the summer:• Kickstarter backers: Batch #1: Estimated shipping September 2018 - *New est: Nov 2018.• Indiegogo backers: Batch #1: Estimated shipping October 2018 - *New est: Nov 2018.• Indiegogo backers: Batch #2: Estimated shipping December 2018
 
But why did we decide to launch on Kickstarter first and then InDemand on Indiegogo?Well, we want to give as many people as possible the opportunity to get their hands on the 'all new' Mu One, and Indiegogo to us has a wider overseas audience which we have not captured from Kickstarter so far.
We are a small team, and after these Crowd Funding campaigns have completed their Worldwide shipping for the Mu One, it will then be limited to just shipping and retail in the UK for now, as well as Amazon UK, US & Europe. We are hoping to expand our shipping reach soon, and hope to progress with this to put the Mu One on the global stage.
 

 
Here's a first look at our initial prototyping of the Mu One in the meantime...
 
   
Functional Testing of the Mu One Charger Unit
 
Our Story
 
A few years ago two Dudes wrestled with a sketch.
A sketch that was about to have life forced upon it.
It was the start of a heroic British start-up story. A story that was solving a long overlooked problem of the size of the humble UK plug.



 
Having been unchanged for over 50 years the UK plug was outdated and outsized in comparison to the mobile devices that it served. That changed as the sketch became the Mu and the UK plug size was solved forever.
The Mu won Design of the Year, Accessory of Mobile World Congress along with other associated high profile awards for its novel and simplistic form factor.
But in reality, the job was only half done.
Under the hood, the unseen secondary challenge of the Mu related to the power that it provides. In its first manifestation the ‘Mu Classic’, the Mu had an output power of 1Amp — just enough to charge a smartphone. Later, the ‘Mu Tablet’, ‘Mu Duo’ and ‘Mu International’ increased the power to 2.4Amp — now smartphone and tablet ready. But the enemy of increasing the power of the Mu had two faces: the size of the components on the electronics board inside the Mu that were generally linear to its output, and the heat that it produced. The Mu, being super small, had a very limited enclosure to fit power and to disperse and heat. The impact that the Mu could have over a full range of mobile devices was limited by its essence — size.
For the last two years, the small team behind the Mu have been working with the major global semi-conductor companies aligning their design to the ultimate pursuit of these goliath power providers — high power density (lots of output in a small space) and high efficiency (low heat loss).
And the results are in…
The Mu One hosts 45W output power, now enough to power the latest notebooks and Macbooks. It hosts Power Delivery Technology that creates a variable voltage for fast charging devices, and it has an auto detect chip on board that creates an optimum charge for iOS, Android and other makes of mobile devices. All of this inside the svelte 14mm profile of the Mu.
Being able to add over four times the power of its predecessor is a result of the birth of Gallium Nitride Technology (GaN) enabling a huge amount of power to be enclosed in a very small space — all whilst running at a market leading efficiency of over 90%.
Finally, the solution to create the ultimate Mu is available.
Technology has finally caught up with the Mu that those two Dudes always wanted to produce. 

Two Dudes
 
Risks and challenges
 
Our small design team first successfully launched our UK version of the Mu in 2012.
Since then we've established fantastic manufacturing partnerships allowing us to design and build a Mu family.
This will be our third big product release since launching the original Mu USB charger in 2012, and this time around we have been working with a specialist technology partner to deliver an extraordinary small and powerful product. The Mu One combines their expertise, our design skills and the superb production capabilities of our manufacturing partners.
All of these are in place and prototypes have been made so we just need to lock down those prototypes, push into production, create some tooling and stir in a little magic.
Saying that, we've done this before and we know that nothing is plain sailing but we've built in some contingency time into our production schedule to allow for the inevitable 'item' that we can't foresee at the moment. We're confident that the pursuit of creating magic will overcome that unknown 'item'. And we've been here long enough to know that we'll be handling both during and after this campaign.
Now, it's magic time!

story:
Secret Happy Hour is here to do one thing: Provide customers a new way to discover and get great deals at their favorite restaurants and bars.

The smartphone has become a ubiquitous extension of the human experience and no one understands that better than we do. With Secret Happy Hour (SHH), restaurant and bar customers will be able to receive exclusive happy hour specials and discounts that people without the app will never know existed. Think of it as a tight knit community of people who will be getting awesome discounts at their favorite watering holes and eateries...SHH!

Here Are Just A Few SHH Features:

  • Targeted Secret Happy Hours: Customers only see happy hours in their cities or areas they frequent.
  • An easy-to-use interface to help get customers straight to the nearest happy hour.
  • Customize what you want to see and what you don't; It's your app, so you can set it up how you want.
  • Cash in on awesome deals by simply showing your waiter, waitress, or bartender your promo code, but keep it a secret...not everyone has to know ;)

Here's How SHH Works:

Restaurants and bars have the ability to publish Secret Happy Hour specials so that customers can cash in on these awesome deals...

 

Why Do We Need Funding?

Lucky for us, we don't need a lot to make this happen. The executive and founding members are all designers and developers, so we've got the app covered by just devoting our time. What we need help with is server and marketing costs to help get the name out there. We personally have to sign up the restaurants we feature on the app...That makes for a lot of gas, hotels, planes, and trains.

Most importantly we want the app to be free for you to use....Forever! 

 

Secret Happy Hour Aims To Change The Game

Besides delivering customers amazing deals, we want to put money back in the local economy. Enough of the large chains ruling the world and putting the mom and pop shops out of business.  Our aim is to sign up local establishments and steer away from the big chains and corporations. The local shops are a part of the community, and for the most part they have better food, better service, and fun atmospheres. Secret Happy Hour is here to help customers discover hidden local gems they never even knew existed.

Dont Have The Cash To Back Us?

Secret Happy Hour is a big project, and everyone that believes in us will help us make it through these long days. Help us spread the word: Tweets, Instagram Pics, and Facebook posts mean the world to us. If you want to root us on feel free to email us at info@secrethappyhour.com.

EVERYTHING HELPS AND NO CONTRIBUTION IS TOO SMALL!

Thank you for considering us! We're thrilled to have you along as part of our journey! Visit us at www.secrethappyhour.com for more information.

story:
Our App is 70% complete and we just need $3,000 more to finish and launch it.

Our Story

So where do I start.... Background? My name is Blake Gratton and I have an identical twin brother named Brock Gratton who is my best friend and business partner.  Together our story is pretty long so I'm going to give you the short version in hopes that I do not completely bore you.


Brock and I graduated college in 2004 and immediately started working for a large bank doing mortgages.  It was the absolute prime time to get into the mortgage business and we were knee deep in loan applications ranging from experienced investors to first time home buyers.  We quickly realized that 90% of our customers were first time home buyers and had absolutely no clue what to expect.  They didn't have a clue as to what they wanted, how much they could afford, what their mortgage payment would be, or even what interest rates looked like.  So this created a very tough relationship up front trying to hold the clients hands and make sure they understood why they couldn't afford a beach front property.  Lol


Working with first time home buyers was fun, but we quickly realized our clients needed to be better prepared and needed to understand the mortgage loan process. This is why we've come up with an app that will do all of this for them.


The app is also geared towards mortgage loan officers who do not want to carry their laptop around with them everywhere they go.  The application will have a section that allows mortgage loan officers to fill out full 1003 applications, save them to their app, email them to themselves and more.


What the App will do:

  • Mortgage Calculator - You will be able to plug in how much the purchase price is for a home, how much money you can put down, and what interest rate you will have.  It will then calculate how much taxes, insurance, and your monthly payment.
  • Live Interest Rates - We will have an interest rate feed that will update throughout the day as to what the daily interest rates are.  It will show 30 year fixed, 15 year fixed, 1 year arm, treasury bond, and more.
  • A Full Mortgage Application - Yes... a full mortgage application.  The app will have a 1003 (Mortgage terms) that you will be able to fill out and email to yourself.
  • Save & E-mail Feature: The app will allow you to fill out an application, save it and come back to make as many changes to it as you would like.  If you find a new house at a different price?  No worries... open up the old app and make the appropriate changes.  Then e-mail it to yourself and present it tot he loan officer.
  • Amortization Schedule- Everyone wants to know how much they will be paying towards interest and how much they will be paying towards principle.  This will spell it all out for you.


Our website has been thrown up, we just need to complete it and get it ready for when we launch the app.

http://www.pocketmortgageapp.com


The Impact

This application will help the mortgage world 10 folds.  It will not only save you time and give you complete knowledge as to what to expect, but it will make you a more qualified home owner.


The application was originally set up to target Mortgage Loan Officers who could take a mortgage app whenever and wherever they were as long as they had their iphone or ipad.  But during development and really thinking about who can benefit from this app, we decided the target market was not restricted to loan officers, but to actual home buyers as well.  If every customer I worked with walked into my office with a fully filled out loan application, and knowledge as to how much they could afford, I would have had more happy customers and closed loans.


What We Need & What You Get

So we've been working on this app on and off for quite a long time now.  We've designed the look of the app, and even have the app integrated into the apple testing framework, but we have not yet built out the functionality.  We've run out of funds for the app and need to raise $3,000 just to finish the functionality.  Once it's fully functional we will go "live" with it and start selling it in the app world.


Other Ways You Can Help

Forward this campaign to anyone in the mortgage business or anyone looking to buy a new home.  The minute we raise enough money we will pay the programmer to finish it and launch.  We're really excited about this project and are happy to have found Indiegogo.com

story:
CLICK HERE TO ORDER

The DoBox Mini is in production stage. That means we can guarantee the first shipping date for the fastest backers! 

How to use the DoBox Mini?

 

 

1. Plug in the USB-C and an ethernet cable

2. Connect to your home network on your iPhone or iPad

3. Use the DoBox app to control all features and functions

 

With DoBox Mini you can now connect to more external devices like never before. Portable Wireless Hub for iPhone and iPad. 7-in-1 Wireless Adapter with 32GB Internal Storage, USB-C, Ethernet, 2xUSB, Micro SD, Audio Out and HDMI. DoBox Mini gives you the connectivity you were missing from your Apple device.

Wireless Connectivity

The DoBox Mini has multiple ports to connect an internet cable, flash drives, hard drives, keyboards, TVs, projectors, monitors or speakers, and use them wirelessly through your home Wi-Fi network. So you don't have to connect your iPhone / iPad to the DoBox Mini physically. Save yourself from dongle hell!

Mouse on iPad/iPhone

For the first time ever, you can use a traditional mouse and keyboard on your iPad in our app. Use our built-in browser for all online tasks just like on a Mac. Leave your MacBook at home and control it remotely with our unique Screen Sharing Client based on VNC technology.

Wireless Storage

You can backup your photos, videos and documents wirelessly and securely offline. DoBox has its own internal storage plus a microSD card reader. Plug in a microSD card to extend the storage or connect a flash drive to access your files. Never lose your files again!

Multimedia Player

Use DoBox Mini as a media center through HDMI. Play your favorite videos, presentations or pictures from its internal storage using your iPhone or iPad as a remote controller. Control everything from the comfort of your chair!

File Sharing

Now you can share, copy and manage all your music, photos, videos and documents without restrictions among your devices and among your friends. You can use this feature on any iPhone, iPad, Mac or PC. Free your files from the iOS prison!

Free DoBox Mini App

You can easily manage all functions with our free iOS app. You can see DoBox's status, access external devices, use the app as a remote controller, receive notifications and online updates. Store and manage your files and connect to your laptop remotely.

 

Why is DoBox Mini better?

With regular USB-C hubs, you are still tied to your cables when you plug anything in. Besides, they are just for the new iPad Pros and you can't use them with any other Apple device. Unlike other USB-C hubs, DoBox Mini is a truly wireless solution that works with all iPads and even with iPhones with iOS 10 / 11 / 12.

Read about DoBox Mini here: 

 

The Problems We Solve With The DoBox Mini

We love Apple, but we also feel limited in its possibilities. In the recent years, Apple has been intentionally reducing and changing the ports on its products, while making us buy over-priced adapters. We have an iPhone and an iPad, but we felt frustrated, because we faced the following problems:

  • We couldn't easily connect our old speakers, keyboards, projectors, etc.
  • Everything needed a separate adapter, but we could plug in only one cable
  • When connecting a cable, we lost the advantage of mobility
  • We couldn't attach a flash drive or an external hard drive to our iOS devices
  • We couldn't share, edit and backup files with others offline

 

DoBox Mini vs Original DoBox

 

About us

We started to develop our first product the DoBox in 2016 and we sold more than a thousand units already. It is in mass manufacturing and now you can buy it on Amazon US or on our online store.

Since our start we have grown into a professional team and we also acquired our first funding from HiVentures, a VC company from Hungary.

This January we won an Innovation Award at CES 2019 in the Computer Peripherals category! We saw the need for a small home version of the original DoBox so we came up with the idea for this product.

 

 

 

Team

 

Tech Specs

Hardware:
Full aluminium body
Chip: Quad-core Cortex A7
Memory: 1GB RAM
Storage: 32 eMMC
Ethernet: 10/100/1000 Mbps (Gigabit)

Size and Weight:
Height: 0.71 inch (18 mm)
Width: 5.12 inches (130 mm)
Depth: 2.52 inches (64 mm)
Weight: 5.71 ounces (162 grams)

 

Support and Guarantee

We will send software updates online to your DoBox continuously to fix possible problems and bugs. If you have any problems with your DoBox, simply contact us, and our customer service will help. You receive one year guarantee for the hardware.

Copyright notice: DoBox and DoBox Mini is a brand of Fruitdock Ltd. All trademarked terms are the property of their respective owners. Fruitdock Ltd. makes no claim to affiliation with any trademark holders including Apple and others. The design is patented by USPTO.

 

Risks and challenges

We have to apply for different certifications (CE, FCC, etc.). We may face possible delays, but we will do everything to deliver on time. We create custom kernel and software, but we use such solutions that will allow for online updates. This way we can fix possible bugs, and continue to work on the updates. Each DoBox Mini will be tested before dispatch, and we also give one year guarantee.

 

FAQ

Will the mouse work in all apps?
Initially, the mouse will function inside our app, but we offer an open source software development kit for app developers, so they can implement the DoBox's functions into their own apps. The system-wide cursor is not enabled on iOS by Apple.

Does the mouse work only in a remote app?
Basically there are three ways to use the mouse with the DoBox: 
1. Within the DoBox app and built-in browser
2. In our remote app as shown in the video,
3. In third-party apps, if they implement the DoBox SDK.

What iOS version is supported?
Currently our app works with iOS 11 and iOS 12 and planning to extend to iOS 10 to support as many versions as possible.

Does it need a jailbreak?
No, absolutely not. All functions are based on official programming libraries.

We have an iPhone and an iPad, but we felt frustrated, because we faced the following problems:
We couldn't easily connect our old speakers, keyboards, projectors, etc.
Everything needed a separate adapter, but we could plug in only one cable
When connecting a cable, we lost the advantage of mobility
We couldn't attach a flash drive or an external hard drive to our iOS devices
We couldn't share, edit and backup files with others offline
 DoBox Mini vs Original DoBox About usWe started to develop our first product the DoBox in 2016 and we sold more than a thousand units already. It is in mass manufacturing and now you can buy it on Amazon US or on our online store.Since our start we have grown into a professional team and we also acquired our first funding from HiVentures, a VC company from Hungary.This January we won an Innovation Award at CES 2019 in the Computer Peripherals category! We saw the need for a small home version of the original DoBox so we came up with the idea for this product.   Team Tech SpecsHardware:Full aluminium bodyChip: Quad-core Cortex A7Memory: 1GB RAMStorage: 32 eMMCEthernet: 10/100/1000 Mbps (Gigabit)Size and Weight:Height: 0.71 inch (18 mm)Width: 5.12 inches (130 mm)Depth: 2.52 inches (64 mm)Weight: 5.71 ounces (162 grams) Support and GuaranteeWe will send software updates online to your DoBox continuously to fix possible problems and bugs. If you have any problems with your DoBox, simply contact us, and our customer service will help. You receive one year guarantee for the hardware.Copyright notice: DoBox and DoBox Mini is a brand of Fruitdock Ltd. All trademarked terms are the property of their respective owners. Fruitdock Ltd. makes no claim to affiliation with any trademark holders including Apple and others. The design is patented by USPTO. Risks and challengesWe have to apply for different certifications (CE, FCC, etc.). We may face possible delays, but we will do everything to deliver on time. We create custom kernel and software, but we use such solutions that will allow for online updates. This way we can fix possible bugs, and continue to work on the updates. Each DoBox Mini will be tested before dispatch, and we also give one year guarantee. FAQWill the mouse work in all apps?Initially, the mouse will function inside our app, but we offer an open source software development kit for app developers, so they can implement the DoBox's functions into their own apps. The system-wide cursor is not enabled on iOS by Apple.Does the mouse work only in a remote app?Basically there are three ways to use the mouse with the DoBox: 1. Within the DoBox app and built-in browser2. In our remote app as shown in the video,3. In third-party apps, if they implement the DoBox SDK.What iOS version is supported?Currently our app works with iOS 11 and iOS 12 and planning to extend to iOS 10 to support as many versions as possible.Does it need a jailbreak?No, absolutely not. All functions are based on official programming libraries.

story:
IMPORTANT UPDATE - Guys do not forget to add 20 USD for shipment when claiming a perk.  It's written in a description! If you haven't done this, go to - " Contribute now" and pres "No Perk, just a contribution!" Add 20 USD. Thank you. We apologize for any inconvenience.

About us

We are young and ambitious. We have a good idea and want it to become a reality. For the last year we have been creating Deeper - smart sonar, operating with smartphones and tablets that support Android 2.2+ and iOS 4.0+ operating systems. It is a unique project that requires large investments. This is why we can not bring it to completion unless we get your financial assistance. We ask you to support us and we will do everything to make this product reach you, your friends, relatives and other passionate fishermen as soon as possible. We hope that Deeper will serve both, the passionate amateur fishermen as well as the professionals. We want you to be the one with the biggest catch!

What is Deeper?

After a few futile hours at the pond with a fishing-rod many begin to wonder what it would be like using one’s smartphone to see where all the fish are hiding. With this device we are making it possible. The sonar ensures that your fishing goes successfully in any fresh or salt water all around the globe. When Deeper is paired with your smart device, its unique technology allows you to see the view of the ponds bed. It is reflected by sonar's emitted waves then the information is sent to the screen of a phone or a tablet allowing you to learn about the water temperature, depth and, of course, where the fish are.

How does it work?

Deeper interacts with a smartphone or tablet computer via Bluetooth connection and a special mobile application created for this unique sonar. Using this app, you will see all the information required to enjoy successful fishing.

Deeper sonar can easily interact with a smart device within up to 150-foot range with no additional cables. Operating systems Android 2.2+ or iOS 4.0 and higher will ensure that the mobile app works right.

Mobile app of the Deeper sonar lets you observe air temperature, moon phase, turn on the calendar and check the dates important to fishermen without turning off the echo-sounder. You can instantly take a photo of the fish you just caught without turning off the application and post it on Facebook or Twitter social networks. You don't even need to leave the boat or the fishing site.

We are almost ready. We found a well established high-tech factory that is capable of mass producing the device. However, they have a 1,000-unit minimum order requirement to start process.

What your contribution will help us do?

We already spent our money and donations from our relatives who strongly believe in success of this product. Those expenses include: programming, design, testing, prototype, application development and patenting.

We need your help because we want the product to be of high quality and to satisfy all the following requirements:

  • Bluetooth certification – $15.000
  • Product certification – $20.000
  • Injection molding tools – $35.000
  • First production run – $80.000

After we launched our website, we experienced a huge number of unique visitors in the first few days. We have also received hundreds of inquiries for more information about our product. This is why we are even more excited to bring this product to market and surprise all passionate fishermen around the globe.

If you know friends or relatives who like fishing, please spread the news! We believe they will be happy to learn about our device.

For more information please visit our website: www.buydeeper.com

FAQ

Q) Does Deeper work with all phones and tablets?
A) No. Deeper works only with smartphones and tablets supporting iOS 4.0+, 5.0+ and Android 2.2+ operating systems.

Q) Is Deeper the only sonar that works with a smartphone or a tablet?
A) As far as we know, yes. We are the innovative company that creates devices like no one else in the market.

Q) When can I download an app from Apple App Store or Google Play?
A) At this moment the app is being tested. It will be available for download in August 2012 or maybe sooner.

Q) Will the app cost money?
A) No. The first version of the app will be free.

Q) Will the mobile app for Deeper have add-ins?
A) Yes. We work hard for the app to have as many functions as possible. In the future, there will be many more functions.

Q) Is Deeper resistant to water and shocks?
A) Yes. While designing the device we had in mind that it has to be resistant to water in the depth of up to 1 meter, and small shocks.

Q) How does Deeper work?
A) You attach the device to a fishing-line and using the fishing-rod throw it to the location where you plan to catch fish. After landing on the water, device immediately turns on and sends information about that particular spot: depth, fish, water temperature. It could be done from the coast, a boat, a small bridge, a harbour and maybe even from a large boat or a bridge.

Q) Who can use this device?
A) We recommend it to everyone who enjoys nature and fishing. Your age does not matter, however, we recommend being at least 13.

Q) Will Deeper be available for purchase in shops that sell fishing gear?
A) Yes. We are searching for partners all around the world who can sell our product, but the price will be significantly higher and we expect that our device will be available in shops in October, 2012.


Q) How to become a partner/distributor?
A) We look for partners and distributors in all parts of the world. If you are interested in our product, please contact us at sales@buydeeper.com

Q) I am a blogger, a journalist. I need more information.
A) If you are going to write about our product but the information is not enough, contact us at press@buydeeper.com or find the section Press on our website. We really appreciate your support!

Your age does not matter, however, we recommend being at least 13.Q) Will Deeper be available for purchase in shops that sell fishing gear?A) Yes. We are searching for partners all around the world who can sell our product, but the price will be significantly higher and we expect that our device will be available in shops in October, 2012.
Q) How to become a partner/distributor?A) We look for partners and distributors in all parts of the world. If you are interested in our product, please contact us at sales@buydeeper.comQ) I am a blogger, a journalist. I need more information.A) If you are going to write about our product but the information is not enough, contact us at press@buydeeper.com or find the section Press on our website. We really appreciate your support!

story:
Find Me – Tornado Safety Smartphone App


Cousins Tammy and Kim Fuller were so impacted by the May 20, 2013 tornado that hit Moore Oklahoma.  They were doubly devastated when another F5 tornado hit neighboring community El Reno on May 31.

Tammy and Kim had always wanted to work together to do some disaster preparedness efforts, but not till the May Oklahoma tornadoes did it hit them how they could help.

Software architect Tammy and public relations and disaster prevention expert Kim heard that media reports that some Oklahoma residents didn’t immediately take cover after a tornado warning was issued because they feared nobody would be able to find them in the rubble.

Immediately Tammy and Kim came up with the concept of developing a smartphone app that allowed users to alert family and friends that they have taken cover during a tornado warning, the location of their safe place and the exact GPS location of that location should street signs and landmarks be destroyed.


Once the app was developed Tammy was able monitor via web-based mapping software by GeoRss compatible systems, they realized that local first responders can see every person who has activated their app, their current location, saving valuable time knowing where the people are, not just searching every home not knowing if a person took shelter there or not.

SEEKING AT LEAST $5000 for LARGER SERVER

The developers, Tammy and Kim are seeking at least $5000 to secure a larger server to enable larger numbers of users to partake in the app. Currently the cost of the app will have to be approximately $2.99 per user because of the charges that the developers are going to have to incur to allow the app to email; text and make a phone call with the users current location. 

If  servers are donated or $5000 is raised to incur that cost, the cost of the app could be reduced or funds could be used to develop the follow on products (Find Me-
Hurricane Safety app; Find Me—Winter Snow Storm Safety app; and Find Me –
Spring Storm Safety app).

Contributors will receive each of the apps free of charge and also receive free disaster safety information during emergencies in their own areas. 

Contributors will also have the satisfaction that we have the capacity to enable thousands of users in tornado alley to take cover with the peace of mind that someone knows where to come find them once a tornado has passed.

THE IMPACT

Helping Tammy and Kim developed this app and follow on products will give you the satisfaction that we are the first group to develop a real-time tornado rescue app in the country. We believe this will be the wave of emergency management and first responders. In fact, we see this being a feature in existing safe rooms. Right now there is no standardized feature notifying communities where there are safe rooms (storm shelters) and if people took shelter in them. This technology can eventually be adapted for actual tornado safe rooms and shelters.

OTHER WAYS TO HELP


Tammy and Kim could use your help: 

  • Please get the word out to family and friends in tornado alley (by the way every state in the country has had tornados) to purchase the Find Me—Tornado Safety App) and anyone in the news media help us get on your shows or in your publication to talk about this groundbreaking safety app.  App will be available September 11, 2013 (pending iTunes approval)
     
  • We are making it easy for you to share our story by using the IndieGoGo share tools!

We are so excited about the possibility to expand our app to make it run on a larger server to insure that the server doesn’t crash during a national emergency, tornado or hurricane.

Thank you in advance. We really really appreciate your support.


Tammy and Kim

story: For a while now, I've been looking at additive manufacturing as a means of rapid prototyping for both recreational and profesional environments. I've decided that a 3D Printer would be amazing, but I need funds. I'm a high school student and have no job, and I hve no time for a job as I am involved in intense academics,Cross County, and robotics. If I can just get a 1 or 2 dollar pledge from a couple hundred people, I can meet my goal.

Important Notice 

Now you can order MAGQI Automatic Wireless Car Charger on Amazon(United States) and Aliexpress, which will be faster shipping. Blow are the links to order: 

Amazon(United States): http://bit.ly/MAGQIAmazon
Aliexpress (Worldwide):  http://bit.ly/MAGQIALIEXPRESS

MAGQI X is a newly designed wireless car charger.Owe to the infrared induction and automatic telescopic levers, there  is no need to put a sticker or worry about unstable levers any more. Simply insert MAGQI X into the air vent, put your phone on , charging will soon be initiated. Enjoy a safe and convenient driving with MAGQI X wireless car charger.

 

We're a group of like-minded professionals who has been in the electronics industry with more than 10 years of experiences collectively from all over the world. The company is currently based out of Shenzhen, China. The sales forces of the company are professionals from multinational FMCG companies around the world.

 

1, When will MAGQI X be shipped out?

We will ship it out to all backers on  the end of January 2018.

2, What is the input/output of MAGQI ?

The input is  5V/1.5A and the output is DC5V/1A

3, What does the package include?

It includes one car charger, one car adapter, one air vent clip and  one USB cable.

4, I am a wholesaler, who should I speak to if we want to distribute MAGQI?

Please send an email to marketing@magqi.cc, we will take care of it. 

hello@magqi.cc

story:
Français • Italiano • Español • Português • Nederlands • Svenska • Deutsch • Pyсский • Malay • 한국어 • 中文 • 日本語 • العربية

What is HALO BACK?

HALO BACK is the first smart screen protector in the world.

The invisible back button lets your iPhone go back easily. With this little magic, you can operate your phone with one single hand.

 

 

Why you need it? 

iPhone is becoming bigger and better. Maybe too big to hold with a single hand? You may drop your phone when press the faraway button on the top. Double tap and swipe can help in somehow. However, you may not succeed every time when swipe while double tap takes a long time.                   

Before: cannot reach the back button on upper left corner

 

After: go back easily with the invisible button 

 

 

How to use a HALO BACK?

It's really simple. Just install the smart screen protector on your phone, turn on the screen, WOW, the magic button works!

No battery. No APPs.

 

 

What's improved in the new generation?

  • iPhone 7 type added! 
  • 2 times the sensitivityof 1st gen, thanks to the new electric circuit design based on nanomaterial generates. 
  • 3 options of basic materials which are first class of screen protector.

 

Can I use it on my new iPhone 7?

Yes! We redesigned the new HALO BACK for iPhone 7 & iPhone 7 Plus. Now it works perfectly for all iPhone 6 & 7 series.

      

Easy your life with HALO BACK anytime, anywhere

 

 

 

 

 

 

Start to enjoy your carefree life! 

 

Listen to early backers:

 

3 options available for the new HALO BACK

And this time, we have three options of material for you: Self-healing, Glass Pro, and Privacy. They are all easy to apply, no bubble, ultra clear, and durable. 

 

 

 

 

       

Watch the dropping test video of New HALO BACK!

 

*The new HALO BACK glass screen protector passed the test of steel ball(64g-151g) dropping from 90cm. The performance is as good as the first class screen protector brands such as Zagg and Tech21.

*This test is for HALO BACK Glass Pro & Privacy screen protectors, both are made of double fortified tempered glass. The Self-healing screen protector is made of an innovative material which provide self-healing from daily scratches. It's non-glass, but with glass-like transmittance. All of the three materials are easy to apply, no bubble, ultra clear, and durable.

  For more details about the Glass Pro material, please visit:   https://www.haloback.com/products/glass-pro-scr...

Tech Specs

*There might be curtain adjustments in mass-manufacturing products

Compatibility: iPhone 7 Plus/ 7/ 6s Plus/ 6s/ 6 Plus/ 6

 

Packaging Design

 *There might be curtain difference in packing between the 3 options of HALO BACK.

         

Perks

We’ll send you a survey after the campaign closes. The survey system will collect your shipping address and your HALO BACK(s)' styles: iPhone 7 Plus/ 7/ 6s Plus/ 6s/ 6 Plus/ 6.           

         

How it works?

We add an invisible smart button to iPhone. When you press the bottom corner, current is lead to top through our patented SmartBack™️ technology . So you can just go back easily with a slight, quick touch.

 
Where we're at
Since the idea of 'Add a back button to iPhone' came out, the team have been keeping designing and improving the smart screen protector. Thanks to the support from 8000+ of you, we made the 1st gen products last year.
 
After hundreds and thousands of trying, we finished the draft design of new HALO BACK in Aug, 2016. And tested the prototypes for more than one month since the new iPhone published.
 
Now, we need your help to move this project to manufacture. All your contribution will be used on mass manufacture. 

From sketch to prototype

 

 

About Us

HALO BACK, founded in 2013, is a pioneer of smart phone functionality and innovation.

Starting from a small idea on Kickstarter, HALO BACK has accumulated tens of thousands of supporters world-wide and been featured in over 200 major media outlets including Gizmodo and CNET.

Our team aims to provide clever new products that improve performance for our customers while creating a seamless user experience. Currently with users in nearly 200 countries world-wide, HALO BACK continues to develop consumer products that are on the cutting edge of ‘smart’ technology.

 

 

HALO BACK supply 'Tech, Smart, Easy' lifestyle and products. We are searching for global co-partners. If you want to order wholesale or become a distributor of HALO BACK, please contact us through: sales@haloback.com.

      

International Backers

We have partnered with global warehouses and the most reliable global logistics services including DHL, USPS, Royal Mail, TrakPak, Shunfeng etc, assuring efficient delivery to every corner of the world.

We charge $4’s shipping fee for backers from US and China. For backers from all the other countries, we charge $5 for shipping. Free shipping globally if you support 20 HALO BACKs or more!

In US we ship by USPS. Estimated delivery time: 3-8 days since dispatch.

In China we ship by Shunfeng. Estimated delivery time: 3-8 days since dispatch.

In countries as listed: BE, DK, FR, DE, IE, NL, PT, ES, IB, AU, CN, we use Royal Mail and TrakPak as logistic solution. Estimated delivery time: 3–8 days since dispatch.

For all the other countries around the world, we ship by DHL. Estimated delivery time: 1-2 weeks since dispatch.

Warranty

HALO BACK provides 1-year replacement warranty for the products backed in this project. 

During 1-year period, HALO BACK will replace any defective product backed in this project free of charge (except for shipping charges for the product) with an identical HALO BACK product. In the event that HALO BACK is unable to replace the product with an identical HALO BACK product (for example, because it has been discontinued), HALO BACK will offer either a refund or provide a replacement of another product from haloback.com in an amount equal to the purchase price of the product as evidenced on the original backer information and as discounted by its natural use.

For detailed process, please read our FAQ, or contact our customer service via message.
