No battery. No APPs.
  
What's improved in the new generation?

iPhone 7 type added! 
2 times the sensitivityof 1st gen, thanks to the new electric circuit design based on nanomaterial generates. 
3 options of basic materials which are first class of screen protector.


 
Can I use it on my new iPhone 7?
Yes! We redesigned the new HALO BACK for iPhone 7 & iPhone 7 Plus. Now it works perfectly for all iPhone 6 & 7 series.

 
 
Benefits
      Easy your life with HALO BACK anytime, anywhere   

 

 

 
Start to enjoy your carefree life! 

 
Listen to early backers:

 
3 options available for the new HALO BACK
And this time, we have three options of material for you: Self-healing, Glass Pro, and Privacy. They are all easy to apply, no bubble, ultra clear, and durable. 

 
 

 

 
       
Watch the dropping test video of New HALO BACK!

 
*The new HALO BACK glass screen protector passed the test of steel ball(64g-151g) dropping from 90cm. The performance is as good as the first class screen protector brands such as Zagg and Tech21.
*This test is for HALO BACK Glass Pro & Privacy screen protectors, both are made of double fortified tempered glass. The Self-healing screen protector is made of an innovative material which provide self-healing from daily scratches. It's non-glass, but with glass-like transmittance. All of the three materials are easy to apply, no bubble, ultra clear, and durable.
  For more details about the Glass Pro material, please visit:   https://www.haloback.com/products/glass-pro-scr...
Tech Specs

*There might be curtain adjustments in mass-manufacturing products
Compatibility: iPhone 7 Plus/ 7/ 6s Plus/ 6s/ 6 Plus/ 6

 
Packaging Design

 *There might be curtain difference in packing between the 3 options of HALO BACK.

         
Perks
We’ll send you a survey after the campaign closes. The survey system will collect your shipping address and your HALO BACK(s)' styles: iPhone 7 Plus/ 7/ 6s Plus/ 6s/ 6 Plus/ 6.           

         
How it works?
We add an invisible smart button to iPhone. When you press the bottom corner, current is lead to top through our patented SmartBack™️ technology . So you can just go back easily with a slight, quick touch.

 
Where we're at
Since the idea of 'Add a back button to iPhone' came out, the team have been keeping designing and improving the smart screen protector. Thanks to the support from 8000+ of you, we made the 1st gen products last year.
 
After hundreds and thousands of trying, we finished the draft design of new HALO BACK in Aug, 2016. And tested the prototypes for more than one month since the new iPhone published.
 
Now, we need your help to move this project to manufacture. All your contribution will be used on mass manufacture. 

From sketch to prototype

 


 
About Us
HALO BACK, founded in 2013, is a pioneer of smart phone functionality and innovation.
Starting from a small idea on Kickstarter, HALO BACK has accumulated tens of thousands of supporters world-wide and been featured in over 200 major media outlets including Gizmodo and CNET.
Our team aims to provide clever new products that improve performance for our customers while creating a seamless user experience. Currently with users in nearly 200 countries world-wide, HALO BACK continues to develop consumer products that are on the cutting edge of ‘smart’ technology.
 

 
 
HALO BACK supply 'Tech, Smart, Easy' lifestyle and products. We are searching for global co-partners. If you want to order wholesale or become a distributor of HALO BACK, please contact us through: sales@haloback.com.
      
International Backers
We have partnered with global warehouses and the most reliable global logistics services including DHL, USPS, Royal Mail, TrakPak, Shunfeng etc, assuring efficient delivery to every corner of the world.
We charge $4’s shipping fee for backers from US and China. For backers from all the other countries, we charge $5 for shipping. Free shipping globally if you support 20 HALO BACKs or more!
In US we ship by USPS. Estimated delivery time: 3-8 days since dispatch.
In China we ship by Shunfeng. Estimated delivery time: 3-8 days since dispatch.
In countries as listed: BE, DK, FR, DE, IE, NL, PT, ES, IB, AU, CN, we use Royal Mail and TrakPak as logistic solution. Estimated delivery time: 3–8 days since dispatch.
For all the other countries around the world, we ship by DHL. Estimated delivery time: 1-2 weeks since dispatch.
Warranty
HALO BACK provides 1-year replacement warranty for the products backed in this project. 
During 1-year period, HALO BACK will replace any defective product backed in this project free of charge (except for shipping charges for the product) with an identical HALO BACK product. In the event that HALO BACK is unable to replace the product with an identical HALO BACK product (for example, because it has been discontinued), HALO BACK will offer either a refund or provide a replacement of another product from haloback.com in an amount equal to the purchase price of the product as evidenced on the original backer information and as discounted by its natural use.
For detailed process, please read our FAQ, or contact our customer service via message.

story:
Auvidea J120

You are looking for very high CPU and GPU performance computer in a tiny package. The J120 carrier together with the Jetson TX1 compute module packs super computer power in a mini form factor.

The J110 just got better - it became the J120 and now features an integrated 9 axis sensor (IMU) for drone and UAV applications. To reduce risk and improve time to market we have implemented the mini HDMI port of the J100.


This block diagram shows a minimum CAN centric flight controller based on the TX1. The motors are controlled via CAN based ESCs like the ESC32 by Autoquad. Positioning data is provided by the Auvidea CAN2GPS module (38183 - Ublox MAX8W). The USB3 stereo camera may be used for visual navigation and object detection.
How do the various models differ?

J100 + 38194: this is the combination of the J100 plugged into the 38194 modular motherboard, which brings out a few extra interfaces.

Quad core ARM + GeForce graphics

Look at the J120 being the integration of a high performance quad core ARM system and a NVIDIA GeForce graphics card. You can even run your CUDA or Visionworks applications on the J120 with TX1. 

  • play 4k videos
  • 3D animations with GPU computations (CUDA)
  • deep learning and computer vision - auto fly the UAV

Just 2 months ago NVIDIA started shipping the Jetson TX1 development board with the TX1 compute module. For the J100 shrinks the development board to the tiniest form factor possible - the size of the TX1 compute module itself. The J110 is just slightly bigger. It is just a little wider to make space for standard connectors. 

  • mini HDMI port to connect to your monitor
  • USB2 and USB3 for mouse, keyboard and devices like the ZED stereo camera
  • Gigabit Ethernet 
  • Wifi
  • onboard M.2 type M slot for extremely fast SSDs (up to 2500 Mbyte/s)
  • size: just 50 x 111 mm (TX1 + 24mm)

NVIDIA Jetson TX1

NVIDIA's press release states that "Jetson TX1 is the first embedded computer designed to process deep neural networks -- computer software that can learn to recognize objects or interpret information." The 3.4x2 inch (87x50mm) module includes a Tegra X1 ARM Cortex-A57 processor with 256 core NVIDIA Maxwell graphics, 4GB of LPDDR4 memory, 16GB of eMMC storage, 802.11ac WiFi, Bluetooth and Gigabit Ethernet.

3D image of J120 carrier board

The 3D image shows the 3 connectors for 1000B-T Ethernet, dual USB3 and mini HDMI port on the left. In the middle is the M.2 slot for 2280 (22x80mm) ultra fast SSDs. On the bottom edge are expansion connectors for USB0, fan, UART, 2x CAN and power. On the back side (not visible) is a micro SD card reader. No external memory device is needed to boot the TX1. It boots from the internal 16GB eMMC.

Currently the J120 printed circuit board (38198) is in PCB making. Please have a look at the blog in the end. Then we will build up prototypes. First samples for beta customers will be available in late March/early April. We will test these and correct any bugs, if there are any. With our experience with the J100 we expect the rev 1 of the J120 to be very clean. In any case we will clean up the design with rev 2 and produce a bigger quantity. I expect rev 2 to become available in April/May 2016.

Auvidea J100 carrier board for the TX1

Auvidea has developed the tiny J100 (38188) carrier board, which is targeted mainly at UAV applications. Therefore it has non standard connectors, to reduce weight and size. The rev 1 pictured below has a pin connectors for USB3. Rev 2 (38188-2) will have 2 micro USB 3 connectors (on the left). Optionally it will integrate a 9 axis sensor (IMU).

We have received the first prototype (38188) on Feb 7. In just 5 days, we got all the basic functions to work. It boots into the Ubuntu GUI. We can run complex applications like playing 4k videos on a 1080p60 monitor. We can read and write the SD card. We have console access via the UART. Next we bring up Ethernet by interfacing a motherboard to connect to a standard RJ45 connector.

This picture shows how the J100 mounts underneath the TX1. The board size is exactly the same (50x87mm) as the TX1. The large heatsink on top is optional. The TX1 features extensive power management. If it is not doing much it stays very cool. But if you really load the CPU and GPU the power consumption might raise to 10 to 15 watts. 

The J120 design is largely based on the J100. We just increased the size slightly to make space for the standard connectors (RJ45 Ethernet, dual USB3 and mini Displayport). As we now know the little mistakes we have made on the rev 1 J100, we are very confident that the J120 will work straight away. 
Plan

Please contribute so that we have the funds to finance the build of a pre-production run. 

  • we have a batch of PCBs (printed circuit boards) build
  • we need to source the components required - some have lead times and need to be ordered in quantity
  • first we build a couple of sample in mid March and test them thoroughly 
  • next we build a batch of cards for the beta customers

NIVIDIA Jetson TX1

I think NVIDIA has designed a great product with the TX1. It brings high performance desktop performance and features to embedded system. So now we can architect a very powerful and feature rich mini computer.

  • I think people will then have a platform so they an bring a whole set of new applications and use cases to life
  • our focus is on UAV applications - with the TX1 the UAV has the compute performance so it eventually can see like we do. Times will be over where the UAVs just fly into trees or people.
  • please have a look at the auvidea.eu site. Our focus is on products to encode video so HD quality can be streamed live from the UAV to the ground station.

Risks

The J100 shows that we are on the right track. Auvidea has the knowhow to concept, design and manufacture high integrated systems with todays high speed serial busses like USB3, CSI-2, HDMI, LVDS and more. We understand the design rules to make this technology work. And our team is very dedicated and motivated to bring these systems to life in a very short time. Our in-house manufacturing allows us to build prototypes and the initial production run very quickly with top quality.

This picture shows the production of the bottom side of the J100 module together with 2 other products on the same panels. This fully automatic pick and place system has the precision and speed to place the tiny and fine pitch components on the board.
Embedded World show 

From Feb 23 to 25 we are showing the J100 at the NVIDIA booth at the Embedded World show in Nuremberg. If you get a chance please come to see us and have a look at our carrier boards for the TX1. 

Please also have a look at the thread below. Here the TX1 and Auvidea's carrier boards for the TX1 are discussed. 
DIYdrones thread on the TX1 and Auvidea's carrier boards

Where do I get the TX1?

The TX1 development board have been shipping in the US since December 2015. Thousands of kits already have been shipped. The list price is $599. There is a special educational discount: $299. European orders are scheduled to start shipping in March 2016. We are looking it creating a special bundle of the J100 and J120 carrier boards and the TX1. Please stay tuned.
Can I pay in US $?
This project is set up in EUR. But do not worry. If you are based in the U.S. or elsewhere you can easily pay in US $ with your standard Paypal account. Just specify that you would like to pay in EUR. Paypal takes care of the currency conversion for you.
Blog
February 12: start of the layout of the J110 carrier board. We started with the J100 and removed all components which are not required. The board was enlarged by 20mm to make room for the connectors. Then all required components are placed to the right and yellow wires indicate how they should connect. There are 325 components in total.

This is the J100 prototype with TX1 module installed in an aluminum case. We will demo this at the Embedded World show next week in Nuremberg.  This setup has the ZED stereo camera connected and it runs the ZED depth finder demo app.

The large PCB shown is the J200, which is designed to carry two TX1 modules for power hungry applications.
February 20:  layout of the J110 finalized. PCB production of the J110 and the J100 rev 2 will start on Monday, Feb 22nd. I expect to receive the finished PCBs on Tuesday, March 8th. Both the J100 and the J110 are 6 layer PCBs. 

If you are interested in the J100 and you would to build a UAV or drone to show at the upcoming NVIDIA GTC please contact me, so that we work out a special plan.
February 22:  the designs of the J100 and J110 taped out yesterday and the PCBs were ordered.  The plan is that the first PCBs will be populated right after we have received them. Testing should be fairly quick, unless there are some unforeseen issues. So if things work well and I am confident that they will, we should be able to ship the first units mid March. 

The fully assembled demo case for the Embedded World show. We now integrated the first J200. Unfortunately there was no time before the show, to power up and test the J200. So this has to wait until Friday.
February 25:  the Embedded World show was great. We have seen great interest in the TX1 and the carrier boards. 
March 3: we were busy to finish the design of the modular motherboard for the J100. 

The J100/TX1 combo plugs in on the left side. On the right there are slots for one or two flight controllers. When the J100 is plugged into this motherboard, more features/interfaces become available:
  • Gigabit Ethernet on 9 pin connector or on RJ45 (mounted on the bottom)
  • buttons and USB port for firmware upgrade
  • 2 CAN interfaces 
  • 2 optional CAN interfaces with Holt HI-3110 to support ARINC 825 and CANaerospace standards
  • M.2 key B (SATA) 2242 module slot for SSDs
  • size: 87 x 98 mm (weight: approx. 60 grams)
  • power: optionally 2 inputs up to 42V (10 LIPO cells) - redundant powering
Next we started bringing up the J200. The TX1 is now booting and Gb Ethernet is working. But we have issues with the display port output. This is the reason why we went back to the mini HDMI output with the J120.
With the new focus on the J120 (38198), the perks with the J110 (38197) have been removed and replaced by the J120. The price has increased from €199 to €219 because of the integration of the 9 axis IMU. Supporters of the J110 will be upgraded to the J120 at no extra cost.
March 4: the first batch of PCBs for the J120 has been ordered. They are scheduled to come in on March 15. If everything works out as expected, we should be able to ship the first samples of the J120 rev 1 to beta customers starting March 20. The confidence level is very high, as functions like UART, SD card, USB, USB3 already have been tested on the J100 and J200. M.2, CAN and CSI-2 have not been tested yet.
March 14:  the PCBs of the J100 rev 2 have arrived and today the bottom side components have been populated. The campaign has been extended by 10 days, so I can show working prototypes of the J100 rev 2 and J120 before the campaign ends

March 15:  a first batch of J100 rev 2 carrier boards has been build. It is a complete success. On the first board tested, the TX1 booted up straight away. HDMI out and USB 3 are ok. Just the new auto boot features requires a very minor patch.

March 17: a first batch of J120 carrier boards were build up. Within an hour we got Ubuntu booting, so HDMI out, Ethernet, USB 2 and 3 are working fine. As a first test we played a 4k demo video. This max'ed out the quad core ARM processors.

March 22: we now got the M.2 slot (with four PCIe lanes) to work. I requires the Jetson TX1 kernel to be compiled to install the NVME driver for the M.2 cards. Next the J120 rev 1 needs to be patched for it to work. We could verify operation and identified the changes required for rev 2 of the J120.

story:
SliceCharge available at our official website: www.hardciderlabs.com

 

We’re huge Apple fans and own many of their products. As much as we love Apple devices, we don’t love the fact that all the cables from different devices get tangled, messy, or lost. That’s why we’ve turned to wireless charging. However, most wireless chargers in the market can only charge 1 or 2 devices with low power so it takes forever.

 

 

Introduce SliceCharge, the World’s Fastest 3-in-1 Wireless Charger for All Apple Devices -- iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch. Fully charge your iPhone X/8 in less than 3.2 hours. With SliceCharge’s 18W, it is 1.5 times faster than other wireless chargers on the market. The same charging speed as cable, have the same charging efficiency without being restricted by a wire.

 

The SliceCharge is one of the only chargers on the market that can FAST charge up to 3 Apple devices at the same time, at 18W power delivery. With Slice, you can even charge two iPhones at once, at a rate of 20% battery boost in less than 30 minutes. That’s a 70% increase in efficiency.

 

 

It doesn’t just stop with iPhones, SliceCharge can fast charge Android phones up to 10W, too! Now you don’t have to fight over the charger with your family and friends.

 

Compared with other wireless chargers, skip the complicated installation process with Slice. We have integrated an Apple Watch coil inside the charging pad as well as 2 Qi compatible. Just simply place your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods on SliceCharge and it’s ready to go.

 

The SliceCharge is the only charger that is thinner than the phone it charges. Measured at only 6.9mm (0.27 inch), the Slice is smaller than the iPhone X at 7.7mm (0.30 inch). After much design iterations and mold building, we crafted a structure that fits the most powerful charging protocols within the most compact space.

 

Wireless charging has been a relatively new feature for Apple consumers, therefore, only the newest Apple devices have wireless charging capabilities. The AirPods users currently don’t have the luxury of wireless charging, but we’ve designed something to change that.

 

 

Our engineers have designed an AirPod Power Case with built-in receivers to enable wireless charging AirPods. Simply place your insert your AirPods into the AirPod Power Case and let them charge wirelessly.

 

 

This leather pouch mysteriously contains Qi compatible charging technology built into it.

 

Our phones always seem to die at the worst time. With the SliceCharge, simply place your phone on the fast charging pad and continue doing whatever you were doing -- whether it’s watching cute dog videos or playing an intense game!

 

Place your phone with its case on and watch it charge without a problem.

An 18W power adapter is offered for you to select if you haven't an adapter which meets QC3.0 9V/2.5A. It is compatible with both 120v and 240v AC. *Please specify whether you need type A/B or type C/E/F/J/L. If you do not specify will send you Type A/B. *If the power adapter still cannot meet the local standard of your country, we will offer a free power plug for you, once you select the rewards with the 18w power adapter included :)

 

SliceCharge is available in 3 colors! Choose from Carmine Red, Frosted White, and Indigo Blue :)

We used the newly designed prototype charging pad to test - see how fast we can fully charge an iPhone with 7.5W. 

 

 

Creating valuable products has always been our philosophy. Hard Cider Labs is a group of designers and engineers who love using Apple products and developing new technology for them. It is our goal to make the best products we can to make the world just a bit better and hassle-free.
story_txt: SliceCharge available at our official website: www.hardciderlabs.com We’re huge Apple fans and own many of their products. As much as we love Apple devices, we don’t love the fact that all the cables from different devices get tangled, messy, or lost. That’s why we’ve turned to wireless charging. However, most wireless chargers in the market can only charge 1 or 2 devices with low power so it takes forever.  Introduce SliceCharge, the World’s Fastest 3-in-1 Wireless Charger for All Apple Devices -- iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch. Fully charge your iPhone X/8 in less than 3.2 hours. With SliceCharge’s 18W, it is 1.5 times faster than other wireless chargers on the market. The same charging speed as cable, have the same charging efficiency without being restricted by a wire. The SliceCharge is one of the only chargers on the market that can FAST charge up to 3 Apple devices at the same time, at 18W power delivery. With Slice, you can even charge two iPhones at once, at a rate of 20% battery boost in less than 30 minutes. That’s a 70% increase in efficiency.  It doesn’t just stop with iPhones, SliceCharge can fast charge Android phones up to 10W, too! Now you don’t have to fight over the charger with your family and friends. Compared with other wireless chargers, skip the complicated installation process with Slice. We have integrated an Apple Watch coil inside the charging pad as well as 2 Qi compatible. Just simply place your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods on SliceCharge and it’s ready to go. The SliceCharge is the only charger that is thinner than the phone it charges. Measured at only 6.9mm (0.27 inch), the Slice is smaller than the iPhone X at 7.7mm (0.30 inch). After much design iterations and mold building, we crafted a structure that fits the most powerful charging protocols within the most compact space. Wireless charging has been a relatively new feature for Apple consumers, therefore, only the newest Apple devices have wireless charging capabilities. The AirPods users currently don’t have the luxury of wireless charging, but we’ve designed something to change that.  Our engineers have designed an AirPod Power Case with built-in receivers to enable wireless charging AirPods. Simply place your insert your AirPods into the AirPod Power Case and let them charge wirelessly.  This leather pouch mysteriously contains Qi compatible charging technology built into it. Our phones always seem to die at the worst time. With the SliceCharge, simply place your phone on the fast charging pad and continue doing whatever you were doing -- whether it’s watching cute dog videos or playing an intense game! Place your phone with its case on and watch it charge without a problem.An 18W power adapter is offered for you to select if you haven't an adapter which meets QC3.0 9V/2.5A. It is compatible with both 120v and 240v AC. *Please specify whether you need type A/B or type C/E/F/J/L. If you do not specify will send you Type A/B. *If the power adapter still cannot meet the local standard of your country, we will offer a free power plug for you, once you select the rewards with the 18w power adapter included :) SliceCharge is available in 3 colors! Choose from Carmine Red, Frosted White, and Indigo Blue :)We used the newly designed prototype charging pad to test - see how fast we can fully charge an iPhone with 7.5W.   Creating valuable products has always been our philosophy. Hard Cider Labs is a group of designers and engineers who love using Apple products and developing new technology for them. It is our goal to make the best products we can to make the world just a bit better and hassle-free.

story:
I am Johnathan Stanley, a business professional and entrepreneur with a background of creating business models and systems specifically geared towards making difficult tasks simple! Heart2Give is a campaign consisting of a team of 8 business professionals who are pursuing a vision greater then ourselves! We want ALL charities to have access to a phone app that allows all of their supporters the power to donate in the moment of need right from their personal smart phones! This is something very important to me because of the great amount of time and energy that must be invested by charities to raise funds to then be able to go serve the need they were passionate for in the first place. If the effort to gain funds and complete administrative necessities could be minimized, how much more effective might they be?!?. We have found no systems like this that are 100% free for the charities to use and most non-profits don’t have the resource to build their own. Something else to think about is the value of gaining the ability to donate when someone is in the “moment”, rather than waiting or putting it off till later. This is going to be a VERY sophisticated phone app and with your help we believe it can literally change the way in which the world gives while increasing the volume of giving exponentially!

Ok! What we need and what you get!

Well to put it simply from an IT Development standpoint this aint your grandmas phone app! The back end data base of the software is very in-depth and secure so the brunt of our budget is for back end code writing and system architecture. We are literally building an entire secure and personalized dashboard for the charities to create custom campaigns, provide transparency of their financial distributions for interested donors, import donor lists, immediately send notifications and requests for individuals to give as a need arises, and track cash flow. The system will also organize every donation made by each donor and provide statements for tax write offs. The $28,000 will also allow us to create the API in multiple platforms including iOS for IPhone as well as Android and tablets.

Oh and yes, the perks for helping us fund this amazing giving app:

  • Level 1 donations of $10-$50 are our “Enthusiasts”.  You will, of course, receive a tax write off since we are a 501c3 non-profit but you will also have your name listed on our “Giving Revolution Supporter Page”.
  • Level 2 donations of $50-$100 are our “Visionary Firebrands”. Tax write off, your name in the “Giving Revolution Supporter Page” plus our cool Heart2Give T-Shirts printed with the H2G logo and “I started a revolution”
  • Level 3 Donations of $100-$1000 are our “Radical Dynamos”.  You will have all the perks of the first two PLUS we will showcase the charity of your choice on the home page of Heart2Give during our launch for thousands of donors to see!
  • Level 4 Donations of $1000 + will aptly be our “REVOLUTIONARIES”.  All the benefits of the first three PLUS you will be listed as a founder and VIP treatment in our concert promotion where we will set a Guinness Book of World records for donations raised in a liver performance, real time, through electronic devices.

 

Other ways you can help!

If you are in a financially tough position and just don’t have money to donate you can still be a part of the Giving Revolution! We are all about helping other Charities and are already putting together lists of Non-Profits who would like to learn more about the giving app on Heart2Give and how it might benefit them! Please pass this Indiegogo fundraser to everyone you know. We are also beginning to showcase different non-profits around the country on our Facebook page so feel free to forward their info to us and you never know we might do an interview.

From all of us at Heart2Give THANK YOU and

Welcome To The Giving Revolution

story: BUY NOW!
story_txt: BUY NOW!

story:
Do you have your own brand or business that could benefit from exposure using the latest technology?

We have built a platform that enables design companies to quickly design mobile apps to match their customer's brands' look and feel.

Help us to raise awareness of our platform and new revenue streams it creates for designers by investing in an app for your brand.

Users publish updates instantly to Blackberry, Android, iPhone and iPad at the same time. Because your app is live, any updates you make to your app later on will be immediately available to anyone who has installed it!

Check out our design platform and click more info to see some sample apps:

www.LiveAppDesign.com

 

Live App Design - powered by Silicon W

Live App is a platform designed and devloped by Silicon W. Silicon W is a tech-art fusion space that teaches design and development to young entrepreneurial talent while building community projects for mutual benefit. We hope to inspire tech-art innovation that creates jobs and creative tech solutions to the world wide challenges we face. (www.siliconw.com)

As it has been increasingly difficult for designers to find work in North America specifically, The Live App Design platform enables design companies or designers to still use their design skills to generate income by taking care of all the coding for them.

Any small to medium business looking to spend under $5000 (or a monthly fee of $200-300) so that they can have their own mobile app is now able to work directly with a designer to make it happen.  No coding required!  An existing design partner could use our platform to create apps for their current customer base!

Our hosting fee is $10/month which enables end user downloads and access to the portal so that designers and/or their customers can update the content.  This is what we hope to be our main source of direct revenue from the project.

What We Need & What You Get

We need funds to be able to create focused marketing programs that spread the word about our platform and the opportunities it creates for existing designers.  The funds will be used to drive internet advertising, traditional print advertising and to foster partnerships with existing design companies and software companies (We hope Adobe reads this).

Using our talent pool at SiliconW we will create custom apps for your company in return for helping us finance the marketing of our platform. We will work with you to ensure your app is exactly what you want and then give you access to change the content in any way you like.
In a nutshell: WE WILL CREATE A CUSTOM MOBILE APP FOR YOU.

 

The Impact

LiveApp will help to fund our SiliconW Tech-Art fusion community center.  Our goal is to help young students and grads that have little work experience with real-world, hands-on opportunities to grow their skills.  In addition, our gallery features works from mostly undiscovered artists in an effort to raise their exposure as well as provide them with assistance and guidance getting their presence online via websites and mobile apps.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word about our platform and feel free to ask us any questions you may have!  We're very excited about the opportunities our platform presents and hope that you feel the same way too!  There are built in tools on indiegogo to help spread the word via Twitter, Facebook and email.

story:
Pre-Order Now

 

 
PRESS KIT
 

 

A home for your Apple Magic Keyboard ...

... that can hide away ...

... or completely detach.

 

A full-size typing experience...

 

... at different angles ...

...or orientations.

 

A wraparound design ...

 

...that protects the corners...

 

...and Apple Pencil...

 

...with or without the keyboard inside.

*iPad and Apple Magic Keyboard not included.

 

 

 

Folding the flap under itself, lets the 12.9 Touchtype Pro sit comfortably on your lap.

 

 

Is Touchtype Pro the best iPad Keyboard case?

While growing up, my family and friends knew me as the “tech guy” and would often ask, “what [phone, laptop, etc.] should I buy?”

Sometimes the answer was clear ("get an iPhone"), but every so often I'd have to ask  "what’s important to you?"

And it’s the same situation here. 

The Touchtype Pro is not for everyone. Here are a few reasons why you may want to consider something else:

Bluetooth: Since it relies on the Apple Magic Keyboard, that means it needs to be recharged separately. It also means that you’ll need to remember to turn it off when you’ve packed it away since key presses can wake up the iPad.

If this is important to you, then I’d recommend the Apple Smart Folio Keyboard as your best bet since it’s the only case that uses the Smart Connector.

Backlighting: Another limitation of the Apple Magic Keyboard is that the keys are not backlit. I like to work in the dark sometimes and  appreciate the subtle key illumination on my Macbook Pro.

There are a few solutions that turn your iPad into a laptop on the market, but I'd personally recommend the Brydge. Like Touchtype, Brydge also got its start on Kickstarter and their keyboard incorporates many features found in today's laptops (i.e, backlighting, adjustable angles).

Weight: Predictably, the Apple Magic Keyboard and extra protection make Touchtype one of the heavier options when the keyboard is inside. Here’s a comparison using the 12.9 iPad Pro as an example:

Apple Smart Keyboard Folio 12.9: 0.9 lb
+ iPad Pro 12.9”: 1.4 lb
+ Apple Pencil: .05 lb
Total: 2.35 lb

Brydge 12.9”: 1.51 lb
+ iPad Pro 12.9”: 1.4 lb
+ Apple Pencil: .05 lb
Total: 2.96 lb

Touchtype Folio 12.9”: 1.2 lb
+ iPad Pro 12.9”: 1.4 lb
+ Apple Pencil: .05 lb
Touchtype Keyboard Case: .25 lb
+ Apple Magic Keyboard: 0.51 lb
Total: Folio/iPad/Pencil (2.65 lb) + Keyboard/Case (0.76 lb) = 3.41 lb

Without the keyboard, folio portion is lighter (2.65 lb) than the Brydge, but the extra material needed for protection and keyboard connectivity keep whole package three-tenths of a pound heavier than the Smart Keyboard Folio. So if weight is the primary concern — and you can only afford one iPad case — then I’d recommend you go for the Smart Keyboard Folio.
 

Touchtype Pro is the best keyboard for you if…

You’re already using, or would like to explore using, the Apple Magic Keyboard with your iPad.

You already know the Apple Magic Keyboard’s constraints with regards to Bluetooth, backlighting and weight but prefer what it gives you in return — a familiar, full-size, tactile, typing experience.

If this sounds like you, then you’ll love Touchtype Pro.

 

It’s important to me that you find the best keyboard solution for you — even if it’s not Touchtype — for two reasons.

One, it means that those who do choose Touchtype will be more satisfied since they will have made an informed decision beforehand, after knowing all the pros and cons.

Two, it means that iPad users will be more satisfied with their keyboard choice overall. This, in turn, will put pressure on companies (including Apple) to continue to push the platform forward.

 

 

The Journey So Far...

Believe it or not, I’ve been working on this since the day the iPad launched — nine years ago.

Once everyone discovered that the original iPad was Bluetooth compatible, I made a paper prototype that same week. 

Very first paper prototype

I knew plastic molds were expensive, so I wanted to see if I could make it out of soft materials. Here is one of the early prototypes I got made during a trip to Vietnam.

Early leather-based prototype

I wasn’t satisfied with the fit and finish so I decided to make a simpler version and launched it on Kickstarter in 2012.

Screenshot from the successful 2012 Kickstarter Campaign.

My hope was that this would provide the financial runway for me to created the plastic-based case that I really wanted.

Drawings from the initial patent application

But it wasn’t to be.

The manufacturers I was working with had some consistent quality issues  and Apple then released the iPad Air, which weren’t compatible with whatever inventory I had.

Inventory in my garage for the first campaign

It was at this point that I decided to shelve Touchtype.

Fast Forward to Q4 2015. Apple releases the Magic Keyboard, iPad Pro and Apple Pencil. I, and my bank account, had recovered so I felt compelled to give it another shot.

I updated the designs and started looking for manufacturers.

Pitch deck to manufacturers

It was not until 2018 that I finally found a competent and trustworthy manufacturer. They truly understood the vision and went above and beyond to help me get to this point.

Specifications for internal magnet configurations in the folio's cover.

This launch is a significant milestone on a longer journey. With my newfound connections and confidence, I now have more ideas for new iPad and mobile accessories.

And I’m excited to see what’s next.

story:
Introducing HAVOC - the best AND only rugged battery case for your iPhone 6.

This rugged case has a built in battery with 110% more power, is shock resistant, water resistant AND it's completely dust proof. We believe that everyday life is an adventure; With more than double the power, the HAVOC keeps you prepared for the unexpected.


Where are we now?

The HAVOC design is finalized and our prototype is complete! Making the best rugged battery case is not a cheap endeavor so we need your support to help us make this a reality.  Pre-order your HAVOC iPhone 6 Power Case and help us bring this case to market. Thanks for your support!


2X MORE POWER:

Power up with our best battery case yet. With 3200mAh of built in power, recharge your phone from 0-100% and save a little something extra for later - Double your battery life, double your adventure.


Water Resistant:

The case can withstand the effects of inclement weather or inadvertent coffee mishaps. Rated at IP65, the HAVOC can withstand more than you average rain storm. Keep your iPhone 6 dry when your garden hose goes haywire or

your friend celebrates that touchdown a little too aggressively (Cheers! Power Responsibly). 


Shock Resistant:
The HAVOC comes with a second layer of protection, covering all corners and key points of impact, keeping you protected from drops. Whether you have little humans, sticky fingers or decided to give rock climbing a try, we've got you covered in all moments of unexpected shock.

Dirt & Dust:

This power case is completely sealed from dirt and dust, so don't be afraid to get a little dirty. 


Made for You:

 All current Lenmar power cases have MFi (Made For iPhone) certification. The HAVOC will be no different. This allows us to design and produce a power case with your phone in mind. The HAVOC and iPhone 6 will be undeniably compatible, like peanut butter and jelly. 

*The HAVOC will not be shipped until MFi testing and certification is complete.* 


 

LED Indicators:

With a 4 LED system, keeping track of your HAVOC's remaining battery life is easy. Simply depress that stylized power button and relax.

Easy Charging:

The case is designed to first charge your phone and to recharge the built-in battery second - allowing you to keep your phone protected at all times. The HAVOC recharges using the included Micro USB cable.

The HAVOC also ships with a headphone extension cable. 

Choices, Choices:

The first two available colors will be Grunge Metal & Obsidian. Grunge Metal has the swagger of a metallic finish with textured black accents. Obsidian is black on black, bold enough to speak for itself. 

When the campaign ends we will email you to confirm your color choice. 




US Shipping is Included. For shipping to Canada, please add an additional $30. For all other international shipping, please add $40. (Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries)




Order the MAVEN or the HAVOC as a gift for someone special? Send us an email and we will hook you up with a personalized printable e-card (for any occasion). 

_____________________________________________________________________________

Our MAVEN iPhone 6 power case brings you 110% more power in a sleek and slim package. The MAVEN is the newest version of our award winning iPhone 5/5s battery case, the MERIDIAN. The MERIDIAN was named TOP CHOICE by the Wall Street Journal and has won every head to head competition to date.


IndieGoGo is the ONLY place you can pre-order at an exceptional introductory price.

Once the campaign ends we will email you to confirm your color selection.



UPDATE: Our first color samples for the MAVEN have arrived!

_____________________________________________________________________________

What is the difference between the HAVOC and the MAVEN?

The HAVOC offers double the battery life for the iPhone 6 with 3200mAh of battery in a case that is dust proof, water resistant and shock resistant.

The MAVEN is a classic battery case with double the battery life for the iPhone 6. This case provides 3000mAh of battery in a sleek and sexy design with optimized speaker channels for better sound.



_____________________________________________________________________________

 

Current Status: Our first prototype is here, and it looks GOOD!

Rain Test:




A Little About Us:

We are a small family owned enterprise with nearly 50 years of experience under our utility belt. Our first power case was launched in 2011 with the iPhone 3GS, and we have continued to push the boundaries ever since. Our iPhone 5/5s Power case, The MERIDIAN, was ranked TOP CHOICE by The Wall Street Journal this year and has won best honors in every head to head competition to date.

Risks and Challenges:

Yes. There are risks in new product development. We don't expect anything to come up. In the event that something does interfere, we will overcome these challenges with complete transparency to all of our contributors.

Let's Make Some Noise

Want to help in other ways? Connect with us and help spread the word  #UNDEADPOWER #LENMARHAVOC


1. Contributions & Payment

Will you keep me updated with the progress if I contribute?

Yes! When you contribute to the HAVOC Rugged Power Case Campaign (at any dollar amount), we will ensure that you receive all of the latest information about the project as it progresses.

Are shipping costs included in the Perk price?

For addresses within the USA, shipping price is included. For address in Canada, please add $30 USD to your contribution. For any other international orders, please add $40 USD to your contribution once you have selected your perk. 

Does the Perk price include VAT or other taxes?

No. Contributors must pay any applicable taxes and duties for the designated country of delivery. Once we get close to the delivery date, we will email you to confirm your shipping address and will provide further instructions on handling VAT or other applicable fees.

Help! What do I do if I forgot to include international shipping?

No problem. Click the contribute now button at the top of the page and manually enter $40. This will be added to your pledge amount. make sure to include the same shipping address that was on your original contribution. 

Aside from pricing, is there a difference in the product offered in the Pioneer Special vs. Procrastinator Special?

No. Both of these Perks are for the HAVOC battery case. The Pioneer special is the early bird discount.

I had problems making a contribution, please help?

If you had trouble making a contribution, please check Indiegogo's common contribution errors.

I made a contribution, but now I've changed my mind. Can I have my money back?

Indiegogo orders are concept pledges, not purchase transactions and therefore are non-refundable. If you require customer support, please email: marketing@lenmar.com

I asked for my Perk to be sent to the wrong address! What do I do?

We will be contacting all backers before shipping out the Perks to confirm your shipping address. When we do, please respond with the correct address. 


2. Availability & Delivery:

When will you ship the MAVEN?

We aim to ship the first MAVEN pre-orders in March 2015. The MAVEN will ship as soon as MFi certification is complete. 

When will you ship the HAVOC?

We aim to ship the first HAVOC orders in March 2015. The HAVOC will ship as soon as MFi certification is complete. 

When will I get to choose the color of my HAVOC/MAVEN iPhone 6 case?

Following the end of the campaign, all contributors will be contacted to confirm color choices. 

If I take part in the Indiegogo campaign, will I get my iPhone 6 Battery Case before others?

Yes. We will fulfill these pre-orders for both the MAVEN and the HAVOC first. These will be shipped in the order of contributions made through Indiegogo.

Will the HAVOC and the MAVEN be available for general sale after the campaign ends?

Yes. Both the HAVOC and the MAVEN will be available for purchase on lenmar.com and with our retail partners. These will be sold at the advertised retail price. By ordering on Indiegogo, you can purchase at the lowest price and can guarantee the earliest delivery. 

After contributing to the campaign, what happens next? Do you just deliver my iPhone 6 battery case?

We will post frequent updates on the status of both the MAVEN and the HAVOC. Once we get close to our delivery date we will email you to confirm your shipping address and to find out what color case you would like to receive. In the meantime, you can connect with us on social media for some other behind the scenes looks at Lenmar Undead Power.


3. Product Related

What is the difference between the HAVOC and the MAVEN?

The HAVOC offers double the battery life for the iPhone 6 with 3200mAh of battery in a case that is dust proof, water resistant and shock resistant.

The MAVEN in a classic battery case with double the battery life for the iPhone 6. This case provides 3000mAh of battery is a sleek and sexy design.

Are the HAVOC and MAVEN MFi certified (Made for iPhone - Apple stamp of approval)?

The HAVOC and MAVEN will not be released until they have MFi certification. 

What is the warranty for the HAVOC and the MAVEN?

Both the HAVOC and the MAVEN come with a 1 year limited warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.

Are these cases compatible with an iPhone 6 from ALL carriers (i.e AT&T, Sprint, T Mobile, Verizon etc)?

Yes. The HAVOC and the MAVEN are compatible with an iPhone 6 from any cellular carrier.

My question wasn't answered in this campaign page. Help?!

If you have additional questions, please email us at marketing@lenmar.com or visit our website
story_txt:
Introducing HAVOC - the best AND only rugged battery case for your iPhone
6.
This rugged case has a built in battery with 110% more power, is shock resistant, water resistant AND it's completely dust proof. We believe that everyday life is an adventure; With more than double the power, the HAVOC keeps you prepared for the unexpected.








Where are we now?

The HAVOC design is finalized and our prototype is complete! Making the best rugged battery case is not a cheap endeavor so we need your support to help us make this a reality.  Pre-order your HAVOC iPhone 6 Power Case and help us bring this case to market. Thanks for your support!











2X MORE POWER:
Power up with our best battery case yet. With 3200mAh of built in power, recharge your phone from 0-100% and save a little something extra for later - Double your battery life, double your adventure.










Water Resistant:


The case can withstand the effects of inclement weather or inadvertent coffee mishaps. Rated at IP65, the HAVOC can withstand more than you average rain storm. Keep your iPhone 6 dry when your garden hose goes haywire or 
your
friend celebrates that touchdown a little too aggressively (Cheers!
Power Responsibly). 















Shock
Resistant:

The HAVOC comes with a second layer of protection, covering all corners and key points of impact, keeping you protected from drops. Whether you have little humans, sticky fingers or decided to give rock climbing a try, we've got you covered in all moments of unexpected shock.









Dirt
& Dust:
This power case is completely sealed from dirt and dust, so don't be afraid to get a little dirty. 



Made for You:
 All current Lenmar power cases have MFi (Made For iPhone) certification. The HAVOC will be no different. This allows us to design and produce a power case with your phone in mind. The HAVOC and iPhone 6 will be undeniably compatible, like peanut butter and jelly. 
*The HAVOC will not be shipped until MFi testing and certification is complete.* 






 



LED
Indicators:
With a 4 LED system, keeping track of your HAVOC's remaining battery life is easy. Simply depress that stylized power button and relax.

Easy Charging:

The
case is designed to first charge your phone and to recharge the built-in
battery second - allowing you to keep your phone protected at all times. The
HAVOC recharges using the included Micro USB cable.

The HAVOC also ships with a headphone extension cable. 







Choices, Choices:
The first two available colors will be Grunge Metal & Obsidian. Grunge Metal has the swagger of a metallic finish with textured black accents. Obsidian is black on black, bold enough to speak for itself. 
When the campaign ends we will email you to confirm your color choice. 






















US Shipping is Included. For shipping to Canada, please add an additional $30. For all other international shipping, please add $40. (Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries)

story:
Thank you so much for all the support! This campaign is closed and we're now accepting pre-orders on our website.

 

 

 

It’s hard to capture smooth video with your smartphone, we’ve all been there. You think you captured the perfect moment, but it ends up as a crappy memory.

We're FlowMotion and as adventurers, travelers and techies, we believe that great moments should be captured in the best possible way. 

That’s why we made FlowMotion™ ONE - the world’s most versatile smartphone stabilizer.

 

 

  

Absolutely not! Our mission is to put an end to shaky videos and make professional videography available for everyone. FlowMotion™ ONE is developed by engineers, designers, and professional videographers, made for everyone to capture everyday moments.

 

 

FlowMotion™ ONE eliminates camera shake so you can capture every moment in perfect quality. 

 

FlowMotion™ ONE only weighs 300g and fits in your pocket. Simply detach the grip and fold the stabilizer.

 

Mount ONE to any camera mount, GoPro mount or to the optional carbon extension pole. The grip and joystick enable you to control the stabilizer, even while using the extension pole.

 

Share vibration-free and professional looking videos on Snapchat and Instagram.

 

 

Advanced auto follow technology built into the FlowMotion™ app allows you to always have YOU, or someone you care about in focus. Simply mark the person on the screen, and ONE will follow and keep them in the frame, no matter how they move.

 

 

Live stream your moments in smooth cinematic quality directly to Facebook or YouTube, whether you are skiing, traveling or going to your favourite concert.

 

 

ONE is ready whenever you are. No calibration needed. Just press on and you're good to go.

 

In pan mode, you smartphone is fixed in the vertical direction, but pans smoothly when you move from side to side. Pan mode is perfect for most situations, whether ONE is mounted on your bike or on a FlowMotion™ pole or handle.

In lock mode your phone is fixed relative to all axis and stands perfectly still, no matter how you move.

In pan + tilt mode your smartphone will move smoothly in all directions, while at the same time, compensating for vibration and sudden movement.

Unlock the full potential of your ONE with the FlowMotion™ app. Access features such as motion time-lapse, panorama, and professional video shooting modes – or create your own custom presets. Use the app to view and organize all your media, and keep the product firmware up to date. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Exact shipping rates will vary depending on destination, but will not exceed 50 USD per reward. FlowMotion™ rewards will be shipped according to Kickstarter pledge order. If you want your FlowMotion™ ONE soon, you should move fast!

 

 

Since we started prototyping in April 2015, we have iterated, redesigned and tested, over and over again, in order to make something we can be truly proud of. Using 3D printers, we have built a new prototype almost every week. Building the world’s most versatile smartphone stabilizer requires every single part of the product to be perfect.

 

Most stabilizers use hobbyist electronics, which are often overpriced and underpowered for a consumer-grade product.

FlowMotion™ ONE’s high-quality electronics are durable, energy efficient and designed with surface-mount components in mind. All parts are carefully chosen to be optimized for mass production.

 

 

Our state-of-the-art control system and algorithms is the core of ONE and keeps your smartphone perfectly stable even when you’re not. By using sensors and our advanced 3D stabilization software, three high precision electric motors rotates your smartphone (at 1000 Hz) to compensate for vibration and shaking.

Design DOES matter. Or at least, we think so. Collaborating with award-winning EGGS design, we created FlowMotion™ ONE to be functional, ergonomic, versatile and also to be rapidly and inexpensively manufactured.

 

 

 

 

We teamed up with our manufacturing partner, Protolab, almost a year ago. With over 30 years of experience they know how to get consumer electronics products to market. In addition to working closely with them on design for manufacturability (DFM), packaging and assembly, they are accommodating critical support on-the-ground in China and have sourced outstanding suppliers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

With FlowMotion™ ONE, anyone can produce professional-looking videos and share them with the world. Our team also has a lot of ideas for great products in the future that we want to build. But, we can’t do it alone. Right now, YOU can choose which projects and technologies become a reality.

Help us bring the most versatile smartphone stabilizer to the masses by backing us now.

        

 

 

Yes! We’ve made a FAQ section below. We’ll be adding new FAQs as we go along, and we’ll be keeping you up to date with Kickstarter Updates, messages, and via the Comment wall. And please, feel free to reach out to us!

In addition to working closely with them on design for manufacturability (DFM), packaging and assembly, they are accommodating critical support on-the-ground in China and have sourced outstanding suppliers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

With FlowMotion™ ONE, anyone can produce professional-looking videos and share them with the world. Our team also has a lot of ideas for great products in the future that we want to build. But, we can’t do it alone. Right now, YOU can choose which projects and technologies become a reality.
Help us bring the most versatile smartphone stabilizer to the masses by backing us now.
        

 

 


Yes! We’ve made a FAQ section below. We’ll be adding new FAQs as we go along, and we’ll be keeping you up to date with Kickstarter Updates, messages, and via the Comment wall. And please, feel free to reach out to us!

story:
Our designs have been tested and proven. We have been working on perfecting the KOALA to keep your phone safe on any adventure.

 

Hi. This is Haj the founder of HANGTIME, as an avid and lifelong skier, climber, hiker, and traveler, I’ve managed to spend a lot of time playing and adventuring in the wild places of the world. I’ve been lucky that way! In fact, the KOALA was invented on a ski lift. The idea of dropping my phone was scary in several ways.

First of all, a smartphone may be the single most expensive piece of gear I take into the mountains. Secondly, they are often a lifeline to safety. And finally, they are packed full of exotic and often toxic materials that can do damage to fragile wilderness ecosystems. These concerns combined with my 35+ years of outdoor experience became the inspiration for the KOALA design as well as the foundational values for HANGTIME. Over my life, a passion for playing in wild places has grown into a passion for keeping those same places beautiful and healthy.

So, when it came time to put pen to paper and share what HANGTIME is all about, here’s what I wrote:

  • BUILD LIFETIME GEAR ~ Durable products that people love don’t end up in landfills. We back-up that commitment with our 100% Lifetime Guarantee.
  • REDUCE E-WASTE IN THE WILD ~ Humans generate about 50 million tons of e-waste per year. The KOALA reduces the number of smartphones lost in the wilderness, where the environmental impact is greatest.
  • PLAY OUTSIDE ~ When people play outside they feel better and they come to love those places and do what they can to care for and protect them. 

In short: HANGTIME makes non-SH*TTY gear, designed to last a lifetime of playing in wild places we all love while leaving them free of waste so that our kids (and their kids, and theirs, etc) can explore the same wild places we do today!

Thanks again for taking a moment to check us out and read my story. See ya in the wilds!

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship to select countries. VAT and GST not included. Please see the reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

We plan to ship starting in Nov. 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this! The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

 

We can't do this without you!

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for entrepreneurs & enterprises.

story:
Apple MFi Certified Portable Dual Connector Charging Keychain Cable

Charges both your iPhone and Android mobile with the Select switch!





What is DuoKeyCharge?

DuoKeyCharge is a keychain sized cable for charging lightning and micro-USB devices. Instantly, switch between the devices for data syncing and charging by using the Select switch on the cable itself. 

Designed to fit onto your keychain. It is small, compact and easy-to-carry. You will never be without a cable to charge your devices.

It is manufactured from the highest quality TPE material to make it pliable and strong. Every section of the cable is carefully designed to deliver greater durability. The Uni-body design prevents any lose parts and enhances the lifetime of the product by making a single solid product.




DuoKeyCharge Cable details:





Dual End Connectors that are perfectly spaced so that you can connect both iPhone and Android mobile devices.


Switch between devices to connect without the hassle of removing it physically from the connectors.


Tangle free and elegant so no more messy wires on your desk.


Connect to your existing wall charger to charge your device. Easily switch between the devices with the Select Switch that needs to be charged.


DuoKeyCharge is highly portable, so your phone stays fully charged when you have your keychain while travelling.   


Charge your device with an external battery pack when 

you need a little extra power on a busy day.

 


You can charge your iPhone 2X FASTER if you connect the DuoKeyCharge cable to iPod Wall Charger which is rated at 2.1A/5 Volt. The DuoKeyCharge is rated for 2.4A/5V maximum.


It can bend easily. As a result, you can use any USB 

port to charge your device… even the ones that 

are hard to reach!



DuoKeyCharge is designed to carry high current capacity and its rated for 2.4A/5V, so it can charge your iPad or Android tablets.  



DuoKeyCharge 3D Models:


DuoKeyCharge Prototype:




Where do the funds go?



FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING!!! 

We need your help:
We able to work with our top quality manufacturer partner to complete the tooling and manufacturer has lined up to start our first batch of mass production.  
Pledge your DuoKeyCharge and help us the spread the words to friends, family and colleagues. With your support, we will bring DuoKeyCharge to your hands. 


Stretch Goals:


You can select your choices of DuoKeycharge, MicroCKeyCharge or DuoMicroKeyCharge at the end of the campaign. 
We will be sending you an survey at the end of the campaign to know your choice of AISCO Keycharge.  
USB Type C Cable specification: USB 2.0 Type-C Male
USB Type C Partial List of Compatible Devices: 
Google Nexus 5X and 6P
OnePlus Two
Lenovo Zuk Z1, LeTV
Nokia N1
Lumia 950, Lumia 950XL
2015 Google Chromebook Pixel 
2015 MacBook with 12" Retina Display 
Other Type C devices

Referral Program:

Please be sure to share your unique link with friends and family. 

1. Login & Go to DuoKeyCharge campaign 

2. Copy your unique Link on the left side of the campaign video

3. Share the Link 


AISCO Trio Stand/Charging Dock for Apple iWatch: 


For more pictures of AISCO Trio Stand, Click here or visit www.aiscotech.com


Contact Us:

Reach us at support@aiscotech.com for questions.


Risks & Challenges:

During the past several months we have established a strong relationship with our manufacturing partner in Shenzhen, China who has been manufacturing several Apple MFi certified cables and other high quality iPhone and Android accessories.  Manufacturing risk is at a minimum because our manufacturer is an authorized Apple MFi certified company and has multiple manufacturing facilities for high volume productions.

We have already completed fine tuning of the tooling for both keychain main body and the switch parts. Now, we have produced fully functional DuoKeyCharge keychain cables and are already setup to start mass production.

To avoid any delays, we have already initiated the mass production of DuoKeyCharge. You will receive the DuoKeyCharge as soon as we receive the shipment in mid of January 2016. We are hard at work to deliver your perks on schedule. 


FAQs:

How light is the DuoKeyCharge?

10 grams (0.35 oz)

Does the DuoKeyCharge work with a protective case? 

Yes, the DuoKeyCharge cable is designed to accommodate all cases.

Does the DuoKeyCharge come in any other colors? 

Currently, the DuoKeyCharge is only offered in black color. 

Does the DuoKeyCharge work with iPad or tablets? 

Yes, the DuoKeyCharge is rated for 2.4A/5V and will charge Apple iPad, Samsung tablets and other Android tablets.

Is the DuoKeyCharge Apple MFi certified? 

Yes. The DuoKeyCharge is Apple MFi certified to ensure highest quality, safety and will continue to work with future iOS updates. 

What other certifications does the DuoKeyCharge have? 

The DuoKeyCharge is both CE and RoHS Certified.

Will the DuoKeyCharge work with the new iPhone 6S/6S Plus? 

Yes. The DuoKeyCharge is licensed and certified by Apple's MFi program to be used with Apple's Lightning devices. The DuoKeyCharge works with every Apple iPhone, iPad & iPod with a Lightning connector. This includes the iPhone 6S Plus, 6S, 6 Plus, 6, 5, 5C & 5S, iPad 4, iPad Mini, iPod Touch, iPod Nano and all new iOS devices.

When will my DuoKeyCharge ship/arrive? 

Yes. The first batch of mass production is underway and we will start shipping the DuoKeyCharge during the 4th week of January or sooner. 

Will the international shipping take more time than the domestic US shipping to deliver my perks?

International shipping always takes extra time than domestic. Delivery time of the international shipping vary by country and by the local customs procedure. Tracking number will be available for international shipment but updates may not be available due to the local post office. The fastest delivery time for the international shipment to arrive will be approximately 10-15 days. Sometimes, it may take anywhere from 3 to 5 weeks in the case of any issues with the address or customs.

Where will the campaign funds go?

Funds will be used for mass production, campaign fee and shipping.  We already finished tooling and successfully manufactured the fully functional DuoKeyCharge.  

How to refer this campaign to my friends?

Please see the Referral program section above. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with your friends and family using the sharing tools on the left side of the campaign page. Share as many times as you can!

Visit www.aiscotech.com for latest product updates.

story:
Please move to our new campaign to get your NIFTYX
https://igg.me/at/GETNIFTYX

 




NIFTYX LifeSaving Bracelet aka NLB offer you the most handy solution for the device charging. You no longer have to worry about leaving your charging cable behind & run out of juice when you are in emergency.

NIFTYX bracelets are able to charge your devices up to 2.4A to provide the fastest charging solution. And it also allows you to sync your devices as well so you can just carry our bracelets for most of the uses.


?


?

Our NIFTYX bracelets(NAB & NLB) provide 3 colour options for the leather.

Twilight Black, Chestnut Tan, Burgundy Red

NIFTYX LifeSaving Bracelet(NLB)
All-Black Collection(Black-Black) & Original Collection(Black-White)

NIFTYX Awesome Bracelet
Premium Stainless Steel Buckle(Removable)(Add-on item)


We have very skillful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpectedly happened, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards.

?

When do you start shipping?
It is scheduled on April 2017.

What colours can I choose from?
We offer Burgundy Red, Chestnut Tan, Twilight Black.

When can I select the size / colour?
You will receive a survey after the end of campaign to choose your options of the order.

What kind of phone does it support?
Currently it supports Lightning and Micro USB devices, and Type C will be our stretch goal.

What is the capacity for NIFTYX LifeSaving Bracelet(NLB)?
It is 210mah which is more than enough for an emergency use.
We are looking for a bigger capacity without compromising its size.

What is the Max Current allowed?
It supports up to 2.4A

Do they support sync and charge?
Yes, absolutely.

Do you offer warranty on your products?
Yes, all products will be offering 1 year warranty.

Are they really hand braided?
Yes, they are all hand-braided from our team to provide you the finest quality.


General Enquiry: enquiry@getniftyx.today

Press and Sample Review: pr@getniftyx.today

story:
WearSmith - Alcohol Breath Tester is designed to be your personal accessory in modern life. It's the easiest way to know your breath alcohol concentration in a short time. The Smartphone Application will analyze how long it will take you to recover and counts down until you’re sober enough to drive . It will notify you by linking to the tester via Bluetooth smart technology. You can also use it standalone, and it will show the result on the OLED display.

We won the COMPUTEX d&i awards, organized by the Taiwan External Trade Development Council (TAITRA) and executed by the International Forum Design (iF).

 

 

 

WearSmith is designed to be your personal accessory. It’s as light as an eraser – only 19g (0.7 oz) – you can easily slip it in your pocket, jacket, or bag. The classic mistake we make when we drink is thinking we’re OK to drive in the moment. Why not take WearSmith with you and objectively find out if it’s safe for you or your friend to get behind the wheel?

Easy, convenient, and safe. Sounds reasonable.

WearSmith is available in four colors to match your personality or clothing style:

  • Navy blue
  • White
  • Rose gold
  • Red

How does it work?

Our team made WearSmith as user-friendly as possible and we are striving to improve it. Our goal was making WearSmith convenient for anyone’s day-to-day life. You can easily wear it as a necklace or clip it on your keychain.

 

Its diamond shape mirrors that of an ice cube. Worried about drinking past your limit? Just squeeze it, blow, and get a measurement in a few seconds. No costly mouthpieces, no waste, and no complicated settings.  Just blow and wait for the results!

Blow steadily and continuously for 5 seconds

 

Your BAC measurement is read directly on the OLED display or on your smartphone by a secure Bluetooth connection.

We also developed a companion app with extra features and options. It analyzes how long it will take you to recover and counts down until you’re sober enough to drive. It also advises you when your BAC is too high to call a friend, cab, or anyone to come pick you up, just in case. It’s available on iOS and Android.

After setting up a personal profile and setting your emergency contacts, the app will notify you as you take measurements with adorable manga-style characters reflecting your drinking status.

 

RESULTS

Meet the seven manga-style characters that will reflect your drinking status.

 

 

WHY use it ?

WearSmith is easy to use and take anywhere. Its compact footprint is unobtrusive and hassle-free. To boot, it’s more affordable and effective than competitors.

 

Who should use it?

If having a breathalyzer were as easy as having a tiny gadget on your keychain, wouldn’t you use it? Why not?

You like to drink responsibly; you care about your friends, family members, and co-workers and want to ensure they travel safely. Are you often out at the club or bar? Get yourself a WearSmith and stay on top of how much you’ve actually had to drink, not how much you think you’ve had.

Give it to your party-animal roommate you’re concerned about. Slip it into your college-bound child’s car.

Breathalyzers don’t need to just be for police; they can be a tool for everyone to prevent tragic accidents. There are millions of alcohol-impaired driving episodes each year, many resulting in fatal accidents. If having a breathalyzer was as common as having a smartphone, we believe there would be far fewer. WearSmith is the best choice for a person to drink safe and responsibly.

     

    OUR STORY

    The idea came to me last summer when a friend of mine had too much to drink at my BBQ party and insisted on driving home. I feared for his safety, but he wouldn't accept that he was too drunk to drive and I couldn't convince him or stop him.
    I think we can all agree that driving is not such a good idea after drinking. The problem I’ve noticed, however, is that it can be hard to convince someone that they’re not able to drive. With WearSmith you can objectively prove to the person that they’ve had too much; there is no need to fret about persuading them.  That is why we created this small, accurate gadget to help you making the right decision and prevent accidents.

    Our team also realized that breathalyzers are largely too big, expensive, and slow to be practically carried around by most people: WearSmith was born. We started development and tested multiple prototypes – now it’s the lightest, smartest, most affordable breathalyzer available.

     

    IN THE PRESS
     

     

      

     

    CHALLENGE

    With a year of development and testing under our belt, we have started production planning and verification.

    This Indiegogo campaign will fund our first round of mass production. The biggest challenge in developing this product was handling the dynamic sensor readings from the electrochemical sensor in such a tiny device. Measuring one’s BAC is tricky – no two people metabolize alcohol at the same rate. Breathalyzers can vary themselves, with the same person can get different measurements from two different devices. To make things even more complicated, countries have different standards of illegal intoxication using different units of measurements – please ensure you follow your country’s laws. Fortunately we overcame the struggle; we are confident WearSmith provides measurements accurate enough to personally manage drinking habits. The next challenge is consistency: tuning mass production to maintain high quality. Consequently, we will ship products according to the success of our first batch and ship in the order of the earliest pledges. Shipping will take 2-16 working days depending on destination.

    FAQ

    • How long does the battery last?

    The battery lasts for up to 1000 tests and can be idle for up to 3 months.

    • When do you start shipping?

    Shipping is scheduled for early September.

    • Where do you ship? Only in the USA?

    Shipping is WORLDWIDE.

    • There are only 4 colors?

    For now yes. But more might be available in the coming months. Give us your feedback.

    • What technology is used to measure the BAC?

    The WearSmith uses an electrochemical fuel sensor. It is the same technology used on professional breathalyzers and is accurate for personal reference.

    Use the WearSmith Alcohol Breath Tester for information purpose only, and don't drink and drive nor drink and work. The results from this alcohol tester are for reference only, and the manufacturer does not take any legal responsibility.
