story:
(Free 2 Hour Parking Coupon Codes and Free Friend Referral Hours are at Bottom of Page and Cheap Donation Perk Hours to the Right)

What is Park On The Fly?

Created by concerned UF students in 2010, Park on the Fly is a massively scalable parking management system designed to make buying, selling, and finding parking simple and cheap.  We’ve brokered over 14,000 transactions at rock bottom prices, such as $0.50/hour, $3.75/ 24 hour day, and $10/week for our fellow UF students and residents of the city at large.  The system allows consumers to purchase parking before leaving home, removing the hassle of searching for an open lot.  Our clients are property owners looking to monetize unused or not fully utilized parking or land near high traffic areas, such as campus or downtown.  Our clients are also individuals that want to sell their home parking spaces for special events such as football games and day to day parking.  We are currently active at 13 locations, even 1 parking garage, and are working hard to add locations daily, even in new cities!

How Does It Work?

Simply go to our website and tell us where you're going and when you're going there.  We'll show you the lots we manage and let you buy your spot hours, days, or even weeks in advance.  The day of your reservation just drive to the lot and park.  No printouts necessary!  We're also currently developing our mobile app which will allow you to find and buy parking in under 30 seconds, which reduces the current transaction time experienced on mobile devices.  We expect to release the app in the near future.

Who's Running The Show?

We're all Gator Grads! We're current graduate students, a former consultant, and a nuclear engineer supported by an amazing programming team of local and distant talent that counts billion dollar companies among its clients.  We believe that there is absolutely no reason why anyone should spend twenty or thirty minutes looking for parking.

Contests Attended And Media

We've been invited to compete in several business competitions on behalf of UF.  You can see Sargent and Aashish presenting at the Wake Forest Elevator Pitch competition at the top of this page.  We qualified to present at Wake Forest after beating out applicants all over the country.

We were also one of 11 student run companies worldwide invited to present at the HKUST MBA International Business Plan in Hong Kong.  They flew us out there to represent The University of FL.  It was a great experience that has kept us moving on the right path.

Why Do We Need Your Support?

Over the past 3 years we've proven the business model and conducted a beta test.  We provide real value to people parking such as students, property owners, and feedback from our existing customers has been amazing.  The next step is to expand and make the systems even more feature rich for students and our users.  We plan to use funds raised from this campaign to increase our user base locally by growing beyond our 10-13 locations and to hire more staff, many of who will be students.  This sometimes takes some capital to go along with hard work.  The more locations we have, the more we can get rates reduced for students beyond the $0.50/hour, $3.75/day, $20/month, and $80/semester we already have achieved.  We've found that our biggest problem is publicity.  When people find us, they keep using our service.  In fact, the average user has completed over 23 transactions! 

Get FREE Referral Parking Hours by Spreading the Word!

Share this campaign on Facebook using the below steps.  Friends who see it can take action, earning you free hours, shown below in chart.  We'll keep track of it.

Steps For Sharing and Getting Your Referral Hours (Easy Free Parking)

For every person you refer to our Indiegogo page that donates, we'll give you 5 hours of FREE parking.  If you get 10 friends to donate, that’s 50 free hours of parking that costs you nothing! In order to get credit for your referrals please do the following easy steps:

1.  Via your Facebook wall or wall of your favorite groups, for example, share our Indiegogo campaign address in several places.  The address is igg.me/at/parkforfree or you can click the share button at the top of the page.  The more places you share to, the more free parking referral hours will accrue to you!  Never pay for parking again.

2.  In order for us to total your referral hours, put the following via a copy paste job if you like, in a comment under your main share from number 1 above.  This will allow us to easily total your referral hours by the end of the campaign.

 “Please take a moment and let Parkonthefly.com know that I referred you by putting my email address, (enter your email here), on their company wall which is at the following address, https://www.facebook.com/pages/Parkontheflycom/5908678373.  You will enjoy their cheap parking system for class, downtown, and other locations this year.  They have the lowest prices in town hands down for short and long term parking.  I get 5 free hours of parking for each person that donates to this community funded campaign.  You can too by telling your friends about this awesome new system designed by students for students!  Share the above with your info instead of mine and let the good parking karma roll!”

3.  Also, you don't have to donate to earn the referral hours.  Each of your referrals that donate will earn you 5 hours of parking that will be distributed 1-4 times a month or at the end of the campaign.  Even if we don't have lots in your city yet, feel free to share the campaign and simply use your referral hours once spaces open in your city


Free 2 Hour Coupon Codes For One Time Use

(have to be used by May 18th but hours earned from donations do not expire)

Try out our service with 2 hours of FREE parking at our website.  Just use this coupon code when you do a transaction and feel free to donate or refer others for more free and cheap parking:

·  Code for people who saw our Alligator Newspaper Advertisement

  • Parkalligator2014

·  Code for people who got postcards in the mail

  • Parkcard2014

   Code for people who heard about us via Facebook advertising

  • Parkfacebook2014

·  Code for people who saw a post from a Facebook friend

  • Parkfriend2014

·  Code for people who heard of us by word of mouth from a friend or someone  else

  • Parkmouth2014

Code for people who heard of us in an email from their department

  • Parkdepartment2014

·  Code for everyone else who isn’t in an above category

  • Parkeveryone2014
Note: Copy paste or enter the codes above as the coupon code when making reservation online

Check out the system for yourself with the 2 free hours.  We think you'll like what we're doing and will want to support our efforts.  Please note that due to expected demand, we can't guarantee you a spot.  The code will be active for at least a year, so if all the spaces are full in a certain lot come back and try again and something will open up.

Additional Important Terms:

1.  You can still order parking perks and get free hours even after our fundraising goal is reached.

2.  You can donate more than once if you want access to more perk hours.

3.  Coupon codes for perk hours will be issued to the email address of donor on a regular basis during the campaign.

4.  Referral hours earned may be capped at somewhere between 300 -500 hours of free parking for each person who refers friends or they may be uncapped for the duration of the campaign, at the discretion of Parkonthefly.com

Selling Parking on the System

Last, but not least, if you know property owners that might want to sell parking please contact us directly via the website. We have a generous cash commission program in place for individuals and organizations that bring us new clients.

Thank you for your time, donations to system, referrals, and have a great day from our team!

places.  The address is igg.me/at/parkforfree or you can click the share button at the top of the page.  The more places you share to, the more free parking referral hours will accrue to you!  Never pay for parking again.2.  In order for us to total your referral hours, put the following via a copy paste job if you like, in a comment under your main share from number 1 above.  This will allow us to easily total your referral hours by the end of the campaign. “Please take a moment and let Parkonthefly.com know that I referred you by putting my email address, (enter your email here), on their company wall which is at the following address, https://www.facebook.com/pages/Parkontheflycom/5908678373.  You will enjoy their cheap parking system for class, downtown, and other locations this year.  They have the lowest prices in town hands down for short and long term parking.  I get 5 free hours of parking for each person that donates to this community funded campaign.  You can too by telling your friends about this awesome new system designed by students for students!  Share the above with your info instead of mine and let the good parking karma roll!”3.  Also, you don't have to donate to earn the referral hours.  Each of your referrals that donate will earn you 5 hours of parking that will be distributed 1-4 times a month or at the end of the campaign.  Even if we don't have lots in your city yet, feel free to share the campaign and simply use your referral hours once spaces open in your cityFree 2 Hour Coupon Codes For One Time Use (have to be used by May 18th but hours earned from donations do not expire)Try out our service with 2 hours of FREE parking at our website.  Just use this coupon code when you do a transaction and feel free to donate or refer others for more free and cheap parking:
· 
Code for people who saw our Alligator Newspaper Advertisement
Parkalligator2014· 
Code for people who got postcards in the mail
Parkcard2014   Code for people who heard about us
via Facebook advertising
Parkfacebook2014· 
Code for people who saw a post from a Facebook friend
Parkfriend2014· 
Code for people who heard of us by word of mouth from a friend or
someone  else
Parkmouth2014
Code for people who heard of us in an email from their department
Parkdepartment2014
· 
Code for everyone else who isn’t in an above category
Parkeveryone2014Note: Copy paste     or enter the codes above as the coupon code when making reservation onlineCheck out the system for yourself with the 2 free hours.  We think you'll like what we're doing and will want to support our efforts.  Please note that due to expected demand, we can't guarantee you a spot.  The code will be active for at least a year, so if all the spaces are full in a certain lot come back and try again and something will open up.Additional Important Terms:1.  You can still order parking perks and get free hours even after our fundraising goal is reached.2.  You can donate more than once if you want access to more perk hours.3.  Coupon codes for perk hours will be issued to the email address of donor on a regular basis during the campaign.4.  Referral hours earned may be capped at somewhere between 300 -500 hours of free parking for each person who refers friends or they may be uncapped for the duration of the campaign, at the discretion of Parkonthefly.comSelling Parking on the SystemLast, but not least, if you know property owners that might want to sell parking please contact us directly via the website. We have a generous cash commission program in place for individuals and organizations that bring us new clients.Thank you for your time, donations to system, referrals, and have a great day from our team!

story:
* Fastest campaign to begin delivery!

Check the updates and comments - the quickest campaign to begin fulfilment on Indiegogo!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

The braided cable with TensileTubing™

Did you know, phone cables are considered an electrical commodity? That's because they're not expected to last for more than a year. 

We've tested ours to withstand over 20,000 bends! 

It's not really their fault. We take them everywhere with us, pull them, wrap them round the plug and adapters, and each cable gets used several times a day.

The stress joints of the cables are not something that have ever been addressed. People make the cables stronger, and so have we with the high tensile synthetic braid, but we also looked into how we can reduce the stress at the connector joints, and how we can increase the tensile strength of the product.

 

 

DESIGN

 vb      

less stress on the joints, and the internal wiring with an additional flexible plastic mould over and through the cable connector

                   

The Finished Article

 

Well, it's taken us a long time, but we've done it. And then we tested them. First to 5,000 bends, then 10,000, and now 20,000!

And we're going to keep testing and see how far they really can go :)

So, what else is different about this campaign? Well, we've already produced 6,000 cables! So, instead of waiting for months, or risking any production issues, the minute the campaign ends, we begin shipping. We have shipping hubs in the USA and UK ready to go.

We're doing our best to keep things simple, stylish, and reliable.

Another happy early bird customer having fun wrapping his cable around the plug. Thanks for sharing!

 

Retail packaging - 1st set of cables have already been delivered to one of the biggest national retailers..... but we can't tell you who yet ;) 

 

 

and

already in stores

 

See our reviews:

    

    

 

So, what else are we up to?

NOW AVAILABLE ON INDIEGOGO

EchoVibes water-resistant wireless earphones:

click here for a set of EchoVibes AND any Echo cable and save $79!

story:
The Trigger

After starting my career in oilfield 12 years ago; I was always frustrated because of the inaccessibility to software and technical solutions, it's not designed for individuals regarding technical specs for computers or even price tags for these applications.

What You Need

So let's imagine:
  • Online application you can access and use on any machine
  • the core of the application is open-sourced and visible to you
  • you'll pay for the service associated to the application, not for the application itself
  • Upgrades and enhances are done in background, you don't need to reinstall the software. 
  • No frustrating licensing.
Now you can concentrate on your actual job, let it to be learning, researching, or providing consultancy. 

Risks & Challenges

Geopressure Web App is designed with all features to help geopressure consultants well-site geologists, drilling engineers, and reservoir engineers do their job, and with learning curve in mind for students and trainees to be as simple as possible so they can focus on the real work.

Ways You Can Help

Your donation, your participation, every dollar you're paying for this project is a step to a better solution that help you in your daily work as a geopressure consultant, a petroleum engineer, a drilling engineer, or a well-site geologist.

Geopressure Web App - the core - will be open source, if you can improve it, please do.

story:
SoundFest's Real Clarity

Better Hearing When and Where You Need It

Current Product Features and Benefits

Real Clarity is a game-changing mobile app, developed by SoundFest Inc., that delivers hearing assistance via smartphone. Unlike expensive hearing aids, SoundFest's Real Clarity app embeds state-of-the-art speech detection as well as noise reduction algorithms into smartphones, tablets and other multi-media consumer products to deliver convenient, effective hearing assistance at a fraction of the cost. SoundFest's revolutionary alternative to traditional hearing aids enables people to understand speech in loud or difficult listening situations. Real Clarity's affordable price also places better hearing within reach for millions of people. 

Real Clarity’s affordable Mobile App is:

  • Downloadable to an iPhone or iPod Touch. In 2013 Android devices will be supported.
  • Adjustable for your personal hearing profile
  • Configurable for many different listening situations
  • Accurate in detecting and enhancing speech
  • Effective at suppressing background noise
  • Compatible with most wired headsets
  • Integrated with other smartphone apps
  • Suggested Retail Price: $19.95

Currently compatible with most wired headsets, SoundFest's Real Clarity app will offer wireless convenience to its users in 2013. Once the company successfully raises the capital required, it will complete development and begin manufacture of its patent-pending wireless Bluetooth earpiece.

 

Wireless Hearing Assistance via Smartphones

SoundFest’s patent-pending wireless earpiece solves certain key technical challenges to allow, via Bluetooth radio link, wireless connectivity between a smartphone's embedded microphone and an in-ear speaker. 

SoundFest has filed a patent to protect its innovative, low-delay signal processing wireless solution. Real Clarity’s powerful system will include: 

  • Real Clarity app
  • Remote microphone capacity embedded into smartphone
  • Wireless earpieces for discreet, real-time hearing assistance
  • Listening enhancements for other apps, phone calls and music

For an example of how Real Clarity sounds for a person with difficulty hearing on a train, listen to this audio clip.

 

Powerful Benefits

According to the World Health Organization, 693 million people worldwide suffer hearing loss. In the United States alone, 48 million people experience hearing difficulty. Fewer than 75% of them, however, use hearing aids. 

Industry research has identified four primary reasons people don’t use existing hearing devices: High cost, that insurance often doesn’t cover. Lack of clarity in the amplified sound from current technologies. Cosmetic concerns and perceived social stigma to wearing a hearing aid. Fitting and adjustment processes that are inconvenient and time-consuming. Real Clarity's wireless earpiece will solve these problems and deliver powerful benefits: 

  • Cost – Hearing assistance for hundreds, not thousands of dollars
  • Clarity – High-quality speech enhancement and noise suppression
  • Capability – Configurable for a variety of listening environments
  • Convenience – Self-adjusting, saves settings and audio profiles 
  • Cosmetic – Discreet wireless Bluetooth-like earpieces 

 

Our Story

SoundFest is the brainchild of co-founders Mark Eisner and David Duehren, two experienced engineers who like to solve communication problems for a living. Mark began developing the company's flagship product three years ago, when he started losing some of his own hearing, and discovered he was spending hours at specialists' offices, and spending thousands of dollars on hearing aids of limited quality.

Why shouldn't hearing better be simpler, he thought, and no more complicated than getting a pair of glasses to correct your vision?

Mark recognized the untapped power of smartphones to help solve this global public health problem. Poor hearing not only compromises people's professsional and social well-being, it is associated with serious health risks, like depression and dementia, as you age. So Mark decided to develop Real Clarity to deliver low-cost hearing assistance via smartphone. Turns out the timing couldn't be better: the fastest growing segment of smartphone market happens to be aging baby-boomers. Many of them are beginning to experience the onset of age-related hearing loss. So Real Clarity is well-positioned to be the right product at the right time in the market.

Thanks to patent-pending technology developed by Mark and David, SoundFest will soon offer sleekly designed wireless earpieces with its Real Clarity App. These discreet Bluetooth-like earpieces will allow Real Clarity users wireless connectivity  and hearing assistance whenever and wherever they need it. Without delays. Without extra devices. Without staggering bills.

Unlike traditional hearing aids, which often cost 10 or 20 times more, Real Clarity's App and wireless earpiece will retail for less than $200.

 

Proven Leadership

Mark and David have been developing ground-breaking software and hardware products in the signal-processing space for decades.  

David Duehren, CEO and Co-Founder of SoundFest, was a Co-Founder, Director and CTO of Brooktrout Technology (BRKT), a NASDAQ-listed and Inc.500 company. He holds MSEE and BSEE degrees from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, as well as several telecommunications-related patents.

Mark Eisner, SoundFest CTO and Co-Founder, has nearly four decades of experience as a software entrepreneur and senior architect. He has authored multiple software innovations in the field of speech recognition. He earned his BSEE from MIT.

Paul Buta, VP Marketing & Sales, co-founded Optas and served as COO. An adjunct professor of healthcare marketing at Boston University, he holds an MBA from the University of Chicago, and MSEE and BSEE degrees from the University of Illinois.

story:
9to5Mac : "Clever Project puts USB port at the front of the iMac"
BelgiumiPhone: "Gives you easy access to the USB port of the iMac"
MikeShouts: "Sometimes the simplest idea could be a life changer"
MacMixing: "There are so many time that I could have used this"
TodaysHype: "Thumbs up for solving the iMac USB problem at low price"
UberGizmo: "iMacompanion making it easier for users to plug USB devices"
MacG: "Made out of the same aluminium as the iMac it blends in perfectly!"

Just like you some of your friends with iMacs will love the iMacompanion! Therefore we will give you a $5 refund at the end of the Indiegogo Campaign for every referral pledge you bring to the iMacompanion. It will only take you a couple of seconds!

Here is how our referral program works:

1. Add a pledge for an iMacompanion
2. Click on the link button below our video to get your personalized referral link
3. Share that link via the different social medias: Facebook, Twitter, Reddit...
4. Track via your Indiegogo profile how many times your linked has been used to add a pledge. If you are an early bird contributor and you have at least five referrals your iMacompanion will be FREE! 

At the end of our Indiegogo campaign, we will refund you based on how many times your referral link has been used to add pledges and you can of course use it to get more than one iMacompanion funded! 

TIP: Just sharing your link may not be effective enough. The most efficient way to get referrals would be to share one of our photos that you like, explain why you supported our campaign, and then add your referral link.  

Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions on our referral program!

Certain USB devices, such as a printer or a hard drive, may always stay connected to your iMac. They can therefore be plugged into the rear ports of the iMac and left there without a problem. However, when you want to add files from your USB thumb, transfer photos, or other day to day uses for a USB port - accessing them in the back can be a hassle! 

The iMacompanion solves that problem by giving you access to a front USB port while preserving the beautiful design of the iMac. 

The iMacompanion is a USB 3.0 extension made out of sandblasted and anodized aluminum to seamlessly integrate itself at the foot of the iMac. Thanks to the ultra-slim cable (0.01 inch/0.25 mm) that passes under the foot of the iMac, it will keep your desktop cable free.

To install, simply remove the protective layer of the PU (polyurethane) below the iMacompanion, stick it on the tip of the foot, and pass the cable under the iMac. The cable will be completely invisible from the front. 

Thanks to its unique design, the iMacompanion is fully compatible with all iMacs ranging from 2004 until Today! It also works with both the 21.5 inch and the 27 inch versions and it is very likely that it will be compatible with future iMacs. 

The iMacompanion is also compatible with Apple's Cinema Display screens and other brands of screens with hard to reach USB ports in the back. Please check measurements carefully before pledging.

The iMacompanion is a USB 3.0 extension made out of sandblasted and anodized aluminum just like Apple's own iMac. 

  • Length: 1.9 inch (46mm)
  • Front: width 1.3 inch (34mm)
  • Back: width 0.9 inch (22mm)
  • Height: (excluding the front edge) 0.7 inch (18mm) 
  • Height: of the front edge 0.25 inch (6mm)
  • Weight: 1oz (25gr)
  • Cable length: 23 inch (60cm)
  • Cable width: 0.03 inch (0.75mm)

Xbench Transfer Speed test on iMac with fusion drive and an SSD external drive*:

  • In the iMac's rear port: Write 130MB/s Read 140MB/s
  • Via the iMacompanion: Write 110MB/s Read 140MB/s

*Performance may vary from one drive to another.

The PU below the iMacompanion can be re-used several times should you need to change iMacs (though we recommend not to treat it as a mobile port).

The iMacompanion is an accessory every iMac owner should have. It's also a unique gift for people who love their iMacs!

Click here to go to our press kit.

Here are all the steps that we have completed so far in the creation process of the iMacompanion:

To continue we need your support and funding. We have already gathered the funds to produce a USB 2.0 iMacompanion but the market has really told us that USB 3.0 is the way to go! Therefore we have to create specific molds for the USB 3.0 connectors and we need your help to order them as they are expensive! Here is the timeline from the project onwards:


Launching the iDockAll last year has taught us precisely how to successfully completed a campaign, and we know how challenging it can be. Our priority is, and has always been, to make sure our backers are happy with their purchase and the service they have received. We are very proud to say that in the vast majority of cases, we have succeeded! We intend to do even better in this campaign.

We are now 100% ready. All processes have been carefully tested, allowing us to establish confirmed lead times of manufacturing. We are confident to say that we will be able to ship within five months of the project's funding.

Please let us know if you have any questions or comments, we would love to hear from you.

And of course, feel free to share this project with anyone who loves their iMacs.

Thank you warmly for your support,

Nathalie and Kevin


For more updates you can also follow us on Facebook andTwitter !

Apple and the iMac image are trademarks of Apple Inc.,

No endorsement implied.

story:
Our Product

Quicklegal is a new app that allows users to download and instantly video chat, audio call or private message an attorney anywhere in the nation . Now consumers can obtain instant, reliable legal advice on demand - all from the comfort of their mobile devices!

Using our service, licensed attorneys may respond through the internet to private user messages or requests for audio/videoconference consultations for fixed, affordable fees paid by the user. Users' fees are paid directly to the attorney, who in turn pay our company a monthly subscription fee, as well as per-use service fees. With our state-of-the-art platform designed by one of the most premier software development companies in the United States, users gain access to instant legal advice from attorneys in their area for an affordable fee, and attorneys gain exposure to new clients through face-to-face interaction and personal contact, all while earning fees. We believe this is a win-win for consumers who need fast and reliable legal advice and attorneys who want to market and promote themselves in a personalized way, while productively using their time.



Our Technology

Quicklegal is an interface comprised of web and mobile application software that features audio and videoconferencing, as well as private messaging, with built-in secure payment processing, geo-location, and an attorney rating system. While the components of the technology are not entirely new, they are utilized in a revolutionary way to expand consumers' access to qualified legal advice instantly, on demand.


  


Why We're Doing This

The legal technology industry is growing rapidly. Just last year, law firms in the U.S. earned $266 billion in revenue, but with more and more clients becoming computer-savvy and depending on the use of modern technology, the traditional law firm model is breaking. Clients are demanding affordable legal advice on demand and most law firms aren't equipped to provide it. Quicklegal is designed to be fast, efficient and easy to use for both the consumer and the attorney. When something happens or a question arises, many consumers wish they had an attorney to chat with for few minutes to ease their concern and help them contemplate the next step. Attorneys, who are often looking for ways to service more clients and bring in new streams of income, need a way to assist these consumers - but not at the risk of nonpayment or unnecessary liability risks. 

By decreasing time commitments, processing payments in advance, and providing a secure, online venue for attorneys to chat with clients face-to-face, Quicklegal is the solution. Now, attorneys who have gaps in their schedule or just wish to use the service throughout the day to earn income and personally control their marketing, can make themselves available online to help consumers at the moment they need legal counsel.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

    • Help us get the word out and make some noise about Quicklegal. You might know attorneys who would want to take part in a free 30-day trial of the service, or even users who might be looking for a new type of legal solution. Let them know about us!
    • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!
    • Help make Quicklegal and Quicklegal.com household names. Share the name and concept with others and share their reactions with us!

    Thank you!

Help make Quicklegal and Quicklegal.com household names. Share the name and concept with others and share their reactions with us! 
 Thank you!

story:
A Firewall for Your Car or Truck's Electronic Network Prevents Vehicle Theft & Safeguards Data!




HOW IT WORKS


is designed for post-1996 U.S. light vehicles (cars and trucks) that include a functional and accessible OBD2 port.  It simply attaches to this connector, normally located near the steering column under the dash.  It can be removed and re-installed for vehicle maintenance, inspection or emission testing.


The product is U.S. Patented and globally standardized by the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE).




                                           


Why You Need One


One reason is that a variety of electronic tools are available to re-engineer vehicle networks, reset odometers, and tamper, hack or erase vehicle electronic data via the OBD2 port.
This port is not secure and generally prone to miss-use of the original safety and emissions control related purposes.
You "Own" the electronic data that your vehicles generates, stores and transmits.  Yet, you need a simple way to prevent others from accessing or altering your data.  

addresses the challenge of electronics intensive motor vehicles as simply as possible by providing a means to control access and prevent misuse.

         About Me and What We Need 

I'm Tom Kowalick, president of AIRMIKA, Inc., an auto-tech company located in Southern Pines, North Carolina.  We are members of the Consumer Electronics Association (CEA).  I've been involved for many years in developing and standardizing automotive event data recorder (EDR) technologies.  I've also developed a number of cyber security products.  These products are patented and globally standardized.  

I have several products under development, one of which utilizes my recently patented Near Field Communication (NFC) technologies.  I need funding to fully develop and market this product so it can used with a cell phone.  Hopefully, if I have a successful campaign I'll use donor funding to do so.


                       The Perks

This is no-pie-in-the-sky campaign.   The product is available to ship within days at the conclusion of the campaign to the initial 3000 donors.   You will have it by mid-October or early November.   If the campaign exceeds the 3000 in-stock inventory then I will send donors a digital coupon good following the next manufacturing cycle.  For those that just want to support a great project I set-up a $1 and $5 good idea thank you.  There is also a postcard perk for $10 and a special $500 Angel Donor perk.


    BOTTOM LINE: 
You Own the Data - Protect Yourself!

story:
WHAT IS SEIZARIO?

Seizario is a mobile app that helps detect falls and seizure convulsions, and informs emergency contacts in a timely manner so help can be provided. It is the brain-child of Amir, a 13-year old innovator, who developed it with the help of his dad (computer science professor). Seizario can be directly downloaded on your smartphone, without any additional hardware.

THE NEED FOR SEIZARIO (In Numbers)

Over 65 million people worldwide (3 million in the US) suffer from epilepsy, with repeated seizures (many involving severe convulsions and falls) that can lead to injury or death if not treated in a timely manner. 

Falls of seniors lead to over 2.4 million serious injuries a year in the US, and many more worldwide.


IN THE NEWS



NEW "MATCHING PROGRAM"!

Now, as a campaign contributor you can select someone (or foundation/chapter) who will receive the same level of access you will receive to Seizario and our development team. [You can provide the names/contacts to our team at the end of the campaign].


SUPPORT SEIZARIO

Your contributions will enable a new product to reach millions around the world to improve their lives, and add peace of mind to their families and loved ones. 

To scale Seizario on Android and iOS, we need resources (including equipment, and the best development tools) that we hope to get through this campaign, after taxes and overhead. The Android version has passed through the alpha testing phase, but development and refinement is needed ($5K equipment + $25K development and updates). The iOS/iPhone version is in the development phase, and more resources are necessary to get it ready ($7.5K equipment + $32.5K development & updates).

 GOALS: WHAT YOU GET & WHAT YOU ENABLE


AWARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS


Seizario was the winner of the Epilepsy Foundation Shark Tank Competition - People's Choice Award, 2014. This competition is for the most innovative products for people with epilepsy.

Seizario also received a special science award certificate from the Office of the United States Surgeon General, for outstanding research in the field of health science, 2015.

The Seizario team earned awards in the ACM MobiCom 2014 mobile app competition (first place), and in the startup pitch competition.

Amir, is a finalist at the Intel International Science & Engineering Fair 2015. He received the Intel excellence of computer science award in 2013, 2014, 2015, was a semi-finalist at Broadcom Masters science competition in 2013, 2014, was awarded the Young Innovator of the Year (by GAIN; Gainesville Area Innovation Network) in 2014, and Young Hacker of the Year (by Grooveshark) in 2013, 2014, 2015.

[More info and news available on Seizario.com website news]


HOW SEIZARIO WORKS
Seizario uses various capabilities of smartphones including sensing, computation, storage, communication and user-interface. It runs in the background efficiently - with minimal effect on the battery. 



A. EASY SET UP STEPS


B. IN CASE OF EMERGENCY




C. USER-FRIENDLY INTERFACE

Seizario has a user-friendly interface to change the settings. You can change the disarm mechanism, alarm wait time, sensitivity of convulsions, among others.

    


FEATURES OF THE SEIZARIO APP

Seizario offers a variety of features to help users manage their lives (by increasing self-efficacy) and their family members (by providing peace of mind). Salient features of Seizario include:


JOURNEY & TIMELINE



BETTER THAN THE USUAL SUSPECTS

- No extra hardware: Seizario is a mobile app that runs directly on your smartphone. Unlike other products, you do not have to wear a watch, bracelet, or wrist-band to make Seizario work. So no extra hassle of charging watches or bracelets and pairing them with your phone, or worrying how far away your phone is from your wearable device.

- Multiple detection capabilities: Seizario is the first (and only) product designed to detect falls AND seizures. This covers many more cases of emergency than just detecting seizures or just detecting falls.

- Affordability: Wearable-based solutions cost around $200, and may require monthly subscription, resulting in $500+ cost per year. Seizario can be obtained (in early access) for as little as $10 through our campaign (with no monthly subscription). This makes Seizario 50 times more affordable than related products.


THE PERKS

* For T-shirt design and cookies please see images in the Gallery.



DEVELOPING THE SEIZARIO APP

To develop Seizario, we have devised two systematic methods for evaluation using internal and external trials. Our team has extensive expertise in this field.

The internal evaluation trials use a test bed including a variety of mobile devices and scenarios. Detailed sensory data are logged and studied. Data analytics are then used on tens of thousands of samples to identify the best settings for our algorithms. Our results thus far have been quite promising. We plan to further expand our coverage with a variety of Android and iPhone devices. In addition, a richer suite of use-cases will be established to enhance the user interface for a better user experience.

For the external trials, we are working with the epilepsy community, a group of early volunteers in the field, and a group of field experts/neurologists to optimize our algorithms to get maximum detection of emergencies (i.e., increased sensitivity) with minimum false positives (i.e., increased specificity). We plan to expand our user base through this campaign to obtain your feedback.


POSSIBLE  RISKS AND CHALLENGES

EMERGENCIES ARE NOT THE SAME: The Seizario team is well aware of the variety of emergency cases, and the complexity of detecting some of them. As with any related product, it may be impossible to cover 100% of all possible emergency scenarios. Through our internal and external testing we have been able to cover many common cases of convulsions (mainly in generalized tonic clonic seizures) and falls. With your involvement, Seizario shall improve and learn to adapt to different patterns.

DEVICES ARE NOT THE SAME: Delivering excellent performance on a variety of smartphones provides a challenge. Our algorithms are efficient and effective, they adjust to various sensors, and self-calibrate with different sensitivities, achieving very good performance in our tests so far. With your support and participation in this campaign, these algorithms will be even further enhanced. 

We plan to deliver the mobile app according to schedule. But a larger scale release, on a variety of devices/users, may incur minor delay .


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Q: Will you have support for iOS / iPhone?

A: Yes, Seizario will be available for iOS / iPhone devices, as well as Android phones (running 4.0 and above). 

Q: How much will Seizario cost?

A: Early access to Seizario starts at just $10 through this campaign. Please check the perks for the various packages. If this campaign reaches its goals, then a free version of Seizario will be released (see 'GOALS' section above).

Q: Which phones can run Seizario?

A: Seizario was designed to work with most Android smartphones running 4.0 or above. Seizario has been tested on several phones running Android 4.1 to 5.0. For iOS/iPhone, Seizario is planned to work mainly with iPhone 5s, iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 plus. 

There is a large variety of smartphones, and we cannot provide an exhaustive list of phones for Seizario. We plan to provide an updated list of devices and operating systems as we go through the various release phases for Android and iOS.

Q: Will there be a monthly subscription for Seizario?

A: No. Unlike many other hardware products, Seizario obtained through this campaign does NOT require a monthly subscription.

Q: Will Seizario drain my battery?

A: No, according to our experience so far Seizario consumes less than 2% per day for average phone usage. 

Please note, however, that battery consumption depends on usage patterns and may be different between users. Your mileage will vary depending on your usage.

Q: Will Seizario send a message to my emergency contacts immediately if the phone falls from my hand, even if I am not in danger?

A: No, Seizario triggers a visual and audio alarms when an emergency is suspected. The user can disarm the alarm and stop the sending of the message within a pre-set time (default is 30 seconds). Only if the alarm is not stopped then the message is sent.

Q: Does Seizario collect and share my personal information?

A: No. Seizario does not record, store nor share your personal or private information. Data is stored on your smartphone for your own personal use. During the initial (immediate) phase, anonymous data will be sent to the Seizario team to help improve your experience. Such data does cannot identify people’s personal information.

For more details visit Seizario.com


SPREAD THE WORD

Please spread the word about Seizario, the world's first mobile app for detecting seizures and falls through Seizario Facebook page, and visiting our website Seizario.com.

story:
Pocketlight : "Buy one - Give one"  

About us : 

O'SUN is a company that designs a smart range of portable solar lamps that are made to be used by anyone in the world by focusing on answering the need of those who live without access to electricity. 

Our first product "NOMAD" launched in 2013 have already changed lives of thousands of people's around the world and have been awarded in many countries.


How Pocketlight is Born : 


In June 2014 we decided to developed a second lamp under the concept of "One lamp-One Individual" .                                                   

To design Pocketlight we took the decision to contact several schools and designers based in countries where there is a huge need of electricity and thus give the opportunity to one of them to collaborate with us.

We received several concepts but one really stood out and met our needs, this concept was the one proposed by Parin Sanghvi a 22 year old under graduate student (at that time) from MIT institute of design in India. 

India happens to be the most deprived country as far as provision of energy is concerned. 306 million people in the country are still living without benefiting from this basic utility.

Parin , is now a graduate since April 2015 and we are proud to make his dream happen and see his finished design getting manufactured.

The Belgian agency IOL Strategic Design specializing in design and product development for the past 17 years carried out all the art Pocketlight modeling in accordance with Parin Sanghvi's design , standards and electronic constraints. The agency has helped to make the connection between design and technology by offering us a functional solution.


Pocketlight & the project

We are happy to introduce Pocketlight our new, affordable, multi-situation and compact solar lamp specially designed for an individual. The multiple functions work instinctively, enhancing the experience and allowing tasks to be completed efficiently.The "Pocketability" and simplicity of use makes it a useful task light in any situation. It provides more than 30 hours of LED light, ideal for disaster emergency situations, camping, hiking or simply has a reading lamp.

In developing countries Pocketlight will have these positive impact :

  •  It will improve children's life by giving them the opportunity to study during evening hours and thus extend the light time by minimum 4 hours a day.
  • The amount of toxic fumes from the kerosene lamp will be reduced, that represent for woman and children in a shelter or hut the equivalent of 
    • 2 packs of cigarettes a day.
  • CO2 emissions will be reduce of about 100-150 kg per year
  • Reduced fire hazard indoors
  • Increased safety of the user against assaults,rape.
  • Through our community projects,support young and local woman entrepreneurs by giving them the opportunity to develop their own "solar shop" that will create jobs and income.
Be part of the " Buy one - Give one " campaign as Pocketlight will start to be distribute in October 2015 to you and to our community projects. 

Pocketlight is the lamp to bring with you for your outdoors activity, trip or in your car. Now you can pre-order at a price of $40 for one Pocketlight and you will proudly donate the same lamp to someone in need in developing countries.




How we make the difference

Pocketlight is a state of the art solar lamp : 
  • The most compact of it's category : 132 x 71 x 12 mm
  • Super lightweight with only  90 grams 
  • 360° rotative clipper that make it extremely versatile : portable light , ceiling light , stand on a table by itself , around the neck and many more.....
  • Weather resistant
  • LifePo 700mAh battery that allows 2000 complete charge, more than 5 years.
  • Most efficient solar cells 
  • Single LED LM 80 
  • 3 lighting mode : up to 5 hours @ 40lm + 2 hours power reserve @ 6lm   
  •                                   up to 10 hours @20lm + 2 hours power reserve @ 6lm
  •                                   up to 33 hours @6lm
  • Charge in 6 hours under optimal sun condition
  • S.O.S flashing mode for emergency
  • Charge visual indicator
  • Battery level indicator 
  • Automatic dim down when battery must be charge
  • Material ASA and Polycarbonate anti-UV
  • Patented


O'SUN Community projects 

We have, since 2012, operated 7 projects in 6 African countries : South Africa, Democratic Republic of Congo, Burkina Faso, Swaziland, Guinea Conakry, Mali.

Our community projects are always conducted in the field by us in partnership with NGO’s that work on a daily basis with the population in needs and  give us good following and feedback. 

In the Western Cape,South Africa,where you can find the biggest township in the country, we are working with Matchbox-Africa to distribute our O'SUN lights to nursery, schools,homes.

Part of the mission is also to educate the future users about the benefits of using the sun energy for lighting and how it will upgrade their health condition, education , security and economy.

On our website, we describe in detail through images the progress of every community projects that have been realized.

If you are an NGO or charity and you have a community project, don't hesitate to contact us at info@o-sun.net


Make some noise to promote the campaign !

All together we can raise our voice and spread the information about Pocketlight and the "Buy one -Give One" campaign through our network.

We also look for medias, bloggers and communities to talk about the campaign and reveal our story to the world. For all that generosity, THANK YOU !


You have a question ?

You can always send your questions on the comments section of this campaign or directly by email to campaign@o-sun.net

You may also find the answer you're looking for on our website.
story_txt:
Pocketlight : "Buy one - Give one"  
About us : 

O'SUN is a company that designs a smart range of portable solar lamps that are made to be used by anyone in the world by focusing on answering the need of those who live without access to electricity. 
Our first product "NOMAD" launched in 2013 have already changed lives of thousands of people's around the world and have been awarded in many countries.




How Pocketlight is Born : 

In June 2014 we decided to developed a second lamp under the concept of "One lamp-One Individual" .                                                   
To design Pocketlight we took the decision to contact several schools and designers based in countries where there is a huge need of electricity and thus give the opportunity to one of them to collaborate with us.
We received several concepts but one really stood out and met our needs, this concept was the one proposed by Parin Sanghvi a 22 year old under graduate student (at that time) from MIT institute of design in India. 


India happens to be the most deprived country as far as provision of energy is concerned. 306 million people in the country are still living without benefiting from this basic utility.
Parin , is now a graduate since April 2015 and we are proud to make his dream happen and see his finished design getting manufactured.
The Belgian agency IOL Strategic Design specializing in design and product development for the past 17 years carried out all the art Pocketlight modeling in accordance with Parin Sanghvi's design , standards and electronic constraints. The agency has helped to make the connection between design and technology by offering us a functional solution.

Pocketlight & the project
We are happy to introduce Pocketlight our new, affordable, multi-situation and compact solar lamp specially designed for an individual. The multiple functions work instinctively, enhancing the experience and allowing tasks to be completed efficiently.The "Pocketability" and simplicity of use makes it a useful task light in any situation. It provides more than 30 hours of LED light, ideal for disaster emergency situations, camping, hiking or simply has a reading lamp.
In developing countries Pocketlight will have these positive impact :



 It will improve children's life by giving them the opportunity to study during evening hours and thus extend the light time by minimum 4 hours a day.


The amount of toxic fumes from the kerosene lamp will be reduced, that represent for woman and children in a shelter or hut the equivalent of 2 packs of cigarettes a day.CO2 emissions will be reduce of about 100-150 kg per year


Reduced fire hazard indoors

Increased safety of the user against assaults,rape.
Through our community projects,support young and local woman entrepreneurs by giving them the opportunity to develop their own "solar shop" that will create jobs and income.

Be part of the " Buy one - Give one " campaign as Pocketlight will start to be distribute in October 2015 to you and to our community projects. 
Pocketlight is the lamp to bring with you for your outdoors activity, trip or in your car. Now you can pre-order at a price of $40 for one Pocketlight and you will proudly donate the same lamp to someone in need in developing countries.




How we make the difference
Pocketlight is a state of the art solar lamp : 


The most compact of it's category : 132 x 71 x 12 mm
Super lightweight with only  90 grams 
360° rotative clipper that make it extremely versatile : portable light , ceiling light , stand on a table by itself , around the neck and many more.....
Weather resistant
LifePo 700mAh battery that allows 2000 complete charge, more than 5 years.
Most efficient solar cells 
Single LED LM 80 
3 lighting mode : up to 5 hours @ 40lm + 2 hours power reserve @ 6lm   
                                  up to 10 hours @20lm + 2 hours power reserve @ 6lm
                                  up to 33 hours @6lm
Charge in 6 hours under optimal sun condition
S.O.S flashing mode for emergency
Charge visual indicator
Battery level indicator 
Automatic dim down when battery must be charge
Material ASA and Polycarbonate anti-UV
Patented






O'SUN Community projects 



We have, since 2012, operated 7 projects in 6 African countries : South Africa, Democratic Republic of Congo, Burkina Faso, Swaziland, Guinea Conakry, Mali.
Our community projects are always conducted in the field by us in partnership with NGO’s that work on a daily basis with the population in needs and  give us good following and feedback. 
In the Western Cape,South Africa,where you can find the biggest township in the country, we are working with Matchbox-Africa to distribute our O'SUN lights to nursery, schools,homes.
Part of the mission is also to educate the future users about the benefits of using the sun energy for lighting and how it will upgrade their health condition, education , security and economy.
On our website, we describe in detail through images the progress of every community projects that have been realized.
If you are an NGO or charity and you have a community project, don't hesitate to contact us at info@o-sun.net




Make some noise to promote the campaign !


All together we can raise our voice and spread the information about Pocketlight and the "Buy one -Give One" campaign through our network.
We also look for medias, bloggers and communities to talk about the campaign and reveal our story to the world. For all that generosity, THANK YOU !

You have a question ?
You can always send your questions on the comments section of this campaign or directly by email to campaign@o-sun.net
You may also find the answer you're looking for on our website.

story:
Become an Internet of Things App Developer.
According to the McKinsey Global Institute, the Internet of Things will be a major economic engine in the near future. By the middle of the next decade, McKinsey’s experts predict that the Internet of Things will have an economic impact of over $6 trillion globally.
In the past, mobile iOS and Android developers faced a difficult predicament. Most iOS developers use Objective-C, while Android developers use Java. Fortunately, we've got the Corona SDK™ and the Lua programming language, which enables cross platform mobile development. To put it simply, it means you can develop an application once and build it for iOS, Android.

Arduino™ is the world's most popular tool, is a tool for making mobiles that can sense and control more of the physical world than your desktop computer. It's an open-source physical computing platform based on a simple microcontroller board, and a development environment for writing software for the board.

THE BOOK

If you've ever wanted to learn how to build your own iOS or Android IoT Apps, we have something very special for you on this IndieGoGO campaign.

Corona SDK & Arduino Hacks is THE ultimate E-Book on how to build your own fully-functioning iPhone and Android Internet of Things app, made specifically for beginners.

  • No pre-knowledge required
  • A Mac or PC
  • A paid Apple Developer account is NOT required - you can download Xcode 6 for free.

Illustrated E-Book

A book made of more than 200 pages will cover the five awesome projects. It will be a book based 90% on illustrations.

For every Chapter you will find the description, the step by step guide, and all the information necessary to successfully complete the project, in a simple and clear way. 

Working with the SMS Remote Control

Start working with Arduino IDE

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Chapter I: Exploring the systems

Arduino UNO

Ethernet Shield 

Relays

Arduino Led Proto Shield

Nano Router 3G/4G

SMS Remote Control System

 IP Cams 

 Proto Board how2hackapps 

Chapter II: Introduction to Corona SDK: Easy Cross-Platform Development

What is Corona SDK

How to create your first Internet of Things Smartphone project

Chapter III: How to Set up our Smartphone (iPhone or Android) to Arduino UNO

Setting Up Proto Shield Kit how2hackapps

Image 1 = Proto Shield  Kit "How2hackapps".

 Internet of Things

Chapter V: Garage Door Opener + CAM IP Embedded Control App.

Chapter VI: Home Control {Irrigation Pumps & Swimming Pool Control, Garden Lights}

Chapter VII: Wifi Boat Control {Boat Ganway, Anchor Windlass, Winches}

Corona SDK program

Arduino Code 

 The Hardware

 The Schematic

 Setting Up the Wifi Boat Control 

Chapter VIII: Smartphone Wifi Rocket Project

Corona SDK program

 Arduino Code

 The Hardware

 The Schematic

Setting Up the Wifi Boat Control

Chapter IX: SMS Remote Project

Corona SDK program 

Arduino Code

 Setting Up the GMS board

THE PROTO SHIELD KIT

The SHIELD was designed to be the perfect companion of the E-Book. 
The shield will add Internet capabilities to your Arduino and to your projects. The five projects of the book will all be dedicated to the Internet of Things and I will teach you how to connect anything to your smartphone.

Proto Shield Kit components:

  • Arduino UNO
  • ETHERNET Shield
  • Relay 5v
  • Nano Router 3G/4G

E-book for free

Are you a newbie with App development? Don´t worry about that, buying my book "Corona SDK & Arduino Hacks" you will have my first successful book for free "How to Create your first iPhone App" with Corona SDK.


THE PERKS

You can choose any combination of these elements. 


Our Plan

We are now ready to bring you the E-book with the Proto Shield Kit. There are however a few key steps we need to take to deliver the E-book and the Proto Shield Kit to our bakers.

With your help, we need to: 

Prior to launch 

  • Translate the book to Spanish and Chinese. 
  • Design the marketing.

During campaign (December 2014 to February 2015) 

  • Production planning  
  • Work with FedEx on importation process into U.S., Canada and Europe

After the campaign (February 2015 to March 2015)  

  • Manufacturing of the Proto Shield Kit How2hackapps
  • Product inspection by third party company at manufacturer    
  • Shipment of rewards to our backers.

Swift Code 

I plan if the campaign is over $ 20,000 add to the book projects code in Swift

Find me On Twitter.


Frequently Asked Questions


What will I get? 

With any perk, you will receive the my E-book and and other best seller E-book for free in which I explain how to make apps from scratch.

I've changed my mind. Can I get a refund?
Sorry, Indiegogo's policy is No Refunds. Unfortunately, there's nothing we can do about this. When your contribution is deposited into our PayPal account, it comes from Indiegogo, not from you. So if we were to refund your contribution, it wouldn't make it back to you. Please see Indiegogo's rules here.

Can I get multiple perks?

Yes! You can back our campaign as many times as you want, choosing as many perks as you want.

Can I change my perk?
Unfortunately, not during the campaign. But before we send you your gear, we'll send you an email with a link to a system that will help you manage your perk, input your shipping information, and purchase add-ons if you choose.

When you ship, will you please declare a lesser value on the customs form?
No.

 What are the shipping costs?

All shipping in the US is free of charge. There is additional cost for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. Also, there is no guarantee that this will work in your country (e.g. unknown power & connectivity issues) – there are many hurdles we need to go over until we have a complete picture on the international market. If it turns out that shipment to your country proves impossible, we will reimburse your order.


I hope that you are just as excited as I am about this project and becoming a backer right now. 

THANK YOU for supporting this project, I can't wait to show you what you can learn from this eBook.

story:
About Us

 

 

Rimtech, will manufacture and market a protective device for consumers to use on

their motor vehicles. The trade name "Spartan" will serve as brand name and

identity name for the product. The product is intended as a way to protect the rim

and hubcap while the tire is being treated with Armor All , Turtle Wax or Tire

Foam to name a few. The user would simply place the device over the rim and

proceed to treat the tire. Any errant sprays or drifting mist would land on the cover

rather than on the rim or hubcap. This would eliminate the need to wipe the rim

afterwards. The process could then be repeated with the other tires. This

elimination of a step during the car washing process would save the user time and

effort and would ensure that no chemicals are left on the wheel.

 

 

Advantages Of the Product 

The appealing features of “SPARTAN” would be its ease of application, the reduced amount of wheel cleaning required, and the protection provided for the wheels. No longer would the car owner have to wipe the rim and hubcap after spraying or cleaning the tire. Instead, he could simply place the cover over the rim while applying chemicals to the tire. The cover would prevent the chemicals or soap from accumulating in the many crevices and opening of the expensive rims and would prevent long –term chemical buildup. When uncovered, the wheels would look like new, and the owner would be proud to show them off. The “SPARTAN” would save the vehicle owner a great deal of time and effort since he would not have to clean the wheels after coating the tires. This product would be lightweight and durable for years of effective use. It would also be inexpensive and could be easily stored on a shelf or in the trunk when not in use. This product could appeal to private car owners as well as owners of car wash facilities and auto detailing businesses as a way to increase productivity.

What Your Funding Will Do

This is what funding is needed for:

  • CAD Files
  • Injection Molding
  • Working Prototype/ includes testing
  •  Manufacturing
  • Insurance
  • Start-up Costs

 

The Deal About the Owner

 Here is my story.  I am currently serving in the U.S. Army and have been for fifteen years.  I am married to the woman of my dreams for the past 13 and as a result of that I have had the privilege and honor to help raise my beautiful 10, 8, 5, and 3 year olds!  Life doesn’t get much better when you realize you are the luckiest man on the planet as I get to be supported every moment of my day with them!  Thank you to you, you really are awesome!

My product has come this far with the help of my family and amazing friends; including some awesome mentors along the way.  One of which is a professor from the (TSBDC) Tennessee Small Business Development Center whom has gone way above his call of duty and offered priceless guidance, knowledge,  and know how as I now have entered the business world.

With his help, it has brought me to you.

My goal is to give to the market what is missing.  My product alone offers that!  A way to clean your rims the right way!  We take so much pride in the things we love, here is a way to ensure a deeper level of satisfaction in the work we offer!  This alone sells my product!  Something we need, so something we Get!

More importantly then fulfilling our need is also fulfilling ourselves.  My story documents my time in Iraq and Afghanistan.  There I saw things that many don’t.  We do the job and in return we retire from the military only to receive our retirement check that barely covers the bills and/or we enter life again missing an arm or a leg.  This is not to tell you that I am looking for pity, instead to remind all of you that the end result should never be a retirement check, it should be to look deeper into ourselves, always knowing what better to offer.  To do what you do today, but to also believe in that interest of yours, to know it’s true value and to let it out!  We all need it, yes we need the physical need it offers, but more importantly it reminds us to be the best parts of ourselves, and that is what the world needs!  It needs us to know our value and to show others to see theirs!

Continuing for a moment with my time line let me tell you another significant moment for me.   A year back, I received an offer to take my idea off my hands by a large multi-million dollar company, but I turned it down.  I was told it would be too much for me to handle.  Here is what I think about that.  My years in the military have taught me several things; one is that ‘We never quit, if I can look Death in the face and return to my family, I CAN DO ANYTHING!  And anything also includes taking my heart and soul and sharing it to the world!  It is not too much to handle to know who I am.  And it is my goal for you to never forger who you are.

My story has brought me to you today.  I am without words as I attempt to explain what you really mean to me.  You give me courage to tell you this.  I may not know you, but your approval is what drives me.  I am offering you to see you through me.  And to never give up! 

So  please take advantage of my product as in itself it serves a need not yet met, and please continue to know who you are and have the courage to share it with the rest of us!

Can't Give Financialy.... You can still help here's how:

Anyone can give but it takes a special person to share something good with a friend coworker or the eccentric family member, Please share our product with them liberally thankyou.

 

Contact Us

rimtech4you@gmail.com

story:
WHAT IS CINECAUSE?

See good.  Do good.  Feel good.

  • Audiences are increasingly seeking culturally relevant movies.
  • Film is a powerful tool, inspiring audiences to take action.
  • Earn appreciation and awards by supporting worthy causes.

CineCause is a philanthropic platform, connecting socially relevant films, celebrities and news to related causes.  We are a curator of quality films -- movies with something to say. 

Our aim is to leverage media to drive awareness on key issues.

Through our channels, audiences discover meaningful movies - in a full range of categories. They learn about related causes and which causes celebrities are supporting.  They make donations and are provided links to organizations to get involved.  And, of course, they share these films and their related causes with family and friends.

Since launching the company in the Fall of 2011, we’ve found success in curating terrific showcases, presenting award-winning films at International film festivals and partnering with causes on special events.  But we all know, we’re living in a mobile world, and CineCause is ready to take our next big step.  We need your help to make this happen. 

WHY ARE WE SEEKING FUNDS?

We need an App!

To fully realize the impact CineCause can have on these important issues, we need to develop a dynamic and affective App for iPhones, iPads and the like.  With the CineCause App, you will: 

See good.

  • Discover socially relevant films
  • Watch these amazing films anytime, anywhere
  • Read reviews and related news content

Do good.

  • Buy movies from iTunes & Amazon for offline viewingâ€¨
  • Participate in the cause(s) of interest to you
  • Make donations to qualified charities

Feel good.

  • Gain an understanding and appreciation for relevant issues
  • Share feelings and knowledge through social mediaâ€¨
  • Earn praise and rewards as a result of cause participation

With your help, we can get this App designed and developed, maximizing our opportunities to affect positive change.

Thank you for your support!

Feel free to visit us at www.cinecause.com or email us at info@cinecause.com

FAQ

Which film festivals participate in the CineCause Spotlight Series?

Julien Dubuque International Film Festival, Topanga Film Festival, Albuquerque Film Festival, San Diego Film Festival, Ojai Film Festival, Naples International Film Festival

What is the difference between Showcase and Spotlight?

CineCause curates and presents Showcases on the website, on different subjects and themes.  When CineCause presents a film at a participating film festival, the projects are considered part of the CineCause Spotlight Series.

What comes with a CineCause Subscription, and how does the Rewards Program work?

Click here for more details on our Subscription and Rewards Programs http://www.cinecause.com/join
story_txt:
WHAT IS CINECAUSE?
See good.  Do good.  Feel good.

Audiences are increasingly seeking culturally relevant movies.
Film is a powerful tool, inspiring audiences to take action.
Earn appreciation and awards by supporting worthy causes.
CineCause is a philanthropic platform, connecting socially relevant films, celebrities and news to related causes.  We are a curator of quality films -- movies with something to say. 
Our aim is to leverage media to drive awareness on key issues.
Through our channels, audiences discover meaningful movies - in a full range of categories. They learn about related causes and which causes celebrities are supporting.  They make donations and are provided links to organizations to get involved.  And, of course, they share these films and their related causes with family and friends.
Since launching the company in the Fall of 2011, we’ve found success in curating terrific showcases, presenting award-winning films at International film festivals and partnering with causes on special events.  But we all know, we’re living in a mobile world, and CineCause is ready to take our next big step.  We need your help to make this happen. 
WHY ARE WE SEEKING FUNDS?
We need an App!
To fully realize the impact CineCause can have on these important issues, we need to develop a dynamic and affective App for iPhones, iPads and the like.  With the CineCause App, you will: 
See good.

Discover socially relevant films
Watch these amazing films anytime, anywhere
Read reviews and related news content
Do good.


Buy movies from iTunes & Amazon for offline viewingâ€¨
Participate in the cause(s) of interest to you
Make donations to qualified charities
Feel good.

Gain an understanding and appreciation for relevant issues
Share feelings and knowledge through social mediaâ€¨
Earn praise and rewards as a result of cause participation
With your help, we can get this App designed and developed, maximizing our opportunities to affect positive change.
Thank you for your support!

Julien Dubuque International Film Festival, Topanga Film Festival, Albuquerque Film Festival, San Diego Film Festival, Ojai Film Festival, Naples International Film Festival

story:
In 2012, we live in a world where social networks have become some of the most widely used tools to connect with one another, whether to communicate, to make friends, or to share.

The problem is that this connection takes place mostly in front of the computer, so even though we're connecting, it feels like we've become more disconnected from each other. 

Enter Tryper.

Tryper is a social network, similar in many ways to others, such as Facebook and Google+, in that it will enable you to easily find your friends, communicate with them, make new ones, or reconnect with old ones. But unlike other sites…

Our goal is to make you leave your screen; whether to get together with your friends more often, to meet new people with similar interests, or to expand your circle of friends.

We've designed tools that will make it incredibly easy for you to meet in real life, face to face, to do pretty much anything you could possibly think of or want to do (or even things you've never thought of doing!), whether to play sports, go skydiving, go to a museum, go shopping, or simply have a drink with a few friends!

Similarly, when it comes to traveling; whether it's your first time and you've never left the city you live in, and you don't even know where to begin, or if you're an experienced traveller who has already seen the world... whether you want to go backpacking across Europe to meet new people, to go and relax on the beaches of Mexico, or even to have the next big adventure of your life with a couple of your closest friends...

Tryper will make this quick to do and simple to manage.

Now, Tryper is not in its beginning phase – In fact, with Indiegogo's help, we would be ready to launch shortly after our Indiegogo campaign comes to an end.

A year and a half has gone into designing and developing Tryper, and our team has gone from 4 people to 9 people in the past 5 months, and includes more than 60 years of experience, with backgrounds in:

  • Engineering
  • IT System Administration
  • Computer Programming (7 highly experienced programmers, including expertise in web, iOS, and Android development - that's right, we have mobile on the way!)
  • Software Design (web and mobile)
  • User Interface Design (web and mobile)
  • Software Testing
  • Technical Writing
  • and Project Management

Lastly, it's important to mention 2 more things: Privacy and Ownership of Information. 

1) Privacy: This is extremely important to us and we have put extensive work and planning into making sure that your privacy is kept safe. From giving you settings that will enable you to control your information, such that only your friends can see it, to preventing search engines from finding your profile in a search, we take privacy very seriously and we intend on ensuring that it doesn't get violated.

2) Ownership of Information: We believe that just because you are putting your information on our site, it doesn't make it right for us to become the owners of your information. This is why: your information will remain yours. It will never become ours. We will never sell it to anyone. We will never show it to anyone, unless legally forced. If you decide to leave Tryper and you delete your account, your information will get removed, deleted, erased. It is yours and this means it is yours to come and go with, as you please.

Now, we managed to get this far on our own, but we need your help to get it out to the world.

We'd need a minimum of $100,000.

This money will be used for server space, bandwidth, and infrastructure costs. For you, this translates to:

  • Opening Tryper up to many more people
  • Having it run much faster, more smoothly, and with less loading times
  • Stability: We can take the necessary steps to keep it stable, so that it doesn't crash on you guys.

We want to accommodate 100,000 users at launch and to grow to 1 million users within 3 months of that, and so on.

Imagine having a tool that enables you to find absolutely any activity or trip taking place, with people you want, anywhere in the world, within 10 clicks of your mouse - a social network where you can feel comfortable, knowing that your privacy is kept safe and that your information remains yours ... And did we mention it will be FREE?

We have created something amazing in Tryper that has never been done before. Now help us bring it to you.

story:
MEET THE A-iEasy ™                                        

A-iEasy ™ is a one piece foldable plastic display stand that sticks on the phone or tablet.

 

 

Want to sell the A-iEasy™ in your store?
Awesome! Just click on the button below to email us with your info.

 

 

       

Shenzhen A-iEasy Technology Co.,Ltd

 

: 400-606-2660

: sales@a-ieasy.com

: www.a-ieasy.com

: https://www.facebook.com/ieasy2016/

: https://twitter.com/Alisaxiong1

: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ9NvKNG3hpPTo...

 

 

I'm A-iEasy

 

It is designed to be small and thin so that it is a convenient accessory as part of the phone and can be used in the portrait or landscape mode.

 

  

 

1. Do you ship worldwide?  What are the shipping costs?

Yes.   And Shipping costs change depending on the chosen perk and your location. Select your country in the check out process and the shipping costs will be shown instantly.

2.  When can I choose the color of my A-iEasy phone stand?

All perks and backers can choose the color even u support only One piece.We will send out a survey during the campaign in which you can select your color.

3. What kind of payment method do you accept?

We accept paypal, wireless transfer and credit cards

4.  When will I receive my A-iEasy stand ?

We can guarantee the first 500,000 pieces to be shipped before August.15th.

5.  Where should I stick the phone stand on?

Remove the adhesive liner, point the adhesive towards the back bottom of the phone , tablet or phone case surface and press it down hard.

For more detailed instructions, please refer to "how it works" in the user manual

6. Will it stable if I use it on bigger screen smartphone or tablet?

Definitely yes!

A-iEasy is built by strong PP material with sturdy 3-Linkage structure. It can hold the big screen devices with ease.

Besides, A-iEasy has a tablet version which is bigger and more stable.And it is durable, we certified for 1,000,000 times bending test!  

7. Does the stand pack individually?

  We designed our package for 1, 2,5 and 10 pcs.

8. Any other questions or Wholesale inquiries?

Feel free to send us an email at:  sales@a-ieasy.com

9. Campaign link:

Share the campaign link to support us.
