story:
Who are we?

We are GDome. We design, manufacture and internationally distribute professional dome ports and accessories around the world. Visit our site www.getgdome.com to learn more.

 

How do I get a GDome Mobile? 

To preorder our Universal Smart Phone Dome Housing, SELECT the PERK you would like to receive. We will start shipping out perks in July 2019. 

 

What is a split shot?

It is a photo or video that captures under the water and over the water at the same time.

This is the device you need to get them

Introducing the GDome Mobile Dome Port System

 

                 

The GDome Mobile takes dome housings to the next level. With the universal design, it caters for smartphones up to 6.5" (including the iPhone+ sized models) as well as phones with multiple lenses like the Samsung S10+ and iPhone X.

Making a dome housing is one thing. Making it universal so that it works with all leading smartphones across different brands, with different lens configurations is another.

It didn’t stop there, with a rear touch membrane you can operate your phone at the surface of the water. For all of our Indiegogo backers, we will be offering a FREE Bluetooth shutter remote (Andriod and IOS) this will allow you to capture shots remotely with your smartphone, you can also choose to add it into your GDome Mobile to never miss a shot.

 

Secret Perk Unlocked ✅ 

FREE Thumb Screw Tightener now Included with every GDome Mobile  

 

Product Features

 

 

 

#GDomeMobile on Instagram  

 

The First Future Proof Dome System

Your phone changes all the time, the dome system you use shouldn't have to! 

Why invest hundreds of dollars in a phone housing that is only compatible with a specific phone model or brand? By choosing GDome Mobile, you can share your housing with family and friends even if they are using a completely different phone brand. 

Installation is as easy as this

*2 x foam inserts included

 

   Class-Leading Optics 

Images so good you wouldn't think they were shot through a dome

Shot with an iPhone X in Portrait Mode in the GDome Mobile Housing

Finding the solution for improving our already great optics posed a challenge from the get-go. We finally got this right with adding to our unique mix of ingredients to give us the perfected GDome optic lens. This V1 dome lens has been successfully used on all of our PDS systems to date. With the release of GDome Mobile we took this mix and improved on its makeup. The new V2 lens will go to market with each unit. The new V2 lens will be implemented across our existing range as soon as we start shipping.

With our open lens design, you can get the perfect portrait shot (focused subject & blurred background)

 

 

Go Live on Social Media with GDome Mobile

Go live on your favorite social platform while capturing amazing split-shots! 

As long as a portion of the GDome remains out of the water, you will be able to share some incredible footage directly to your friends, family, and followers. 

 

With our open lens design, the sky is the limit!

Use wide angle lenses, ND filters, CPL filters and more. Filters are an awesome accessory allowing you the freedom to get creative. Adjust the light hitting your camera lens by using a wide range of different lenses and filters. Filters allow you to capture wider apertures for greater depth or adjust shutter speeds for time-based effects.  Capture twice the image with wide angle lenses while the image remains crisp & straight with no fisheye distortion.  

Watch this video if you want to learn more about external filters and their benefits. 

 

The intention of the GDome Mobile is to be as user-friendly as possible. With a built-in hand grip support, the GDome Mobile is very easy to use and feels extremely comfortable in hand. We have made it modular so you can easily add extra items to take the standard setup into a professional rig. Start building yours today!

 

While the GDome Mobile is NOT made for action cameras, we tested it with the GoPro Hero 5 | 6 | 7 Black, Silver and White as well as the DJI Osmo Action and managed to get some awesome shots. 

This is not the perfect solution for action cameras and we recommend using our stock action camera PDS GDomes, available from the GDome Online Shop, but the option is there for those who are willing to give it a go.

Easy to use

Once the phone has been placed in position and the back plate secured it’s as easy as point, touch and capture.

What is in the box

  1. GDome Mobile
  2. 2 x Foam inserts 
  3. Side Grip
  4. Spares kit

Specs, Materials and performance testing

  • Glass-filled nylon body
  • Optically correct 6.1-inch dome lens (excluding flange)
  • Hardened steel reinforcement
  • Marine grade stainless steel screws and bolts
  • Total assembled weight 800 grams
  • Length 25cm (9.85 Inches), width 18cm (7 inches) & height 7.5cm (2.95 inches)

Our robust glass filled nylon housing is made structurally rigid with hardened steel. Its torsional rigidity allows the housing to maintain its seal as one descends deeper. Our V2 Dome was developed for specifically for the Mobile, with better optics and more scratch resistance, it is a major step up for us. 

Who are we

GDome was founded in 2015 with the aim of creating an affordable dome housing. Our first version of the Dome took to the market by storm, allowing us to constantly improve and add to our product range. At the end of 2018 having launched our Version 3 PDS (Professional Dome System), we decided to take on a new challenge, the smartphone. 

We have spent four years developing GDome into a market leading brand. This has enabled us to grow our reputation, market share and product offering, allowing us to bring GDome Mobile to life! We built the GDome Mobile for everyone. We used our passion for water with our photographic expertise and experience to bring you a unique product. 

Patent Applications

We have spent years and thousands of dollars developing our products. 

In order to protect our designs and concepts we have filed for the following full & or design patents:

F2016/00946

2018/07018

A2018/01882

F2018/01883

 

For absolute peace of mind

 

We guarantee all of our products and our reviews stand testament to this. All units are hand assembled, pressure tested and have to pass our quality control measures. We manufacture all of our products in house to ensure the best care is taken right from raw material inspection to final product testing.

The GDome Mobile is a waterproof housing made to be used on the surface of the water. Although we have dived to 30ft plus with the GDome Mobile, this was purely for testing purposes regardless of the fact it did not leak or damage the phones. The use of the touch membrane was not designed with great depths in mind. The diving backdoor which would make the housing rated to depths of 40m is in development and will be offered a discounted price to all Indiegogo backers towards the end of 2019. 

The GDome Mobile was designed with the intention of being a surface waterproof housing for depths that are not deeper than 5ms or 15ft. 

 

 

 

Why Indiegogo?

Being our first-time crowdfunding we looked to Indiegogo as the platform for us. Since the start of 2014, our business has established a great network of clients and customers. Having successfully shipped over 6000 GDome Housings we believe we are at a point that we can now seek crowdfunding with a proven track record.

The funds we hope to generate from this campaign will allow us to continue developing our product offering without seeking private funding. With bulk upfront orders, we are able to negotiate lower manufacturing parts and shipping costs due to economies of scale. This allows us to focus on what we love doing, sharing our passion orientated products powered by the best customers we could ever dream of.

With your feedback and using this platform, our journey will take the next step forward to creating a household brand.

Join us on our journey!

Risks and Challenges

Our journey over the last few years has allowed us to turn our passion for the outdoors and filming into an established business. Throughout our journey, our focus has been developing great products backed up by a passionate team whose major focus is customer service.

Developing products like this takes time, money and a lot of effort. Being fully self-funded thus far we have managed to develop our molds, packaging, and membrane to a point we are now in a position for final tweaks, testing and printing.

We have been working on GDome mobile for close to 18 months. We have been through multiple prototypes and have already made all the required molds (which has taken over 7 months to complete!). This means that we are months ahead of thoroughly tested GDome Mobile and are ready to start producing the GDome Mobile, we need your help to get the best pricing possible bring the GDome Extended Port to life! Crowdfunding will allow us to get upfront bulk orders, allowing us to negotiate part and shipping prices with our suppliers, thus allowing us to pass this saving on and share it with our GDome family. 

Shipping, Customs & Duties

International distribution is something we have learned to overcome with great shipping partners. 

International freight does come with its own set of challenges. As a business who has acquired all of the necessary permissions and licensing we abide by all laws and legislation.  With this in mind, we cannot mark any item as a 'gift' or as other items. It is illegal to do so.

Please note import duties and taxes are NOT INCLUDED in our reward levels. These charges vary by country and are not in our control.

We will be shipping the GDome Mobile all over the world and it is impossible for us to build the various customs charges into the various reward levels of Indiegogo.

You can use this tool to estimate additional costs.

http://www.importcalculator.com

Remember, we are the creators of GDome and GDome Mobile and not international customs, we make no money off local taxes and duties. You can use this tool as estimates when determining additional costs in receiving our products.

30-Day Money Back Guarantee 

As stated in our warranty section, we will happily replace the GDome for any defects in material and/or workmanship. 

We also provide a 30-Day Money Back Guarantee Policy. If you're unsatisfied with the GDome Mobile for any reason - within the first 30 days of receiving the GDome Mobile, you can return it undamaged for a full refund. We definitely are not here to take advantage of our backers nor exploit their belief in us by sending them something they weren't expecting, this is not how we operate at GDome.

Just remember, every dollar from this campaign will be directly used to paying off mold fees, patent fees, initial start-up costs, producing the packaging, fulfilling those orders and paying off all other expenses incurred thus far.

Team

They say Teamwork makes the Dream work. Our team makes the GDome dream possible. We pride ourselves on our customer service, innovation and truly stand behind the products we take to the market. 

Other Ways You Can Help

GDOME has established itself in the dome housing market over the last 4 years.  

Please share our content and engage with us - it helps us continue to grow!

We would love to hear from you and see your awesome GDome Mobile shots in the near future.

GDome Mobile
2 x Foam inserts 
Side Grip
Spares kit
Specs, Materials and performance testing
Glass-filled nylon body
Optically correct 6.1-inch dome lens (excluding flange)

Hardened steel reinforcement
Marine grade stainless steel screws and bolts
Total assembled weight 800 grams
Length 25cm (9.85 Inches), width 18cm (7 inches) & height 7.5cm (2.95 inches)
Our robust glass filled nylon housing is made structurally rigid with hardened steel. Its torsional rigidity allows the housing to maintain its seal as one descends deeper. Our V2 Dome was developed for specifically for the Mobile, with better optics and more scratch resistance, it is a major step up for us. Who are weGDome was founded in 2015 with the aim of creating an affordable dome housing. Our first version of the Dome took to the market by storm, allowing us to constantly improve and add to our product range. At the end of 2018 having launched our Version 3 PDS (Professional Dome System), we decided to take on a new challenge, the smartphone. We have spent four years developing GDome into a market leading brand. This has enabled us to grow our reputation, market share and product offering, allowing us to bring GDome Mobile to life! We built the GDome Mobile for everyone. We used our passion for water with our photographic expertise and experience to bring you a unique product. Patent ApplicationsWe have spent years and thousands of dollars developing our products. In order to protect our designs and concepts we have filed for the following full & or design patents:F2016/009462018/07018A2018/01882F2018/01883 For absolute peace of mind We guarantee all of our products and our reviews stand testament to this. All units are hand assembled, pressure tested and have to pass our quality control measures. We manufacture all of our products in house to ensure the best care is taken right from raw material inspection to final product testing.The GDome Mobile is a waterproof housing made to be used on the surface of the water. Although we have dived to 30ft plus with the GDome Mobile, this was purely for testing purposes regardless of the fact it did not leak or damage the phones. The use of the touch membrane was not designed with great depths in mind. The diving backdoor which would make the housing rated to depths of 40m is in development and will be offered a discounted price to all Indiegogo backers towards the end of 2019. The GDome Mobile was designed with the intention of being a surface waterproof housing for depths that are not deeper than 5ms or 15ft.    Why Indiegogo?Being our first-time crowdfunding we looked to Indiegogo as the platform for us. Since the start of 2014, our business has established a great network of clients and customers. Having successfully shipped over 6000 GDome Housings we believe we are at a point that we can now seek crowdfunding with a proven track record.The funds we hope to generate from this campaign will allow us to continue developing our product offering without seeking private funding. With bulk upfront orders, we are able to negotiate lower manufacturing parts and shipping costs due to economies of scale. This allows us to focus on what we love doing, sharing our passion orientated products powered by the best customers we could ever dream of.With your feedback and using this platform, our journey will take the next step forward to creating a household brand.Join us on our journey!Risks and ChallengesOur journey over the last few years has allowed us to turn our passion for the outdoors and filming into an established business. Throughout our journey, our focus has been developing great products backed up by a passionate team whose major focus is customer service.Developing products like this takes time, money and a lot of effort. Being fully self-funded thus far we have managed to develop our molds, packaging, and membrane to a point we are now in a position for final tweaks, testing and printing.We have been working on GDome mobile for close to 18 months. We have been through multiple prototypes and have already made all the required molds (which has taken over 7 months to complete!). This means that we are months ahead of thoroughly tested GDome Mobile and are ready to start producing the GDome Mobile, we need your help to get the best pricing possible bring the GDome Extended Port to life! Crowdfunding will allow us to get upfront bulk orders, allowing us to negotiate part and shipping prices with our suppliers, thus allowing us to pass this saving on and share it with our GDome family. Shipping, Customs & DutiesInternational distribution is something we have learned to overcome with great shipping partners. International freight does come with its own set of challenges. As a business who has acquired all of the necessary permissions and licensing we abide by all laws and legislation.  With this in mind, we cannot mark any item as a 'gift' or as other items. It is illegal to do so.Please note import duties and taxes are NOT INCLUDED in our reward levels. These charges vary by country and are not in our control.We will be shipping the GDome Mobile all over the world and it is impossible for us to build the various customs charges into the various reward levels of Indiegogo.You can use this tool to estimate additional costs.http://www.importcalculator.comRemember, we are the creators of GDome and GDome Mobile and not international customs, we make no money off local taxes and duties. You can use this tool as estimates when determining additional costs in receiving our products.30-Day Money Back Guarantee As stated in our warranty section, we will happily replace the GDome for any defects in material and/or workmanship. We also provide a 30-Day Money Back Guarantee Policy. If you're unsatisfied with the GDome Mobile for any reason - within the first 30 days of receiving the GDome Mobile, you can return it undamaged for a full refund. We definitely are not here to take advantage of our backers nor exploit their belief in us by sending them something they weren't expecting, this is not how we operate at GDome.Just remember, every dollar from this campaign will be directly used to paying off mold fees, patent fees, initial start-up costs, producing the packaging, fulfilling those orders and paying off all other expenses incurred thus far.TeamThey say Teamwork makes the Dream work. Our team makes the GDome dream possible. We pride ourselves on our customer service, innovation and truly stand behind the products we take to the market. Other Ways You Can HelpGDOME has established itself in the dome housing market over the last 4 years.  Please share our content and engage with us - it helps us continue to grow!We would love to hear from you and see your awesome GDome Mobile shots in the near future.

story:
An honorific title given only to venerated teachers when they become a Zen Master.

Roshi is a minimalist's best friend for the ultimate backup battery solution without having to lug around cords, backup battery "bricks" or an ugly backup battery case.

Roshi is a patent pending portable backup battery device with an A-Grade Lithium Polymer 1,020 mAh battery enclosed in a sleek case measuring only 3.38 inches wide by 2.2 inches tall by 0.24 inches thick. We designed Roshi to fit in your wallet just like a credit card and to take up as little space as possible. You only have to know that it's there when you need it.

Does this look familiar?

At $19, a three foot long charging cable is a costly nuisance. Charging on the go shouldn't require lassoing a meter long cable into your pocket.

Great ideas start in the mind and are put to paper by the heart.

We tested various types of control boards and batteries out of existing battery packs to see if the design was even feasible with the space requisites.

The "Ah-ha" moment during sampling led to making our paper rendering illustrated:

While we were dissecting generic packs, we noticed that most have 3 power indicator lights built into the sides of the units and realized that our unit MUST integrate an upward facing power light design with 4 L.E.D.'s, so that it is able to be utilized without being touched to determine the power level left in the battery pack.

Our map with the 4 front facing L.E.D.'s:

Shell design with the 4 LEDs:

CAD, Side View A:

CAD,  Side View B:

We are awaiting the Apple Inc. design certification to produce the retail product in a certified Apple Inc. factory and need to set up the production tooling, finish the product's packaging and complete testing with independent quality control specialists.

Raw prototype functionality test:


Prototype, as-is:


With Backers' help, Roshi's retail version will have an all black durable case. We had the prototype case mold produced in white for easy viewing of problem areas and potential functionality issues. We will be making the appropriate adjustments to the case during the packaging time frame.

Prototype test 2, charging a Droid® AND iPhone 5® at the same time (we took the prototype to a local retailer to find a Droid® phone to use for the test since we don't have one):


Right now, the prototype can charge your phone and your phone can sync over Wi-Fi:


Part of our manufacturing costs are for allowing Roshi to charge and sync through the output plugs using the input plug without having to connect to Wi-Fi to sync. Yes, this is old fashioned, but what if you don't have Wi-Fi available and need to sync to your computer?

Recharging Roshi:


Do we know what we're doing? Yes!

We have developed 3 timelines for delivery; of which, we will notify our backers along the way of any delays with timeline expectations derived from our plan maps.

Here is our planned timeline (with expected delays):

Here is our mid-delay timeline:

Here is our long delay timeline (worst case scenario):


Our Gantt Chart:

It may take up to 14 days to fully receive the pledges after the project ends, but we are estimating enough received by day 7 to advance the factory their deposit.

Are these timelines realistic? Yes. How do we know? We know because we already experienced 90% of the process in order to get our prototype ready for testing and certification.

Apple certified factories know exactly what they are doing and are ahead of the curve. The Apple certified factory has been identified and is awaiting our go-ahead. They are an Apple MFi 6.0 certified factory located in China.

While we were going through the tooling process with the R&D factory, we were able to get the prototype certified with RoSH, CE, and the FCC. With Crowdfunding, the UL certification will be completed between May and June.

Our project costs are broken into 4 basic categories: Testing, Tooling, Manufacturing and Packaging. Within the main categories are costs like independent testers, tooling molds and setup fees, manufacturing and consumer certifications, and package design.

Our prototype was put together by a factory that is undergoing the Apple certification process. The factory cut us a deal on the tooling and mold costs compared to what it was going to cost us directly from a factory already certified by Apple Inc. The anticipated approval date is still unknown and we want to launch this product sooner rather than later. This is why we are Crowdfunding. We decided to go direct to an Apple Inc. certified factory to finalize the retail product instead of waiting out the certification to come through for our R&D Factory.

This decision added unexpected costs, but we felt it best not to wait another 2-3 months beyond the point at which this particular factory is at with the Apple® process. The disadvantage for us has led to creating an advantage for Crowdfunders.

Roshi is designed for sophisticated individuals whom live proactively instead of re-actively. Why wait until after your battery is dead only to worry about where your power cord is, where nearby outlets are, or whether you'll accidentally leave your phone behind while it's tethered to a wall.

Our Evangelist reward is only $10 more than a standard lightning® cable! A certain and special thank you to those early movers and adopters.

Are you ready to become a Zen Master? Pledge today and prove so.

The day started off at 6 am volunteering at Naples largest event of the year to raise money for a local children's charity. Countless phone calls, emails, and taking picture after picture for donors lead to a nearly-dead battery with an extremely important phone call scheduled just after the event that couldn't be rescheduled.

Unfortunately, my charge cable and "portable" backup battery were in my car well out of reach across town. The event ended successfully, but did not leave me with any time to reach the car. The call came in on my way to the car and the uncomfortable notice to the caller that the battery could die at any moment didn't alleviate the (good) stress of the call. Fortunately, the battery literally died just after hitting the call ended button. With all the hast, my keys were with one of the other volunteers and didn't realize it until I reached the car with no ability to call to have them dropped off.

Cables, bulky batteries and special battery cases are inconvenient and easily forgettable (and occasionally keys). Remembering to put your wallet and phone in your pocket (or purse) is habitual. The inconvenient additions are not.

Roshi is the bridge between convenience and habitual tendencies.

Thomas O'Riordan, Enso LLC - Innovator, Inventor & Entrepreneur

Thomas's childhood dream was to be his own boss, start his own companies, be self-reliant, create value and positive change.

That dream became a goal and a reality several months after graduating from Chapman University's George Argyros School of Business and Economics in 2009 with a B.S. in Business Administration emphasizing in Entrepreneurship. Six months after graduating, he closed an Angel-funded 6-figure deal on his first start-up company.

Douglas Thomas - Sourcing & IT

Seasoned technology and sourcing professional with over 20 years of experience in international sourcing, operations, and finance.  Douglas started out in banking working with small start-up companies and transitioned to Southern California in the late 1990s during the technology boom. 

Douglas Led K2 subsidiary IT and sourcing programs in both US and Asia. Possessing both entrepreneurial spirit and a solid business focus on utilizing new technology to solve challenges, Douglas will drive the operational efficiency and efficacy to high levels.  Currently, Douglas is a consultant for some of the leading fashion and action sports branding companies regarding their ERP software and integrations.

Disclosures

*Google Inc. wholly owns the Droid®, Android®, et al trademarks. No endorsement by Google is implied. Any reference herein is intended with strict limitations, as outlined by Google Inc., with respect to their registered and/or pending marks. Apple Inc. wholly owns the iPhone®, Lightning®, et al trademarks. No endorsement by Apple Inc. is implied. Any reference herein is intended with strict limitations, as outlined by Apple Inc., with respect to their register and/or pending marks.

Risks and challenges

Fail first and often to narrow down the obstacles, inconceivable variables and unexpected barriers to success. As a testament to its' very definition, Roshi has mastered it's skills to be what it stands for in perpetuity. All of our R&D roadblocks are out of the way and our goal is in clear sight.

We are firm believers in the only obstacle being money when it comes to finishing products. We believe there isn't a reason to ask our customers to take a risk that we aren't willing to take ourselves without firm absolution that the missing link is excess care and quality being devoted to the product. We've completed the supply chain conundrum and are ready to finalize Roshi with the absolve that maximizing quality over quantity is at the utmost importance.

story:
HUB.FM - music id, discovery, storage, mood, visualization, recording, & live broadcast from any device

current features in place:

1.)  audio mood visualizer plays, records, & streams on mobile, chromecast, & desktop

2.)  multiple icecast stream & playlist creation for unlimited users

3.)  soundcloud sync with search, groups, like, playlists, tracks, followers, following

4.)  google drive & amazon s3 bucket sync

5.)  stats for tracks, playlists, streams, & geolocation

6.)  dropship from our merchandise site - shirt.fm

features to be developed with indiegogo funds:

1.)  convert to angular, demo @ iradio.tv

2.)  create hybrid mobile app with ionic / phonegap

3.)  sync dropbox, itunes, spotify, youtube

4.)  integrate audio fingerprinting similar to shazam

5.)  integrate seatgeek concert ticket api

6.)  enable dropship for members from shirt.fm

t-shirt rewards

White-T & Play Logo

Sport Grey-T & Happy Logo

Black-T & Chill Logo

Long Sleeve Red Chill

Long Sleeve Red Guru


artist signed matte canvas print


mixji™ by thos.benton

story:
World's first power generating smartphone case   



HOW DOES IT WORK?

Just unfold the crank handle and spin.  The handle is connected to a rare earth magnet dynamo generator.  This generator produces serious power to charge your phone in fact its  23 times more powerful than solar and it works at night!  The AMPware Case gives you backup talk/text time when you have no access to wall power.  In an emergency a charged phone could be a lifesaver!

                    

FEATURES:


OUR DESIGN JOURNEY:

Mark Gabriel and Erik Durr are the co-founders of AMPware. 

In 2005, Gabriel and Durr were both directly affected by Hurricane Katrina.  Separated from loved ones, they relied solely on their cell phones to keep in contact with friends and family.  

This disaster became the inspiration for the AMPware Case, a way to keep a smartphone powered in any situation. 

Durr and Gabriel met while engineering students at Louisiana State University in Baton Rouge.  They have worked together as technical leads on several startups since they met in 2008.  They are committed to making this product reality and they have been through many design concepts to get to this point.        


MANUFACTURING PLAN:

Currently we have a working model  and manufacturing plans.  With our background in startups, we have already developed relationships with manufacturers and suppliers.  We want to keep control over production, so assembly of the AMPware Case will be right here in the USA. We need your contributions to keep us going.  This will allow us to make AMPware into a household name. 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS:


How much do I have to crank it?

The AMPware Case can produce up to 1 full amp of power! 

5 minutes of cranking can generate:



How to pay and add Shipping

You may combine shipping in with the original payment amount.  You may type in the total amount after you chose your perk.

OR

If you forgot to add shipping initially, then please add a separate contribution for the shipping amount.  We will use your email address to link the shipping payment to any earlier perks you may have claimed.


What does the AMPware Case come with?

When you order on Indiegogo, you will receive:

  • One AMPware Case
  • Recognition on our website as an early backer.


What color does it come in?

AMPware Case will initially be available in black.   We will expand to other colors in the future


What smartphones will it be made for?

AMPware will start as a case for iPhone® 6/6s.  After our initial production, we will begin to release other model types for popular devices.  


How can I contact the AMPware team?

If you have any questions or comments, please email info@getampware.com


Stay AMPed!


*Calculated battery life is based on normal and standby usage of an iPhone® 6. Actual power generation and battery life will vary depending cranking RPM and phone usage. iPhone® is a registered trademark of Apple® Inc.

U.S. & International Patents Pending

*Calculated battery life is based on normal and standby usage of an iPhone® 6. Actual power generation and battery life will vary depending cranking RPM and phone usage. iPhone® is a registered trademark of Apple® Inc.
U.S. & International Patents Pending

story:
Here at ActionProof we put a strong emphasis on cultivating our relationship with the action-loving community. This is why we are offering this great opportunity to our first Indiegogo backers!! By supporting our campaign right now, you will be one of the first to receive THE BUMPER in May at a special price (over 30% off!!).

Choose one of our perks and as a big thanks, the ActionProof team is taking care of all shipping costs during the campaign! 

Keep in mind that if you wait until after our Indiegogo campaign has ended to place your order, you will have to purchase THE BUMPER at its regular price ($35) via our website and shipping will not be included. 

Pre-order now before anyone else! Get ready for action!



Anticipating the release of the Apple Watch™, our team has developed THE BUMPER, the first shock absorber for this new revolutionary technology.

THE BUMPER is not a cover. It is an easy-on protection for your Apple Watch™ in order for you to wear it in extreme conditions.

Your smartwatch will be protected and its features unobstructed.

Apple Watch™ will be the most beautiful wearable technology in the world and, thanks to us, also the most protected.







1. UNPARALLELED PROTECTION

  • 360º rubber shock absorption
  • Fits on any 42mm Apple Watch™ 
2. SAFETY WITHOUT SACRIFICING CONTROL

  • Full access to the screen

3. FULL ACCESS TO DIGITAL CROWN

  • Can be rotated and pressed even while protected

4. EASY ACCESS TO BUTTON

  • Take control anytime

5. UNALTERED AUDIO FUNCTIONS

  • Speakers and microphone are free to perform in any situation

6. UNOBSTRUCTED HEALTH SENSORS

  • Sensors are always in contact with your skin
  • Made with analergyc material

7. EASY ON, READY IN A FLASH

  • Time is key when it comes to action. THE BUMPER is easy to install in one simple move, even in the most difficult and extreme situations.





Material

Ultra Resistant Rubber

Features

High Resistance to UV Radiation, Ozone and Outdoor Exposure

Temperature Resistance: Min. -40°C / Max. 120°C

Torsion and Shock Resistant 

Resistant to chemical aggressions 

Resistant to Abrasion 

Dimensions

41mm x 44mm x 11 mm / 1,61 x 1,73 x 0,43 inch

Notes

Compatible with the (big) 42mm Apple Watch™

360° Rubber shock-absorber protection

Patents

Italian patents pending n 102015000007604 and n 202015000007605.

European community design pending n. 002647008



The introduction of technological devices has changed how we approach sports and outdoor activities. Every performance metric can be measured and evaluated with devices like the iPhone and Apple Watch™, making them integral parts of an active life. But unlike traditional sports equipment, these devices need protection. That’s why we’ve made it our mission to guarantee full protection and maximum comfort for every active user.







ABOUT THE PROJECT:

Over the past several months, we have been focused on gathering all the available information about the Apple Watch™. Through a process of reverse engineering, we transformed the photos we found online into a 3D model with a very high level of precision. 

Then, using a high quality, anallergic rubber material, we designed our first prototypes. The next step before starting production is to finally get our hands on an Apple Watch! We will make sure that our prototypes work perfectly, do some fine tuning if needed, and start production immediately to get THE BUMPER in your hands as fast as possible. With our production partner ready to go, we are prepared to deliver THE BUMPER in May 2015. 

Support us with your perk and get THE BUMPER before anyone else! Regular sales will start only after we have delivered all Indiegogo orders.











We have decided to further your requests! 

Therefore here you can find some images showing different possible combinations of TheBumper.


MOUNTING INSTRUCTIONS
Many of you have asked us to show how THE BUMPER will be mounted. We have done our best to show the procedure without having an Apple Watch in our hands yet.





The Actionproof team has a love for Apple and a passion for extreme sports, which inspired us to create THE BUMPER.

story:
Thank you to all of you that contributed to the Cling On Tuner campaign. It is amazing to see so many people from around the world to show their interest in this product. All in all, supporters from over 26 US States and 24 countries from 6 continents around the globe are going to be the first owners of the Cling On Tuner! Congratulations and THANK YOU!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Cling On™ Tuner is a COMPACT and STYLISH digital tuner that WILL mount just about anywhere on ANY string instrument! A must have for any musician!

SO small...

      SO SLEEK...

            SO VERSATILE...

It's the FIRST and ONLY tuner that can be truly HIDDEN out of sight, thanks to its INNOVATIVE MOUNTING TECHNOLOGY!

 

 

 

 

.......................................................................................

 

 

TWO MODELS TO CHOOSE FROM:

Classic Titanium Cling On™ Tuner MSRP $39.99

 

Limited Edition Cling On™ Tuner MSRP $42.00

.......................................................................................

 

What is REVOLUTIONARY about the Cling On™ Tuner?

 

The Cling On™ Tuner is:

•        WORLD’S ONLY tuner that can be truly HIDDEN behind the headstock of most guitars, as well as many other fretted instruments.

•        WORLD’S FIRST tuner to tune “Dropped D” string in guitar mode. It will display that as string "0 D". Your only other alternative so far was to use a chromatic tuner.

•        WORLD'S MOST VERSATILE tuner that can attach almost ANYWHERE on virtually ANY stringed instrument, as long as the surface is flat.

•        SIX tuners in ONE including chromatic, guitar, ukulele, banjo, cello and bass tuners. Most other tuners have no more than 3 instrument modes.

•        One of the MOST ENERGY-CONSERVING tuners - The Cling On™ Tuner will automatically shut off in 4 minutes.  If the tuner is used for 4 minutes every single day, the battery is expected to last well over 2 years. Most other tuners stay on until they are turned off, or until they do not detect vibration for a certain period of time. But what happens if you forget to turn it off and continue playing? It will stay on and it will drain the battery.

•        One of the MOST ACCURATE tuners - Behind the small size of the device is hiding a machine that provides over 99% accuracy and an almost instant readout (under 20ms response time).

•        One of the MOST ELLEGANT tuners - During the design process a lot of attention was paid not only to its functionality, but also to the visual aesthetics of the tuner itself. No cheap plastics will be used, so not only will it look great, but it will also feel great in your hands.

•        DEDICATED BUTTONS - No multi-function button to confuse you.  The Cling On™ Tuner will use dedicated buttons that will make it very clear and easy for anyone to jiggle through the many features without any confusion.

• One of the MOST COMPACT tuners with one of the LARGEST LCD DISPLAYS. This large color backlit LCD display (35mm/1.38”diagonally) is very easy to read from a distance even in the darkest dungeon.

 

 Dimensions of the Cling On Tuner:

 

 

How and where can the tuner be attached to the instrument?

The mount uses the force of suction. With a simple twist it clings to the surface with a hold so strong, that it can lift up most stringed instruments. This tight connection also allows for the vibration of the instrument to be easily transferred on to the tuner, providing the sensitivity and accuracy needed. With only 36mm (1.42 inches) in diameter this little mount can be placed almost anywhere on the instrument as long as the surface is flat and non-porous. If the surface is porous then you have the option to use one of the nearly invisible clear round stickers that will be included with the tuner. They will provide the necessary non-porous surface for the mount to cling on to the instrument. Most guitars for example have a high gloss finish, or painted surface, so that provides the adequate surface for the mount to cling on, WITHOUT the stickers.

Limited Edition tuner mounted on headstock of classical and electric guitar:

 

Cling On™ Tuner mounted on the soundboard of classical and electric guitar:

 

Cling On™ Tuner mounted on different places on the side of a classical guitar:

 

Cling On™ Tuner mounted on a banjo:

 

Cling On™ Tuner mounted on an ukulele:

 

If the tuner is mounted near the heel or behind the headstock it doesn't have to be removed when the guitar is placed inside a case:

 

 

Other than the color how is the Limited Edition tuner different?

The Limited Edition Tuner will be produced in limited quantity, so you will be one of the few people around the world that will have the opportunity to own this tuner. It will also include a small VELVET POUCH to store the tuner when not in use. It's convenient and will also provide the protection and respect that your Limited Edition Cling On™ Tuner deserves!

Velvet Pouch for Limited Edition Tuner:

 

 

Who needs the Cling On™ Tuner?

Anybody playing a stringed instrument will benefit from having a Cling On™ Tuner. Whether you are a professional musician performing at concerts and gigs, or a teacher, student, or just a guitar aficionado, you have to tune your instrument. The Cling On™ Tuner is making tuning a lot easier and more fun. The popular clip tuner is primarily used by guitarists because it can clip to the headstock. However, that is the only place where this tuner can be attached to. On the contrary, the Cling On™ Tuner gives you the flexibility to attach it ANYWHERE on ANY string instrument as long as there is a flat section on the instrument with the size of the mount (36mm/ 2.41").

 

Cling On™ Tuner mounted on instruments other than guitar:

 

.......................................................................................

 

 

Where is the Cling On™ Tuner in the development process?

It has been a lot of hard work to design and construct all the necessary components, including all plastic parts, printed circuit board, LCD screen and backlight. But I am happy to announce that at the time of starting this campaign most of the work in the design, development and testing have been completed and the results have been outstanding. The Cling On™ Tuner  is currently in pre-production stage, meaning that all components have been designed, constructed and tested. All CAD files are completed and verified, and they are ready for the production process. What you see in the video and the pictures are fully functional prototypes. What's left is to finalize few minor tweaks in the programming, as well as the exact color that would be the closest to what you see in the rendering.

 

Where is it going to be manufactured?

I have established a relationship with a highly reputable company in China that specializes in manufacturing digital musical equipment including tuners, so this isn't a new venture for them. From the first sketch to pre-production they have been extremely professional and very attentive to my requests to make the Cling On™ Tuner exactly the way I envisioned it. I am very confident that you would be completely satisfied with the outcome of the first production run of the Cling On™ Tuner.

 

Why do I need your support?

There are over 15 different components (not counting nuts and bolts), including over 10 plastic parts that require building tools for the injection molding, as well as several electronic components including the PCB panel, LCD and backlight. At this point, we completed and tested the tools for all plastic components, so they are ready for mass production. Manufacturing the PCB panel and the LCD is very technological and sophisticated process. They are both designed and ready for production. To be able to get to a price point that would make financial sense, these components will have to be produced on a much larger scale. Your support is giving me the financial leverage I need to lower the production cost. 

 

Why would you consider supporting this project!

 By contributing to this project you are not only going to get the Cling On Tuner at a great price, but more importantly you are becoming an integral part of this journey. With your support you are essentially helping make this idea become a reality. 

 

.......................................................................................

SPECIAL THANKS:

Creating a new product from start to finish can't be done by just one person, regardless of his or her experience. I am extremely grateful to everyone involved in this project. If it wasn't for their trust, help and professionalism, as well as patience, the Cling On™ Tuner would not have been possible. I can't make this in my garage:)

Without any particular order I want to express my SINCERE THANKS to:

- The manufacturing partner in China with their amazing team of engineers and designers.

- Stanislav Evstatiev, Svilen Dimitrov, and  Vladimir Stanchev from Zoom Design for working so hard on creating the two wonderful animations just for this campaign.

- Verginiya Kadina for designing the logo, retail packaging, various graphic design work, and her professional advice.

- My brothers Nikola and Vasil Chekardzhikov, who played and recorded with me (together as Triada Guitar Trio) the music for the classic animation.

- Grammy winning Los Angeles Guitar Quartet for letting me "butcher" their wonderful arrangement of the famous piece known as Pachelbel's "loose" Canon.

- Marcus Macmillan and James McMillan for recording and engineering the music for the classic animation and the video for this project.

- Alex Beroza (feat. 3amAssociation) for the permission to use "Improvisation on a Friday" (ccmixter.org, licensed under Creative Commons License 3.0)

- And last but not least, Thank You in advance to ALL of YOU INDIEGOGO SUPPORTERS!

story:
Short Summary

I'm Olivia Scrivanich, an author, screenwriter, actor (just got my first part in season two of webseries "The Weepers").  I'm also the creator of BreathWash Touch-free Automatic Mouthwash Dispenser!

I’m moving forward with this idea I had over 25 years ago.  I knew this idea was ahead of its time but was unaware of the technology needed to power it.  We all know it exists today.  

**You're support is vital to make BreathWash become a reality for everyone!  Because of YOU I'll be moving forward with a dream I had years ago!  I don't have the words to express my gratitude to you all.  When you checkout the BreathWash  for Kids tab a lot of parents and their children will be happy too!  BreathWash will be everywhere and YOU made it happen...how great is that?!


What We Need & What You Get

  • With the research, pre-development and patent work done, I'm at the stage where we're ready for the final design, development  and marketing of BreathWash.  This is where I really need your help to raise $11,000 to cover those costs.
  • PERKS range from a "Thank You" to a round of golf with Alonzo Metz - former SEAHAWKS Linebacker, Nesby Glasgow - 14 Years NFL former SEAHAWKS Defensive Back, Randall Morris, former SEAHAWKS Running Back and KID SENSATION (Xola Malik)!!
  • If I don't reach my entire goal, the funds will still go to the final design and development of BreathWash and I'll just have to figure out another way to raise the rest!

The Impact

I have already been contacted by some business owners that want it for their establishment and that happened even before the site was even finished!

Oral Hygiene is so important.  BreathWash goes beyond the usual mint or stick of gum!

Just picture where you'll see it when we reach our goal:

·  Your home

·  Hotels

·  Restaurants

·  Dental Offices

·  Office buildings

·  Salons

·  Spas

·  Airports…

Everywhere there is a person with a mouth...there's BreathWash.  I can see the people expecting to see in in the bathroom just like the automatic, soap dispenser, water faucet, towel dispenser and...yep...toilets!

Other Ways You Can Help

Unable to contribute?  No problem!

  • Just get the word out to your family, friends & social networks and create a buzz about BreathWash
  • It's easy...just use the Indiegogo share tools!

THANK YOU ALL!!!

I have already been contacted by some
business owners that want it for their establishment and that happened even before
the site was even finished!
Oral Hygiene is so important.  BreathWash goes beyond the usual mint or stick of gum!Just picture where you'll see it when we reach our goal:
· 
Your home
· 
Hotels
· 
Restaurants
· 
Dental Offices
· 
Office buildings
· 
Salons
· 
Spas
· 
Airports…Everywhere there is a person with a mouth...there's BreathWash.  I can see the people expecting to see in in the bathroom just like the automatic, soap dispenser, water faucet, towel dispenser and...yep...toilets!Other Ways You Can HelpUnable to contribute?  No problem!
Just get the word out to your family, friends & social networks and create a buzz about BreathWash

It's easy...just use the Indiegogo share tools!

THANK YOU ALL!!!

story:
Presenting the weather resistant LED waist pack that charges your phone. 

Perfect for runners, cyclists, hikers, walkers, parents and children - anyone that values safety and an active lifestyle will love the BSEEN!





The BSEEN is perfect for:


Press

Cult of Mac: "You can charge your smartphone while cycling or running with an accessory also designed to keep you alive on the road. Sounds like a lot to ask of a battery pack, but the Boost Pack by BSEEN does both with a rather simple design."

Incredible Gear: "Meet BSEEN: a LED waist pack with multiple lighting modes that keeps you visible in the outdoors."

Fitness Gizmos: "It keeps you visible outdoors without getting in your way."

Cool Wearable: "It is lightweight, water resistant, and easy to use."





Do you usually run in the dark?
According to RunKeeper, Americans run the most at 6am and 6pm.
That means that many people work out when it is dark. In some other countries, this time is even earlier in the morning or even later at night. 

The National Safety Council states that chances of being struck and killed as a pedestrian increase 1100% after dark. Reflectors provide some visibility, but are only effective in the presence of a light source, and can be hard to see from certain angles.


The BSEEN pack is illuminated as well as reflective, so you are even more likely to be seen. The battery will provide up to 180 hours of consecutive illumination in flash mode. Our lighted products can be seen from 250 yards away.


Has your phone ever died far from home?


Many people fear not having their phone available to them when they need it. On a long run or bike ride, you may be listening to music or using GPS, which can drain the batteries quickly. 





The BSEEN Boost pack has a 4000 mAh backup battery, which can give the average smartphone (iPhone 6, Samsung Galaxy, HTC One) a full charge and give you the peace of mind that you will stay connected when away from home. Listen to as much music as you want without worrying about draining the battery. The battery is removable, so it's easy to recharge and also take on the go without the pack.

AVAILABLE FOR BSEEN BOOST PERKS ONLY. The phone charging battery pack is not available for BSEEN Basic perks.


Know that your children are safe and seen.


The BSEEN waistband is highly adjustable, so even a young child can wear one. This pack is perfect for night walks and late family outings.


Store all of your necessities.


The BSEEN pack holds everything you need on the go. Store your cell phone, wallet, keys, chapstick, and anything else you might want with you. Use the pack for storage during a daytime hike or add the light for an evening walk. We've got you covered.


Go the distance.


Take the BSEEN anywhere far from home. Know that you can rely on the extra battery to take you all the way.

The BSEEN Boost pack has a 4000 mAh battery, which gives your smartphone a full charge.



Worried about running in the rain?

Know that your belongings are safe from raindrops. The BSEEN is made up of water resistant materials and closes with water resistant zippers.



Our packs ain't cheap.


BSEEN packs are made of quality materials and the construction is designed to last for years and years. We don't skimp on quality because we want this to be your go-to pack for a long time.

We have access to our materials in different colors, so we are offering four great combinations to choose from! We will reach out to you at the end of the campaign to get your color choice.



BSEEN Options

We are also offering a lower cost BSEEN pack. All features and specifications are the same as the regular BSEEN, but without a backup battery pack. This means you cannot charge your phone using the pack, but you will have a little more storage and a little less weight (the total weight of the Basic pack will be approximately 5oz). The lights are just as awesome, and will last 4-6 hours between charges. The battery is easily recharged via cable.




Features

  • LED lighted section, which can be set to continuous or two flashing settings
  • 4000 mAh removable/rechargeable external battery to run lights and charge cell phone (BSEEN BOOST PERKS ONLY)
  • Main zip pocket to store phone and other necessities
  • Smaller interior pocket with velcro closure
  • Interior key clip
  • Headphone port
  • Water resistant easy to clean fabrics
  • Water resistant, smooth zippers
  • Reflective piping on various parts of the pack
  • Stretchy sides for a snug fit and less bounce
  • Adjustable waist belt with side-release buckle closure
  • Can be worn in front, in back or crossbody


Specifications

Dimensions of pocket section: 8"x 4.5" (20 cm x 11.5 cm). The pocket will fit most popular phones on the market, including the iPhone 6 and 6 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S6, LG G3, Nexus 6 and HTC One.

Waist belt: Tri-glide length adjustment, side-release buckle closure. Adjusts from approximately 22.5" (57 cm) to 39" (99 cm) with about 3" (7.5 cm) extra stretch from elastic on the sides.

Lights: Efficient LED light panel. Each panel is a polymer piece that is highly light transmitting. There is an LED at each end, so not much power is required and almost no heat is generated. There are 3 light settings: Continuous, Slow Flash and Rapid Flash.

Construction: Nylon and polyester construction, nylon waistbelt with elastic sides for snug fit, water-resistant outer zippers.

Weight: Battery and pack together: approximately 10 ounces.

External battery (BSEEN BOOST ONLY - NOT AVAILABLE IN BSEEN BASIC PERKS): Power: 4000 mAh. Dimensions: 120mm x 65mm x 9mm. Weight: 5.6 oz. Runs lights 120-180 hours or provides a full charge to a smartphone, or a combination of the two. Charges with micro-USB.



LED Slap Bands

Some of our special early bird perks come with LED slap bands. Wear them on your wrists, forearms or ankles while walking, running or cycling to help you BSEEN. The slap bands have two modes: continuous and flashing. Available colors include neon green, neon orange, neon pink and red. Choose your slap band colors at the end of the campaign.




Project Development

We have been working on this pack for about a year. We have been developing and selling our slap bands for about 3 years. We work directly with the factory, so we are able to make design refinements quickly and easily. This means we will be able to produce our pack quickly and get our perks shipped efficiently. We also used our pre-campaign to get feedback from our audience, which allowed us to narrow down to the most highly recommended features and colors.



Why we are crowdfunding

We are crowdfunding as a way to bring new and better products to market faster. We are a manufacturer so we already have the factories to make our product so we are able to develop products quickly and efficiently. We are also crowdfunding so that we can afford to create mass quantities of packs. This requires having a mold cut for the polymer piece that transmits light, and building up our inventory.

We are also looking to the potential users of our product to provide feedback so that we can improve and refine our current solution. We want to make the best, highest quality, and safest lighted pack possible, and the input of the public will make this goal attainable. We are also able to offer the best prices possible during the campaign, as a thank you to our buyers who are helping to support our development and refine our product.



About us

Ming D&Y Inc. is a California-based company that is actively involved in designing, developing, manufacturing and marketing LED lighted safety sporting goods. We already produce LED slap armbands, LED sporting belts, and many other lighted products. Because we manufacture our own products already, you can be confident that we will deliver quality products on a short timeline.

Trident Design is a product design and commercialization firm based in Columbus Ohio. They work with inventors, startups, and corporations to develop and market products and run crowdfunding campaigns. Trident is working with Ming D&Y to develop the content for the campaign, help market the product, and support in any way they can.




Risk and challenges

Because we are manufacturers, having this product made is very low risk for us. We have a factory that already can make our product, so we won't need the time and effort that a crowdfunding campaign typically requires in this stage.

There are a few things we still have to consider. Currently, the polymer that transmits light is created by cutting from an extruded piece. To mass produce the BSEEN, we will need a mold. We still need to cut and test the mold, which will take some time. We also need to ensure the polymer is clear enough to transmit light from a distance. We don't think this will be a big roadblock for us, but it could potentially effect our timeline.



FAQs

  • How does BSEEN charge my phone?
    Each BSEEN purchase includes a battery pack. There is a separate, hidden pocket where the battery is stored. The cable that powers the lights plugs into one USB port, and a phone charging cable can be plugged into the other USB port. Plug your phone in as normal to simultaneously power the lights and charge the phone. The battery pack can be removed easily to recharge.
  • How long does the battery last? 
    • The battery should last 120-180 hours on flashing mode, or charge a smartphone completely.
  • Will the BSEEN fit my phone?
    The pocket size has been increased to fit an iPhone 6 and 6 plus, LG G3, Nexus 6, Samsung Galaxy S6, HTC One and several other similarly sized phones. 
  • What else will fit in the pouch?
    We have been able to fit all our necessities; an iPhone, small wallet, and house key can all be carried simultaneously.
  • Does the pack come with a phone charger?
    No, the battery has a USB port that you can plug your existing charger into. The BSEEN does not come with a phone charging cable, only a micro-USB charger for the battery pack.
  • How do I charge the backup battery?
    The backup battery can be removed from the pouch, and can be charged with an included micro-USB cable. You can plug it into your computer's USB port or an existing wall charger.
  • When are the perks expected to ship?
    NEED TO FIGURE THIS OUT
  • Can I change or cancel my perk?
    Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust your perk selection. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on IndieGogo are also non-refundable.
  • How much will shipping cost?
    Shipping costs will be indicated on each perk. The cost of shipping depends on the country the product will be shipping to.
  • How do I contact the BSEEN campaign managers?
    Email us with questions, press opportunities and bulk inquiries at contact@lightedpack.com.


Referral program

GET 1 FRIENDS TO BUY A BSEEN, GET A FREE LED SLAP BAND! No limit!

How it works:

  1. Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here.
  2. Click the "Link" icon on the top left of the page to get your personal URL, or begin sharing on social media by simply clicking the "Facebook" or "Twitter" buttons with your URL pre-loaded.
  3. When you click on any share tool on the campaign page, then you’ll automatically get a post or tweet that’s ready-to-go with your personal URL.

How to track your results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  5. Count the number of funders.


Contact

For press and bulk order inquires please contact us at contact@lightedpack.com.

story:
AutoAAN Answering Machine App
Never Pay for Voicemail Again

Phone companies make 100’s of millions of dollars a year on voicemail. We want you to keep that money.
Automatic Answer And Notify (AutoAAN) is the answering machine app that lives in your smartphone! Now callers can leave a message directly on your phone - no voicemail service is required from your mobile provider. Buy AutoAAN once, and never pay for voicemail again!

Do you know how much you’re paying?
Many of us spend over $90 every year for the privilege of having others leave us messages. You may not realize how much you’re paying because it’s bundled into a package, but here are some common voicemail prices in the US and Canada:




Save $600 With AutoAAN
 
Savings are based on a $5 monthly. The same cost of having AutoAAN forever!!!  
For $5 you can have voice mail forever
We are limiting the number of apps we sell at $5 to only 500 as a way of thanking people who pre-buy and support the campaign. The next lot will be at $10. We are in the process of completing a survey that will help determine the final price. The suggested retail price is $20.

With AutoAAN, you pay once and never get charged again - kind of like buying an answering machine, but much more high tech. Even if you’re on a cheap plan, AutoAAN pays for itself just a few months. AutoAAN will work in the US, Canada, the UK, Australia, Japan - anywhere. Since the app resides on your phone it is independent of your mobile provider so it will work on any cellular carrier.

If 1 million people made the investment of AutoAAN, that would lead to savings of $60,000,000*** which consumers get to keep instead of making the phone companies richer. VoIP started a tidal wave of long-distance savings; now AutoAAN is going to provide the same for voicemail users.

Sample AutoAAN Now!
A new browser will open to demonstrate the app
 
"I'm watching cat videos, please leave a message"
Your life is more dynamic than "I'm not available, leave me a message." You're in meetings, having dinner, out at a club, exercising and living! AutoAAN provides contextual messages to callers so they have a better understanding of your situation and when you'll be returning their important call. Now you'll have options.

When your phone rings, you'll be provided with a list of answering messages for the caller to hear. Having a business lunch? Let the caller know, "Hi, I'm at lunch right now, but should be finished in an hour or so. I'll return your message when I'm done." In a noisy location? Let the caller know, "Hey, it's really loud where I am right now, leave me a message and I'll call you from a quieter location shortly."

AutoAAN will come with a number of professionally pre-recorded messages so you can get started immediately. If you want to record your own messages, you’ll be able to do that, too. Provide your caller with more details and more context than ANY other voicemail system!

Help us bring AutoAAN to market
My name is Daniel Feuer, and I’m a long-time entrepreneur. AutoAAN was something that popped into my head through necessity. My mobile phone is an important tool for me and it’s kept close by at most times. Even when nature calls, my phone is with me - but it’s difficult to answer the phone at those times! When that call literally happened to me, I really wanted to let the caller know that I was “busy” and that I'd call back in a few minutes - AutoAAN was born!

We’ve been working on AutoAAN for over three years and she’ll be coming to market no matter what, but we can do it more quickly with your support. Developers have been working diligently for many months on the UI and programming to make AutoAAN a reality. Proceeds from this campaign will go to our developers so they can complete the app ASAP.

So why should you support us?
  • You believe that you should be in control of your voicemail.
  • You want to be the first to break away from your carrier’s antiquated voicemail system.
  • You want to provide context to people when they leave you a message.
  • You could save yourself $100’s of dollars by forgoing perpetual voicemail billing.
Realize the potential of what an app like AutoAAN can achieve: there’s never been a voicemail app that resides in your phone. Together, we can provide a competitive alternative to overpriced voicemail.

Why does voicemail suck?
You mean besides the cost, being locked to a provider, limited message storage, and no contextual messages?

Length limits. Limits on voicemail length may be the stuff of romantic comedy, but they are so 1990s. AutoAAN has no length limits.

Storage limits. How often do you hear “This mailbox is full” when you try to call your friends? With AutoAAN, the number of messages that can be stored is only limited by the free space on your phone. AutoAAN puts voicemail control where it belongs - in your hands. The voicemail is on your phone, not on someone else’s computer system.

Uni-Message. Current voicemail technology only allows for one message to be played to callers. Contextual voicemail allows for real-time, dynamic playback of messages to callers specifying your situation.

Why doesn’t this exist already?
I’ve spent over three and a half years trying to build the technology behind this, beyond that, your guess is as good as mine. With over a million apps*** out there, why has no one succeeded in disrupting the huge, profitable voicemail industry?

But what if I get voicemail free from my provider?
AutoAAN is a perfect complement to basic voicemail. Use the AutoAAN app for your primary voicemail and your carrier’s as a backup for the times you are out of the service area or your phone is off. Make sure what you have is really “free”. Some carriers bundle voicemail in an add-on package. Generally speaking if you have less options in your bundle by removing voicemail you’ll save yourself money!

AutoAAN is priced to be affordable. Some mobile providers charge more for few month’s worth of voicemail than it costs to have AutoAAN forever!

Frequently Asked Questions

Q   Can I have both AutoAAN and my carrier’s voicemail?
A   Yes! AutoAAN is a perfect replacement for your carrier’s voicemail, but both can work at the same time. However, we do recommend getting the cheapest carrier voicemail plan you can buy!
   
Q What happens if I turn my phone off or the battery dies?
A   AutoAAN only works when your phone is on and you have service. But one of the benefits of AutoAAN is that it can co-exist with your current mobile carrier’s voicemail. If you’re worried about missing voicemails, buy AutoAAN as your primary voicemail and downgrade to the most basic voicemail plan your carrier sells. Then, if your phone runs out of power or you’re out of the coverage area, callers can still leave a message.
   
Q   How long can the messages be?
A   There is no restriction on the length of messages callers leave.
   
Q   What happens to my messages if I buy a new phone?
A   You can remove and transfer messages to you computer or to the cloud through services such as DropBox.
     
Q   How many messages can be saved in AutoAAN?
A   As many as the free storage available on your device can handle.
   
Q   Can I move the messages off the phone?
A   Yes. The messages are stored on your phone as MP3 files. You can back-up and move the messages just as you can with most other files.
   
Q   I have a dual SIM phone. Will Auto AAN work?
A   Yes. AutoAAN will provide you a convenient unified location for your messages. You won’t have to dial two different systems to get your messages.
   
Q   Will AutoAAN work with my mobile phone provider?
A   AutoAAN is not dependent on your carrier and will function with any provider.
   
Q   Will my carrier charge extra for using AutoAAN?
A   AutoAAN is answering your phone, so applicable airtime charges may apply. Make sure you understand your mobile provider agreement.


Footnotes:
* Assuming the $5 monthly voicemail plan allows for 35 five minute messages. Best Buy has a 4TB drive costing CA$170 - http://www.bestbuy.ca/en-CA/product/wd-wd-my-bo... CA$5 would buy 117.64Gb. At 64 Kbps, a five minute message takes up 3200kb. Therefore 36764 messages could be stored.

** 1,000,000 mobile subscribers with voicemail each costing CA$5 per month over one year

*** Apple announces 1 million apps in the App Store - http://www.theverge.com/2013/10/22/4866302/appl...

Prices are in Canadian dollars unless otherwise noted. Copywrites and Trademarks are owned by their respective companies.
story_txt:
AutoAAN Answering Machine App Never Pay for Voicemail Again




Phone companies make 100’s of millions of dollars a year on voicemail. We want you to keep that money.
Automatic Answer And Notify (AutoAAN) is the answering machine app that lives in your smartphone! Now callers can leave a message directly on your phone - no voicemail service is required from your mobile provider. Buy AutoAAN once, and never pay for voicemail again!
Do you know how much you’re paying?

Many of us spend over $90 every year  for the privilege of having others leave us messages. You may not realize how much you’re paying because it’s bundled into a package, but here are some common voicemail prices in the US and Canada:






Save $600 With AutoAAN




 


Savings are based on a $5 monthly. The same cost of having AutoAAN forever!!!
 


For $5 you can have voice mail forever
We are limiting the number of apps we sell at $5 to only 500 as a way of thanking people who pre-buy and support the campaign. The next lot will be at $10.  We are in the process of completing a survey that will help determine the final price.  The suggested retail price is $20.

With AutoAAN, you pay once and never get charged again - kind of like buying an answering machine, but much more high tech. Even if you’re on a cheap plan, AutoAAN pays for itself just a few months.
AutoAAN will work in the US, Canada, the UK, Australia, Japan - anywhere. Since the app resides on your phone it is independent of your mobile provider so it will work on any cellular carrier.
If 1 million people made the investment of AutoAAN, that would lead to savings of  $60,000,000*** which consumers get to keep instead of making the phone companies richer. VoIP started a tidal wave of long-distance savings; now AutoAAN is going to provide the same for voicemail users.  




Sample AutoAAN Now!A new browser will open to demonstrate the app



 



"I'm watching cat videos, please leave a message"

Your life is more dynamic than "I'm not available, leave me a message." You're in meetings, having dinner, out at a club, exercising and living! AutoAAN provides contextual messages to callers so they have a better understanding of your situation and when you'll be returning their important call.
Now you'll have options.
 When your phone rings, you'll be provided with a list of answering messages for the caller to hear. Having a business lunch? Let the caller know, "Hi, I'm at lunch right now, but should be finished in an hour or so. I'll return your message when I'm done." In a noisy location? Let the caller know, "Hey, it's really loud where I am right now, leave me a message and I'll call you from a quieter location shortly."

AutoAAN will come with a number of professionally pre-recorded messages so you can get started immediately. If you want to record your own messages, you’ll be able to do that, too. Provide your caller with more details and more context than ANY other voicemail system!
Help us bring AutoAAN to market 
My name is Daniel Feuer, and I’m a long-time entrepreneur. AutoAAN was something that popped into my head through necessity. My mobile phone is an important tool for me and it’s kept close by at most times. Even when nature calls, my phone is with me - but it’s difficult to answer the phone at those times!  When that call literally happened to me, I really wanted to let the caller know that I was “busy” and that I'd call back in a few minutes - AutoAAN was born! 
We’ve been working on AutoAAN for over three years and she’ll be coming to market no matter what, but we can do it more quickly with your support.  Developers have been working diligently for many months on the UI and programming to make AutoAAN a reality. Proceeds from this campaign will go to our developers so they can complete the app ASAP. So why should you support us? 
You believe that you should be in control of your voicemail.
You want to be the first to break away from your carrier’s antiquated voicemail system.
You want to provide context to people when they leave you a message.
You could save yourself $100’s of dollars by forgoing perpetual voicemail billing.

Realize the potential of what an app like AutoAAN can achieve: there’s never been a voicemail app that resides in your phone. Together, we can provide a competitive alternative to overpriced voicemail. Why does voicemail suck? 

You mean besides the cost, being locked to a provider, limited message storage, and no contextual messages?
Length limits. Limits on voicemail length may be the stuff of romantic comedy, but they are so 1990s. AutoAAN has no length limits. Storage limits. How often do you hear “This mailbox is full” when you try to call your friends? With AutoAAN, the number of messages that can be stored is only limited by the free space on your phone. AutoAAN puts voicemail control where it belongs - in your hands. The voicemail is on your phone, not on someone else’s computer system. Uni-Message. Current voicemail technology only allows for one message to be played to callers.  Contextual voicemail allows for real-time, dynamic playback of messages to callers specifying your situation. Why doesn’t this exist already?

I’ve spent over three and a half years trying to build the technology behind this, beyond that, your guess is as good as mine. With over a million apps*** out there, why has no one succeeded in disrupting the huge, profitable voicemail industry?
But what if I get voicemail free from my provider?

AutoAAN is a perfect complement to basic voicemail.  Use the AutoAAN app for your primary voicemail and your carrier’s as a backup for the times you are out of the service area or your phone is off. Make sure what you have is really “free”. Some carriers bundle voicemail in an add-on package. Generally speaking if you have less options in your bundle by removing voicemail you’ll save yourself money!

AutoAAN is priced to be affordable. Some mobile providers charge more for few month’s worth of voicemail than it costs to have AutoAAN forever! Frequently Asked Questions


Q
 
Can I have both AutoAAN and my carrier’s voicemail? 


A
 
Yes! AutoAAN is a perfect replacement for your carrier’s voicemail, but both can work at the same time. However, we do recommend getting the cheapest carrier voicemail plan you can buy! 


 

 



Q

What happens if I turn my phone off or the battery dies?


A
 
AutoAAN only works when your phone is on and you have service. But one of the benefits of AutoAAN is that it can co-exist with your current mobile carrier’s voicemail. If you’re worried about missing voicemails, buy AutoAAN as your primary voicemail and downgrade to the most basic voicemail plan your carrier sells. Then, if your phone runs out of power or you’re out of the coverage area, callers can still leave a message. 


 

 


Q
 
How long can the messages be? 


A
 
There is no restriction on the length of messages callers leave. 


 

 


Q
 
What happens to my messages if I buy a new phone?


A
 
You can remove and transfer messages to you computer or to the cloud through services such as DropBox.


 
 
 


Q
 
How many messages can be saved in AutoAAN? 


A
 
As many as the free storage available on your device can handle. 


 

 


Q
 
Can I move the messages off the phone? 


A
 
Yes. The messages are stored on your phone as MP3 files. You can back-up and move the messages just as you can with most other files. 


 

 


Q
 
I have a dual SIM phone.  Will Auto AAN work? 


A
 
Yes. AutoAAN will provide you a convenient unified location for your messages.  You won’t have to dial two different systems to get your messages.


 

 


Q
 
Will AutoAAN work with my mobile phone provider? 


A
 
AutoAAN is not dependent on your carrier and will function with any provider. 


 

 


Q
 
Will my carrier charge extra for using AutoAAN? 


A
 
AutoAAN is answering your phone, so applicable airtime charges may apply.  Make sure you understand your mobile provider agreement.
